
-----title
蒲江 (出生地)
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='bb7449fd817c46f7a6c9eee31d94199e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bb7449fd817c46f7a6c9eee31d94199e");'><span id='bb7449fd817c46f7a6c9eee31d94199e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1198')">1178-1198年</a>，1-21岁</div><div id='bb7449fd817c46f7a6c9eee31d94199e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年6月8日</a>　本年生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1179&endYear=1180')">1179-1180年</a>　居乡。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　从乡先生何普受书数方名。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　从乡先生杜希仲受义理之学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1193')">1183-1193年</a>　居乡。作品：韩愈论。<div id='poem_1297843' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297843' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297843?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韩愈不及孟子论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297843")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297843_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297843'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297843'>凡天下欲为而不能者其辞厉，卫道之君子视天下之小不正，孰不欲大其门以受之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297843_comment'></div>然去圣贤愈远，私智曲学方视古为有加，而己之才力气量乃非古圣贤之比，则心声之发往往有峻厉而恨其不能者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297843_comment'></div>尝观韩昌黎答孟简一书，始终愤世嫉邪，类非平时雍容徐缓等语，说者以其不及孟子之辞为愈之过乎谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297843_comment'></div>吁，以愈之身而慨然自谓「韩愈不及」之语，愈之辞气亦厉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297843_comment'></div>彼其意盖以为邪说之移人，今已甚于孟子之时，以堂堂韩愈之贤乃不能如孟子之息邪说，号呼大叫于语人之际，愈诚有不足之恨哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297843_comment'></div>其曰「韩愈不及孟子」，恨之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297843_comment'></div>今夫喜怒哀乐之情，未有不自夫辞气之发者见之，然其意亦各有所向也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297843_comment'></div>成瞷谓「彼丈夫也，我丈夫也，吾何畏彼哉」，则是耻其不若人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297843_comment'></div>颜渊谓「舜何人也，予何人也，有为者亦若是」，则是必为而后已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297843_comment'></div>韩愈谓「彼能是，我乃不能是」，则是欲为而不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297843_comment'></div>夫惟欲为而不能者，其愤必深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297843_comment'></div>天下未有怀不能为之恨，而泰然帖息于辞气之表也，而况愈当抵排异端之日，又非若异时慕舜、周公之心比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297843_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297843_comment'></div>自昔异端之病天下，莫烈于战国，然孟子以亚圣大才，力闲先圣之道，貉白圭，夷许子，直夷之，妾妇仪、衍，羞比管、晏，又非止禽兽杨、墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297843_comment'></div>然当时邪说者不得作，虽以杨、墨之害牢不可破，且能康色以受其归，而侏离左衽之未有，后世犹赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297843_comment'></div>非轲之力于排击也，人心正而邪说自息，公道明而私见不作，轲之道盖有以受之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297843_comment'></div>今也降汉魏而唐，缁黄之徒风天下而惟己之从，其为害又惨于孟子之时，而愈乃以一世山斗，顾乃不能如孟子之所以受正人心之责，则以愈视轲，愈当少降哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297843_comment'></div>愈也学术所宗惟孟氏一人，而其言亦曰「愈尝推尊孟子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297843_comment'></div>平时推尊者，乃使异端小道屏息而不敢肆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297843_comment'></div>今非惟不能息，而又甚焉，含愤扼腕，宜其托诸孟简，慨叹其遗恨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297843_comment'></div>异时杏坛之语人，循循然应对进退，纡徐和缓，宛然有温厚之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297843_comment'></div>而今也愈之一书，峻厉激发，一则曰韩愈，二则曰韩愈，且凛然于辞气之表，而「不及孟子」等语，所以致其不若人之恨者亦深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297843_comment'></div>虽然，愈恨其不及孟子，其意不为不切，而夷考其论议，则愈与孟子固自有不容及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297843_comment'></div>孟子谓性本善也，愈则品而为三；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297843_comment'></div>孟子谓墨乱孔也，愈则合而为一；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297843_comment'></div>孟子谓尧舜不偏爱，而愈则有同仁之说；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297843_comment'></div>孟子言必称尧舜，而愈则有易伯之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297843_comment'></div>异时趑趄光范之门，又腼颜于孟子之藐大人、辞万钟者，尝使愈充其抵排攘斥之功以进于孟子纯全之地，则轲得其传矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1297843_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　从乡先生章寅臣受义理之学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年</a>　县试，居第三名，以文受知于蒲江县令冯仰之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年</a>　居乡。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年</a>　谢恩师范荪。作品：谢邛守范季才宗丞启。<div id='poem_1297498' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297498' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297498?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢邛守范季才宗丞<span class='inlineComment2'>（荪）</span>启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1197年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297498")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297498_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297498'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297498'>河南门下士，或疑少年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297498_comment'></div>蓬莱海上仙，偶蜕凡骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297498_comment'></div>繄点铁成金，有循吏之化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297498_comment'></div>故搴旗执馘，成竖子之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297498_comment'></div>衔荷实深，揆量莫称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297498_comment'></div>窃以词章本童子篆刻彫虫之技，道学乃儒者心地汗马之勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297498_comment'></div>故功名成就不在于孔翠照影之初，而气质变化当观于异鸡反走之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297498_comment'></div>士而知此，天其舍诸！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297498_comment'></div>如某者口黄幼生，汗青活计，抱影韩檠之二尺，刳心邺架之万签。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297498_comment'></div>誓铁砚以进修，指污渠而警策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297498_comment'></div>二十作《文赋》，未当陆士衡挺异之年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297498_comment'></div>五千擢英才，已无舒元舆不养之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297498_comment'></div>偶陪鹄立，获侣鹗飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297498_comment'></div>牛膝龙肝，滥已甚矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297498_comment'></div>风声鹤唳，幸可再乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297498_comment'></div>不谓周人之璞，得侣琅玕之林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297498_comment'></div>遂使东郭之竽，亦窃斗升之禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297498_comment'></div>虎误再中，隼不空弮，冒幸若然，沾丐奚自！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297498_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官学本诚一，论不蘧篨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297498_comment'></div>自浩气养心以味道腴，不茹柔吐刚而猎声利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297498_comment'></div>因蜚凫之入觐，陪振鹭之清班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297498_comment'></div>九寺森岩，三山密迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297498_comment'></div>谓即侍紫宸之案，簪笔螭头；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297498_comment'></div>而乃厌承明之庐，分符鹤岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297498_comment'></div>秖恐趣大昕之对，未容久外服之留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297498_comment'></div>间者弦歌于一同，已沐驯雉之化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297498_comment'></div>今焉师长于千里，载陪鸣鹿之歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297498_comment'></div>致使晚生，亦玷公选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297498_comment'></div>某敢不勉晞前辈，益励后图？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297498_comment'></div>惟加膏而希光，不速成而求益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297498_comment'></div>君门射策，宁敢过期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297498_comment'></div>谠论批鳞，誓不迎合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297498_comment'></div>或可代诸老先生之对，庶不贻吾党小子之羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297498_comment'></div>弗负师承，是报今赐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1297498_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　春，应乡试，受知于赵大全。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1198&endYear=1198')">1198年</a>　秋，应类省试，以《易》冠同经生，受知于李大异、宇文绍节。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='5a5143b8302e41beaa595d4e523f6035_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5a5143b8302e41beaa595d4e523f6035");'><span id='5a5143b8302e41beaa595d4e523f6035_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年</a>，26岁</div><div id='5a5143b8302e41beaa595d4e523f6035' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>秋，葬杨氏于何村之癸山。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>秋，友人乐新造访，以其父墓志相请，未果作。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>秋，离川赴京，父高孝璹、同产兄高稼、友人曹易等同行。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='d77bba57038143fb8ea411f2dc62382e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d77bba57038143fb8ea411f2dc62382e");'><span id='d77bba57038143fb8ea411f2dc62382e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1208')">1207-1208年</a>，30-31岁</div><div id='d77bba57038143fb8ea411f2dc62382e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年6月</a>　回到蒲江老家。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年9月</a>　祭扫先墓及亡妻杨氏之墓。作品：祭先墓文。焚黄告杨孺人墓文。<div id='poem_1298174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>焚黄告杨孺人墓文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298174")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298174'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298174'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298174_comment'></div>君弃予而死，今五年矣，而墓之木枞枞其阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298174_comment'></div>君死之年之冬，余造朝，明年甲子九月二十六日，女璧海亦不幸以病死于临安之官舍矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298174_comment'></div>恍昔欢之犹梦，慨响像之滋邈，弗可追也矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298174_comment'></div>又明年六月，余始以实历凑学官减年得升朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298174_comment'></div>又明年九月，上祀明堂，敷祭泽，余时由校书郎出守汉嘉，已陛辞，犹以官簿得赠考妣，君亦得妇人初品封，今年始克还墓下，𤑔命书之副以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298174_comment'></div>吁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298174_comment'></div>谷不受禄，死而饰壤，何嗟及矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298174_comment'></div>尚其有知，以服天子之休命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1298174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1207&endYear=1207')">1207年11月</a>　史弥远等诛杀韩侂胄於玉津园。闻讯，与兄弟赋诗表庆贺。作品：次韵□丞兄闻丁卯十一月三日朝报。<div id='poem_253150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵□丞兄闻丁卯十一月三日朝报<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253150")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253150'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253150'>龙章晨下九重关，帝敕元凶出羽山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253150'>揭日行空破昏闇，乘风纵燎绝神奸。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253150'>须看文正昭陵日，孰与忠宣元祐间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253150'>更愿和平培治体，儒臣千岁侍天颜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253150'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253150_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253151' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253151' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253151?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1207年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253151_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253151'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253151'>傥来得丧本无关，或为鸿毛加太山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253151'>纵昔尹鼯<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作持权）</span>宁有损，及今投裔枉为奸。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253151'>公私界分分明甚，狂圣途程念虑间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253151'>初学粗知真富贵，从今克复愿睎颜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253151'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253151_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年1月</a>　葬女璧海於亡妻杨氏墓左。作品：哭女璧海文。<div id='poem_1298125' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298125' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298125?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭女璧海文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298125")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298125_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298125'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298125'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298125_comment'></div>岁在癸亥，汝生于成都，汝母以产馀感疾而殂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298125_comment'></div>时吾已得学官之除，亟解佥幕，偕汝护汝母之丧以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298125_comment'></div>既葬，挈汝造朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298125_comment'></div>明年至临安，吾属汝妳谨视汝，时汝饮食，冀汝长在吾侧，则犹汝母之存也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298125_comment'></div>逮九月，汝以脾弱，因致风痫，吾亲为问药，又使医者王永年诊汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298125_comment'></div>既少间，吾仍入太学考试，谓当无他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298125_comment'></div>不一二日，汝叔翁以书来，云汝疾作，吾归省状，则已不可为矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298125_comment'></div>犹守汝药汝，数日而卒，寓汝于僧舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298125_comment'></div>后二年，吾丐守汉嘉，不忍使汝与我偕东而捐汝于万里也，使人负汝以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298125_comment'></div>越二年戊辰正月甲子，穴汝母之墓之左藏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298125_comment'></div>吾行负神明，使汝夭阏，痛伤奈何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298125_comment'></div>汝其有知，其歆此奠，以从母于九京也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1298125_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年1月15日</a>　上元节，与友人孙纲唱酬。作品：蝶恋花（又见王正班玉瑞）<div id='poem_253788' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253788' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253788?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蝶恋花 和孙蒲江□□上元词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253788")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253788_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253788'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253788'>又见王正班玉瑞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253788'>霁月光风，恰与元宵际。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253788'>横玉一声天似水。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253788'>阳春到处皆生意。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253788_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253788'>十载奔驰今我里。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253788'>昔□元非，未信今皆是。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253788'>风月惺惺人自醉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253788'>却将醉眼看荣悴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253788_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年2月5日</a>　移葬祖母高氏及伯父、伯母、叔父、叔母等五丧。作品：家庙祭文。<div id='poem_1298126' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298126?labeling=true' target='_blank'>家庙祭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年2月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298126")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298126'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298126'>维开禧四年戊辰二月辛丑朔，越五日乙巳，孝孙某等谨以牲脯酒茗之奠，致祭于皇叔妣孺人高氏凤娘子、先伯父南五郎、伯母赵氏五娘子、先叔父乡贡进士南九郎、叔母高氏爱明娘子窀穸之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298126_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298126_comment'></div>自葬我先大父，于今三十有五年，先大母为寿冢其旁，昔者尝有治命于我诸父曰：「我死则合葬于是，以从汝父于九原也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298126_comment'></div>后十四年，大母即世，不幸天降割于我家，疫疠相寻，自是丧祭疾病无虚日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298126_comment'></div>明年四月，伯母继卒，既逾时不举，而阴阳家者流遂得以拘忌之说肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298126_comment'></div>今年曰山头不白；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298126_comment'></div>白矣，明年曰隧道不明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298126_comment'></div>明矣，又明年曰墓龙不出；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298126_comment'></div>出矣，又明年复曰中宫不空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298126_comment'></div>家蓄一书，人持多喙，虽皆诞谩不根，而人所共疑，不敢独异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298126_comment'></div>绵岁历祀，事日益变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298126_comment'></div>越六年辛亥而伯父卒，越九年癸丑而叔母卒，越十四年庚申而叔父卒，是岁伯父之为族人后者亦卒，至是而诸父之存惟后高氏者一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298126_comment'></div>某等因自惟念，自大母下世，兄弟长者丱，次者龀，幼者襁，今有室有家、有禄有子矣，使父祖淹延西序之攒，而子孙食稻衣帛，尚有颜面以生斯世乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298126_comment'></div>为父祖尚安用此不肖孤乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298126_comment'></div>亦欲置拘忌不问，以惟事之早济，或又谓泽乡沮洳，坎隧久掩，今启之以纳后丧，设有圮颓，咎将谁执？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298126_comment'></div>乃稽之《礼经》，酌之人情，而又考诸唐神龙故事：将合葬后于乾陵，严善思谓尊者先葬，卑者难复于后开入，乞于乾陵之旁更择吉地，取生墓之法，别为一陵，且云神道有知，幽涂自得通会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298126_comment'></div>其议虽为陵墓设，然等而下之，以用之于士庶人之葬送，取义则一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298126_comment'></div>乃定议，于昔寿冢之旁为茔，距百步，地名文池，得兑山卜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298126_comment'></div>其地可容数穴，兆域虽异而冈连势接，新故虽殊而魂气无不之，遂命剪拂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298126_comment'></div>赵氏姆居左，高氏婶居右，二父在后，先大母在二父后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298126_comment'></div>撰即窆之日，得今年二月之庚申，敢先事启殡，用酒醴牲牢以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298126_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298126_comment'></div>自大父始造我家，我大母实相成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298126_comment'></div>诸父皆不幸早世，克绍我大父母者，实惟今葬之二父赖焉，不幸亦相继零谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298126_comment'></div>逮二十馀年，缘情起义，乃始克以二世之五丧窆，不孝之罪上通于天，虽百身奚赎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298126_comment'></div>神某有知，尚歆此薄奠，以即安于新宅也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1298126_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年2月</a>　与杜益之女订婚，行纳采礼。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='2da55bcad10a4e1a995461a776de06ff_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2da55bcad10a4e1a995461a776de06ff");'><span id='2da55bcad10a4e1a995461a776de06ff_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>，31岁</div><div id='2da55bcad10a4e1a995461a776de06ff' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　冬，友人宋德之寄赠《乙丑送行诗》墨本，题其后。作品：跋宋常丞德之送行诗后序。<div id='poem_1297640' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297640' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297640?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋宋常丞<span class='inlineComment2'>（德之）</span>送行诗后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297640")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297640_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297640'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297640'>嘉泰末，余入为学官，时柄臣擅朝将十年，士气日削，阴伺风指者已密陈开边之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297640_comment'></div>一日赤眚为沴，太阴犯权，未旬日北内门鸱尾及省部、相第灾，宰相襆被奔都亭驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297640_comment'></div>翌日，上避殿彻膳，诏百官上封事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297640_comment'></div>余时与李仲衍、范少才，赵全道先生同在学省，李、范及余大槩谓今爵及舆隶，权移主上，赵所言数事亦切时病，余忘之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297640_comment'></div>而宋君时编摩宥府，谓《离》为火，为甲兵，《坎》为水，为月，为盗，为隐伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297640_comment'></div>故火失其性，赤气见滥炎起，则忧在甲兵之事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297640_comment'></div>水失其性，太阴失度犯权，则忧在隐伏之盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297640_comment'></div>识者韪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297640_comment'></div>是岁沿边帅守始尽易武臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297640_comment'></div>吴曦既久在西垂，皇甫斌在襄汉，郭倪、李爽在两淮，悉总兵民之任，识者忧之而未有陈说者，宋君又索言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297640_comment'></div>次谓乞置四川类补试，使蜀士得补入太学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297640_comment'></div>次谓蜀帅权重，宜及今防微杜渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297640_comment'></div>宋君既对，余适以职事见宰相，谓余曰：「宋编修既言蜀帅权重，而又欲蜀学得拟贤关」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297640_comment'></div>余觇其词色方愎不平，退即为宋君言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297640_comment'></div>宋瞷知庙论不合，力请去，执政有留之者，俾丞奉常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297640_comment'></div>涉春再请，乃得去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297640_comment'></div>方是时，朝廷论议，和者如出一口，而乃有不茍于同以取宰相厌弃者，可不谓贤乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297640_comment'></div>宋、李、范、赵与余既相继去国，时事大变，宋所言甲兵武帅等事至是皆验，可不谓识虑过人矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297640_comment'></div>「国虽靡止，或圣或否，民虽靡膴，或哲或谋，或肃或艾」，天下未有有阴无阳、有小人无君子之时，故又曰「如彼泉流，无沦胥以败」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297640_comment'></div>譬之泉也，茍疏而通之，虽有淤腐，可赖以免；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297640_comment'></div>徒知壅阏蔽塞，无所分别，则淤日以甚，清者亦与俱败耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297640_comment'></div>庆元、嘉泰、开禧之间而稍知此理也，贤者尚可以少安于位，以相与扶世建俗，大纲虽失，亦须能救其半，竟蹈沦胥之戒，使生灵受其祸而贤者徒以知言名于时，可胜叹夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297640_comment'></div>后二年，朝廷改元更化，余被命将造朝，宋君以诸公乙丑送行诗墨本见寄，因以所见题其后云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1297640_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c219cd25611c45268db6d4d9cd033a17_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c219cd25611c45268db6d4d9cd033a17");'><span id='c219cd25611c45268db6d4d9cd033a17_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1210')">1209-1210年</a>，32-33岁</div><div id='c219cd25611c45268db6d4d9cd033a17' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　春，友人王表民造访，以其母黎氏墓志铭为请。作品：太孺人赐冠帔黎氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298016' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298016' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298016?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太孺人赐冠帔黎氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298016")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298016_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298016'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298016'>开禧改元之夏，余官中秘书，青城王表民以进士造廷，始与倾盖而语，检履醇固，心寔期之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298016_comment'></div>嘉定之明年春，表民过余于里舍，拜且泣曰：「吾昔丧吾母，将以某年某月甲子祔诸导江县武骑乡吾父之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298016_comment'></div>昔者乙丑之会，表民尝辱察焉，识竁之铭，敢援此以托于子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298016_comment'></div>则辞曰：「竁之有铭，非古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298016_comment'></div>妇人名不出阃，子善自饬，使身立名扬，斯其为铭也大哉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298016_comment'></div>曰：「子之教既闻命矣，抑表民之穷毒，人有不及知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298016_comment'></div>吾父始居约时，自闑以内麻枲、饎爨、米盐、臡醢，吾母实躬其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298016_comment'></div>伯父宋杰两预贡籍，仲父宋乂登绍兴第，仕至石泉守，吾父独不偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298016_comment'></div>吾母曰：『乖逢命也，毋多戚』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298016_comment'></div>除馆聘士，教授诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298016_comment'></div>大父所居为堂曰胜籯，石泉君质之以治庭对之装，吾母曰：『先训不可坠也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298016_comment'></div>乃尽出橐中装以庚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298016_comment'></div>堂既归而欹陋弗治，又勉葺之，盖十五年而复旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298016_comment'></div>人缓急扣门，力所逮给，未始有爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298016_comment'></div>吾父之宾客至，无留门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298016_comment'></div>逮嫠居，持家益自力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298016_comment'></div>聚指日夥，至仆仆筥薄织衽组紃以佐衣食之阙，视己出若元配所出，拊育均一，人莫能以厚薄名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298016_comment'></div>淳熙十年，余兄子俊、达之充赋于永康、维川，各以词赋居第一，吾母差自慰，卒罔克寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298016_comment'></div>绍兴三年，第三兄天民复举礼部，明年唱第庭中，阶迪功郎，主潼川府通泉簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298016_comment'></div>吾母喜曰：『诗书之泽幸不坠于未亡人之手』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298016_comment'></div>方倚门待还而遽以赴闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298016_comment'></div>余弟之在七者，曰宜之，以后叔父咨，用荫调巴州通江县尉，尝贡于某路转运司，俄又早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298016_comment'></div>是数者皆人所叵堪，匪姿性明晤，畴以自释？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298016_comment'></div>嘉泰改元，得重膇之疾，弗良于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298016_comment'></div>表民当应进士举，重违膳药，吾母觞之曰：『尔饮斯！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298016_comment'></div>吾尚能力疾以迟尔之得』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298016_comment'></div>表民悚然以釂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298016_comment'></div>少学《春秋》，觕通大指，有司误以冠乡举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298016_comment'></div>暨四月丁亥造榜，则吾母以壬午属纩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298016_comment'></div>免丧不死，始获齿开禧改元进士榜，调汉州绵竹尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298016_comment'></div>呜呼，尚忍言之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298016_comment'></div>人有子贵于终养，表民之兄弟，其策名科举者率先卒，以重母戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298016_comment'></div>其幸及豆区禄者，虽独后死而不获一日之养，不孝之罪上通于天，不铭无以识也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298016_comment'></div>余瞿然警谢曰：「子之言及此，不敢曰不可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298016_comment'></div>孺人盖华阳大姓，名道素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298016_comment'></div>曾大父上行，皇太府寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298016_comment'></div>大父朝彦，皇秘书丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298016_comment'></div>父纁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298016_comment'></div>取王氏，封孺人，朝奉郎仁之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298016_comment'></div>是生孺人，以归于王君宋文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298016_comment'></div>生长见闻，熏习儒素，用能安贫笃践，具妇母道，而始终衷焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298016_comment'></div>王君之元配魏氏，生男子即子俊、达之，女子曰松寿，嫁温江文舜中，皆卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298016_comment'></div>继室以孺人，生六子，即天民、表民，次裕民，次秀民、宜之、顺民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298016_comment'></div>天民、宜之、顺民亦皆先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298016_comment'></div>内外孙男女十有五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298016_comment'></div>孺人两遇庆寿恩，得初等封，赐冠帔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298016_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1298016'>士修于约，维逑之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298016_comment'></div>浅泳深方，靡居匪康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298016_comment'></div>厥修弗显，厥报孔彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298016_comment'></div>谓报则彰，卒负其偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298016_comment'></div>或朝而披，或夕而芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298016_comment'></div>譬彼场苗，既耨既秧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298016_comment'></div>虽有饥馑，亦有丰穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298016_comment'></div>塴是铭章，后人之庆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1298016_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年3月</a>　生父高孝璹卒，约术士王彦正为卜葬地。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年5月</a>　成肃皇后大祥吉日，斋宴邀魏了翁兄弟，致书县令孙纲，以心制为由辞。作品：柬孙蒲江纲。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　应友人杨迈之请，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：杨君庆崇墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298015' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298015' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298015?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨君庆崇墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298015")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298015_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298015'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298015'>绍兴三十年四月己未，眉丹棱杨君庆崇年二十有八以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298015_comment'></div>其二孤迈、懿，懿蚤夭，迈时八岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298015_comment'></div>逮淳熙末年七月辛酉，始克葬于富寿乡虎头山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298015_comment'></div>君之配石氏先卒，至是合葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298015_comment'></div>乃嘉定二年，迈以书来曰：「迈不天，逮事考妣日浅，零丁孤藐，葬故缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298015_comment'></div>今二十有二年矣，而未有以识竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298015_comment'></div>然非敢缓也，亦妄意少自立，如昔人泷冈阡墓表盖有待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298015_comment'></div>今老矣，终亡以见当世之士而求铭，即死将不瞑，子幸有以相我也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298015_comment'></div>余嘉其志之诚而哀其弗遂也，谨疏其状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298015_comment'></div>君盖亦少孤，能自植立，以不逮养为恨，岁时展松槚，率号恸忘返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298015_comment'></div>兄弟出分，訾取其薄，室居其漏，孝友之行著于里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298015_comment'></div>襮顺里方，待人怡怡，若无所不可，及遇事勇为，凛有不可夺，既事则若未尝有所为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298015_comment'></div>少耆书，不妄交友，尤乐人之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298015_comment'></div>杨氏自君之王父恂登元丰五年进士第，官不过承议郎以殁，其后衣冠不断如缕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298015_comment'></div>君自少轸门户之忧，劬劳力学，穷晨夜不置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298015_comment'></div>以至宗䣊之课试于有司其不能具装赍者，君率为经理，俾不以累其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298015_comment'></div>预宾荐、擢科第者，由绍兴末年以来续续不绝，君不可谓无助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298015_comment'></div>其事虽亦人所能为者，然其春秋鼎盛，如苗始秧，会见秀实，使假以日月，庸可限其所成邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298015_comment'></div>呜呼，是可哀也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298015_comment'></div>君之王父元符末应诏上书，崇宁二年编入党籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298015_comment'></div>中兴之初，诏书数下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298015_comment'></div>录元祐党人及元符上书姓名，既宠秩之，又禄其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298015_comment'></div>绍兴之元，天子祀明堂肆眚，凡元符三等人悉依元祐党人恩数，尤为著明，士多有沾丐者，蜀顾以远见遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298015_comment'></div>幸世载贤德，不爵而贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298015_comment'></div>使天下之为善者当有后，而子柔中既蚤丧，柔中生君，又不克寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298015_comment'></div>有皇上帝，伊谁云憎，而独啬于此邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298015_comment'></div>孙男焞、椁、淳、錞，孙女适孙南金、史正道，外曾孙男女三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298015_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1298015'>杨氏之先，厥载自雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298015_comment'></div>先世仕唐，僖驾是从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298015_comment'></div>避乱中州，家于唐安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298015_comment'></div>君九世父，徙今丹山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298015_comment'></div>曾王父球，赠秩承事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298015_comment'></div>厥开承议，直道名世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298015_comment'></div>彼何人斯，胡违厥臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298015_comment'></div>生世不逢，谓后斯昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298015_comment'></div>中兴诏书，爰蔇往居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298015_comment'></div>居堕疏逖，往藏幽墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298015_comment'></div>苗不待实，再世如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298015_comment'></div>天果梦梦，胡畀之质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298015_comment'></div>抑人有言，非此其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298015_comment'></div>代石塴词，以谷嗣人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1298015_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年11月</a>　资州新建贡院成，应邀撰文记其事。作品：资州新创贡院记。<div id='poem_1297863' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297863' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297863?labeling=true' target='_blank'>资州新创贡院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297863")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297863_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297863'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297863'>古今未有遗民而可与共治者，是故先王立为司徒，教之以德行道艺，而兴其贤能，乡老大夫以礼礼宾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297863_comment'></div>向为万民也，今合众而尊异之，众宾之席皆弗属焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297863_comment'></div>厥明献其书，则王再拜而后受，与祖庙之宝物偕藏于天府，其不轻而重也盖若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297863_comment'></div>自科目设而教法浸坏，虽二汉近古，此意间有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297863_comment'></div>迄魏、晋、隋、唐，则事益远于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297863_comment'></div>舒元舆所谓试之日，士携脂烛餐器，分坐于寒庑冷地，唐虞辟门，三代贡士，未有若是慢易者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297863_comment'></div>相承以至于今，未之有改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297863_comment'></div>虽然，是固因时之制，不得已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297863_comment'></div>顾独不可救其甚而益其所未备者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297863_comment'></div>资于西南为文物郡，由先汉二王以后，代有显人，垂诸万世而修名贞节，尤莫盛于国朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297863_comment'></div>迨百年而来，亚礼部，冠大庭，擢鼎甲，首全蜀者，项背相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297863_comment'></div>由宰臣法从寺监郎圉，班班可考，资之文物于是为蜀称首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297863_comment'></div>然考其贡士之宫，则未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297863_comment'></div>寓试于报恩佛舍，弗便，则合郡县庠而棘焉，犹病其褊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297863_comment'></div>庆元初，分漕司贡额于诸郡，资之贡二十有一人，至是增为三十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297863_comment'></div>士舍是亡他途也，则就试者因以倍于昔，盖不下五千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297863_comment'></div>而仅入出于一门，既未免有壅阏躏藉之虞，幸而得入，负笈而冀少纾焉，则伥伥然靡所止戾，编苇架竹，犹未足以容也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297863_comment'></div>有徙就于楼居者焉，则危栈腐梁，上下填牣，廪乎压覆是惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297863_comment'></div>投卷之庑，衣冠曳屦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297863_comment'></div>校艺之馆，藩拔级夷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297863_comment'></div>封录之所，嚣隘近市；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297863_comment'></div>导水之沟，污秽杂袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297863_comment'></div>士生一世，居广居而立正位，其所存何如也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297863_comment'></div>今若此，殆所谓唐虞三代不若是慢易者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297863_comment'></div>今崇庆守杨侯某，故绍兴戎监某之孙也，方怀绂里居，慨然曰：「我祖父捐田千亩于学，以资公养，所以望于乡之士者，不为薄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297863_comment'></div>今登进贤能之所，而苟焉弗称，盍即其地思所以拓之者」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297863_comment'></div>草图练日，虑材鸠庸，而为士者翕翕以应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297863_comment'></div>县庠之西北，为民僦居，请庚之，得方七十六丈有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297863_comment'></div>石墙环缭，三门彪列，四庑昈分，攀龙附凤，二堂屹于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297863_comment'></div>中为三术，以直达郡县庠，修畅而靓深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297863_comment'></div>至于有司之直，胥史之舍，悉增其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297863_comment'></div>直中门为亭，南向以发舒文明之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297863_comment'></div>士游其间，庶几绰乎有容，不复如前日之填然几亵，其所甚重者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297863_comment'></div>经始于嘉定二年春正月，汔其年之冬十一月，新筑凡五百四十楹，诸费为钱一千四百四十万有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297863_comment'></div>郡守眉山吕君涧赞其成，教授潼川王君晞鸿以杨侯赴镇代其劳，盘石令王君子克率外三邑缗钱以助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297863_comment'></div>制置司机宜郡人赵君希浚以前三岁举人尝输金于州也，至是白其长，出所输以给用度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297863_comment'></div>州之士各襁属不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297863_comment'></div>役成，复具以颠末，属余为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297863_comment'></div>余每叹古道沦夷，上漫于求贤，下苟于应令，上下相与以薄，而俗益不古若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297863_comment'></div>自庆历崇儒，诏州县各立学官，而士始知劝学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297863_comment'></div>承平日久，列郡各有贡院，修屋坏除，位置有所，若知所以重其事者矣，顾犹未能骤改其所谓慢也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297863_comment'></div>且朝廷设科，将以蒐实材，崇正学，为斯世用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297863_comment'></div>今或者往往以浅陋得，例持衡榷无用之文，为取才之的。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297863_comment'></div>士苟于得者，亦随其程度而为之应，幸而得之，则又将其今日之所以取于人者取人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297863_comment'></div>彼是相寻，其流益降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297863_comment'></div>充而为公为卿，皆此其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297863_comment'></div>其本若是，则其所成就，盖可类推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297863_comment'></div>其间亦岂无鸿生硕儒由斯以进者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297863_comment'></div>然自非豪杰之士，瞭然乎义利之分，其能不为所溺者鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297863_comment'></div>尝试使今之校士者，参诸古人之所以取，惟正学之尚，而不必泥科臼以榷陈腐之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297863_comment'></div>今之充赋者，思古人之所以进，务正学以言，而不必曲程度以循有司之陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297863_comment'></div>则今日取士之制，藉曰不皆出诸此，而吾所以自立者，未尝一日而离乎此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297863_comment'></div>「言寡尤，行寡悔，禄在其中矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297863_comment'></div>在云者，非必役役于干禄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297863_comment'></div>「脩其天爵，而人爵从之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297863_comment'></div>从之云者，非必区区于要禄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297863_comment'></div>夫如是，不惟得之有道，士之闻风者且将日改月化，惟本之趋，视夫词华之工、科级之盛者，且将有所不屑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1297863_comment'></div>推之以用世，况肯不义而富且贵乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1297863_comment'></div>顾余不令，何足以预闻乎此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1297863_comment'></div>因士之请之力，书此以遗之，将冀偕事斯语，求为君子之归，毋俾世儒以科目相诟病也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1297863_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　葬生父高孝璹于长宁阡，于其本卜地筑室，以为聚友读书之所。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　应友人彭百川之请，为其父墓志铭作跋。作品：跋丹棱彭君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1297638' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297638' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297638?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋丹棱彭君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1209年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297638")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297638_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297638'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297638'>丹棱彭百川始欲以绍熙之元葬其亲于墓之左，其宗人洋川通守亘尝为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297638_comment'></div>寻牵于阴阳拘畏之说，乃改卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297638_comment'></div>逮嘉定之二年十二月壬午蔡始食，月日既与铭牾，则俾予识其末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297638_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297638_comment'></div>自义理不竞，封竁大事乃尽操之巫史，鸿生学士岂无尚论古制、习闻儒先者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297638_comment'></div>而人所共疑，稍独异则纷然以为是阔于人情，往往以缓者为审，速者为间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297638_comment'></div>彭君之葬自庚戌迄今，一为所怵，动至二十年，亦以不敢独异耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297638_comment'></div>彭君饬身嗜学，卒老布韦，百川之通赡，当有以卒其志者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1297638_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年1月</a>　应友人洪偲之请，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：知南剑州洪公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298026' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298026' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298026?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知南剑州洪公秘墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定三年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298026")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298026_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298026'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298026'>洪姓系出共工氏，代有显人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298026_comment'></div>五季时由歙徙饶之乐平，又七世徙番阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298026_comment'></div>至给事中彦升以进士起家，洪氏益大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298026_comment'></div>给事之弟彦先，右通直郎、太师、郑国公，娶董氏，赠鲁国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298026_comment'></div>是生魏国忠宣公，秃节龙荒十有五载，比得生还，复与时忤，终徽猷阁直学士、朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298026_comment'></div>生六子男，而文惠、文安、文敏公咸以文名擅当世，今之为世家言，洪氏盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298026_comment'></div>若南剑史君，则忠宣之孙而文惠之仲子也，讳秘，字必之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298026_comment'></div>大母、母皆沈氏，皆魏国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298026_comment'></div>君资禀英晤，加以生长见闻，不绳而直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298026_comment'></div>方忠宣南迁，文惠继免，君力学任家，娱适亲意而忘其谪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298026_comment'></div>平生侍文惠，荐进无虚日，而中外无一人知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298026_comment'></div>文惠尝语魏国：「是儿志趣过人，克家子也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298026_comment'></div>以忠宣遇郊霈补官，初监潭州南岳庙，继调湖南茶盐司干办公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298026_comment'></div>湖湘饥，吏不以实闻，君力白其长，振廪捐直以粜，且督郡邑覈除菑田，民汔以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298026_comment'></div>用荐者改秩，知绍兴之山阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298026_comment'></div>邑号多讼，异时于省于部于御史者靡有虚日，吏巽懦，无能孰何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298026_comment'></div>视事微寒暑间，率夜漏未尽致两造于庭，片言折之，辄得其平以去，虽气力者持之，不为回挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298026_comment'></div>事二连帅，或侈用，或横歛，否则恫疑虚喝以责羡于邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298026_comment'></div>君叹曰：「吾宁以罪行，剥下媚上，所不忍为也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298026_comment'></div>秩满，会史魏公再相，范文穆公参与政事，于是淳熙五年，文惠去相位盖一星终矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298026_comment'></div>方文惠守新安时，得范公于郡户曹，一见器重，极力推引，俾君内交焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298026_comment'></div>史公于文惠，则尝先后镇越者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298026_comment'></div>二公雅知君，暨得山阴治状，期以职事留之，君以母魏国疾辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298026_comment'></div>调江西安抚司机宜文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298026_comment'></div>魏国疾革，君侍膳药衣不解带，至执丧几毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298026_comment'></div>既除，终不忍去文惠左右，不得已调官，择期戍之远者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298026_comment'></div>通判光州，期至则弗果往，曰：「昆弟各有官守，吾可复行乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298026_comment'></div>未数月文惠薨，君实颛丧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298026_comment'></div>比再免丧，叔父文敏入翰林为学士，主眷方楙，人谓君门地人物将自是升矣，方退然就吏部铨，签书桂阳军判官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298026_comment'></div>守知君贤，调理细大，罔不诹决，君亦乐为之尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298026_comment'></div>通判郢州，常摄守事，郡有黥卒号余夜叉，聚亡命出入襄汉间，急之则逸他境，缓则复出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298026_comment'></div>公召游徼授方略，遂擒以献，封内帖然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298026_comment'></div>自兵火后，公私垂罄，学无公食，君与郡博士图所以廪士与教者，覈隐田得上腴数百顷，悉以归诸学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298026_comment'></div>摄事未几，郡以大治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298026_comment'></div>差知武冈军，陛辞以二事为言曰：「襄汉鄂渚之屯旧隶岳飞，号岳家军，无一不当十，其馀子弟尚劲挺可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298026_comment'></div>顾效用之廪率倍长行有奇，为壮士者非效用则弗屑，而主将吝啬自封，率以长行之给募流庸，此缓急可恃乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298026_comment'></div>光宗嘉奖再三，且谓：「三衙亦有此弊，莫肯为朕言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298026_comment'></div>卿文人而熟兵家利害，留心国事乃尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298026_comment'></div>卿来自边埸，有所见为朕罄言之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298026_comment'></div>君遂奏：「沿边屯田自中兴以来，两朝经理规模远矣，而法久弊生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298026_comment'></div>盖火耕水耘非士所习，而督将亦非闲于农事，若岁收不足自赡，旁近民田乃至罹其扰，故不若罢之便」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298026_comment'></div>光宗又曰：「观卿议论，可谓实材，姑往新任，俟边帅有阙，首当用卿矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298026_comment'></div>武攸为郡，民獠杂居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298026_comment'></div>君始至，戒吏毋敢擅入溪洞征科，戒民毋得贱市獠物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298026_comment'></div>郡多盗，君谕以利害，俾各归农贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298026_comment'></div>亡何，配隶王文彬等六人夜踰城剽杜氏之产，惧且觉，则将间坊市祠神之会相挻为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298026_comment'></div>君迹捕尽得之，以尸诸市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298026_comment'></div>或劝以闻，当受显赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298026_comment'></div>君曰：「彼犯法而戮之，守事也，奚赏之云乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298026_comment'></div>识者益以是服君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298026_comment'></div>郡计旧仰给永、邵，邈不相应，君条奏，乞以郡所上银纲于总领所敷于二州，而留赋以自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298026_comment'></div>朝廷从之，迄今为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298026_comment'></div>尤笃意学校，延登诸生讲授经义，溪洞闻风，至遣子入学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298026_comment'></div>比去，邦人思之，奉尝不辍，谓武攸为郡馀百年，守之祠于民者惟吏部侍郎郑公汝谐与公而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298026_comment'></div>庆元四年，秋霜杀稻，番为甚，民大艰食，吏以令诉菑伤者毋过八月十五，却不复听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298026_comment'></div>君因入对为上言：「令固云尔，然霜菑率后此时，令弗及也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298026_comment'></div>且援苏文忠在杭日上时宰书论风灾事，乞下敕局增修旧令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298026_comment'></div>又言：「民为邦本，今赃墨成风，朘民以奉权势，乞加禁戢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298026_comment'></div>时韩氏擅政，道路以目，亡所畏忌，人以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298026_comment'></div>京魏公欲留之，卒为忌者所间，以亲嫌弗果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298026_comment'></div>差知南剑州，不赴，自请奉祠，以主管武夷山冲佑观里居，凡三历任，盖自是不复有当世意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298026_comment'></div>以宰相子材足以自致显闻于时，居家以孝友著，所居官卓荦有风绩可纪录，论事上前，疏畅磊落，人主为动，名卿才大夫鲜不知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298026_comment'></div>顾阶京秩馀四十年，年七十有一，而仕不过二千石以殁，此岂其所冯弗厚，抑亦介特不肯与时俛仰者，固其世然耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298026_comment'></div>君将易箦，遗令曰：「处州之族与忠宣同曾祖，奕世种德，此其后且大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298026_comment'></div>文惠之母弟某府君无子，其以处州从弟栻为之子，以遗泽官之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298026_comment'></div>君之令人与二子弗替先志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298026_comment'></div>栻之女兄归赵成公，故成公状君之行于昔，既葬而君之仲子偲以状请铭于某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298026_comment'></div>既辞不获，则定著君行事如此，乃书其爵氏、卒葬、宅兆而系以铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298026_comment'></div>君官自登仕郎累迁至奉直大夫，爵番阳县男，邑户三百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298026_comment'></div>娶魏氏，累封令人，故左朝请大夫、直敷文阁安行之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298026_comment'></div>子男三人：某，朝散大夫、前知容州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298026_comment'></div>偲，承议郎、权发遣嘉定军府；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298026_comment'></div>儋，蚤世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298026_comment'></div>女子六人，归奉议郎知衢州西安县杨汝明、从政郎南恩州阳江县令廖公辅、朝请郎新知连州张履信、乡贡进士程洋、迪功郎荆门军录事参军邢谔、宣教郎知湖州长兴县王元春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298026_comment'></div>孙四人：蔺、荀、万，皆将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298026_comment'></div>芮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298026_comment'></div>君之卒以嘉定二年正月甲子，葬以三年正月己酉，兆在鄱阳县城北十里青山之麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298026_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_77_1298026'>于皇荩臣，蹈谊执方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298026_comment'></div>显允良拂，袭庆承芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298026_comment'></div>有谞其华，猗奕以昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298026_comment'></div>胡宁维君，厥用弗将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298026_comment'></div>匪云弗将，闇兮以章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298026_comment'></div>秦魏之从，君居允荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298026_comment'></div>在后之人，率履弗忘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_83_1298026_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　春，应高道充之请，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：处士高大中墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298013' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298013' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298013?labeling=true' target='_blank'>处士高君大中墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定三年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298013")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298013_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298013'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298013'>高氏以姓著于邛，居蒲江者，故依政徙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298013_comment'></div>三世至惟谨，惟谨生永安，取延贡罗氏，与故谏议大夫宋公齐愈为友婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298013_comment'></div>宣和初，宋为学官，命其子宏甫束书往从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298013_comment'></div>寻补博士弟子员，与同舍高抑崇闶、陈少阳东，黄伯渊源、赵子然雍、孙太冲道夫、杨原仲愿、李纯粹静一、雷公达观最相厚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298013_comment'></div>久之当升内舍生，会女真犯阙，师徒解散，独徬徨不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298013_comment'></div>思陵渡江之明年，始还宅里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298013_comment'></div>元配雅之百丈吴氏，于是吴夫人之卒三年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298013_comment'></div>继室以余之族祖姑，生五男子，长曰大中，字正道，是为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298013_comment'></div>朝廷解严，录围城中守学人，内舍遇恩，再免文解，然不复仕进意矣，训厉诸子益力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298013_comment'></div>君自少志识绝人，娴于词赋，尤善礼学，郡县校官月书季考，率先诸子鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298013_comment'></div>内舍君既倦游，得君所为文，喜曰：「吾平生交游皆天下贤士，今半在青云，吾之不遇，其在儿乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298013_comment'></div>益不事生产，放意水石，春华秋月，命酒张坐饮，率以君侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298013_comment'></div>往往托诸诗章乐阕，宣寄情意，父子自为唱酬，家庭之内愉愉如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298013_comment'></div>君文词务敏赡，初若不苦抽思者，而趣诣深远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298013_comment'></div>与人交，容色温厚，间遇所不可，人莫能夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298013_comment'></div>俄有疾，即眉山访医，居数日暴厥而卒，时乾道七年正月壬辰也，年四十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298013_comment'></div>亲亡恙，诸孤藐然，扶护返室，见者莫不感涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298013_comment'></div>君娶魏氏，讳润，同里慥之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298013_comment'></div>生四男子：道充、公讷、公谅、公谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298013_comment'></div>讷早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298013_comment'></div>二女子，适黄夔、杨子应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298013_comment'></div>孙男伯震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298013_comment'></div>孙女八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298013_comment'></div>外孙男女五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298013_comment'></div>君之亡也，魏夫人年三十有九，仰事尊章，俯鞠孤稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298013_comment'></div>家故约，自闑以内麻枲、饎爨、米盐、醪醢，料理靡密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298013_comment'></div>凡二十年，堇堇毕昏嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298013_comment'></div>晚年道充始两预宾荐，冀少成立以卒父志，以宽母忧，而嘉定之十月辛未，夫人以疾不起矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298013_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298013_comment'></div>厥父十年太学，脱死重围，卒韦布以遗厥子，为子既弗逢世，事亲复不尽年，以贻厥妇，嫠居教子者三十有八年，又廪廪以终其身，是可悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298013_comment'></div>道充将以嘉定三年三月丙申葬君、夫人于善何乡之兑山，而以铭属余曰：「道充之葬也缓，不则无以白诸幽也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298013_comment'></div>某以心制谢不能为文，则曰：「王文公尝书刁虞部、谢师宰之墓矣，推己之哀，子何辞焉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298013_comment'></div>乃为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1298013'>中原有黍，逢岁之殚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298013_comment'></div>厥开嗣岁，匪暵而乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298013_comment'></div>易易干他，云胡斯难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298013_comment'></div>有子考无咎，其又奚叹！</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1298013_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　春，岳父杜益入葬，撰文哭之。作品：哭杜威州文。<div id='poem_1298120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298120?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭杜威州文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1210年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298120")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298120'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298120'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298120_comment'></div>天下之生夭寿并区，吉凶同域，莫可终诘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298120_comment'></div>岁在丙寅，余校中秘书，余友虞仲易及杨节毅公以书抵余曰：「子未有室，成都杜子仁端人也，其亲知皆天下贤士，今其子长矣，子盍妻诸」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298120_comment'></div>余未及报，寻丐守汉嘉以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298120_comment'></div>明年还里舍，余以虞、杨之言宜信，不复他求昏，又明年而委禽焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298120_comment'></div>礼成之夕，公与余表叔父一见投分，不翅平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298120_comment'></div>仅踰月公死，则元年三月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298120_comment'></div>叔父常悒悒，念之踰年，始获拜公像于成都，哭之恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298120_comment'></div>又踰月而叔父死，则二年之三月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298120_comment'></div>相望各旬岁，安知其遂相从于九原也与哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298120_comment'></div>余与妇各执丧于服舍，卒卒之欢曾不盈眦，而无涯之戚殆将终身，尚安用生斯世也与哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298120_comment'></div>去冬余葬余叔父，衔茹荼毒，曾未数月，而公之子今又以公之即幽之日月告，忧患摧心，精力遐漂，靡所济集，益觉岁月遒卒，人命危浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298120_comment'></div>呜呼，余永无望也与哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298120_comment'></div>衰制攸系，义不得先往以听役于将事者，亟驰薄奠，姑识余衷，傥未即溘去，或能援我吊也与之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298120_comment'></div>蒙缟曳素，临封宰上，为公一哀而出涕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298120_comment'></div>言不能文，神鉴之哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1298120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　春，建鹤山书院成，开门授徒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年6月21日</a>　郡人郭杭卒，应其子郭汝该之请，为撰墓志铭。作品：郭君杭墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298017' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298017' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298017?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郭君杭墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1210年6月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298017")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298017_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298017'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298017'>上初临轩之岁，余与沈黎郭君之子汝该为同年进士，始识君于江渚间，气貌温夷，固知为隐居好脩者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298017_comment'></div>君之弟麟亦以累举恩得官，还至鄱阳病革，君精祷躬视，靡有遗力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298017_comment'></div>既死，哭之恸，护丧徒行，色悴形槁，人不堪其忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298017_comment'></div>汝该请曰：「今违乡数千里，脱不幸有风露之感，奈何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298017_comment'></div>盍以附于便舟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298017_comment'></div>君不可曰：「死丧之怀，原隰之求，吾不知为勚」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298017_comment'></div>卒护其丧以达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298017_comment'></div>字其孤没身不衰，余以是益义之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298017_comment'></div>君与余盖同为临邛人，讳杭，字仲仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298017_comment'></div>鼻祖伦官于黎，因家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298017_comment'></div>曾祖某，合州文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298017_comment'></div>祖某，父某，皆有潜德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298017_comment'></div>君蚤孤，事祖母王夫人谨甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298017_comment'></div>弟妹幼，尤念之不释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298017_comment'></div>君推产归妹，且俾弟择便安者，而己受其馀，闺门愉愉如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298017_comment'></div>性好周恤，虽质屋解衣罔有吝，以是家用益落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298017_comment'></div>尝抚汝该诲之曰：「吾所恃惟汝尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298017_comment'></div>汝该感愤，学亦力博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298017_comment'></div>从贤士大夫游，忠毅杨公震仲为郡校官，雅敬爱君父子，数引重焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298017_comment'></div>州较试旧无地，君白郡守规而屋之，自经始至竣役，君与同郡史𤈴之力居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298017_comment'></div>汝该登进士第，每所官游，君必与俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298017_comment'></div>其为石泉理掾，日以审克为训，有重辟辄不乐，五日一私饭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298017_comment'></div>为《平反录》寘汝该坐右，命之曰：「狱成为我笔其槩，吾将观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298017_comment'></div>凡笔之忸怩者，皆汝心之未尽也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298017_comment'></div>嘉定三年六月丁丑，卒于石泉官舍，年六十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298017_comment'></div>娶段氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298017_comment'></div>子汝该，今为迪功郎、雅州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298017_comment'></div>孙拱辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298017_comment'></div>□年□月，汝该奉君之丧葬于汉源祖茔丑山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298017_comment'></div>段夫人先君二十有八年卒，尝藁葬郡北圣钟山下，迁祔新卜，从治命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298017_comment'></div>初淳熙中，五部落扰边，我战不利，游寇近郊，制置司遣王师雄以兵来援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298017_comment'></div>未至城三十里，师雄栅相公岭据险自卫，逗遛不前，寇日逼，众恟惧，莫敢以情开晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298017_comment'></div>君独奋曰：「事急矣，安能以一方坐毙」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298017_comment'></div>乃夜踰城抵师雄砦，迟明谒军门，为劈折利害，言进屯便，师雄如其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298017_comment'></div>寇至，知我有备，稍稍引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298017_comment'></div>时谓微君城不守矣，人以是多君远识云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298017_comment'></div>君之族子迪功郎黄中尝状君之行，窆有时，汝该奉而泣曰：「必君也知我父者，敢以铭请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298017_comment'></div>某曰：「君之行行乎家，信乎州里，尚安以吾铭为也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298017_comment'></div>汝该稽颡又泣曰：「虽然，尚先志也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298017_comment'></div>乃不果辞，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1298017'>兰生深林，无人而芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298017_comment'></div>惟君之修，不以其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298017_comment'></div>履变蹈难，厥脩孔彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298017_comment'></div>我作铭诗，以相其藏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1298017_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　秋，类省试，鹤山书院学生自类省元王万以下共七人入选，一时传为美谈。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1210&endYear=1210')">1210年</a>　应族人魏巳之之请，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：处士魏雄飞墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298014' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298014' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298014?labeling=true' target='_blank'>处士魏君雄飞墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定三年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298014")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298014_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298014'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298014'>汉原巨先豪于谷口，人无贤不肖阗门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298014_comment'></div>或讥之曰：「子本吏二千石之世，结发自修，何遂自纵放为轻侠之徒乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298014_comment'></div>巨先亡以应，则托诸家人寡妇以况己，且曰知其非礼，然不能自还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298014_comment'></div>呜呼斯言，奚无理之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298014_comment'></div>士方为血气所役，伥伥于外，特患于未之知焉耳，知之斯速已之，顾安有不能自还者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298014_comment'></div>吾族祖仲举讳雄飞，少亦以气盖里中，虽尝束书从临邛李静一纯粹游，会离家难，不克卒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298014_comment'></div>寓邛之南道，其地号曲路，居民鲜少，生理寡薄，农耕贾鬻，铢裒氂积，堇堇给伏腊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298014_comment'></div>君故蒲江徙，久而从其俗，买酒舍，召庸保杂作，旴衡抵掌，见事风生，有小不便必以控于守宰，不得其平不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298014_comment'></div>逮阅变既久，困心衡虑，于是卷束豪锐以从其所当事者，振施乡邻，辑柔宗姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298014_comment'></div>岁大祲，尝发粟以食饿者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298014_comment'></div>其不幸而丽于法，又为讼其冤，迄于全活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298014_comment'></div>族孙有少孤者，三世稿菆，君聚族而赙之，其楄柎窀穸之事悉为经理焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298014_comment'></div>晚尤喜释氏书，庬眉鸠杖，颓然终日，语不及家事，闻人之善则亟称之不翅己出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298014_comment'></div>余叔父仲祥甫及余预宾荐，躐科级，君喜至忘食，以是益勉子孙以善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298014_comment'></div>其深自绳削，求为笃厚之归，乃至若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298014_comment'></div>然则不能自还于礼如原巨先之去者，其贤不肖固不待论而判矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298014_comment'></div>年七十有八，以开禧三年七月丙子终于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298014_comment'></div>曾大父某，大父某，父某，妣某氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298014_comment'></div>配同里王氏，淳熙四年七月壬寅卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298014_comment'></div>生三子男：已之、巽之、申之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298014_comment'></div>女长适郭宜孙，次文圭，次张由礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298014_comment'></div>内外孙男女十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298014_comment'></div>已之将以嘉定三年十月□日葬君、夫人于县之钦德乡旷义里震山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298014_comment'></div>先事，属铭于某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298014_comment'></div>藐然心制，谢不能文，则曰：「柳柳州尝表陆元冲，欧阳文忠尝铭杜伟长，凡皆推己之哀以致诸人，矧在宗族，子何辞焉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298014_comment'></div>乃摭幼所逮闻于诸父者而叙次之，复系之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1298014'>悠悠浮骖，载驰载驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298014_comment'></div>惟君复之，说于桑榆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298014_comment'></div>侯田侯庐，我耕我居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298014_comment'></div>侯黍侯稌，我湑我酤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298014_comment'></div>荒是南道，爰启厥初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298014_comment'></div>根膏实腴，后嗣之须。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1298014_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2b7b3f6885b448fc8bc92987af42c053_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2b7b3f6885b448fc8bc92987af42c053");'><span id='2b7b3f6885b448fc8bc92987af42c053_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>，34岁</div><div id='2b7b3f6885b448fc8bc92987af42c053' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>　道士赵道川造门求文。作品：紫云山崇仙观记。<div id='poem_1297861' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297861' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297861?labeling=true' target='_blank'>紫云山崇仙观记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297861")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297861_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297861'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297861'>大中祥符七年，绵州守臣刘宗奏言，彰明县紫云山崇仙观柱木有文，为道士形及北斗星象，伻来以图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297861_comment'></div>上宣示宰臣于禁中，臣旦、臣准各拜表贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297861_comment'></div>逮重和元年，始建道学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297861_comment'></div>是岁诏崇仙观其以延祥为额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297861_comment'></div>国朝崇尚老氏，惟祥、禧、政、宣间为盛，而是山被遇凡再，今皆在太史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297861_comment'></div>岂其山川郁蟠，固有以宅灵气，会风云，而感召至祥若此者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297861_comment'></div>尝欲考诸方志，以验其然否，未果也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297861_comment'></div>开禧二年，余校雠中秘书，山之道士曰赵道川，以刊志未备，乃水陆万里，疏其事而语诸余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297861_comment'></div>会余去国，乃俾它属，道川蹴然谢不敢，则为言：「子诚有意焉，他日其访我于蜀，尚有以赎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297861_comment'></div>今也既舍去后六年，余尚里居，道川踵门请曰：「京师之会，逢执事之不閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297861_comment'></div>虽然，执事尝坠言焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297861_comment'></div>出其观之图牒，则视前益加详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297861_comment'></div>盖山居彰明县之西南四十里所，曾峦环秀，古木樛翠，地理书谓常有紫云结其上，故名，理或然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297861_comment'></div>冈来自北，为天仓，为龙洞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297861_comment'></div>东为风洞，为仙人青龙洞，露香台；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297861_comment'></div>西为蟆颐，为白云洞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297861_comment'></div>南为天台山，为舜帝洞、桃溪源、天生桥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297861_comment'></div>其阙则前为元始殿，为黄箓宝宫，九真殿在后，玉皇殿在九真后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297861_comment'></div>东岳天师钟楼在前左，三元桂籍真官真武在前右，南辰五师后左，经楼瑞真堂后右，三仙六神居前两庑，以至斋宫宿庐、庖湢库圉，以固以具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297861_comment'></div>古柏鼎立于庭者巉岩老硬，盖不知年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297861_comment'></div>而其间所谓黄箓宝宫，则世传为唐开元二十四年神人由他山徙寘于此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297861_comment'></div>宫之三十六柱皆檀木，铁绳隐迹，迄今不毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297861_comment'></div>所谓柱木有文，则住山张承杲修是宫而得之，即国史所书者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297861_comment'></div>诏承杲倍赐束帛及御茗、紫衣师号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297861_comment'></div>由是远近翕翕归向，馆宇盖修，像设有严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297861_comment'></div>相承至蒲怀显，与其徒复增拓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297861_comment'></div>爰暨于今，营甃髹壁之工日备，猗其伟欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297861_comment'></div>古之民四，今之民六，而四不足以加二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297861_comment'></div>古之教一，今之教三，而二常足以胜一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297861_comment'></div>人谓二氏语人以善恶祸福，故崇尚者众，非偶然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297861_comment'></div>服儒衣冠者满天下，岂不曰自孔氏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297861_comment'></div>孔氏之德，大要使人近思下学，谨独为己，即事即物以致其知而充之，以至于治国平天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297861_comment'></div>其道盖至约而易知，至近而易行者也，而鲜有能的然笃信，以从事于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297861_comment'></div>如二氏之徒，尊其师之说，使四方之人奔走附集，衎衎施施而不能已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297861_comment'></div>虽缮营宫庙，裒聚遗文，儒者亦鲜及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297861_comment'></div>因道川之来之勤、之请之力而重有感焉，乃并书以遗之，且将以谂吾徒焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1297861_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='fa79b24dca10406a919286326b07aa07_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fa79b24dca10406a919286326b07aa07");'><span id='fa79b24dca10406a919286326b07aa07_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1213')">1212-1213年</a>，35-36岁</div><div id='fa79b24dca10406a919286326b07aa07' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　家居，修缮鹤山书院，撰文记其本末。作品：书鹤山书院始末。<div id='poem_1297883' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297883' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297883?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书鹤山书院始末</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297883")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297883_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297883'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297883'>开禧二年秋八月，临邛魏了翁请郡西还，既又三辞聘召，遂得迁延岁月，丘园之乐者累年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297883_comment'></div>先庐枕山，与古白鹤冈阜属连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297883_comment'></div>山之颠则修竹缘坡，循坡而上，草木胶葛，又上焉则荆棘之所于也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297883_comment'></div>有烽燧故基，相传为李唐时西南夷数大入，是为望敌之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297883_comment'></div>盖居一县之最高峰，故县人亦罕至其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297883_comment'></div>一日与家人穷隮，颇爱面前隈支一峰，欲即之而不得，则除剪其荆棘，蒙犯虺蜴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297883_comment'></div>聚足而上，则其地平袤，衡广二百尺，纵数里，无复侧峻凹凸，殆天閟而地藏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297883_comment'></div>隈支中峰复屹立其前，如有钜人端士色授面承，欲遂卜室贮书其上，与朋友共焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297883_comment'></div>会居心制，未即功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297883_comment'></div>嘉定三年春，诏郡国聘士，邛之预宾贡者比屋相望，未有讲肄之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297883_comment'></div>会鹤山书院落成，乃授之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297883_comment'></div>其秋试于有司，士自首选而下，拔十而得八，书室俄空焉，人竞传为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297883_comment'></div>了翁曰是不过务记览、为文词以规取利禄云尔，学云学云，记览、文词云乎哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297883_comment'></div>则又取友于四方，与之共学，负笈而至者襁属不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297883_comment'></div>乃增广前后，各为一堂，堂内廊庑门墉以次毕具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297883_comment'></div>旁为小室，曰立斋，永嘉叶公为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297883_comment'></div>介一堂曰书舫，舫之左右为南北窗，堂之后为阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297883_comment'></div>家故有书，某又得秘书之副而传录焉，与访寻于公私所板行者，凡得十万卷，以附益而尊阁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297883_comment'></div>取《六经阁记》中语榜以「尊经」，则阳安刘公为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297883_comment'></div>阁之下又为一堂，堂内榜曰「事心」，取邵子语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297883_comment'></div>阁之阴辟小圃，凿池筑室，艺卉木，为游息之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297883_comment'></div>圃之后凭高瞰虚，一川风物之秀皆在目中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297883_comment'></div>又为亭其上，于以仰观日星风露之变，俯察鸟兽草木之宜，又若有以荡开灵襟、助发神观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297883_comment'></div>自惟穷乡晚进，学未能信，而荐叨烦使，轻涉世纷，将败绩厥官是惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297883_comment'></div>方表乞祠官之禄，若得请焉，退而聚友于斯，藏修息游于斯，相与诵先王之遗言，随事省察，万有一不坠厥初以为朋友羞，尚不虚筑室贮书之意也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1297883_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年8月8日</a>　妻杜氏生日，李炎震携其女载酒为寿，赋词谢之。作品：水调歌头（曾向君王说）<div id='poem_253651' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253651' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253651?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头 妇生朝李倅□同其女载酒为寿用韵谢之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年8月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253651")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253651_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253651'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253651'>曾向君王说，臣愿守嘉州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253651'>风流别乘初届，元在越王楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253651'>湖上龟鱼何事，桥上雁犀谁使，争挽海山舟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253651'>便遣旧姻娅，解后作斯游。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253651_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253651'>晚风清，初暑涨，暮云收。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253651'>公堂高会，恍疑仙女下罗浮。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253651'>好是中郎有女，况是史君有妇，同对藕花洲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253651'>拟把<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_253651", 253651, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>鹤山</span>月，换却鉴湖秋。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253651_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年12月4日</a>　友人李侨于生日前一日致政，邀约友人至长庆院访梅花、山茶，作诗贺之。作品：李德秀致政以其生日前一日约士友至长庆院访梅花山茶因以为寿;李德秀致政即席赋五言十韵用韵答之。<div id='poem_253192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253192' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253192?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李德秀致政以其生日前一日约士友至长庆院访梅花山茶因以为寿<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月四日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年12月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253192")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253192_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253192'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253192'>流年苦被雪霜催，惟有山中自四时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253192'>寒色慭花妆岁晚，晓阴挟雾放春迟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253192'>似嫌俗客不同调，留与高人共胜期。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253192'>但愿多书冲祐考，与君长伴岁寒枝<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：是日余闻冲祐之报。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253192'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253192_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253479?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李德秀致政即席赋五言十韵用韵答之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年12月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253479")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_253479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253479'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253479'>冬十有二月，期三百六旬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253479'>高怀局宇宙，良会惜参辰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253479'>乘兴访安道，扣窗呼孔宾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253479'>袭人薰蕙若，夺目烂犀珍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253479'>风景乾吟笔，林花眩醉裀。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253479'>溪山逢旧识，水竹乐閒人。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253479'>岁籥逡巡换，春炜次第新。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253479'>抚时嗟易失，涉道渺无因。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253479'>循物探天运，冥心观我身。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253479'>相期共无斁，不与迹同陈。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253479'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_253479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年12月4日</a>　得祠官，主管建宁府冲佑观。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　冬，伯父魏和孙入葬，为撰墓志铭。作品：魏府君和孙墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298021?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏府君和孙墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定五年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298021")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298021'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298021'>邛之蒲江，魏姓为广，惟谱谍之通者厥系惟二，盖亦有故焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298021_comment'></div>今家于邑中者，则吾宗也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298021_comment'></div>其邑之二十里所曰嘉魏者，故汉嘉徙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298021_comment'></div>中兴初，罢新学，复词赋取士，嘉魏之应诏者曰邦达，年甫冠即预其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298021_comment'></div>我大父雅与厚善，他日无子，大父以第三子和孙为之子，是为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298021_comment'></div>二系之同异莫可考，至是始以唐人洛阳、曲江张氏故事叙昭穆焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298021_comment'></div>君字伯同，一名明孙，资性宽易，寡与物忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298021_comment'></div>孝于亲，厚于友，遇人一以诚，长者无贵贱良楛皆得其欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298021_comment'></div>门临达道，往来游士夕馆昼馔，各厌所欲以去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298021_comment'></div>下迨游手末作、伶优贱工，未尝不丐贷焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298021_comment'></div>家用若以是少屈，而平生遵畏涯分，不持书谒以造请势涂，不事钩谲以圉夺贫弱，不以子金钱求倍称之息，不射时斡货以罔利于乡曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298021_comment'></div>溪皋谷陬，曳杖消摇，嘉时令节，命酒索炙，訾产之厚薄未尝深计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298021_comment'></div>季年阅变既久，处世夷澹，乡有不平之讼，从容造君，一语乃释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298021_comment'></div>乡之一二远官有与君从游者，情分凝笃，暨其领州，则书尺返以阔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298021_comment'></div>其自处不苟率类是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298021_comment'></div>君同产之二弟连岁宾贡，其二弟之子接踵科级，虽以某之不肖，亦获缀一名于庆元进士籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298021_comment'></div>君馀论之所覃者盖若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298021_comment'></div>使天假之年，庞然秀眉，临长族属，承宁乡邻，将有以兴弟顺和厚之风于国人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298021_comment'></div>不幸年六十以卒，寔庆元六年九月戊午也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298021_comment'></div>曾大父某，大父某，父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298021_comment'></div>妣杨氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298021_comment'></div>君取同邑王氏，故安岳主簿、宣义郎致仕英之女，克躬妇道，故能成君之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298021_comment'></div>前君二年卒，年五十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298021_comment'></div>子男三人：长芾，次仲翁，次德谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298021_comment'></div>仲翁以后同产弟直行，德谦以后从父弟良弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298021_comment'></div>女三人，皆卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298021_comment'></div>婿高次卿、宋仲巽、张巩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298021_comment'></div>芾之子一人，愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298021_comment'></div>芾将以嘉定五年十二月丙申葬君于蒲川乡钦风里，以王夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298021_comment'></div>了翁以犹子少承警诲，习熟言行之懿，铭莫如了翁宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298021_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1298021'>以地系姓，厥载自嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298021_comment'></div>君出吾宗，克嗣厥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298021_comment'></div>谓约不絿，谓泰不夸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298021_comment'></div>谓轶不瑕，我铭匪誇。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1298021_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年1月18日</a>　宇文绍节卒，撰文哭之，并作挽诗。作品：哭宇文枢密绍节文。宇文枢密（挽诗）<div id='poem_1298136' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298136' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298136?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭宇文枢密绍节文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年1月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298136")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298136_comment'></div><div
