class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298136'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298136'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298136_comment'></div>天之生公，畴克度之，既予其资而厄其逢而啬其终，竟亦何为者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298136_comment'></div>自公造朝，郎闱枢掾，宰士史坳，东省南曹，北门西掖，清资显序，阅历殆遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298136_comment'></div>至于析圭作牧，专阃宣威，则又无以易公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298136_comment'></div>盖自是声实既孚，遂仪政路，尚谓公不逢邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298136_comment'></div>而始值权臣威陵势压，委心濡迹，罔克自靖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298136_comment'></div>晚居宥府，志亦少纾，位则有制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298136_comment'></div>凡其尊主庇民之盛心，推贤扬善之雅志，讫未能有所展布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298136_comment'></div>呜呼公乎，其亦可悲矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298136_comment'></div>自义理不竞，士习卑鄙，而吾蜀之士习隘踵陋，顾私患失，媢忌成风，汲引莫闻，尤为可叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298136_comment'></div>士将有望于公，以一洗耳目之陋，而有衔弗祛，以殒厥身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298136_comment'></div>天乎，盍不慭遗，俾有以大慰民志者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298136_comment'></div>某昔以诸生受知于公，他日又得侍同朝甚喜，自丙寅请外，音驿顿疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298136_comment'></div>嘉定更化之初，录前为权饕所轧者，某首叨召用，既辞不获请，则将治任以趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298136_comment'></div>会离心制，荣望日颓，公以德爱我，亮其鸟乌之情，勉徇私请，力遏前命，俾守郡绂，得以窃禄养母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298136_comment'></div>某佩荷此意，至于今不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298136_comment'></div>山川悠远，既不克驰渍絮之奠，合以简书之畏，又弗克驰诣帐下，为之一哀而出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298136_comment'></div>忞忞此心，将以醴币，神鉴之哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1298136_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253102' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253102' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253102?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宇文枢密挽诗<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年1月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253102")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253102_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253102'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253102'>人物眇然甚，天胡不慭公。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253102'>北风鸣槭槭，西火乱蓬蓬。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253102'>襄鄂谁专阃，江淮孰总戎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253102'>是应当馈叹，曩日镇江功。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253102_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253102'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253102_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253101' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253101' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253101?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年1月18日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253101_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253101'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253101'>夷考公言行，真成肃悯孙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253101_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253101'>星枢绳懿武，月殿媲隆恩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253101_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253101'>契阔成三世，凄凉隔九原。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253101_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253101'>壮夫襟上泪，并为两师垣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253101_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253101'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253101_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年1月</a>　友人谯仲午之父卒，为撰墓志铭。作品：谯府君春墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298022' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298022' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298022?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谯府君春墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定六年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298022")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298022_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298022'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298022'>嘉定六年春正月丙寅，处士谯君卒于成都之双流尉廨，年七十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298022_comment'></div>厥二月辛巳，其孤仲午反柩于邛蒲江之里居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298022_comment'></div>厥九月庚申，葬于盐泉乡兑山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298022_comment'></div>先事，以书抵余曰：「昔者吾父孤苦自力，尔居吾邻，尔寔稔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298022_comment'></div>尔之同产弟兄则我之所自出也，尔也视余父犹舅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298022_comment'></div>父之竁未有识也，以惟尔也属」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298022_comment'></div>余弗敢辞，叙而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298022_comment'></div>君讳春，字子辰，姓谯氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298022_comment'></div>世居邛之大邑，以儒名家，后徙居蒲江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298022_comment'></div>曾大父祖道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298022_comment'></div>大父景阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298022_comment'></div>父询，再贡礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298022_comment'></div>妣陈氏，文林郎寿祺之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298022_comment'></div>君在母七月而生，十有七年而孤，又三年而丧所恃，茕然一身，备尝险艰，有人所不堪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298022_comment'></div>自幼期立门户，祗遹礼法，弗敢踰越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298022_comment'></div>方是时，大母王孺人年踰八十，诸父异居，公委曲承顺，内外无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298022_comment'></div>从父蓬州府君孝迪心善之，每劳之以书，期属甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298022_comment'></div>甫冠，所从游皆父行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298022_comment'></div>初明毛、郑《诗》，继为词赋，邑宰有士名者率宾礼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298022_comment'></div>自贡士云亡，所藏图籍散逸殆尽，公雅嗜书，多所储蓄，自六经子史至星经地乘、虞初稗官、道释医卜之书，靡不究阅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298022_comment'></div>或假诸人，广所未见，有意者随即传抄，今手泽尚数十编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298022_comment'></div>岁始生之日，子孙上寿，首陈考妣像而泣拜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298022_comment'></div>居负山，望见生陇，作顾云亭其上，凝伫辄移晷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298022_comment'></div>其笃于孝爱若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298022_comment'></div>资简重，与人交怡然以和，有不可未尝假以词色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298022_comment'></div>教子齐家，率本以忠孝，又以扁其室，其趣尚可概见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298022_comment'></div>开禧三年，仲午以词赋举于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298022_comment'></div>嘉定三年再举，乃登明年进士第，试吏为迪功郎、双流县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298022_comment'></div>公过其子，仅旬岁获终养，吁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298022_comment'></div>是可悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298022_comment'></div>君之妃曰陈氏，讳符，临邛人，进士仲鲁之女，昂之孙，承事郎熙之曾孙，不逮事尊章，独能谨祭祀，睦宗族，有足称者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298022_comment'></div>某年某月某日，以疾终于正寝，年若干岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298022_comment'></div>生三男子：焯、仲午、煓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298022_comment'></div>焯先二年而卒，煓为叔父后，蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298022_comment'></div>四女子：长适乡贡进士费之午，次郑存中、费德远，适存中者先亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298022_comment'></div>孙男三人：埏、址、增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298022_comment'></div>孙女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298022_comment'></div>曾孙男一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298022_comment'></div>外孙男女十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298022_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1298022'>兰既种而刈之，胡委佩而亟去之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298022_comment'></div>叶万子孙，勿替引之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1298022_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年2月15日</a>　孙堪卒，其子属李耆寿撰行状且邀魏了翁撰墓志铭。作品：孙仲卿墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298069?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孙仲卿墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定六年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298069")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298069_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298069'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298069'>孙氏之先居青社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298069_comment'></div>七世祖镣，咸平中主江陵石首簿，卒官，葬纪山皇华原，遂为江陵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298069_comment'></div>至四世羲叟，皇任龙图阁学士、太中大夫、文安县开国子，累赠金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298069_comment'></div>尝奉使成都，移镇西川，以平晏州夷、平溱播、平绵茂、城泸南、建石泉军，天监忠劳，锡之祚嗣，蕃衍曼硕，繇是孙氏为荆右族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298069_comment'></div>生涛，皇任朝奉郎，掌广东府机宜文字，好贤嫉恶，为乡里所称，语在墓铭，则从父弟同判西京国子监伟所撰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298069_comment'></div>涛生钧，皇任奉议郎、江淮都督府准备差遣，以疾请主管崇道观以归，寻佥书忠州判官，未上而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298069_comment'></div>其博学笃行，语在墓铭，则忠简胡公所撰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298069_comment'></div>取李氏，中大夫昕之女，熙宁侍御史尧言之孙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298069_comment'></div>继种氏，太尉师道之裔孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298069_comment'></div>并赠孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298069_comment'></div>继师氏，迪功郎古之女，君与兄倅皆师出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298069_comment'></div>君讳堪，字仲卿，少挺特如成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298069_comment'></div>奉议以靖康之变，辟地松滋，不事产业，率为旁近侵冒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298069_comment'></div>君十一岁而孤，师夫人泣而诲之曰：「尔父赍志以没，尔兄弟其勤学厉行，毋坠先训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298069_comment'></div>不然，吾永无望矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298069_comment'></div>兄弟廪廪承命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298069_comment'></div>既免丧，复城西遗址，编芦架葺而居焉，既而田庐皆复其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298069_comment'></div>每晨昏兄弟帅妇孙问母安否，衣视袄寒，食视饥饱，咸俾节适，内外睦雍无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298069_comment'></div>辟塾延师以教子、诸子之愿学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298069_comment'></div>塾之南建书室曰「竹斋」，兄弟从容其间，讲求古人修身齐家之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298069_comment'></div>文有师法，尤谨于择交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298069_comment'></div>初，光禄尝创义庄于□山之阳，以赡宗族之贫者，岁久亦废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298069_comment'></div>君躬畚锸，拾瓦砾，铢积寸累，阅数岁，岁仅收百斛，乃别营泉粟以赡贫者，而移此以给先茔之百用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298069_comment'></div>涖之以盟约，乐景夔章记其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298069_comment'></div>未几，族人有近茔之田为豪大家所并，则倍庚之以给父兄兆域之奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298069_comment'></div>项平甫安世不妄许可，尝铭师夫人之墓，谓夫人与其子不动声色，尽复故业，可以愧天下士大夫之忘祖宗中原而不复者，士论伟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298069_comment'></div>事兄如事父，事无小必禀命而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298069_comment'></div>兄以嘉定三年卒，年五十有八，君哭之恸，若无意于世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298069_comment'></div>六年，君亦五十八，忽苦微疾，喟然叹曰：「吾殆将死乎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298069_comment'></div>处分家事无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298069_comment'></div>以二月丙戌整衣冠而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298069_comment'></div>吁，气禀之同而数之修短有适相似者，亦异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298069_comment'></div>君取乐氏，故免解进士根之长女，端重婉淑，族姻称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298069_comment'></div>子男四人：长炳文，已卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298069_comment'></div>次梦得，以后伯氏，凡再与乡举；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298069_comment'></div>次思义，国子监发解进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298069_comment'></div>次梦符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298069_comment'></div>女二人，长适承议郎、知靖州永平县张辖，次适乡贡进士高楠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298069_comment'></div>孙男□人，孙女□人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298069_comment'></div>君孤苦持家，志念深远，振乏赒贫、存亡继绝之义，又皆为人所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298069_comment'></div>光禄帅成都，民奉祠僭侈，坐贬职左选，君讼冤阙下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298069_comment'></div>乡邦流寓，解额未复，所陈请不获不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298069_comment'></div>刘文节公分阃日，尝为上诸朝，其勇于孝义率类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298069_comment'></div>诸孤以卒之年六月甲申，葬君于皇华原奉议公之墓左，属李南公耆寿状君之行求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298069_comment'></div>人谓君不获施于有政，呜呼，惟孝友于兄弟，施于有政，是亦为政，而君又何憾乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298069_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1298069'>孩提而知爱亲，及长而知敬兄，是亦民行之常，尽其道而死者几人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298069_comment'></div>君庶几其无憾，予焉得而无铭。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1298069'></div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1298069_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1bf7b4dd1cf24df9920309f7fe079d28_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1bf7b4dd1cf24df9920309f7fe079d28");'><span id='1bf7b4dd1cf24df9920309f7fe079d28_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>，36岁</div><div id='1bf7b4dd1cf24df9920309f7fe079d28' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年7月</a>　应友人邛州守张师夔之请，撰文记其新创南楼事。作品：邛州新创南楼记。<div id='poem_1297865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>邛州新创南楼记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297865")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297865_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297865'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297865'>临邛居蜀上游，鹤山襟其西，邛水带其南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297865_comment'></div>风气融液，土田衍沃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297865_comment'></div>民生其间，检履醇固，习尚儒雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297865_comment'></div>盖自胡安先生、林闾翁孺，尝为汉卿、云从之受业，卒以名世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297865_comment'></div>庄遵、陈立，嗣有显问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297865_comment'></div>风流所渐，代不乏贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297865_comment'></div>虽以五季抢攘，而忠谅之士，亦表表著闻于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297865_comment'></div>迨我国朝，道化纯被，士趋益正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297865_comment'></div>或以学业名家，或以功烈垂世，或以鲠直不容于俗，或以廉平有德于民，载在史册，垂诸郡乘，盖烂然可覆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297865_comment'></div>眉山张侯师夔来守是州，崇校官，表遗逸，礼儒士，课弟子员，凡以崇化善俗、迪彝明伦者，侯既尽心焉耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297865_comment'></div>又以南离之方，为一州文明之气所萃，效灵输秀，世载其英也，思益有以作而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297865_comment'></div>循郡谯而南，一目数里，砥平矢直，爰蔇江濒，度其地而楼焉，从广四仞，其衡之长如从而加一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297865_comment'></div>脩楹有觉，阳马承阿，二厦挟承，如鸟斯翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297865_comment'></div>其衡各以二丈所，列巘献状，如揖如授，逝川腾辉，如顾如恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297865_comment'></div>异时郡谯面势，甲于他郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297865_comment'></div>今钜丽如之，而江山气象，扶舆槃礴，则谯弗及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297865_comment'></div>四川制置大使广安安公丙以尝为邑长于斯也，又嘉侯之事法而制时也，捐钱百二十万以相其役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297865_comment'></div>始嘉定五年十一月，迄于明年之三月，费钱千四十万有奇，米三百石，夫万有三千，竣事而民不知役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297865_comment'></div>余同年友天官侍郎阳安许公奕既为之扁其所曰南楼，厥七月，士以书来谂，俾某记其事之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297865_comment'></div>某，州民也，弗敢辞，则姑诵謏闻以推明侯意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297865_comment'></div>盖自天地定位，而南北之方为中且正，《坎》位乎北，中实也，不实则险而易动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297865_comment'></div>《离》位乎南，中虚也，不虚则闇而不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297865_comment'></div>夫二气之升降，万物之生成，于是乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297865_comment'></div>近取诸身，大凡成体而有物，孚信而不可欺者，皆坎之实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297865_comment'></div>而致用之大，惟心为要焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297865_comment'></div>人以一心成位乎两间，虚明中正，至文之所从出也，故其象为离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297865_comment'></div>人皆深体而默践，一有以洞见全体，则所居广居也，所立正位也，所行大道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297865_comment'></div>以之周旋乎万物皆相见之地，如日之方中，宇宙之间，无一弗烛焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297865_comment'></div>是心也，不既甚绰绰矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297865_comment'></div>而人常小之，以自溺于偏倚窒闇之地，物欲蔽而天理隐矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297865_comment'></div>故圣人立象以示之，又设卦系辞焉而告之，故曰：天有四时，地载神气，无非教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297865_comment'></div>坎离虚实之象，非天地间不言之教乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297865_comment'></div>不宁惟是，若《升》之南征而吉，《明夷》之南狩而得，皆取诸此，而都邑之位面朝而后市，乡饮酒之位向仁而偕藏，亦不曰阳明之方，君子所尚，人一身致用之要皆出是中虚之地而可乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297865_comment'></div>侯之作斯楼也，凡以寓其为教之意，非必家至而户晓者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297865_comment'></div>士而能循名会意，有以反求诸己而毋蔽于物欲以窒其虚也，毋闇于偏陂以失其中也，毋安于末技以乱其至文也，毋矜乎小智以晦其本明也，豁然大公，靡所湫阏，则以是充之，造道入圣，将无难者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297865_comment'></div>其英华之晬盎，光辉之畅发，又岂止名爵之荣也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297865_comment'></div>侯之望于士者盖若此，某虽不敏，请与里父兄懋敬厥修，以无忘侯德云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1297865_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　从弟魏文翁为眉山尉，赋词送之。作品：临江仙（细雨斜风驱晓瘴）<div id='poem_253705' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253705' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253705?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临江仙 送嘉甫弟赴眉山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253705")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253705_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253705'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253705'>细雨斜风驱晓瘴，绰开坦坦长途。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253705'>膏车秣马问程初。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253705'>梅梢迎候骑，雁影度平芜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253705_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253705'>行己不论官小大，穷探不间精粗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253705'>只从厚处作规模。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253705'>简编迂事业，屋漏拙功夫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_253705_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b428afe2f9a14907af3477f8eddaee39_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b428afe2f9a14907af3477f8eddaee39");'><span id='b428afe2f9a14907af3477f8eddaee39_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1219')">1218-1219年</a>，41-42岁</div><div id='b428afe2f9a14907af3477f8eddaee39' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年3月</a>　生母谯氏卒，以心制乞身。作品：先叔母卒哭醮词。<div id='poem_1298251' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298251' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298251?labeling=true' target='_blank'>先叔母卒哭醮词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298251")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298251_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298251'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298251'>三月皇皇，念母之不见；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298251_comment'></div>中心养养，过时而未忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298251_comment'></div>虽云礼制之中，当卒旦晡之哭，然而集遐忧其未慭，感知气之如新，用陈醮祭之仪，少寓劬劳之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298251_comment'></div>曼曼长夜，深嗟体魄之何之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298251_comment'></div>明明上天，尚冀超升之有所。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1298251_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年7月9日</a>　同产长兄高载病卒，为撰行状。作品：知灵泉县奉议郎致仕高君载行状。<div id='poem_1298005' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298005' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298005?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知灵泉县奉议郎致仕高君载行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年7月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298005")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298005'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298005'>君讳载，字东叔，世为邛之蒲江人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298005_comment'></div>自为儿时，颖异越常，八岁能属文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298005_comment'></div>尝为犬所噬，作赋以詈之，其间有云：「逐利不顾则从蹠而吠尧，为养所移则事齐而背汉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298005_comment'></div>父师得其文大惊，由是不敢以凡儿蓄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298005_comment'></div>少长，通六学，尤精于毛氏《诗》，旁及子史百氏、异端小说，率数行下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298005_comment'></div>遇有扣质，则事词颠末、姓名月日，语端骆驿无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298005_comment'></div>以词赋冠乡举，登嘉泰二年第，调嘉定府峨眉县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298005_comment'></div>前官以廨圮僦民居，君至拓而新之，未半岁，百废具举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298005_comment'></div>太守果山游君仲鸿、广都费君士戣闻其才，召摄嘉定法曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298005_comment'></div>永康陈君谦为详刑使者，亦甚器之，取置幕下，且除馆授粲，遣子从游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298005_comment'></div>建人刘君崇之代陈，君固请还邑，弗听，事无细大，异席咨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298005_comment'></div>转丞丹棱，邑号难治，会阙令，君以次摄，以公勤重吏足，以文雅服士心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298005_comment'></div>听讼本诸义理，尝有兄弟交愬而父直其弟者，且曰季能食我，君语之曰：「孔子为鲁司寇，释父子之讼，汉韩延寿不肯决兄弟之争议，天伦所在，丽于法则害于教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298005_comment'></div>今为之兄者既不能养其父，傥绳以令甲则宁翅不祥之离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298005_comment'></div>姑令百拜以谢，幸其幡然以返于彝也，而犹不悛，以干于僇，则县令风之未至，将无词于责，敢缓闭閤之思乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298005_comment'></div>于是兄弟感泣，拜唯而退，遂为父子兄弟如初，讼缿因以浸稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298005_comment'></div>俄丁父忧，丧葬尽礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298005_comment'></div>尝于读《礼》之馀，览前朝史牒，叹熙、丰、祐、圣、符、靖、崇、观、政、宣汔于建、绍、乾、淳熙元党论屡变，国势偾起不常，慨然有感于来今，乃取制词之褒贬、廷论之是非，粹成巨编，而自以己意识其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298005_comment'></div>大抵虽以《国史》、《实录》、《长编》、《会要》为之据依，而一时诏旨训词、封章奏疏，则必于先贤文集私史简稽参质，以溃于成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298005_comment'></div>凡百数十年间一治一乱，开卷瞭然，亦庶几为时事之补，非今世类书比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298005_comment'></div>服阕，调泸州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298005_comment'></div>前给事、侍郎许公奕为州，州事悉经其手，裁处明隽，许公既上其绩，去之日又以所知荐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298005_comment'></div>吏部范公继至，则君治任将归，乃曲留之，俾摄帅属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298005_comment'></div>主宾从容，惟孜孜讲学之务，或语及前言往行，诵荅如响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298005_comment'></div>范公即郡斋修地理书，语寮吏曰：「无踰于高君者矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298005_comment'></div>首以委付，又参以刘君湜、史君尧辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298005_comment'></div>君夙夜究心，不日而成，又取佗人之未竟者为粹成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298005_comment'></div>世所谓《寰宇》、《九域》、《堪舆》、《舆地》诸书，亦略备矣，君复以国史、郡乘、私志、野录参绎贯通，凡郡县之升降，诸道之分合，职官之沿改，风俗之微恶，人物之盛衰，与夫宣亩丘乘、封国江河久远难明之事，鸟兽草木选蠕细琐殊尤诡异之物，皆亲为笔削，靡微不周，往往前之为丘乘者莫加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298005_comment'></div>嘉定九年正月，改宣教郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298005_comment'></div>居数月，制置司辟知灵泉县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298005_comment'></div>君至则曰：「县令民社之寄，徒自近世视为冗恶，数日待满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298005_comment'></div>况此邦民贫地瘠，夏赋虽轻，秋输最重，脱又恣吏侵牟，民何从出」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298005_comment'></div>于是取先民格言凡有涉于为宰者辑为书，寘诸坐隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298005_comment'></div>视事穷晨夜，受输者立得券剂以归，无复它日所谓寄廊揽纳之弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298005_comment'></div>又曰今为令者率以簿书不报期会为大故，漫不省讼，且拘以定日，民有缓急将焉愬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298005_comment'></div>乃立为剖决，立未容决则贮之紫囊，俟公退反复筹惟，厥明即以书判示两词之人，莫不厌服愧谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298005_comment'></div>尝被制置司檄差充类省别院点检官，会本路详刑使者护试事，始下令曰：「异时考官往往不深惟朝廷取士之意，背公首私，吾侪尚懋敬之，毋枉有司」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298005_comment'></div>众皆曰诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298005_comment'></div>无何，与同舍大会堂皇上，作而曰：「今有某所某士以某经应选，所当笼取」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298005_comment'></div>众复唯唯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298005_comment'></div>君独徐而前曰：「夫朝廷以糊名取士，可焉取之，不可黜之，不知其他也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298005_comment'></div>今以公之初公明若此，而以是终之，无乃不可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298005_comment'></div>使者为改容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298005_comment'></div>君夷易疏畅，洞无城府，虽居官亦敝衣羸马，不改其度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298005_comment'></div>请谒者或以情告，则厚加顾予，不则善辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298005_comment'></div>亲族之贫者，岁以俸廪周之，戚疏厚薄，各足其分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298005_comment'></div>自扫一室，翻阅旧书，每语人曰：「人斯须废学，则无所措其身」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298005_comment'></div>以故孜孜兀兀，如不能终日，下至词章小技，亦积累成编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298005_comment'></div>与宾朋语，毋问经史，有触其机则丝贯绳联，娓娓不绝，或讲论至夜分无倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298005_comment'></div>意所予，虽晚出后进亦折辈行与语；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298005_comment'></div>所不与，虽大官贵人视之亡如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298005_comment'></div>然亦以是狡险者欺之，己所不予者谤焉，至其自信则凛不可夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298005_comment'></div>今年春，忽觉气血不仁，迨夏四月又闻母病于宁川，忧厉熏心，遂感忪怔淫热之疾，乃即白府乞身，以便省侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298005_comment'></div>诸弟寻以母丧赴，君执书恸泣，曰：「吾何以生为也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298005_comment'></div>于是柴瘠加等，疾不可为矣，遂以七月之九日属纩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298005_comment'></div>呜呼，痛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298005_comment'></div>痛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298005_comment'></div>君取同郡安仁计氏，生三子男：斯立、斯和、斯美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298005_comment'></div>一女，巽，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298005_comment'></div>斯立兄弟将以今年十二月庚申葬君于眉州丹棱县长宁乡仙水里乾山之原，与计夫人同兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298005_comment'></div>重惟君自幼力学，考质经传，上下数千年如指诸掌，为文不事钩棘，和平赡逸，自成一家，当世之儒生闻人咸共期以远到，而未见有所施设，赍恨以殁，宜有立言君子为识其竁以诒世信后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298005_comment'></div>顾事严日薄，其孤有志未就，姑为撰次其爵里行义年，刻诸墓石以俟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1298005_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　是年，荐举李刘，二人有书信往来。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　是年，为唐季乙撰墓志铭。作品：绵州教授承奉郎致仕唐君季乙墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298031' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298031' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298031?labeling=true' target='_blank'>绵州教授承奉郎致仕唐君季乙墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298031")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298031_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298031'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298031'>嘉定六年秋，晋原唐述之季乙以《易》学为四川类试第一，余之表兄高南叔某、西叔某咸在高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298031_comment'></div>初，西叔有女子曰晋，生而明晤，每重于择对，于是闻述之贤而文，遂许妻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298031_comment'></div>其年余守郡通义，述之入对大问，便道过余，留三日谷，问所试《易》，乃以《系辞》「天地定位」以下八句为题，述之对曰：「求易于有象之初，固有以具其相资之理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298031_comment'></div>论易于重卦之后，始有以神其至变之用」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298031_comment'></div>其意盖谓天地间固有是自然之易，而包牺氏因之以作八卦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298031_comment'></div>八卦既画，又重之以极其变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298031_comment'></div>此先天心法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298031_comment'></div>余曰：「大哉，子之及此也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298031_comment'></div>先天之学，前代无传焉，自魏伯阳已若窥见此意，至华山陈处士图南始尽发其秘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298031_comment'></div>一再传而为伊川邵子，则建图著书以示人，且曰万化万事皆生于心，其言可谓深切著明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298031_comment'></div>而得其传者且寡，以用之于科举则又绝无而仅有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298031_comment'></div>今子于数往知来之义虽断以己意，而先天画卦之序、包牺心法之秘，则有以得夫陈、邵之指，斯不亦可尚矣夫」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298031_comment'></div>明年调绵州州学教授，归自行京，西叔以子妻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298031_comment'></div>余又除郡舍馆之累月，体行醇固，不以忧喜见色，而勤学厉行，人有片善寸长则耻躬不逮，不学不能不已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298031_comment'></div>会余奉使东川，辞去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298031_comment'></div>明年当上，适以妇妊及月，姑徐以待其免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298031_comment'></div>既免而母子胥逝，述之伤悼不自任，凡以致其忠爱者罔弗尽，然因是邑邑寡悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298031_comment'></div>至视事于绵，乃能勉自振发，率昧旦大会诸生，以经谕一员番上迭讲，而己为订其可否，退又督课肄之程，厉入出之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298031_comment'></div>丙夜诣诸生，不间寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298031_comment'></div>太守贤之，不俟满岁，即以姓名上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298031_comment'></div>旁近郡邑闻风，亦愿造焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298031_comment'></div>俄以妇练祥醮祭连夕，遂得疾，为庸医误下疏浚之剂，精气顿索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298031_comment'></div>其夕梦脏间有五竖子，各衣其方色，若将决去者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298031_comment'></div>厥明，述之请于其亲曰：「儿疾不可为矣，得豆区禄不克终养，且未有后，以为亲忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298031_comment'></div>即死，愿以弟季垕之子为子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298031_comment'></div>言讫乃绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298031_comment'></div>盖嘉定十年三月二十四日，适其妇始生之日也，其月甲辰，其日己未，又与妇生之月同，呜呼异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298031_comment'></div>余时将漕东蜀，闻讳音即驰书币逆其丧以归晋原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298031_comment'></div>又一年，余以心制乞身，述之之父道宁谋以十□年□月□日葬述之于□□乡□□里□山之原，而状其行以告余，俾识诸竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298031_comment'></div>余拊其状，泣数行下，不忍辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298031_comment'></div>考其世，自曾王考亘为宣教郎，知火井县，王考德成尝贡于乡，父道宁未仕，世居崇庆之晋原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298031_comment'></div>母同郡康氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298031_comment'></div>先是贡士府君少孤，刻志《书》《诗》，旁涉子史，晚又读《易》，将有所论著而不克终其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298031_comment'></div>一日贡士之冢子道昌梦其父危坐，若有愠色，请所以，不对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298031_comment'></div>道昌曰：「大人得无以《易传》未终乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298031_comment'></div>曰：「然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298031_comment'></div>既又曰：「汝弟将有子矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298031_comment'></div>道昌寤，以语其弟，明年乃生述之，遂名以述孙而授之《易》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298031_comment'></div>其后更名季乙以应事，而仍字以述之，示不忘其初也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298031_comment'></div>然孰知潜德蕴文者盖已累世，而述之仅以一第殒身邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298031_comment'></div>谓其有后矣，而竟亦何为者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298031_comment'></div>余表侄夙有美质，不烦姆训，作嫔于唐，克蹈《家人》之正，呜呼，亦孰知其遂止此邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298031_comment'></div>从我于眉山者累月，是时余与西叔偕侍庭闱，今西叔丧母悼妻，而余亦与于哭泣之哀，况铭吾述之也邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298031_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1298031'>慨自士习日卑，舍本趋末，则有未信而仕、不知而作者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298031_comment'></div>孰能知述之之贤，早有志于本，学推儒先之绪言，以求先天之心法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298031_comment'></div>使假之以年，精体笃践，则亦庶几孔门之所谓达者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298031_comment'></div>既厚其予，而亟其夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298031_comment'></div>惟是令名，奕世不椓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1298031_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　是年，友人胡台符通判邛州，为其祖父胡彬立祠，魏了翁为作记；同年，应胡台符之请，为其父胡仲舒撰墓志铭。作品：承事郎胡君仲舒墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298032' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298032' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298032?labeling=true' target='_blank'>承事郎胡君仲舒墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298032")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298032_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298032'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298032'>故朝请大夫、利州东路安抚司参议官晋原胡君以乾道九年通判邛州，嘉定十一年夏，其孙台符承嗣厥官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298032_comment'></div>始至，即治寺之东偏肖参议君之象而奉祠之，既属郡人魏了翁为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298032_comment'></div>其年天子敷祭泽于群臣，台符以升朝赠考承事郎，封母□氏太孺人，因以密章告于祢庙，于邑不自持，入白其母曰：「我先君以淳熙之元易箦于斯，今四十有五年矣，而居处笑语，廞其如存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298032_comment'></div>昔者之葬也，台符尚幼，弗克谒铭于闻人以光昭先君之令德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298032_comment'></div>今年迫始衰，大惧即没于地，赍恨罔极，我将复请于魏公」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298032_comment'></div>母曰：「汝其往哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298032_comment'></div>台符以告，则为迹其行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298032_comment'></div>盖参议之元妃曰高氏，无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298032_comment'></div>继室以刘，绍兴监察御史长源之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298032_comment'></div>生一女二男，而承事君为幼，资明晤，居以孝谨称，凡经史百氏之书过目成诵，至于纂言稡事，往往充牣箧牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298032_comment'></div>一时知名之士如碧山卢衷甫、眉山宋君兴皆闻风愿交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298032_comment'></div>成都吕周辅为郡校官，君往从之，与同郡阎广道、樊子南、宋正仲为研席交，讲切问辩，率至夜分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298032_comment'></div>尤工为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298032_comment'></div>参议如邛之明年，而君年二十有八以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298032_comment'></div>未瞑，参议抚之曰：「期汝大吾门，今止此，命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298032_comment'></div>晚遇恩霈则爵尔子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298032_comment'></div>是时台符方五岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298032_comment'></div>后七年，参议守大宁，遇宗祀恩，乃詶前言，且戒台符曰：「汝其勉诸」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298032_comment'></div>呜呼，韩文公所谓「吾时虽能记忆，亦未知其言之悲也」，非台符所闻于是言者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298032_comment'></div>余既拜兴受之，弗敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298032_comment'></div>无何，台符又以书来曰：「昔者之请，公忘之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298032_comment'></div>尝阅王父手泽，有祭吾父之文，其略曰：『汝生绍兴丁卯，两岁失母刘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298032_comment'></div>乳哺未绝口，气质已自不凡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298032_comment'></div>父再取杨氏，汝方六岁，奉亲色难如成人，子孝母慈，人无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298032_comment'></div>既长，刻意问学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298032_comment'></div>乾道戊子，父调官夔门，留汝居守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298032_comment'></div>五月六日，汝丧母杨，不茹荤饮酒，哭甚哀，见者怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298032_comment'></div>未几父归，则又官无留赋，庾有积粮，可了伏腊，时汝之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298032_comment'></div>郡校官亦奇汝进脩，汝能忘寒暑从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298032_comment'></div>乾道癸巳，汝忽染疾，无何疾间，侍我于邛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298032_comment'></div>明年而汝疾作，三月汝乃弃我而长逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298032_comment'></div>长者如此，幼者果可保其成人乎』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298032_comment'></div>台符每读至此，则搏膺而踊，殆无以生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298032_comment'></div>公其为我并识之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298032_comment'></div>了翁窃惟先正欧阳崇公之卒，文忠才四岁，徒恃母太夫人以立，故泷罔阡之表凡六十年而后作，且曰「脩非敢缓也，盖有待也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298032_comment'></div>今承事君之葬三十有四年矣，台符独非有待者与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298032_comment'></div>而属之了翁则非其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298032_comment'></div>然窃惟承事君生平驯行孝谨，自诚身顺亲以行乎州里，信乎朋友，亹亹乎如川之方至而未有已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298032_comment'></div>盖胡氏之桢干也，而亟夺之，故其祖孙之词肫切慨慷如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298032_comment'></div>矧老而哭子，少而丧父，凡皆钜痛穷罚，人情之所甚不可制者，莫为之铭，于人心独无恔乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298032_comment'></div>然则敢不敬诺？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298032_comment'></div>承事讳仲舒，字汉卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298032_comment'></div>曾王考贽，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298032_comment'></div>王考轮，以子贵赠奉直大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298032_comment'></div>考参议君讳彬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298032_comment'></div>子男一人，即台符，今以奉议郎通判邛州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298032_comment'></div>孙男□人，孙女□人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298032_comment'></div>葬以淳熙十二年□月某甲子，墓在晋康之善化乡□山，祔参议君之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298032_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1298032'>吁嗟胡君，美具美并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298032_comment'></div>扶木之东，而夷其明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298032_comment'></div>父兮畴畀，伤乌哭鲤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298032_comment'></div>儿兮畴依，孀机嫠纬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298032_comment'></div>卅有四年，草庑柏丸，既固既安，后人其蕃。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1298032_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1218&endYear=1218')">1218年</a>　是年，友人张从祖卒，为文哭之。作品：哭将作张少监从祖文。<div id='poem_1298149' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298149' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298149?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭将作张少监从祖文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298149")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298149_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298149'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298149'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298149_comment'></div>上下千百载，前言往行，旧章故典，于其成败得丧，如生其时、为其人以涖其事也，今有如公者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298149_comment'></div>萧然一室，图史左右，盖世所谓可慕可说可怵可愕之事，举不足以易其傃，今又有如公者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298149_comment'></div>昔在嘉泰、开禧之间，某无似，阶缘薄伎，陪厕周行，不四三年而蜀人之更迭出入者不下十七八人，其始终同省者惟公与参与李公及夕郎许公尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298149_comment'></div>今十七八人中之仅存者，乃独李、许二公与吏部范公，而馀皆下世久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298149_comment'></div>矧三公者方以祠官之禄里居，而某越在哀茕，死亡无日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298149_comment'></div>抚人物之牢落，感世道之惛怓，于公之葬宁不使我寤叹而啜泣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298149_comment'></div>每朝会无白首大儒可备顾问，昔人以为深忧，然则一哀之涕，非特为公出也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1298149_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年2月21日</a>　友人许奕卒，撰祭文、挽诗；往吊，因疆吏告警，中途而返。作品：哭许侍郎奕文。（挽）许侍郎奕。<div id='poem_1298150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭许侍郎奕文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年2月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298150")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298150'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298150'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298150_comment'></div>射策应书，宁乏高第，名不掩行，荣不盖愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298150_comment'></div>充曹牣省，孰匪近侍，喑不鸣仗，窳不供使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298150_comment'></div>耸善扶谊，如公亡几，不矜于誉，不怵于毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298150_comment'></div>始仆与公，同堂并峙，权门翕霍，我宇高邃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298150_comment'></div>然仆犹谓，此常分尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298150_comment'></div>寻迁起居，遂陟显美，以郎从官，为中给事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298150_comment'></div>有臣次山，王社是涖，杜晚锡节，高止廉使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298150_comment'></div>自曹向吴，韦郭郑氏，以元舅封，以后父贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298150_comment'></div>至于孟韩，已掩前比，矧兹后兄，亶谓异礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298150_comment'></div>飏于缙綎，唇稽腹诽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298150_comment'></div>公独诵言，成命已出，次山即辞，请遂其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298150_comment'></div>朝奏九重，夕远万里，人为公危，公甘如荠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298150_comment'></div>泸遂汔庸，往釐东梓，弭艰恤隐，罔末弗理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298150_comment'></div>会有介狄，阻兵负鄙，莫肯念乱，胥为蒙蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298150_comment'></div>有告于公，狄势孔迩，公曰吾尝，于朝有位，吾而不言，谁告君父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298150_comment'></div>乃为奏书，道所以故，藉令过实，主听公耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298150_comment'></div>魏高平侯，文靖公李，数白四方，盗贼灾异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298150_comment'></div>是卷卷者，今昔一意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298150_comment'></div>数不加罪，一已见忌，况嗾使者，遽加搏噬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298150_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298150_comment'></div>危言直道，婉娈攸忮，天则不然，惟善是芘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298150_comment'></div>胡亦梦梦，崇降疾厉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298150_comment'></div>然犹庶几，天欲平治，则罔歼良，以劝善类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298150_comment'></div>终于梦梦，公疾不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298150_comment'></div>今年之春，狄难滋炽，腹败枝披，外讧内猘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298150_comment'></div>遂使有位，以公惩艾，坐视生人，肝脑涂地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298150_comment'></div>吾相或知，吾君则未，是孰使然，天实为此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298150_comment'></div>一二年来，频丧吉士，欲其生者，率以忠死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298150_comment'></div>百人所指，则久于世，善罔攸劝，恶罔攸畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298150_comment'></div>是关天运，匪公之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298150_comment'></div>仆方在蹙，矧得公讳，尝欲往吊，属有疆吏，告警于我，中路而废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298150_comment'></div>衋伤未慭，忧结交至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298150_comment'></div>匪私忧伤，言路榛闭，将使狄难，未有止戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298150_comment'></div>公知不知，我生靡届。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1298150_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253160' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253160' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253160?labeling=true' target='_blank'>许侍郎<span class='inlineComment2'>（奕）</span>挽诗<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年2月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253160")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253160_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253160'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253160'>杏园春接袂，蓬省夜分灯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253160_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253160'>权相不吾以，贵人惟子憎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253160_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253160'>虽云殊爵位，均不愧交朋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253160_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253160'>顾影追前事，悠然涕满膺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253160_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253160'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253160_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253159?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年2月21日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253159'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253159'>近事君知不，王心莫与宁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253159'>融风薄台里，秋雨暗前星。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253159'>鸿集稻粱少，虎嗥川谷腥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253159'>人才关世道，敛涕为公铭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253159'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253159_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_253159'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_253159_0'>⑴ 自注：己卯年，庆元府大火，皇太子薨。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_253159_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　春夏之际，红巾军势不可挡，四川大震，与友人张方上书，请起用安丙。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年7月</a>　红巾军之变平息，国州为安丙建生祠，为作记。作品：安少保丙果州生祠记。<div id='poem_1297896' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297896' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297896?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安少保<span class='inlineComment2'>（丙）</span>果州生祠记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297896")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297896_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297896'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297896'>古者储天下之才以为天下用，非有事变迫怵而后图之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297896_comment'></div>周自文、武、成、康以来，《棫朴》、《丰芑》、《崧高》、《烝民》咏歌得人，率非一世之积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297896_comment'></div>逮高、文尚存此意，故事至而才给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297896_comment'></div>中世以后，有不尽然者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297896_comment'></div>辽西告警而飞将起，䍐幵略塞而营平用，五溪师丧而伏波奋，冉肇迫夔药师出，范阳煽凶平原识，廷凑肆毒晋公见，伐蔡屡衄西平显，河东寇结汾阳封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297896_comment'></div>使非耦事涉变也，广厄霸陵，充国援以老弃，李、颜、裴、郭诸人将没身不见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297896_comment'></div>蜀自贼曦之变，而安公始以节显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297896_comment'></div>世未尝无才也，而不肯豫定早计，储之以待用，每每若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297896_comment'></div>然尚有可诿者，曰不及知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297896_comment'></div>然而既知之矣，而用之不尽，至虏闯于外，贼讧于内，蜀势累卵，然后以公再镇，此何为者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297896_comment'></div>方公之未出也，其子以直华文阁握果之州符，参议制幕，即贼所届，扬名追袭，贼越境无所犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297896_comment'></div>公继来此州，虽云就养，盖以讨贼为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297896_comment'></div>会有诏起公，于是奉将天威，殄劓逋寇，靡有遗育，蜀以再安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297896_comment'></div>华文寻以机宜文字往宣抚司，公之婿王君某代之，耨奸锄强，拊柔其民而加燠休焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297896_comment'></div>果之人相与言曰：「非天私我有民，使公与其子若婿先后来吾州，吾属尚有种乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297896_comment'></div>先是，公未仕时，尝游学于是州，习其土风与其州之人士，每过其州，眷焉弗忍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297896_comment'></div>及是被命再镇，灭贼还报适在是州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297896_comment'></div>州人滋不忘，度城之北隅肖公像，与其子若婿并祠焉，介郡人游君景仁似、校官苏君和甫在镕及南充令牟君震卯以谒记于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297896_comment'></div>余每叹汉、唐以来，所储非所用，所用非所储，于公之事既犁然有感，又重叹夫夭为斯世生才，自足斯世之用，特患以一人之好恶为用舍，以事变之缓急为淹速耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297896_comment'></div>郭汾阳既收东都，方议北讨，此何时也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297896_comment'></div>卒夺其军，汾阳不少望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297896_comment'></div>河东事迫，又强起之，又为憸壬所忌，非人主终信不疑，则唐祚岌岌矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297896_comment'></div>然是时非特汾阳出为时用也，七子八婿皆居贵显，幕府六十馀人，率为将相大官，而知名于世者五十人，其卓然可称则杜鸿渐、黄裳、李光弼、光进之徒，皆以才识器业为再世中兴之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297896_comment'></div>然则天生汾阳为社稷计，而又为生其子若婿与从游之宾客以助成之，此岂人力所能致哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297896_comment'></div>欧阳文忠公书其《将略》曰：「忠信之厚固出其天性，至于处富贵，保功名，古人之所难者，谋谟之际，宜亦得其助也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297896_comment'></div>至哉斯言！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297896_comment'></div>不以富贵功名为誇，而以善处善保为难，不以忠信之厚为足，而以谋谟之助为贵，古之建功立业而全德令终者，率是道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297896_comment'></div>今安公父子翁婿，使其相须以成不减汾阳之助，而莫府宾客皆能以李、杜诸贤自勉，相与左右叶成之，则岂但如欧公所谓「处富贵、保功名」者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297896_comment'></div>敢以是复于州人，以彰一门之懿，以慰千里之思，以见人主当以天下用才，士大夫当以天下用其身也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1297896_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　约秋七月间，应友人李埴之请，为撰《潼川新城铭》<div id='poem_1297974' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297974' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297974?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潼川府新城铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297974")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297974_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297974'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297974'>嘉定十二年春，眉山李侯被命守潼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297974_comment'></div>夏四月庚午，兴元禁旅为乱，批利、阆，捣果、遂，将窥潼川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297974_comment'></div>永嘉曹君奉使按刑，盛守备以待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297974_comment'></div>侯闻变疾趋，厥既领州，益大修武备，威声外憺，贼不涉境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297974_comment'></div>秋七月庚子贼平，乃建治城湟，且包牛峰、移西溪为久远计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297974_comment'></div>伻来以图，属临邛魏了翁为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297974_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1297974'>若昔生民，戢戢同宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297974_comment'></div>维辟奉天，绥爰九土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297974_comment'></div>经猷立极，陈轨设度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297974_comment'></div>体天之险，等威以叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297974_comment'></div>因地之宜，沟封以固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297974_comment'></div>犹虑有欲，不相保聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297974_comment'></div>弧矢取睽，门柝取豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297974_comment'></div>俾居无甈，而害有御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297974_comment'></div>然后礼义，教化有错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297974_comment'></div>我猷尔迪，尔戚我吁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297974_comment'></div>尔之恫瘝，则我鞠苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297974_comment'></div>兹忱弗属，世坏伦斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297974_comment'></div>大纲既失，众目随蠹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297974_comment'></div>蚩蚩赤子，莫尔燠咻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297974_comment'></div>上怙其彊，则下怨怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297974_comment'></div>上安于弱，则下违拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297974_comment'></div>极于叔季，末大不举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297974_comment'></div>有开真人，爰审厥御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297974_comment'></div>诸镇内属，廷绅外补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297974_comment'></div>如干役枝，如腓从股。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297974_comment'></div>事权虽削，财力犹故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297974_comment'></div>承平日久，归兽偃武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297974_comment'></div>淮盗濮寇，西戎北虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297974_comment'></div>乘间伺虚，宣骄用侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297974_comment'></div>维时群公，为郡国虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297974_comment'></div>然而犹有，城郭兵伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297974_comment'></div>乃自金陵，读《周官》误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297974_comment'></div>剜肉艾肤，以啖胸腑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297974_comment'></div>郡鲜馀财，民无留赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297974_comment'></div>宁复念乱，徙薪彻土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297974_comment'></div>矧中兴后，张弓未纾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297974_comment'></div>国媮于和，财耗于赂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297974_comment'></div>壤堞弗坏，窾籍弗顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297974_comment'></div>虽遇小偷，壅蠛井鲋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297974_comment'></div>彼封疆臣，无所于诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297974_comment'></div>携持负任，襁属道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297974_comment'></div>肯于狄难，效死弗去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297974_comment'></div>士恃常心，匪城是阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297974_comment'></div>况弃其常，守在平楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297974_comment'></div>蜀之钜屏，如益梓部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297974_comment'></div>益城弗葺，多历年所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297974_comment'></div>比因创难，始议兴堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297974_comment'></div>梓非无城，鞠于水浒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297974_comment'></div>侯吴侯王，侯沈侯许，元丰汔今，绩用亦著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297974_comment'></div>人心弗同，前作后沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297974_comment'></div>或修或否，靡届靡究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297974_comment'></div>况城之南，殷彼牛首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297974_comment'></div>如薄而登，如俯而取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297974_comment'></div>方时宁晏，未睹其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297974_comment'></div>卒然有戎，委柄授手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297974_comment'></div>斤斤李侯，我事孔疚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1297974_comment'></div>维时肤使，同德相友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1297974_comment'></div>乃量弘杀，乃审薄厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1297974_comment'></div>乃上事期，乃均地守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1297974_comment'></div>乃救乃筑，乃削乃甃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1297974_comment'></div>乃祛其西，缳彼大阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1297974_comment'></div>如涤帝牲，如丽辰牡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1297974_comment'></div>维南有闉，屹若登豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1297974_comment'></div>维西有溪，缭若篆籀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1297974_comment'></div>人谓斯何，私相与语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1297974_comment'></div>我城我池，山岳俪久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1297974_comment'></div>我牧我监，城池比寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1297974_comment'></div>仍俾后人，永念拮据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1297974_comment'></div>人之有善，则若己有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1297974_comment'></div>先坏而防，先变而惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1297974_comment'></div>毋生戎心，弃成恃陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1297974_comment'></div>我铭不磨，式谷尔后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1297974_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年12月</a>　亡友史尧辅入葬，为撰墓志铭。作品：宣教郎致仕史君尧辅墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298030?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宣教郎致仕史君尧辅墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298030")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298030_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298030'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298030'>史为太原右姓，自唐宣宗时为临邛县尉者曰灏，始居眉之丹棱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298030_comment'></div>入国朝，乾德初全师雄之乱，曰克恭者以摄丹棱令死事，后赐庙褒忠，爵忠佑侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298030_comment'></div>侯之曾孙润辞主果之西充簿，苏文公字以叔则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298030_comment'></div>再传至汝士，登崇宁二年进士第，终宁州户曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298030_comment'></div>生贯，贯生似孙，刘起居光祖尝铭其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298030_comment'></div>似孙生尧辅，字充甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298030_comment'></div>状貌清羸，若不胜衣，而明晤夙成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298030_comment'></div>年十二三，即受《春秋》于横舟刘子有𤈴，同门者百数，已翕然归重焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298030_comment'></div>厥十有五，与苏文定诸孙讲学于德溪，旁通六艺之文，夜以继旦，粹诸儒先尝所传授，傅以己意，趣诣益不凡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298030_comment'></div>为文识古今体势，诗调尤脱弃凡近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298030_comment'></div>开禧三年大比，以《易》学冠同经生，中类试高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298030_comment'></div>是岁孽韩就殛，明年诸尝与韩忤者以次召用，朝野交贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298030_comment'></div>充甫对策廷中，独抗言曰：「陛下谓去一权倖足以为更化邪，霍山之去未几而汉之权移于内侍矣，梁冀之诛未几而汉之政出于丑邪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298030_comment'></div>唐诛权臣，忧在宦官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298030_comment'></div>及诛宦官，忧在藩镇」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298030_comment'></div>余同年友真景元德秀，端人也，得其文第之前列，为详定官所抑，以冠乙科，调永康军青城县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298030_comment'></div>归未及里而丧其母，又明年而丧父，柴瘠加等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298030_comment'></div>前吏部郎双流范少才子长闻其贤，合里中子弟而授之室，人人自以得师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298030_comment'></div>除丧，调昌州大足县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298030_comment'></div>未上上谒，帅司范公以书局留之，与修职方志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298030_comment'></div>今吏部郎黎德立伯巽守昌元，移书范公，愿得充甫摄郡文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298030_comment'></div>充甫亦力请还次，思职勤事，守器重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298030_comment'></div>邑多盗，民赇吏以避役，充甫白令，悉补授焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298030_comment'></div>并兼之民隐田诡户，繇赋不均，又白守第其高下为之籍，且以闻诸朝，民率谓便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298030_comment'></div>今潼川漕奉常丞程叔达遇孙宰丹棱，雅善充甫，于是言于制置使董君居谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298030_comment'></div>董未始识充甫也，遂以岁荐之员上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298030_comment'></div>寻又以举将升从事郎调合州推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298030_comment'></div>嘉定九年类省试，为点检官，已病肺不能声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298030_comment'></div>余知充甫有年，会将漕东川，即招致幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298030_comment'></div>及归自类试所，则病益侵，然犹彊自力，未尝释卷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298030_comment'></div>十二月壬子，卒于候馆，得年四十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298030_comment'></div>先是，以蜀远士不能自达，故于进士三人、近臣特荐、尝有朝迹及过阙留中之外，俾外阃得以拔士之尤者，或五六人，或三四人，或一二人上之，号曰岁荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298030_comment'></div>由淳熙以后，召用者已四十人矣，既有常比，故报可不越旬时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298030_comment'></div>董君既荐充甫，人谓必且召用，使在三馆两学，不谓能称乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298030_comment'></div>乃自近岁奏报稽滞，董所荐士凡阅二年不下，其后或召或否，而充甫仅得升擢之命，亦已不及见矣，是可叹矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298030_comment'></div>妣李氏、孙氏、杨氏，皆同郡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298030_comment'></div>充甫孙出也，事杨以孝著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298030_comment'></div>取同邑李氏，生子皆夭折，今仅存惟一女子，曰招庆，未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298030_comment'></div>从父兄之子女孤贫亡依，所至挈与俱从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298030_comment'></div>女将行而充甫疾，犹命其家人经理娉事，曰毋使我愧吾兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298030_comment'></div>遗令以从父弟尧烈之子显僧为后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298030_comment'></div>充甫平生澹于货利，奉赐听其家人自为，率缘手尽，已惟破丧败絮，精诵苦吟，穷晨夜不能休，以是终其身焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298030_comment'></div>丧归，仅有杂稿及诸经讲义五十卷自随，无馀货也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298030_comment'></div>余既为买棺给丧事，又以钱百万遗其妻孥，俾买郭外田给伏腊，又得范、程二公及前军器监丞刘思庄翊之，合钱五十万，遂并以买田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298030_comment'></div>显僧卜十有二年□□□，以充甫之丧葬于县之□□乡石子山丑冈之原，而先事之岁，墨衰绖以过余曰：「惟公知我父者，敢以竁铭为请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298030_comment'></div>余不忍曰不可，则为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1298030'>形容之癯，而学之腴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298030_comment'></div>生理之枯，而词之敷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298030_comment'></div>孰为胠之，气质尔殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298030_comment'></div>曷又瘏之，崇降痛痡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298030_comment'></div>呜呼史君，谁与默储。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1298030_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　是年，同产兄高稼为何普买冢于震山，并请铭于魏了翁。作品：荣州司户何君普墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298029' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298029' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298029?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荣州司户何君普墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十二年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298029")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298029_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298029'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298029'>余生四年，从乡先生何君德厚授书数方名，未期岁更他师，犹以父执事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298029_comment'></div>厥二十有二年，当庆元五年，上始御集英殿策进士，余与君偕试于左右廊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298029_comment'></div>余既叨第，君亦以特奏名入等，侪辈往贺焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298029_comment'></div>君愀然曰：「昔我先君以累举恩当得官，所为弗肯就者，将有望于厥子也，而普也不令，汔负考志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298029_comment'></div>呜呼，尚忍言之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298029_comment'></div>余曰：「官无小，苟以行吾志焉，斯已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298029_comment'></div>矧自东汉以来，所谓裹衣褰裳，当还故乡，圣主悯念，悉用补郎者，是出于特异之恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298029_comment'></div>今尚仿此意，胡可少之邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298029_comment'></div>君曰：「是科也，今例以气衰戒得、日暮倒行目之，余谨毋然，然恶能自别也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298029_comment'></div>亡何，调遂宁府青石县主簿，徒步出关，衣敝橐单，行盛暑剧潦中，气貌耸耸，有精悍少年所弗及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298029_comment'></div>居踰年，视事青石，则行其所尝言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298029_comment'></div>寒厅薄廪而用弗饬，处之夷如，遇有公职事则闻命引道，不避雨旸，不间剧易，守甚才之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298029_comment'></div>会修頖宫，属役于君，自物土授规、虑材僝庸，不以烦守，守由是益知君可倚，遇疑狱滞讼即畀君可否之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298029_comment'></div>果之流溪有伐石以甃术者，仇家诬其发冢，且谓以兽骼乱冢中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298029_comment'></div>县令谩不能孰何，既误寘伐石之家于理，仇家犹以其未丽于重辟也，诉之州，州如之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298029_comment'></div>且未厌也，诉之详刑使者，使者又如之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298029_comment'></div>又未厌，诉于制阃，下其事转运司，则檄君诣乡即讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298029_comment'></div>君廉得其状，乃伐山得石，非冢间物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298029_comment'></div>仇家词穷，投缳而死，人曰：是何神也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298029_comment'></div>州县吏为愧谢，台阃钦重焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298029_comment'></div>去为荣州司户参军，兼司法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298029_comment'></div>污吏受输廪粟，恶而易腐，或至裁削供军以取充数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298029_comment'></div>君力鉴其敝，出纳惟一，士服其公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298029_comment'></div>守又才之，俾兼治他职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298029_comment'></div>乃以勤瘁致疾，嘉定元年秋八月丙戌卒于治寺，得年六十有七，僚长与州之人士皆惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298029_comment'></div>君讳普，德厚字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298029_comment'></div>世为邛之蒲江人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298029_comment'></div>曾王父昭明，王父师元，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298029_comment'></div>父宅仁，终免解进士，妣□氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298029_comment'></div>君少倜傥，不可拘以文法，而能自抑歛，笔耕以养父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298029_comment'></div>每造人，无问戚疏，率敷衽陈谊，无毫发滞碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298029_comment'></div>酒后耳热，则轩渠谐笑，舍坐屡舞，投器吐茵，不知其为宾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298029_comment'></div>客至其家，亦无留门，束修之馈即缘手尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298029_comment'></div>晚岁俸赐亦以遗亲友之贫者，卒之日无馀赀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298029_comment'></div>既说輤于家，妻孥之约甚于他日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298029_comment'></div>呜呼，是亦可觇其素矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298029_comment'></div>元妃同邑王氏，继室丹棱杨氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298029_comment'></div>二子男：述之、似之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298029_comment'></div>述之后一年亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298029_comment'></div>孙男法印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298029_comment'></div>孙女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298029_comment'></div>外孙男女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298029_comment'></div>似之贫不克葬，君之友前潼川漕樊仲恂士迪赙以金钱，余之表兄高南叔稼为买冢于县之盐泉乡恩洽里震山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298029_comment'></div>十二年八月壬申，乃克襄事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298029_comment'></div>以余知君之久也，先事之岁，属余铭其圹，义不得辞，乃铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_1298029'>日昃而明夷，车奔而卒驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298029_comment'></div>人坎坎其来之，而君谢以不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298029_comment'></div>出焉而嘻嘻，入焉而怡怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298029_comment'></div>硕迈且颀，尚考志之诒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1298029_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　是年，招李坤臣于家，读三礼；从弟文翁待班还里，相与研讨学事，高斯得侍坐。士无远近，负笈来观。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　是年，安丙生日，赋诗庆贺。作品：安宣抚生日二首。<div id='poem_253103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安宣抚生日<span class='inlineComment2'>（丙　二首）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253103")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253103'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253103'>知是皇家几世仁，天开人物作长城。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253103'>元崇雅号济时相，景略真成间代英。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253103'>天路旂常铺绩用，中原草木识威名。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253103'>北征西略公馀事，应念同胞百万生。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253103'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253103_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253104' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253104' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253104?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1219年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253104_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253104'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253104'>疏戆烦公刮目看，肯持谀语祝加餐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253104'>千钧弩上机宁易，百尺竿头步转难。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253104'>事遇快时聊复忍，民当急处略须宽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253104'>扫除荆棘栽梨枣，累璧重圭耐岁寒。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253104'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253104_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1219&endYear=1219')">1219年</a>　是年，次子魏克愚生。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='265ffd5576a34c1c90e79e4dd84bd152_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("265ffd5576a34c1c90e79e4dd84bd152");'><span id='265ffd5576a34c1c90e79e4dd84bd152_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>，43岁</div><div id='265ffd5576a34c1c90e79e4dd84bd152' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年6月</a>　诏赐周敦颐、程颢、程颐谥号，魏了翁为元奏请官，得诏书副件，为作序，并刻石、锓板以广其传。作品：周元公程纯公正公谥告序。<div id='poem_1297583' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297583' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297583?labeling=true' target='_blank'>周元公程纯公正公谥告序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297583")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297583_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297583'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297583'>臣自嘉定八年司臬剑东，兼摄漕事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297583_comment'></div>厥明年春，上疏请下礼官，为周敦颐及程颢、程颐议所以易其名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297583_comment'></div>玺封下都省，省下春官，时少常伯亦上疏请谥二程，遂并以下奉常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297583_comment'></div>博士曰事关名教，议不可轻，宜下都省集议，由是议久不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297583_comment'></div>厥十年，臣自漕臣再申述前奏，并以横渠张载为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297583_comment'></div>久之，礼官议以周敦颐谥元，程颢谥纯，颐谥正，上悉赐可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297583_comment'></div>厥十有三年六月，乃以命书与其贰付元奏请官，臣遂得受而藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297583_comment'></div>臣谓是举也，百年间鸿儒硕士偶未及言，今乃白发于一介外小臣，而圣断沈雄，不以人废，亶谓盛典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297583_comment'></div>然而郡国邸吏不得而传也，臣虑四方学者未能遍睹，则无以仰称圣上崇儒重道之指，乃摹勒乐石，龛置潼川校官，复锓板以广其传，俾凡承学之士有观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297583_comment'></div>若夫张载易名之请，诸儒从祀之议，则嗣此以闻，期于获命乃已也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1297583_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年6月15日</a>　为李肩吾《字通》作序。作品：字通序。<div id='poem_1297581' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297581' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297581?labeling=true' target='_blank'>彭山李肩吾从周字通序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年6月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297581")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297581_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297581'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297581'>书有六体，或指其事，或象其形，或谐诸声，或会以意，或转注相受也，或假借相成也，凡以极天地万物之变而与八卦、九章并行于两间者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297581_comment'></div>古之为教必由小学者，将以参稽象类，涵养本初，为格物致知、求仁入德之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297581_comment'></div>此如兵法，远交近攻，具有次第，其在学者孰非所当知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297581_comment'></div>而后世师友道阙，高者骛于上达，卑者安于小成，于是礼乐射御书数咸失其传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297581_comment'></div>乃有以书学名家者，则往往仅出于一伎一能之士，而他亡所进也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297581_comment'></div>余每病此，思欲发明文字之本始，聊以集思丑类，为用力之端本，而未能有述焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297581_comment'></div>一日彭山李肩吾从周以一编书示余，大较取俗之所易谕而不察焉者，以点画偏旁粹类为目，而质以古文，名曰《字通》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297581_comment'></div>凡余所病于俗者，皆以开卷瞭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297581_comment'></div>留与语旬有七日，则肩吾盖尝博观千载，历览八纮，而能返诸义理之归者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297581_comment'></div>呜呼，斯其为学岂以一伎一能而可名者比乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297581_comment'></div>肩吾行，属余叙所以为书，将与学者共之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297581_comment'></div>余又谓之曰：「子之为是也，伤小学之湮微而古文之不复见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297581_comment'></div>虽然，子亦知其然乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297581_comment'></div>自秦斯、高以来，是学也，往往滞于偏旁训故而不知进于明德止善之归，故非徇末以流于艺，则必曲学以误其身」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297581_comment'></div>且曰：「近世博通古文、刊别声韵宜莫如夏文庄也，逮其所行，曾不得一字之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297581_comment'></div>以会意一体贯通六书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297581_comment'></div>王文公亦自谓有得于今文矣，而施诸有政，则反不若未尝知书者，遂使世谓书学为不足多问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297581_comment'></div>非书学果亡益于人也，范忠文、司马文正《类篇》之作，比音择字，其明于宫羽之轻重，篆籀之后先，视夏若王殆有过之，而学术行谊为世标表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297581_comment'></div>盖二老者，由下学小成而充之者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297581_comment'></div>夏若王则滞佔毕而不知充之以是也，终其身焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297581_comment'></div>肩吾其必有择于斯矣乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297581_comment'></div>肩吾曰：「善！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297581_comment'></div>非子不足以发，子其遂以此并识于篇端也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297581_comment'></div>于是乎书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1297581_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年11月24日</a>　友人李壁生日，赋诗六首庆贺。作品：李参政壁生日。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　约于秋冬间，门人王迈赴成都，与戚友置酒相送，有词。作品：喜迁莺（鬓霜盈握）<div id='poem_253763' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253763' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253763?labeling=true' target='_blank'>喜迁莺 即席次韵南叔兄同亲友饯王万里万回宣幕</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253763")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253763_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253763'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253763'>鬓霜盈握。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253763'>叹刍牧荒墟，稻粱衰索。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253763'>落日牛羊，晚云鸿雁，傍地飞空无托。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253763'>牧人困和雨睡，田父醉连云酌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253763'>醉梦未醒，虎嗥川谷，麇惊林薄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253763_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253763'>离别。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253763'>谁不恶。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253763'>心事同时，都不论离合。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253763'>眼底时几，鼻端人物，谁辨北征东略。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253763'>最怜世途局趣，只道书生疏阔。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253763'>无可赠君，松阴庭院，菊华篱落。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_253763_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　是年冬，友人李埴知常德府，为之送行，即席赋词。作品：水调歌头（清燕卧霜角）<div id='poem_253663' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253663' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253663?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头 即席和李潼川韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253663")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253663_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253663'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253663'>清燕卧霜角，月魄几回哉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253663'>一声<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_253663", 253663, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>云雁</span>清叫，推枕赋归来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253663'>流水落花去路，画象棠阴陈迹，霄观傍楼台。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253663'>别忆入梅艳，愁色上田莱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253663_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253663'>记来时，惊列缺，走吴回。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253663'>人间都失匕箸，老婢亦惊猜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253663'>疋马晓风鞭袖，孤堞暮烟烽柝，挥却挂蛇杯。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253663'>不负此邦去，笑口也应开。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253663_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1220&endYear=1220')">1220年</a>　是年，应友人虞刚简之请，为撰《简州四先生祠堂记》<div id='poem_1297893' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297893' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297893?labeling=true' target='_blank'>简州四先生祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1220年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297893")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297893_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297893'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297893'>昔者虞侯仲易尝为我言：「伊洛之学非伊洛之学，洙泗之学也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297893_comment'></div>洙泗之学非洙泗之学，尧舜三代之学也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297893_comment'></div>余以其言为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297893_comment'></div>其后又见侯以是赠言于朋友，勒石于斯宫，率缕缕申言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297893_comment'></div>乃嘉定十有三年，复以书抵了翁曰：「刚简始至郡，会盗薄邻邑，效死弗敢去，以为民守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297893_comment'></div>荷宗社之灵，幸而济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297893_comment'></div>因惟道失民散，使赤子颠沛至此，为吏者不汲汲图所以扶持之，顾方以簿书不报、期会之间为大故，仆为此惧，凡以崇化美俗，随所逮为，既不敢不勉，吉月即校官，见诸生，又为扬榷古今，阐崇理道，庶几其有兴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297893_comment'></div>一日有讲授于学官者曰：『伊洛之学以《中庸》为宗，以诚敬为教者也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297893_comment'></div>仆闻之，瞿然曰：吁，自有乾坤即具此理，而谓伊洛云乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297893_comment'></div>《乾》九二言「龙德而正中，庸言之信，庸行之谨，闲邪存其诚」，而《坤》六二言「敬以直内」，然则曰中、庸、诚、敬，是乃天地自然之则，古今至实之理，帝王所以扶世立极，圣贤所以明德新民，未有不由之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297893_comment'></div>唐虞三代由之而治化休明，秦、汉以降反之，而民俗浇薄，自去圣益远，士非功利之习则虚无之徇，非词章之尚则记问之矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297893_comment'></div>逮伊洛诸儒先奋乎千载之下，倡明此理，则士往往惊怪，以是为一家之学，不知尧舜三代之相传，孔、颜、曾、孟之所事，固未尝外此，诸儒先特表而出之以嗣往开来耳，非其实始为此以自摽表，且教人以其所无者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297893_comment'></div>于是士惧然相谓曰：『吾今知非伊洛之学而洙泗之学也，非洙泗之学而天下万世之学也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297893_comment'></div>仆尝因是又取周元公、程纯公、正公、张明诚中子之象而祠于学，以示学者向趋之的，子其为发明四先生之所以嗣往开来之意而记诸社」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297893_comment'></div>余抚其书而叹曰：俗流世坏，士方憧憧于功利之下者，而侯独慨然及此，敢曰不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297893_comment'></div>虽然，不必皆伊洛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297893_comment'></div>元公奋乎舂陵，唱道南服，而二程子实得其传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297893_comment'></div>张子兄弟又皆崛起关中，为西方诸儒倡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297893_comment'></div>于是游、杨、胡、谢诸老与刘元承、王信伯、鲍商霖等盛于东南，苏子明、吕进伯兄弟起于西方，尹彦明、张思叔、朱公掞、马时中、侯师圣、吕原明、刘质夫诸公起于东北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297893_comment'></div>惟巴蜀时僻在一隅，而气数之感，亦自有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297893_comment'></div>元公官巴川，纯公、正公侍亲入蜀，张少公出宰金堂，蜀之人士于是数君子皆未尝不得从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297893_comment'></div>今言河南之学者，指《易传》为成书，而尝闻诸成都之隐者，其后卒成于涪陵之北岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297893_comment'></div>蜀人之笃信其说如范太史，大徒高弟如谯天授、谢持正，皆班班可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297893_comment'></div>荆州袁道洁及登河南之门，其游蜀访薛翁，亦谓伊洛轶书多在蜀者，是此书流传于巴蜀既有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297893_comment'></div>余为儿童时，犹及从长老授伊川《易传》及河南《遗书》，又及见学者多传写二程先生语录，特为其说者未能无科举之累，故缀其说以缉文，而未暇得其所以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297893_comment'></div>一为庆元学禁所怵，则例以伊洛目之，以诚敬讪之，甚者亦一口附和，曰此伪学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297893_comment'></div>自是以来，往往屏其书而不复省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297893_comment'></div>曾不思四先生之教人，赜诸天地万物之奥，而父子夫妇之常不能违也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297893_comment'></div>验诸日用饮食之近，而鬼神阴阳之微不能外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297893_comment'></div>大要使人近思反求，精体熟玩，而有以约之于己，期不失其本心焉耳，奚其伪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297893_comment'></div>虞侯曰：「善！<div class='inline'
