id='poem_sentence_30_1297893_comment'></div>余言即子言也，子其遂以为记」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297893_comment'></div>某方为四先生请易名于朝，请从祀于学，上可其易名之奏，有司令以周程三先生之命书与其贰付了翁，则于侯之请宁敢以固陋辞？</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1297893_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c5079684d7be4439b8b16def560a869b_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1233')">1232-1233年</a>，55-56岁</div><div id='c5079684d7be4439b8b16def560a869b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年3月</a>　还至蒲江家中。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　祭奠先墓，作告文。作品：告先墓文。<div id='poem_1298217' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298217' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298217?labeling=true' target='_blank'>告先墓文<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍定五年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298217")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298217_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298217'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298217'>某猥由愚戆，自速罪辜，偶被误恩，放归田里，尽还职秩，申畀真祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298217_comment'></div>脱命谗波，挺身寇燄，十年于外，一日生还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298217_comment'></div>职是侥踰，繄神之芘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298217_comment'></div>敢共酒币，悉帅妻孥，展墓告衷，神其歆止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1298217_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　迁亡妻杨氏之墓于乾山之原，作告文。作品：告杨宜人墓文。<div id='poem_1298218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298218' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298218?labeling=true' target='_blank'>告杨宜人墓文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298218")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298218_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298218'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298218'>嘉泰三年夏，君以疾卒，是年秋卜何村之癸山以葬，今三十年矣，而阴阳家者流多言其不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298218_comment'></div>幽冥虽异，情则一致，窃计九原有知，亦不能即安于此土也，用改卜茅林先墓之侧，得乾山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298218_comment'></div>爰以今辰启圹举柩，徙于新兆之庐，越七日甲申即窆，谨以清酌庶羞陈于墓前。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1298218_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年4月17日</a>　诏以集英殿修撰知遂宁府，辞不拜。作品：辞免知遂宁府状。<div id='poem_1297327' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297327' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297327?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免知遂宁府状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍定五年四月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年4月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297327")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297327_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297327'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297327'>新渥照临，愚衷震惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297327_comment'></div>伏念某自贻大谴，久屏穷荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297327_comment'></div>忽沾旷荡之恩，俾得返其田里，至又尽还职秩，申畀祠官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297327_comment'></div>既度越于前闻，实超踰于常分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297327_comment'></div>今者误恩中扆，畀守宁川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297327_comment'></div>脱命边陬，起家要郡，宜殚忠力，图报鸿私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297327_comment'></div>而某尚有愚衷，不以控闻，是为自欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297327_comment'></div>某自五溪还荆，上雾下潦，遂成寒暑之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297327_comment'></div>继以仲女卒于荆鄙，哭泣无聊，扶持西溯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297327_comment'></div>至夔门，又有亡弟之讣，几不能生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297327_comment'></div>会鞑卒内侵，惊忧乘之，心气怔忡，手足战掉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297327_comment'></div>幸已舆疾还里，正念处阴休影，以佚馀龄，而成命骤颁，俾当郡寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297327_comment'></div>方时多故，岂臣子辞难避事之时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297327_comment'></div>而陈力不能，莫容勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297327_comment'></div>所有恩命，未敢祗受。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1297327_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年5月</a>　高定子生日，赋词贺之。作品：念奴娇（被东风吹送）<div id='poem_253694' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253694' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253694?labeling=true' target='_blank'>木兰花慢 绵州表兄生日绍定壬辰五月</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253694")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253694_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253694'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253694'>被东风吹送，都看尽、蜀三川。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253694'>向涪水西来，东山右去，剑阁南旋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253694'>家家露餐风宿，数旬间、浑不见炊烟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253694'>踏遍王孙草畔，眼明帝子城边。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253694_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253694'>万家赤子日高眠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253694'>丝管夜喧阗。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253694'>自梓遂而东，岷峨向里，汉益从前。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253694'>人人里歌涂咏，愿君侯、长与作蕃宣。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253694'>我愿时清无事，早归相伴华颠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_253694_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年7月27日</a>　为从弟魏文翁撰写墓志铭。作品：朝议大夫知叙州魏公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝议大夫知叙州魏公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍定五年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年7月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298086")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298086_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298086'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298086'>予少与从父弟嘉父同居共学，季父朝奉府君蚤与乡举，孝友温任，性不违物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298086_comment'></div>嘉父年十三四，已能左右几谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298086_comment'></div>少长，知自力于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298086_comment'></div>尝从师学举子业，既而悔之，曰：「是足为学乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298086_comment'></div>闻郡人李中父坤臣以明经教授乡里，除馆致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298086_comment'></div>中父丧明，卧兴饮食，嘉父扶相必亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298086_comment'></div>盖自圣贤传心之要，以及近世周、程、邵、张诸大儒所讲，精体实察，穷晨夜弗懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298086_comment'></div>或嘲其不切于科举，嘉父曰：「安有本厚而末弗滋者乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298086_comment'></div>学益力，辞益赡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298086_comment'></div>举嘉定四年进士，调迪功郎、眉山县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298086_comment'></div>上事之八月，予被命守眉，乃两易绵竹县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298086_comment'></div>为吏廉明，尝摄法曹，以持法忤守意，守不能难，反以是见知，檄受民粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298086_comment'></div>先是廪人额外苛取，曰例钱，嘉父白守尽蠲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298086_comment'></div>予守汉日，使民自执概量，不取赢，嘉父白守，曰「愿守前规」，守又不能难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298086_comment'></div>总领财赋闻其才，辟赡军酒库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298086_comment'></div>仅视事，改辟干办公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298086_comment'></div>金虏盗边，遣属驻汉中籴餫，嘉父生男四日，弗子而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298086_comment'></div>十二年四月丁卯，溃卒称乱，嘉父挺身劳师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298086_comment'></div>少保安公开宣威府，嘉父之果州，趣公赴镇，公壮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298086_comment'></div>贼平上功，诏减二年磨勘，寻以举主改宣教郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298086_comment'></div>安公谓嘉父习知边圉，俾宰金之上津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298086_comment'></div>予时以心制里居，嘉父固辞辟命，请待班见，凡家食二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298086_comment'></div>予读三《礼》，招中父与处，嘉父参焉，士无远近，负笈来观，各有相长之益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298086_comment'></div>五羊崔正子与之帅成都，辟知新繁县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298086_comment'></div>县有祖宗原庙，四孟月吉、日至，郡有朝飨，遣属诣县陈疏食，用道流而倡舞于庭，嘉父曰：「是不亵神黩祀乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298086_comment'></div>县请于郡，郡上于朝，下奉常给太庙彝器法服，图而班之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298086_comment'></div>嘉父范金制帛如式，凡用泉八百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298086_comment'></div>又给乐童，嘉父遣二人诣太常肄业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298086_comment'></div>予时为卿，命工授之，嘉父即大门外为藏，及时蒇事，民听一新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298086_comment'></div>大修县庠，扁堂曰「师立」，朔月月半谒先圣先师，合县之秀茂读《中庸》《大学》，听者各足其分，退而辑成书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298086_comment'></div>学有句氏田租百馀石，久乃隶常平司，会使者张义立方行县，嘉父白归于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298086_comment'></div>县未有社仓，嘉父节缩浮蠹，得钱三百万为籴本，使者以其法风他郡行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298086_comment'></div>通判成都府，会简州阙守，制置司檄兼摄，百废具修，而去之日府藏之储视前增倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298086_comment'></div>诏再任成都，即解郡还次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298086_comment'></div>制置使辟知叙州，叙空官久，摄事者不为远谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298086_comment'></div>先是横江砦之诸氏，其最蕃曰始鹅，始鹅之诸族，其最肆曰隔柱，仍岁大入为患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298086_comment'></div>嘉父曰：「吾守封于此而民不得安土，吾耻之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298086_comment'></div>乃请于连帅杨叔禹汝则，假师邻郡，俾通判居守，而躬率将士问夷罪，不敢拒师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298086_comment'></div>十一月壬辰，分师以入，七战歼其众，戮其渠率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298086_comment'></div>夷势穷蹙，即面缚军门，誓毋反，归先所侵疆凡四十八村及民畜甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298086_comment'></div>十二月庚子受降，辛丑班师，数安南知堡狄厚叔卖国误师之罪，斩以徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298086_comment'></div>是役也，用州卒夷军及泸荣人凡四千，粮石二千，钱六千万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298086_comment'></div>捷闻，诏增三秩，将士以次进律有差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298086_comment'></div>嘉父自以职分所当为，拜恩感激，益思报效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298086_comment'></div>蠲复业之租以实边圉，籴旁郡米以活饥民，作止戈堂以简师徒，创备边库以拟缓急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298086_comment'></div>制置使上其功状，诏令再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298086_comment'></div>嘉父尝请移安南堡于风洞市以制诸夷，至是报可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298086_comment'></div>方鸠工经始，会北边被兵，制置司徵米五千石，嘉父念边民之困，出少府馀财代输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298086_comment'></div>制阃知之，为尽蠲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298086_comment'></div>忧边劳肄，盖自是得疾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298086_comment'></div>九月末犹力疾调丁筑新砦，皆手画口授，军吏奉以从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298086_comment'></div>十月既望，拜朝议大夫，尚能跪起周旋如他日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298086_comment'></div>丁丑疾病，卒于州寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298086_comment'></div>临终尚谆谆疆埸之事，一语不及私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298086_comment'></div>嘉父蚤晤夙成，孝友温任，俨有父风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298086_comment'></div>自以禄不逮亲，每拜一官辄感怆终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298086_comment'></div>春秋尝祀，如或见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298086_comment'></div>尝读《礼》至「将为善，思贻父母令名，必果」，讽味不能释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298086_comment'></div>名先墓之庐曰「果善堂」，又自为「果斋」，刘文节公为铭，李中父记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298086_comment'></div>绍定元年大比，时有为临川陆氏之言者，往往假窃近似，足以欺庸有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298086_comment'></div>嘉父虑学者贪高成习，乃与新都令郭方叔黄中控于提学司，请谕有司毋以是取人，将自科举取舍以杜其渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298086_comment'></div>士闻风丕变，正学得不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298086_comment'></div>经史传记、诸子百氏，皆尝校雠钩纂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298086_comment'></div>益昌之乱，委于兵火，今仅存者读书日记二十卷、杂稿十卷、巴江《中庸》《大学》讲义二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298086_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298086_comment'></div>嘉父所志所学，盖将以千载自期，行方而气和，见义必为，视人有不获，必起而援之，其曰果善，盖允蹈焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298086_comment'></div>世率以学行、词章、吏事若不相涉，盖曰格物穷理、修身齐家者，动必古训，关于事情，为词章必迂，为吏事必疏，号曰文士，曰能吏，虽不学无行不害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298086_comment'></div>不知今之为学，夐与古异，今之文古所谓辞，今之政古所谓事，今之才则古所谓佞人、任人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298086_comment'></div>夫使学而本诸真知，著于实践，则发为辞辞泽而理，施之政政裕而密，非今之所谓文与才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298086_comment'></div>谓予不信，则如嘉父者亦眇然一儒生耳，其辞达，其事治，皆为世所推许，然则非本厚而末滋者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298086_comment'></div>魏氏世为邛之蒲江人，嘉父名文翁，父讳孝寿，赠朝奉郎，母高氏，赠宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298086_comment'></div>由朝奉而上，祖讳革，曾祖讳大昕，则皆某同出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298086_comment'></div>官自迪功郎至朝议大夫，年五十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298086_comment'></div>取同郡韩氏，迪功郎致仕起之女，封恭人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298086_comment'></div>三男子：强恕、恭愿、进忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298086_comment'></div>恭愿以后其叔父次翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298086_comment'></div>女子二人，未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298086_comment'></div>予归自靖，强恕兄弟拜泣而请曰：「自伯父之南迁也，我先君贰成都、守叙南，皆除馆以望归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298086_comment'></div>去年八月，闻伯父被命西还，丙夜得书，时已被疾，犹亟出觞客，以识其喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298086_comment'></div>今伯父优游林泉，先君不及见矣，墓门有石，舍伯父谁宜」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298086_comment'></div>予敛泣言曰：诺哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298086_comment'></div>墓在普慈乡仁惠里乾山，葬以绍定五年七月丙午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298086_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_82_1298086'>姿金玉兮，言谷粟兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298086_comment'></div>生何笃兮，夭沃沃兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1298086_comment'></div>暵其暴兮，命何蹙兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1298086_comment'></div>谁痛毒兮，夺之速兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1298086_comment'></div>民无禄兮，匪我独兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1298086_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年8月</a>　友人苏公诚访魏了翁于家，了翁为其所撰《陶然堂赋》作跋。作品：题苏叔明公诚陶然堂赋后。<div id='poem_1297791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题苏叔明公诚陶然堂赋后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297791")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297791'>南麾退翁，苏文公之兄也，持正不挠，终于利州路提点刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297791_comment'></div>子孙多贤，且继踵科级。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297791_comment'></div>其五叶曰叔平者，自号松菊老圃，有子曰公诚，字叔明，以礼自牧，为族党归重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297791_comment'></div>尝赋陶然堂以自述，非明乎义利之际者不及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297791_comment'></div>余归自靖，叔明访余山居，言论风指，歛浮归实，进进未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297791_comment'></div>呜呼，世家摇落不振，邦国之耻也，叔明尚懋敬之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297791_comment'></div>玄默执徐同壮月谷旦。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1297791_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年8月11日</a>　诏除宝章阁待制、潼川府路安抚使知泸州；上书请辞，并举游似自代。作品：辞免除宝章阁待制潼川府路安抚使知泸州状。<div id='poem_1297328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免除宝章阁待制潼川府路安抚知泸州状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年8月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297328")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297328'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297328'>三命益恭，方祈反令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297328_comment'></div>十连有帅，更误升华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297328_comment'></div>顾惟湔涤之馀，莫称便蕃之渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297328_comment'></div>弗嫌再渎，用沥孤衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297328_comment'></div>伏念某去国八年，还家万里，曲蒙宽宥，已戴生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297328_comment'></div>岂期职秩之骤还，况复宠灵之狎至，申加祠廪，遄畀郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297328_comment'></div>累兹特异之知，惕若满盈之畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297328_comment'></div>亟吁天而逊避，正蹐地以凌兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297328_comment'></div>未拜俞音，遽叨改命，峻西厢之新涣，拊东蜀之旧封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297328_comment'></div>丐免得迁，以荣为惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297328_comment'></div>载惟衷悃，已具前章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297328_comment'></div>实以婴疾瘴乡，惊心江路，方寇氛之未静，而家难之相仍，志虑怔忡，形神剿瘵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297328_comment'></div>矧当今日，莫重上游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297328_comment'></div>冒膺存抚之司，已剧颠隮之惧，乃若通班宝阁，候对松阶，尤深据蒺之惭，敢后循墙之避？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297328_comment'></div>所有恩命，未敢祗受。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1297328_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年10月7日</a>　同产兄高崇卒，诏赠朝奉郎，官其一子。了翁为作行状。作品：知黎州兼管内安抚高公崇行状。<div id='poem_1298006' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298006' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298006?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知黎州兼管内安抚高公崇行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年10月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298006")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298006_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298006'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298006'>高公讳崇，字西叔，世家邛之蒲江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298006_comment'></div>维高氏以学业行谊闻于州闾，至大夫而家益昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298006_comment'></div>生六男子：冢子载，故奉议郎、知灵泉县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298006_comment'></div>次稼，今为朝散郎、前知荣州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298006_comment'></div>公在第三，幼英晤，受学于乡先生杜德称希仲，为文宏以肆，声律所不能束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298006_comment'></div>大夫与谯夫人持家矩度严，程督诸子穷晨夜弗懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298006_comment'></div>公勤礼笃学，大夫爱之，遣从李中父惟正学《周礼》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298006_comment'></div>未冠，已驰声士林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298006_comment'></div>寻著录于成都之学官，李子周崟、何叔坚德固以国士期之，春秋试事必居第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298006_comment'></div>绍熙三年，大夫以词赋举于乡，由是十年间师友兄弟接踵科级。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298006_comment'></div>公每试辄居首选，而实大声宏，人所媢忌，率降待补生第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298006_comment'></div>盖尝因《周官》慢朝援陈灵公与孔宁仪父戏昵事，有司黜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298006_comment'></div>又尝论绍兴狄难，因及刘豫入寇，有司谬谓刘裕尝篡晋，绍兴间安得此人，又黜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298006_comment'></div>若此类者三，公不以芥蒂，益大肆于学，与仲兄、二季弟处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298006_comment'></div>某时以馆职补外，得与闻讲肄之馀，寒灯破窗泊如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298006_comment'></div>大夫即世，公哀不自胜，尽瘁丧葬，母心以宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298006_comment'></div>嘉定六年，与仲兄各举于成都、潼川路转运司，同赴类省试，公以《周官》拟首选，知汉州许子然沆私其客罗传之，与主文何叔坚论议激触，移公为第四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298006_comment'></div>入对大问，海内人士望二高风采，恨不先睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298006_comment'></div>真希元德秀为人言：「使二高不为举首，是盲有司也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298006_comment'></div>时任伯起希夷尝为庙堂言，政事与议论自为两途，不必徇人言以摇国是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298006_comment'></div>于是任为详定官，而蜀士皆不在前列，故公与仲兄各以进士出身得官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298006_comment'></div>李思行鸣凤时以馆职校试殿庐，出为人言：「高西叔尝拟甲科，为他人所沮」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298006_comment'></div>录其对以示人，至今户有此文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298006_comment'></div>筮仕为眉山尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298006_comment'></div>八年春视事，郡有老妪独居夜死，穿穴具在，莫知杀者主名，公以厚赏重罚得贼于成都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298006_comment'></div>又白县宰，得三乡顾役钱月给部曲，不愆于期，士为公尽力，盗贼用稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298006_comment'></div>尉廨在南门外，屋颓阶圮，公作而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298006_comment'></div>前堂后室，东窗西圃，教阅有地，眺瞻有所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298006_comment'></div>眉易治而难服，公涖以清严，一辞起敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298006_comment'></div>故参知政事李公壁家居，于士少所容接，而卷卷于公，春秋之月，戚友之会，公未尝不得与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298006_comment'></div>太守宋正仲德之引入幕府，张义立方继至，尤所敬礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298006_comment'></div>校试于简，号得士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298006_comment'></div>监司牧守荐举交集，升从事郎，堂差教授眉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298006_comment'></div>以母丧去官，既除，语不及仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298006_comment'></div>工部尚书杨叔禹汝明白丞相，请以教授成都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298006_comment'></div>南海崔正子与之来帅成都，一见奇公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298006_comment'></div>未几摄制置使，移治利州，公往饯之，请罢舍选法，复养士田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298006_comment'></div>盖先是惩养士泛滥之弊，以舍法限弟子员，舍选之名虽美而教养之数十减其六七，教官往往以学粮之羡为媚上之资，故公首及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298006_comment'></div>朔月月半讲授，公辩析精微，音吐洪畅，听者属心，士之就公养者倍于昔，土人谓三十年所未见，公历控于台阃，得缗钱万馀以益之，增斋庐以赢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298006_comment'></div>转运判官范君仲武由汉嘉守将漕成都，颇眷故封，俾公校士于嘉，同事无小大，于公取决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298006_comment'></div>未既厥事，以疾引去，使者以所得之士率出于公，乃上诸朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298006_comment'></div>张义立时为刑狱使者，杨无悔师复为总领财赋，汪茂明果为提举茶马，皆愿公出其门，公未尝自请也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298006_comment'></div>崔公抵益昌，荐书从置邮以来，又荐公，请加召用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298006_comment'></div>制司荐士旧以四人为限，公官簿居五，仅得升擢之命，宝庆元年改宣教郎，堂差知什邡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298006_comment'></div>县为广汉剧，积弛既久，帑人告匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298006_comment'></div>公为更催科之令，分额刻期，书之于册，俾民自视其条目以上诸县官，人情劝趋，不两月间，库管充羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298006_comment'></div>未几入外省，充点检官，首谓：「士之涉猎浅浮者，掇拾关洛方言，窜入举文，以阿时好，最后学膏肓之疾，宜痛除之，以救文弊」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298006_comment'></div>茶马使者应文叔懋之时为主文，嘉纳其说，揭之棘门，凡所拔擢皆视其言而进退之，时论浩然归重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298006_comment'></div>二年旱，明年春饥，公发常平米为食以食之，移书张义立，请饭饥一月，散之日又给一月，使者是之，所活不下千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298006_comment'></div>又立为社仓规约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298006_comment'></div>俾邑士遵行之，至今不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298006_comment'></div>决嚚讼，惩斗狠，质明而视事，日未中而退，纲条既立，百废具修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298006_comment'></div>以其馀力寻绎经史、容接人士外，至桥梁舍馆、阛阓术径，罔不新美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298006_comment'></div>卫元包之宫旧在县旁，岁久榛圮，公读其书而异其人，为葺祠宇，俾学者知所矜式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298006_comment'></div>县有滑胥持吏短长，弟兄盘结，久不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298006_comment'></div>公至，白诸刑狱使者，迸之远方，人谓非洁己者不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298006_comment'></div>县为防以溉田，贰令者往往取徒长之金而私其利，虽旱乾水溢不恤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298006_comment'></div>公悉更其法，第赋役之高下，式竹楗之大小，俾民自修，官吏不得以并缘为奸，役简而堤固，至今为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298006_comment'></div>用登极恩转奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298006_comment'></div>在邑三年馀，无丝发扰民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298006_comment'></div>绍定元年，至利州谒制置使富川桂公如渊，一见留寘幕府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298006_comment'></div>先是利东、西路分置安抚，一治兴元，一治新沔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298006_comment'></div>自郑损以制置使移司新沔，虏尝入寇，损仓皇回利州，人情震惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298006_comment'></div>公谓为今日计，宜循旧比，以二帅分治梁、沔，守卫边埸，制置使还利，端居堂奥，委任责成，庶几缓急不致贻轻纳侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298006_comment'></div>譬诸象弈，大将不出宫、不临河也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298006_comment'></div>又尝谓川秦茶马可分，利东、西路戎帅可分而不可合，时论以为识时务之要，后皆如其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298006_comment'></div>公才资爽亢，遇事可否，不少回屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298006_comment'></div>时有饷所属官吴震乙依凭王人，陵籍州郡，公移书诸司，数其害民蠹政，断不可举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298006_comment'></div>且诵言于众，谓今视蜀饷为何等事，乃付之此辈，闻者快其言，而媢疾者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298006_comment'></div>公自度不可留，辞至七八，桂公姑听其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298006_comment'></div>二年，通判黎州，寻磨勘承议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298006_comment'></div>黎为西川屏翰，而备边市马，关系重大，自奴儿结构难以来，率以马直为兵端，事隶郡丞而钱帛制于茶马司，每岁三千为额，前人常赖其赏，然岁入辄半之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298006_comment'></div>公绥御有法，夷落四集，一岁之马当前官一任之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298006_comment'></div>茶马司本钱未到，乃以他钱代支，不足又以私帑继之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298006_comment'></div>馀直未充，蕃部流言，公日夜调护，关白茶马司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298006_comment'></div>先是茶马司移书朝士，马直之当发而不发者为宽剩钱，丞相闻之，将以充蜀中科降之数，敝蒙牵掣，相持益坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298006_comment'></div>及事转急，遣属按视，始究其实，即发缗以偿之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298006_comment'></div>是役也，微公尽言无隐，几启夷衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298006_comment'></div>事定边宁，不以及格为赏，反以要胁为罪，公一毫不较，涖职滋恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298006_comment'></div>近山有蒙秦化，相传为古烂柯地，符溪薛仲章绂尝仕于彼，建玉渊书院以来学者讲习，久废不治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298006_comment'></div>公修其墙屋轩户，将与邦之秀彦肄业其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298006_comment'></div>会阙守，以公摄郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298006_comment'></div>该庆寿恩转朝奉郎，四年六月被命即真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298006_comment'></div>未几鞑虏盗边，羽书络驿，尽发牌丁以备战守，裹粮积仓，夥费醲赏，去辄不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1298006_comment'></div>又召雄边子弟多至千数百人，边地空虚，夷辄伺隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1298006_comment'></div>或报白蛮踰河而来，数几七百，公厚募勇士，一日而千馀人，鸣鼓扬旌，布列高阜，番落望见，夺气屏息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1298006_comment'></div>甲仗军需积久刓敝，公命工改为之，凡弓矢、弩镞、刀戈、甲胄，数皆五百，军容一新，邻州资其用焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1298006_comment'></div>移屯戍卒岁以千人，自边衅开，益部内守，久留不遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1298006_comment'></div>公虑夷人瞷知，力请于制置副使，仅得其半，俾与州卒共守，尝罚信核，士气欢踊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1298006_comment'></div>虏知有备，久不敢窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1298006_comment'></div>置筹边库，凡图回贸易之利皆贮其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1298006_comment'></div>煮备边盐，俾土人日用饮食无艰，而官赖其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1298006_comment'></div>始至，帑缗五百，去之日盐米杂物多至十馀万，而它藏名色不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1298006_comment'></div>自夏徂秋，疾日以亟，视事如昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1298006_comment'></div>秋末始得报罢之命，即忻然曰：「吾欲退閒久矣，茍以是生还，为幸曷甚！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1298006_comment'></div>吾奉法洁身，恃以无恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1298006_comment'></div>黄公辟书谓官箴士检，雅尚端洁，人所共知，不识坐我何罪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1298006_comment'></div>暨堂帖以台疏至，读半，徐曰：「吾不欲久居幕府者盖以是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1298006_comment'></div>如抑求郡之侥倖，塞觅举之奸贪，结憾同列，取恶饷所，今之得罪固其所矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1298006_comment'></div>而吾尝移书数潘福之不可用，帅不我听，报书具存，今谓朝廷用人，大阃命将，皆我之由，是诬天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1298006_comment'></div>败蜀殄民，责有在矣，然而不足复计」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1298006_comment'></div>后九月癸酉，忽索纸处分家事，命魏良贵书之而自题其末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1298006_comment'></div>十月癸未乃卒，语不及私，辩不及谤，第言「无负君亲，吾奚憾」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1298006_comment'></div>公积思力学，抱负奇伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1298006_comment'></div>自为布衣，识远才迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1298006_comment'></div>刑部侍郎吴德夫猎谕蜀，公谓今蜀道始平，士修不率，宜推明正学以厉人心，吴公为建三先生祠，人谓知本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1298006_comment'></div>公穷经析理，明畅精诣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1298006_comment'></div>遇事感慨，奋髯抵掌，视王公贵人亡如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1298006_comment'></div>逮为吏，益以直道自信，遇所讥评，皆推见肺肝，故善者与居，喜其交警玄发，而不善者并游，则常病其尽言以招过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1298006_comment'></div>然善者少，不善者众，是故虽见知于善类，亦受侮于群小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1298006_comment'></div>天分过人，自经史传注下逮骚典，记闻博洽，名章俊语层见错出，绝去畦畛，自成一家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1298006_comment'></div>虽弄翰戏词，亦殚极精妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1298006_comment'></div>以科目举者，杨叔禹与吏部侍郎胡仲方矩、兵部侍郎杜忠可孝严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1298006_comment'></div>以召用请者，前崔后桂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1298006_comment'></div>今上嗣位，以贤能才识举士，今工部侍郎黄德常伯固与一时监司皆列上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1298006_comment'></div>平生著述有《周官解》十二卷，有《经史杂议》□□卷、歌诗□□篇□□卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1298006_comment'></div>其言论风指可为后法者，又莫之胜载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1298006_comment'></div>生于乾道九年，卒于绍定五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1298006_comment'></div>娶同邑樊氏，卒于开禧二年，年三十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1298006_comment'></div>再娶新津扈氏，卒于嘉定十二年，年四十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1298006_comment'></div>皆赠安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1298006_comment'></div>子四人：斯猷、斯仁、斯和、银菟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1298006_comment'></div>次斯仁以后季弟茂叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1298006_comment'></div>女二人、长适前绵州教授唐季乙，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1298006_comment'></div>次适谯似曾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1298006_comment'></div>内外孙男女九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1298006_comment'></div>斯猷兄弟将以六年正月壬申，举公之丧葬于县之普慈乡仁惠里坎山，事严未及谒铭于立言之君子，敢为次其阀阅行治卒葬如右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1298006_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_127_1298006_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年10月</a>　应胡嚞之请，为其父胡挺撰写墓志铭。作品：国学贡士胡伯清墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>国学贡士胡伯清墓铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍定四年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298089")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298089'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298089'>绍定四年秋，予蒙恩归自靖，道荆州，监沙市镇胡哲过予，涕泣言曰：「我先君之葬以元年十一月甲申，墓在泽山之原，昔者未有以铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298089_comment'></div>重惟先君尝以博士弟子员事先生，先生之典校南宫也，哲又以诸生被选，然则铭非先生谁宜」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298089_comment'></div>授予《圹记》一通，则兄森所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298089_comment'></div>《记》曰：先君讳扬，字伯清，某州某县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298089_comment'></div>少有立志，从游皆闻人，尚友必胜己，谨自饬，期毋愧古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298089_comment'></div>尝语乡人曰：「吾乡自厉仲享、于仲山学于京师，过江来无闻焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298089_comment'></div>结庐泽山，聚辩于斯，躬帅其子弟，罔昼夜作辍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298089_comment'></div>庆元五年升名于大司成，后十有六年哲继之，又六年从父弟焱继之，又六年森又继之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298089_comment'></div>森先以嘉泰四年举于乡，哲登嘉定十六年进士，皆先君刑善之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298089_comment'></div>先君末四举礼部不一得，辈流称屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298089_comment'></div>俄感末疾，诏森等曰：「外袭而取之者，吾志不存焉，而等苟能精义迪彝，以不悖厥衷，吾殁无憾」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298089_comment'></div>时哲尉处之遂昌，筮日将车就养，而疾弥留，继以大故，实宝庆二年九月某甲子，年六十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298089_comment'></div>先君柔直惠和，孝友任睦，书「曾氏问有馀」一章寘座右，日省以事其亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298089_comment'></div>亲疾不脱带，左右尝乐，致丧以礼，忌日必哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298089_comment'></div>遇事肯綮，善劈析，乡有竭作札荒之议则就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298089_comment'></div>好施予，不问家人有无，里称其仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298089_comment'></div>曾祖考讳仁善，祖考讳资渊，考讳作乂，妣某氏<span class='inlineComment2'>（《记》不载妣及所居州邑。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298089_comment'></div>先妣于氏，先先君十九年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298089_comment'></div>子男三：森、轰、哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298089_comment'></div>女二，适于尧知、忠翊郎陈履泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298089_comment'></div>孙七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298089_comment'></div>予读之忾然曰：自蔡京更太学法，岁鍜日鍊，惟以钩章棘句为工，仁义礼知之本心薄蚀殆既，虽训故义疏之书且不暇攻，矧能立其大者！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298089_comment'></div>予尝尸厥官，惕然如不容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298089_comment'></div>今观胡生食太学之禄者三十年，不梏于时之恫，不瘁于身之穷，不憙于子之通，而学之充，而德之崇，而理之融，亦庶几君子之曰终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298089_comment'></div>始予不能铭诸旅琐之憧憧，哲又六千里以申其请于邛，书用识之，庶有以志其马鬣之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298089_comment'></div>归自靖之明年，月建维亥，营室方中，识此者谁，史臣了翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298089_comment'></div>是为铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1298089_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年12月22日</a>　为彭运成撰写墓志铭。作品：教授彭君子远墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298024' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298024' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298024?labeling=true' target='_blank'>教授彭君子远墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（得之于乃子桂芳）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年12月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298024")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298024_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298024'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298024'>故长宁军军学教授、通直郎致仕眉丹棱彭君子远，将以今兹绍定五年十二月丁酉，葬于县之至孝乡麻谷之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298024_comment'></div>前期，二子孝友、孝安踵门而泣请，愿有文以识其藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298024_comment'></div>余窃惟念于子远为同年进士，其后持节东川，又尝为寮，于其请也，奚敢不诺，乃志而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298024_comment'></div>志曰：子远名运成，唐末有讳充者，为汉州金堂令，时称循吏，僖宗入蜀，加侍御史、柱国、锡绯衣银鱼以旌异之，拾遗钱诩志其墓，则子远之十世祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298024_comment'></div>大王父讳彬，王父讳骘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298024_comment'></div>父讳符，从政郎，赠通直郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298024_comment'></div>母王氏，赠孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298024_comment'></div>是生九丈夫子，子远居其八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298024_comment'></div>少力学为文，务崇大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298024_comment'></div>年三十有二始与乡贡，旋丁外艰，又三年类省试奏名，又明年赐第，调荣州应灵县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298024_comment'></div>秩满，调嘉定府府学教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298024_comment'></div>秩满，又调雅州州学教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298024_comment'></div>雅之学宫颇修而士廪稍不给，则请于州，授田分财以助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298024_comment'></div>秩满，调隆州仁寿县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298024_comment'></div>既而堂差潼川府府学教授，筑高风堂、续《进士题名记》以激厉后进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298024_comment'></div>郡有江碛，岁久化为沃壤，豪室擅其利，至交诉于讼庭，有司夺而鬻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298024_comment'></div>子远雠以学廪之馀用，以其租挈增置弟子员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298024_comment'></div>田既入于学，则相与殽乱疆理以售其欺，子远躬行阡陌败其邪谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298024_comment'></div>秩满，又教授长宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298024_comment'></div>学故湫隘，士肄业无所，于是营宫室、设筵几以妥安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298024_comment'></div>郡有淯井监，旧以卤水币馀资养士之费，郡将掩以自封，子远白诸提举学事司，复归于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298024_comment'></div>郡将反以是敬礼之，致之幕下，郡事多所裨益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298024_comment'></div>举者及格，敕二子浮家西归，身诣转运司白事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298024_comment'></div>宝庆元年正月庚辰，终于遂宁客舍，年六十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298024_comment'></div>死之日旁无亲人，同年友应文父懋之时为转运判官，同郡任传父处厚知遂宁府事，具棺衾以歛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298024_comment'></div>乌呼，可哀也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298024_comment'></div>元妃祖氏，继室史氏，皆赠孺人，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298024_comment'></div>祖氏已葬，今以史祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298024_comment'></div>子男三人：孝先、孝友、孝安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298024_comment'></div>先为伯父后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298024_comment'></div>孙男二人：立祖、通祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298024_comment'></div>孙女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298024_comment'></div>余尝谓士生一世，当以千载自期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298024_comment'></div>本之以五事，事者有事于斯五者是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298024_comment'></div>成之以五品，品者品节于斯五者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298024_comment'></div>行之而著，习矣而察，由之而知，其道达则见之于治国平天下，茍不达矣，修身齐家以淑诸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298024_comment'></div>一或怠废，是为自弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298024_comment'></div>若子远者，幼学于家，以父为师，以诸兄为师友，烝烝乎一家之和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298024_comment'></div>长而策名，虽未究其用，而四为郡文学，孳孳然以师道自任，凡所以渐摩淬厉以至馆粲委积，靡一不问，是岂有他哉，亦曰行吾职分所当为者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298024_comment'></div>充是心也，达而师保万民，吾知其必不负其生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298024_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1298024'>居家訚訚，涖官恂恂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298024_comment'></div>淹速在天，知不知在人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298024_comment'></div>怀忠迪纯，以终其身。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1298024_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年12月</a>　为门人史守道撰写墓志铭。作品：故迪功郎致仕史君孟传墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298090' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298090' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298090?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故迪功郎致仕史君孟传墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍定五年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298090")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298090_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298090'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298090'>今之学者例曰自隋唐以科目取士，士习于浮夸，生斯世也，为斯世也，姑以哗众攫荣亦可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298090_comment'></div>乃若穷深务广则有司所未喻，博古通今则有司不及知，故遂以大惭则大好为不可易之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298090_comment'></div>呜呼，胡不以吾友史君孟传之事观之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298090_comment'></div>嘉泰元年，予以剑南幕府较士于眉士之通《春秋》者，询以霸业所由始，迨策士于汉中，举唐入閤本末为问，其间乃有博赡宏丽者，予异而拔之，则丹棱史孟传守道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298090_comment'></div>其年其叔父君承名坤柔，与其乡人称之无异辞，予始内交焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298090_comment'></div>又九年大比，有司以左右史沿革策士，有谓二史不当隶两省，又谓国朝之史自时政记、起居注、国史、日历、实录、玉牒、圣政、宝训等书，凡皆经历宰辅始得上闻，故载笔者不得直书，反覆辩析，如素官于朝者，发其名又孟传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298090_comment'></div>又九年，就外省疏《春秋》经传柢梧，辩晰不遗，有司愕曰：「是敢与公羊子辩，必老于经者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298090_comment'></div>乃得奏名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298090_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298090_comment'></div>孟传以正学直道，未尝为大惭之语也，而有司取之，公论许之，是则患有司之不公不明，而惟浮靡之是习，苟以哗众攫荣者，不惟浅之待人，亦薄乎处己矣，得之不得固不在是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298090_comment'></div>孟传治装入对，忽以疾卒，实嘉定十三年正月甲子，得年四十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298090_comment'></div>诏附刘渭榜，赐同进士出身，授迪功郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298090_comment'></div>绍定五年十二月癸卯，葬于蟆颐山寿乡丑冈之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298090_comment'></div>予得罪南迁，会恩生还，厥子廉璧过予泣曰：「父殁十有三年矣，龟始食哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298090_comment'></div>惟吾父生而惟先生之依，殁而非先生之文将亡以窆，愿有以宠绥之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298090_comment'></div>呜呼孟传，非予铭谁宜！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298090_comment'></div>史氏自临邛府君灏始入蜀，占名数丹棱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298090_comment'></div>八传至克恭，自荣州军事判官摄本县令，御贼于蟠鳌峡以死，嘉泰间锡庙褒忠，封忠佑侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298090_comment'></div>曾王父宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298090_comment'></div>王父仪，迪功郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298090_comment'></div>父元谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298090_comment'></div>妣王氏、孙氏，孙故太学博士逢之孙，知永睦县份之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298090_comment'></div>孟传孙出也，眉目秀杰，矩范夙成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298090_comment'></div>年十四，以能文名于郡国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298090_comment'></div>举文固非其好也，自经子百氏及历代国朝诸史一览不忘，故发于文则援据详博，词辩雄放，顷刻数千言，见者骇服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298090_comment'></div>退而即其人，似不能言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298090_comment'></div>异时学者托周、程诸儒先语以自标榜，孟传为诗曰：「但使躬行皆孔孟，何忧吾道不周程」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298090_comment'></div>此岂茍于言者！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298090_comment'></div>其后学日肆，名日大，愿交者日广，每诵前辈语，云士不可多受恩，亦不可多受知，故独于予为平生交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298090_comment'></div>予召为学官，孟传不能从，则以属予外舅故荆湖北路刑狱使者杨公熹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298090_comment'></div>予后守汉守眉，持节潼、遂，又与之俱，始识后溪刘公光祖、雁湖李公壁，皆恨相得之晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298090_comment'></div>李公尝语及本朝明堂用吉辛故事，孟传随问辩对，不失一字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298090_comment'></div>屡试辄奇，有欲为之地者，孟传不可曰：「为我谢夫君，吾宁黜不是之为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298090_comment'></div>取同郡李氏，生一子，即廉璧，尝与宾荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298090_comment'></div>一女，嫁同郡刘铸弟守文，爱之笃，推田庐予之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298090_comment'></div>予为买屋于眉之南门，有大家以小屋易之，孟传不之较，亦未尝形之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298090_comment'></div>平生论著有《传斋集》十卷、《传斋有用之学》二十卷、《春秋统会》十二卷、《周礼略》十卷、《书略》十卷、《诗略》十卷、《广编》二百卷、《杂钞》五十卷、《国朝名贤年谱》十卷，《广编》稿未竟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298090_comment'></div>孟传为人不茍得，不轻訾笑，不戚贫贱，于我乎馆者二十年犹一日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298090_comment'></div>所谓博闻强识而逊、笃善行而不怠，孟传非与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298090_comment'></div>虽然，孟传之遇也，有司取之，公论予之，此人心之公也，而未及有行，天遽夺之，天固与人异向与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298090_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1298090'>茸显瘝在，式登于耆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298090_comment'></div>侯德侯艺，匪折伊奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298090_comment'></div>谓天简贤，我不敢知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298090_comment'></div>胡瑰尔蕴，靡一日施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298090_comment'></div>如马斯磬，旋控其驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298090_comment'></div>地泐有已，兹铭永贻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1298090_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，祭拜亡友郭正孙之墓，有祭文；并应其子郭黄中之请，为其撰写墓志铭。作品：哭郭兴元文。故太府寺丞兼知兴元府利州路安抚郭公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭郭兴元文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298170")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298170'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298170'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298170_comment'></div>自弃捐边关，诲盗延敌，而毁封破域矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298170_comment'></div>削弱监牧，专利委责，而阋墙斗室矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298170_comment'></div>金缯事虏，饮欺茹诈，而堂皇四辟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298170_comment'></div>有功弗赏，有善弗纳，卒叛弗戮，将骄弗戢，而龟玉毁于箧椟，龙蛇生于几席矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298170_comment'></div>于是公受任于多故之馀，挺身于群疑之侧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298170_comment'></div>众蓄祸于八年，而公持卮于一日，众投戈于散地，而公缨冠于同室矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298170_comment'></div>既幸生之不忍，则一死之皇恤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298170_comment'></div>自靖自献，虽为臣之常分，而言不己从，事不己出，则一死之奚益矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298170_comment'></div>我生不辰，离邮蹈绌，南迁来反，则公之逝魂邈不可即矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298170_comment'></div>悠悠斯世，靡有夷届，而公赍忠原穸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298170_comment'></div>一奠写哀，何嗟及矣，何嗟及矣，尚享！</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1298170_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1298088' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298088' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故太府寺丞兼知兴元府利州路安抚郭公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍定六年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298088")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298088'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298088'>蜀自绍兴和戎，大弃陕服，且割商、秦之半，于是西阻天水、皂郊，东阻大散、黄牛，而阶、成、和、凤遂为西南剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298088_comment'></div>开禧三年，叛将以四州事金，由是金人知我险易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298088_comment'></div>安沂公极力宣理，仅克就绪，会移镇去，边备浸弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298088_comment'></div>嘉定十年冬，虏遂大举，剽西和，批天水，夺散关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298088_comment'></div>明年春，制置使董君居谊自成都进治利州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298088_comment'></div>又明年，虏捣河池，抄梁、凤、秦、三泉，制置司退守剑外，安抚司退守米仓山，蜀之险尽为虏所觇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298088_comment'></div>安公再镇，未及三年而薨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298088_comment'></div>南海崔正子与之继之，未久亦称疾去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298088_comment'></div>会金鞑相持累岁，朝廷患之，嘉定十六年，召淮东帅臣郑损，超除四川制置使，剸属以疆事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298088_comment'></div>一日鞑虏乘虚大入，损惧，捐四州及天水军，退守七方、武休、仙人三关，自沔还利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298088_comment'></div>朝廷又患之，绍定元年，命湖北帅臣桂如渊伐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298088_comment'></div>先是，吾乡郭公正孙通判金州日，当金虏大入，东陷上津，西断梁、洋，公以饷所督餫，间道驰使称贷于京湖制置使赵彦仁方，而谕豪民富商倾财募士，虏遂遁去，与郡守游勉之九功讫全孤城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298088_comment'></div>知长宁军未期岁，崔正子请于朝，移知文州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298088_comment'></div>会虏盗边，迫阶、文，军溃入竟，公擒捕寘之法，民夷按堵，诏进一官因任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298088_comment'></div>在郡四年，擢知嘉定府，兼权成都府路提点刑狱，兼提举常平，未几为真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298088_comment'></div>治状转闻，除太府寺丞，兼知兴元府，利州路安抚兼提举秦茶马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298088_comment'></div>盖公自安康却虏以来，威名著乎西南，命下，佥谓分阃得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298088_comment'></div>公以本生母忧辞不就，申诏夺服，公固辞，不获命，乃起视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298088_comment'></div>公素负才略，有经世志，每观国家故事，至胡丞公力争和尚原，而郑亨仲承秦桧风旨，割以遗金，辄抚几慨叹，又谓无五州不可保蜀，无大散、皂郊诸关不可保五州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298088_comment'></div>至是受任汉中，首以修大散诸关告诸制置使，然边未有警，议格不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298088_comment'></div>三年十一月，鞑自宝鸡趋凤集，如升虚邑，公之言始信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298088_comment'></div>鞑既去凤，公又言鞑必再来，宜亟命沔将以重兵㧖马岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298088_comment'></div>制帅报曰：「沔将岂可跬步去七方邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298088_comment'></div>马岭已付之田燧矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298088_comment'></div>公怃然曰：「谁为是谋者，误矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298088_comment'></div>且七方深处腹内，汗漫无险，异时虏自西入则备西可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298088_comment'></div>今虏攻京兆，闯凤翔，游骑数至宝鸡，则自东入必矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298088_comment'></div>马岭为东西边之要，有险可守，置重兵于此以逆挫之，虏气必夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298088_comment'></div>若俟其踰马岭，逼七方，则五州地数百里已与虏共之矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298088_comment'></div>时有谓虏必西乡者，故公言不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298088_comment'></div>明年三月，虏果由东道纵兵大入，舍凤集不攻而力争马岭，田燧以忠义人千四百当虏众数万，血战三日夜，矢尽援绝，遂死之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298088_comment'></div>虏既踰险，乃鼓行而西，驰骛平原，不可复制，公之言至此又信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298088_comment'></div>方鞑人之寇凤也，遗嫚书城下去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298088_comment'></div>公移书制置使，略曰：「数年以来，虏尝得志于我，今无故请成，意未可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298088_comment'></div>万有一如谍报假途捣汴，且他有难塞之请，将何以应？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298088_comment'></div>今宜谕以道不可假，师无可借，粮无可贷，舍是三者则本朝交邻自有故实，非外有司所得专，宜俟奏报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298088_comment'></div>虽然，议和乃一时之权，严备则万全之计，首当饬将练兵，以备不虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298088_comment'></div>彼若以和误我，则勿候覆请，随宜剿遏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298088_comment'></div>制帅惧拂虏意，指公为异论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298088_comment'></div>四年正月，鞑人又至，则径属他官往武休议和，事甚秘，公弗及知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298088_comment'></div>虏又出嫚书索粮二十万斛，五日取若干斛，其使速不罕诸人裴回兴赵原，而别大赤辈已纵骑焚掠，出没自如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298088_comment'></div>制帅方令诸将毋得擅出兵，沮和好，且遣王良能、李大举诣凤翔虏酋所回报，而督汉中趣办牛羊酒以犒鞑师，边民㧖腕切齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298088_comment'></div>公叹曰：「馁久戍之卒以啖方张之寇，尚策之得耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298088_comment'></div>制司既又下令，悉召西和、天水凡并边之师入保七方，公谓弃五州，守三关，则蹙地已数百里，痛愤累日，又告曰：「勿谓五州可弃，五州之民痛入骨髓，则锄耰棘矜利于锋镝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298088_comment'></div>勿谓三关可恃，玩寇纵敌，使得气去，将往来三关之外而遂已乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298088_comment'></div>语闻，制帅滋不说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298088_comment'></div>公知不可救药，自是兀然孤城，束手待尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298088_comment'></div>鞑人自攻凤翔，已分兵入吾境，先自隔芽、大散关坌入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298088_comment'></div>鞑所驱中原民号投拜户，有愿为我用者，公谓平戎既误，若招纳归附以携其党，实制变之大机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298088_comment'></div>脱又不纳，必反为虏导，即言之制帅，且请事定之后，分处边疆，垦辟营屯荒田，不忧其聚而生变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298088_comment'></div>众是公谋，诸将亦阴给资粮以俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298088_comment'></div>制司俄下令不纳，北人大失望，于是鞑人因归附之众𨈆藉吾竟，三关之外生聚一空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298088_comment'></div>四月癸未破凤，遂长驱东乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298088_comment'></div>时大将久屯武休，公为言：「武休险绝，且重兵在焉，虏决不自此入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298088_comment'></div>彼不右闯石顶原则左投㯠子关，若阳明、日落、黄竹、茍谷，一处透过数十百骑，则武休虽众，无所用之，顾乃懵不加省」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298088_comment'></div>五月丙戌朔，越六日辛卯，虏果以轻师缀武休，而自阳明、黄竹趋迫兴元，梁、洋义士先已分戍诸关，城中惟忠顺军千人，制置司檄遣略尽，其将呼延棫亦分戍石顶原，公誓以死守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298088_comment'></div>俄而武休之众溃，谍报鞑人谋趋米仓山，寮属丘子正、亲校张谅等请曰：「事势至此，若招讧溃，㧖米仓，犹可保民，徒死亡益也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298088_comment'></div>公亦虑鞑人由巴山深入，乃亟索呼延棫，俾鸠忠顺馀军以俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298088_comment'></div>癸巳，遇鞑人于沙窝，我师三战三却，死伤几半，然犹有支径可避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298088_comment'></div>左右劝公，公不为动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298088_comment'></div>甲午，鞑人自廉水捷出我师之前，公与兄子凤州推官宜中、仲子主管机宜文字文中，凡一门八人，同时遇害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298088_comment'></div>左右得免者仅一二，具言其状，行道之人为之流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298088_comment'></div>六月庚午，余同产兄高南叔某自洋州拔将帅师还定汉沔，得公杜家坡，敛而殡之，其孤黄中自巴山跣护以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298088_comment'></div>又明年，余返自南迁，哭之殡所，且俾商祝陈词曰：「呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298088_comment'></div>自弃捐边关，诲盗延敌，而毁封破域矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298088_comment'></div>削弱监牧，专利委责，而阋墙斗室矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298088_comment'></div>金缯事虏，饮欺茹诈，而堂皇四辟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298088_comment'></div>有功弗赏，有善弗纳，卒叛弗戮，将骄弗戢，而龟玉毁于箧椟、龙蛇生于几席矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298088_comment'></div>于是公受任于多故之馀，挺身于群疑之侧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298088_comment'></div>众投戈于散地，己缨冠于同室矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298088_comment'></div>众养祸于八年，己承危于一日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298088_comment'></div>既幸生之不忍，则一死之皇恤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298088_comment'></div>自靖自献，虽为臣之常分，而言不己从，事不己出，则一死之奚益矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298088_comment'></div>祝辞至此，其孤黄中泣之恸，踊而言曰：「是深知先人者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298088_comment'></div>祝诵终篇，黄中愀然曰：「不得公一言以葬，其孤即没于地，将无以见先人矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298088_comment'></div>予谢曰：「予既与而先人言矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298088_comment'></div>黄中曰：「盍为我申叙而铭之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298088_comment'></div>予窃惟念，去年初夏公以书抵靖曰：「比冬鞑人以和欸我，今春又以酋书期我乎汉中，戎帅拒弗纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298088_comment'></div>或者尤之，不知虏情反覆，戎帅未为失也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298088_comment'></div>今书犹在笥，而公抱知言之名以没，是可哀也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298088_comment'></div>然则予既知公之心，予曷敢不铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298088_comment'></div>公字兴祖，系出唐汾阳王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298088_comment'></div>六世祖扆，自安仁徙临邛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298088_comment'></div>曾王考畋，举元祐三年进士，官至左朝散郎，通判绵州，累赠左通奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1298088_comment'></div>王考季舒，举绍兴二年进士，官至左<span class='inlineComment2'>（中缺）</span>子汉，皆随难汉中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1298088_comment'></div>葬公者，黄中与其子久传而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1298088_comment'></div>幼孙祖传，则后公五月而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1298088_comment'></div>女子五人，长适文林郎、潼川府路都钤辖司干办公事张庭秀，次贡士何烨，次迪功郎胡仲荣，次赵森，次张好仁，惟归胡者存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1298088_comment'></div>孙女三人，其存者一，长孙，婿迪功郎、简州司法参军薛桂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1298088_comment'></div>公初该嘉定十七年明堂恩，以官兄子寅中，今为迪功郎、监四川总领所大安军赡军仓，解官持心丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1298088_comment'></div>再该绍定三年明堂恩，官兄子宽中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1298088_comment'></div>黄中将以绍定六年十月癸酉奉公之丧葬于临邛县白木里之东冈，与张宜人同兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1298088_comment'></div>既谒铭于予，庭秀又状公行以来，乃叙而铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_92_1298088'>西南之祸，信亦有繇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1298088_comment'></div>墙藩隙坏，寇戎之招。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1298088_comment'></div>金缯赂遗，彊胡之挑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1298088_comment'></div>伍乘弗整，戎器弗敹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1298088_comment'></div>彼憪然者，专利宣骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1298088_comment'></div>造攻稔衅，匪一夕朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1298088_comment'></div>公兴受败，力支翘翘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1298088_comment'></div>乃设地险，乃绝虏邀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1298088_comment'></div>诲谆听藐，以我言訞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1298088_comment'></div>一策不试，啖于獍枭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1298088_comment'></div>循义尽分，公心孔昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1298088_comment'></div>我原厉阶，揭铭山椒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_103_1298088_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，为亡友邓应午撰写墓志铭。作品：监成都府钱引务邓君应午墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298105' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298105' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298105?labeling=true' target='_blank'>监成都府钱引务邓君应午墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298105")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298105_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298105'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298105'>予守潼川，邓明父应午为中江县尉，恂恂守道，言呐呐如不能出口，予固期之，尚疑其重迟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298105_comment'></div>又明年春三月，某以君命召上印绶去，道中江，馆于县寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298105_comment'></div>会居民失火，屋比延燬，予挟从行壮士巡火所焮，随宜剪扑，至则明父已率巡徼吏奋身颜行，拔藩彻屋，不移瞬而火熄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298105_comment'></div>厥明，予拊而劳之曰：「尉不当如是邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298105_comment'></div>尉歛板百寮底，诚卑且贱矣，然近民莫尉若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298105_comment'></div>讥盗讯囚，追亡擿伏，始一不谨，祸且蔓延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298105_comment'></div>亦犹救焚，不务遏截，炎炎孰御？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298105_comment'></div>予于是始信人之不易而儒生之果可用也，上其姓名于朝，详刑使者应君懋之、茶马使者邹君孟卿闻之，竞荐其才，乃以功令关升从事郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298105_comment'></div>十七年，调华阳丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298105_comment'></div>予既召入为郎从官，每与蜀之有位者书记往返，必称明父之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298105_comment'></div>未几，予以言事得罪，屏之南州，声迹夐绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298105_comment'></div>予归自靖，明父之子有中来言曰：「吾父不幸死矣，今卜兆于会中乡之坎山，得日于今年十一月甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298105_comment'></div>哀惟吾父以职事受知于子，不由左右之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298105_comment'></div>维子之故，历事监牧，皆受不凡之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298105_comment'></div>今不得子铭无以逭不仁不明之责」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298105_comment'></div>予瞿然问故，则宝庆元年七月十三日殒于风淫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298105_comment'></div>呜呼，明父而止于是乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298105_comment'></div>明父自嘉定六年以词赋为乡举首，九年再举，中明年进士第，调中江尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298105_comment'></div>溃卒薄近竟，人情汹汹，明父程督守御，人恃弗恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298105_comment'></div>岁大疫，力请于台阃，饭饥药疾，至捐俸以资之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298105_comment'></div>同年进士徐君仁恭卒于阆中簿正，为字其孤，恤其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298105_comment'></div>府尹李公𡌴风力峻厉，明父诣府白事，为康色顾之，属之城筑，属之籴廪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298105_comment'></div>郡有疑狱，累岁不能决，刑狱使者以付明父，一讯立辩，囚赖以活，自是益见信任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298105_comment'></div>令摄铜山县，明父移书县令，俾其督吏治赋以应期会，宪台屡趣不行，令亦谓明父言然，卒以逭谴，人两贤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298105_comment'></div>又令摄通泉，以县令乡嫌辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298105_comment'></div>既不获命，则植县纲，擿吏奸，为教以谕百姓之怙势逋租者，不浃旬而令行财裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298105_comment'></div>十七年，调华阳丞，部使者今工部侍郎黄公伯固俾摄县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298105_comment'></div>县为西南剧，昼理邑事，夜覈讼牒，剸拨中理，吏畏民安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298105_comment'></div>黄公才之，学校之校比、河渠之畚筑、将士之廪给、征商之检抳，悉以付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298105_comment'></div>或谯其烦，明父曰：「事无精粗，莫非学也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298105_comment'></div>郫令久虚，又俾摄事，县以大治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298105_comment'></div>既复而又摄，去之日郫人绘而祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298105_comment'></div>华阳考满，黄公惜其去，辟监钱引务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298105_comment'></div>至则官寺圮，役丁穷，上下荡亡纪律，君为振而新之，凡出入虚实之数，增减少多之额，工役勤惰之别，皆籍而记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298105_comment'></div>黄公劳之，为请于朝，自官吏至役徒悉增其廪给，职业用劝，国无乏用，实昉乎此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298105_comment'></div>呜呼，人果不易知而儒生之果可用也乃若此，凡谓儒生不适用者，特腐儒为章句，习佔毕，不知事无非学而拘滞一方者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298105_comment'></div>明父世居新都之弥牟，其家彭之濛阳自王父始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298105_comment'></div>邓氏系出东汉司徒禹之后，子孙散居蜀右为多，今成都、双流、新都皆其裔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298105_comment'></div>曾王父仲和，生三子，其季曰师况，登绍兴十一年进士第，则明父之王父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298105_comment'></div>奏辟通判潼川府，未期卒于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298105_comment'></div>父森，妣王氏，生二子，明父其季也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298105_comment'></div>生有令姿，方在龆龀，亲疾累月，忧无所出，刲股和药，亲疾少差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298105_comment'></div>既卒，执丧如成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298105_comment'></div>王夫人性严厉，明父得其欢心，事庶母宋夫人惟谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298105_comment'></div>既壮，兄弟相依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298105_comment'></div>兄嫂以家事自任，俾明父一意游学，明父德嫂之恩，死为之服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298105_comment'></div>或以无服靳之，明父曰：「昌黎不以义起乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298105_comment'></div>邓之族大而多贫，明父事诸父生则致其养，死则赙其丧，世绝者命之后，女笄者釐其娉，亲党有札丧之事必身任之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298105_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298105_comment'></div>古之学者为己，盖有所事者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298105_comment'></div>元配李氏，继室以赵，赠、封皆孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298105_comment'></div>明父卒后，宋夫人尚无恙，年八十九乃卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298105_comment'></div>有中今以赵氏之命求铭，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1298105'>古之所谓学，以明德而美身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298105_comment'></div>所谓士，以范俗而明民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298105_comment'></div>道湮民散，则嗟卑而居下，恶嚣而欲赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298105_comment'></div>以予观于明父，事无精粗，必信必诚，尚庶几古道之有存。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1298105_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，应杨仲炎之请，作《元符忠谏堂记》<div id='poem_1297905' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297905?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元符忠谏堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297905")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297905_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297905'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297905'>予昔为丹棱杨庆崇作志，其子迈以事状来，阅其世，有大父讳恂，举元丰五年进士，终承议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297905_comment'></div>予以书反曰：「崇宁籍元祐奸党，定元符上书人邪等，与而大父同姓名者，非此其是与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297905_comment'></div>而先是未有识之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297905_comment'></div>迈曰：「郡乘有之，子其为我发之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297905_comment'></div>亡何，迈求予书「元符阁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297905_comment'></div>又亡何，李柱史季尤又为承议之五世孙仲炎书「元符忠谏之家」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297905_comment'></div>予归自靖，仲炎请曰：「先人之敝庐则忠谏之故址也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297905_comment'></div>《诗》云『维桑与梓，必恭敬止』，我将以忠谏名吾阁，子为记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297905_comment'></div>予慨然有感于世道之变、人情之反乃至若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297905_comment'></div>且曰奸曰邪，名之至恶，王法之所必诛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297905_comment'></div>人之于先祖也，为铭物，为烝彝鼎，为圹志，称美而不称恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297905_comment'></div>今崇宁用事之臣籍其祖于邪类，附其事于奸党，而子孙矜以为荣，名实不已戾乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297905_comment'></div>窃尝稽诸五三六经之传，自君君、臣臣、父父、子子、兄兄、弟弟、夫夫、妇妇以至仁义礼知之性、阴阳柔刚之分、卑高贵贱之等、是非邪正之别，名之必可言，言之必可行，未尝有无实之名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297905_comment'></div>故圣贤之言，名不与实对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297905_comment'></div>迨周之衰，始有名与实戾者，名之君而实不君，名之臣而实不臣，以至不父不子，不兄不弟，不夫不妇，无时无之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297905_comment'></div>夫既名浮于实，则于是有名实之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297905_comment'></div>逮其又甚，则放辞者盗丘非轲矣，嫉世者溷夷廉蹠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297905_comment'></div>至楚人则白可黑矣，上可下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297905_comment'></div>至秦人则鹿可马矣，黑可黄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297905_comment'></div>至汉则鹖雀可凤矣，至隋则野鸟可鸾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297905_comment'></div>然而以格人元夫为奸邪，播之诏令，勒之金石，书之史册，不忌不疑如京、卞之为，则未之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297905_comment'></div>虽东汉尝以党人锢士大夫，李唐牛、李相倾相轧，不极于乱不已，固未尝被以溢恶无实之名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297905_comment'></div>自京、卞一开其端，变乱白黑，实为阴乘阳、贱陵贵、夷乱华之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297905_comment'></div>至于秦桧，习非效尤，遂取张、胡、李、赵之所引用者加之叛逆之名，株连逮系五十三家，将以为戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297905_comment'></div>韩侂胄柄国，则又以附于赵忠定公者名之逆党，学于朱文公者名之伪党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297905_comment'></div>夫曰奸曰邪曰逆曰伪，本以怖而携之也，而愿附名籍者唯恐后，则是古者至不美之名，在近世反为至美之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297905_comment'></div>况夫人以眇然之身，血气所拘，不百年耳，滥贵素饱，曾几何时，而为是背理反道之事！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297905_comment'></div>不思万世在后，是非予夺著乎人心，瞭不可掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297905_comment'></div>温文正公、申正献公与凡元祐、元符著籍之士，以及乎绍兴、庆元党人，盖皎然如天日之清明，庸夫孺子、裔夷丑虏，孰不知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297905_comment'></div>今蒙以甚恶之名，在诸贤无豪发加损也，祗以贻千载之一噱耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297905_comment'></div>彼京、卞、桧、侂必不以奸邪自名也，而世之言奸邪者，自丁、夏、章、吕而次，未尝舍四人而他求，而苛于方人者，犹曰是奸邪之靡者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297905_comment'></div>虽孝子慈孙于其父祖，亦且讳闻而羞道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297905_comment'></div>至此则名实始虽少紊，而终固未尝紊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297905_comment'></div>陈仲举闻范孟博之去，叹曰：「今既成其去就之名，得无自取不优之议」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297905_comment'></div>然则为柄臣者，诬人以奸邪，本起秽以为臭，然而不能臭人，祗自臭耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297905_comment'></div>姑以利害言之，来者亦当知所择云。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1297905'></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1297905_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，致书黄伯固。作品：黄制置。<div id='poem_1297479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297479?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与黄制置<span class='inlineComment2'>（伯固）</span>书</a><span class='authorDate'>（壬辰）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297479")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297479'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297479'>载惟吾蜀之敝，肇自开禧之弃四郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297479_comment'></div>嘉定以来，经理未竟，虏复大入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297479_comment'></div>分阃者或两三月，或三二年而去，关隘疏鲁，旧来备御去处，未暇尽修，而损之又损，以养成单阏之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297479_comment'></div>故自比岁，坏政败局之说每行于公私文书，信乎其若此也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297479_comment'></div>然药之活之，则未有他策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297479_comment'></div>是以昔之受大寄、膺重任者，惟有开诚心，布公道，集众思，广忠益，不以逊逆废是非，不以喜怒用赏罚，功不以疏远废，罪不以昵比掩，此意不竞，政局之坏相寻无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297479_comment'></div>某官秉德康宁，宅心宽绰，况十年使蜀，阅理既多，凡今谗言，皆所素讲，谅惟闻命引道，旗志号令必已洒然更新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297479_comment'></div>邈兹远服，特未及闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297479_comment'></div>伪帅武仙虽曰散亡之馀，然当鞑则不足，乡我则尚可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297479_comment'></div>安康边面而付之吴桂，未保何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297479_comment'></div>陈昱粗强人意，近乃闻麾下有溃者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297479_comment'></div>岂御下稍严，未可施之目前邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297479_comment'></div>近事则未尽知，若前一年秋冬，汉沔间亦赖其力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297479_comment'></div>田冒能保武、阶于群州溃裂之冲，迩来鞫治之词乃若戾其所为，此不可晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297479_comment'></div>亦尝为李丈言之，而见答之词未甚明畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297479_comment'></div>前一年冬多事之时，人才短长，大略可见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297479_comment'></div>古人观过使过之说，若试以是思之，尚有遗才可用也。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1297479'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1297479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，郡人赵心传刻黄幹《论语通释》，为作序。作品：论语通释序。<div id='poem_1297614' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297614' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297614?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论语通释序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297614")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297614_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297614'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297614'>勉斋黄直卿合朱文公三书为《论语通释》，吾友复斋陈师宓叙所以作，张敏则刻之潭之湘乡之涟溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297614_comment'></div>予首从萧定夫得善本以归，里人赵心传请刻诸梓以幸惠学士，而属予申其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297614_comment'></div>呜呼，是书之有传，士得之以增益知虑而益邵所学，士之幸也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297614_comment'></div>论说之益广，士窃之以绐取利禄而罔闻于行，予之忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297614_comment'></div>呜呼，学者其亦知所择哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1297614_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，友人李大谦集魏了翁所撰周、程诸儒请谥之文及所作祠记，编为《三先生谥议》一书，刻成见寄。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，里人张寅臣刻《伊洛渊源录》，为作序。作品：伊洛渊源录序。<div id='poem_1297615' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297615' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297615?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伊洛渊源录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297615")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297615_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297615'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297615'>里人张寅臣既刊《伊洛渊源录》，求予一言，予方自靖还邛，未皇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297615_comment'></div>会邵阳守李侯大谦以予昔岁为周程诸儒请易谥及前后祠堂记粹为一编，刻成见寄，予举而付之曰：「予所欲言者尽于是矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297615_comment'></div>寅臣请其说，予慨然曰：难言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297615_comment'></div>士患书之不广也，祠之不多也，不知书益广而废学者深湛之思，祠益繁而非古人萃涣之义，然则是录也，无乃非学士之幸与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297615_comment'></div>《易》之象曰：「天在山中，大畜，君子以多识前言往行，以畜其德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297615_comment'></div>学者诚能玩「天在山中」之象，而知多识言行者，将以反观内省，蕴实含美，为辉光日新之本，非以资四寸之口耳也，则是录之行，庶几其有益乎！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1297615_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，友人裴梦得登门拜访，以所著《史汉四纪》相示，为作序。作品：裴及卿史汉四纪序。<div id='poem_1297616' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297616' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297616?labeling=true' target='_blank'>裴及卿史汉四纪序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297616")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297616_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297616'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297616'>予昔放靖，临川裴及卿寓武冈，以所注欧阳子诗属予序篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297616_comment'></div>既及卿溯江入蜀，予亦会恩还里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297616_comment'></div>一日过予，示《史汉四纪》，进楚隐，尊义帝，去逆吕，纪二少帝，而列孺子婴于孝平、光武之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297616_comment'></div>予语之曰：「夫纪所以目一年之事，犹十二次之有岁、二十八辰之有斗牛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297616_comment'></div>秦未讫祚，天下犹为赵氏，楚隐安得为纪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297616_comment'></div>汉高帝亲受轵道之降，其年项籍改宰侯王，诸侯皆以是年纪元，则汉王元年之称不得而易矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297616_comment'></div>若待义帝之终而后为汉，则汉不得以正其始」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297616_comment'></div>及卿曰：「子之言善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297616_comment'></div>虽然，秦之亡也，陈涉倡之，鲁仲连不肯帝秦，百世之下闻者兴起，而况涉乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297616_comment'></div>高帝用董公一言，项籍弑君之罪始暴白于天下，此汉得天下之张本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297616_comment'></div>进楚尊义，不亦可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297616_comment'></div>乃若纪少帝、孺子，亦使后世知母后、权臣之颛制不可以劫天命之正，虽以文帝之贤而寡恩于少帝，君子不与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297616_comment'></div>是书之作，其不庶几于扶天理、正人心乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297616_comment'></div>予以其言之有益于世也，识一时问答为《四纪序》。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1297616_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>　是年，李肩吾为师遇书其《致仕十诗》，为作跋。作品：跋师厚卿致仕十诗。<div id='poem_1297815' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297815' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297815?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋师厚卿遇致仕十诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297815")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297815_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297815'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297815'>师厚卿自绍定元年贡于乡，以母疾祷于上下神祇，曰「万有一齿一名于进士籍，则貤禄吾母，俾寿且宁」，不愿仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297815_comment'></div>其秋不复试礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297815_comment'></div>厥三年而后举进士，则母不及见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297815_comment'></div>既唱第廷中，谋挂衣冠，而夺于亲昵之异论，不遂初志，卒受爵以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297815_comment'></div>归而得疾，几殆，则舍然叹曰：「岂我食吾言以干天怒乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297815_comment'></div>决意不仕，赋十诗见志，属李肩吾书之、予识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297815_comment'></div>予谓之曰：「子以苍苍者为天邪，此心之神明则天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297815_comment'></div>此心之所不安则天理之所不可，天岂屑屑然与人商较是非也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297815_comment'></div>《诗》曰『敬天之怒，无敢戏豫』，子也急求缓弃，违心所安，是戏豫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297815_comment'></div>《语》曰「吾谁欺，欺天乎」，子谓人心之外又有所谓天乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297815_comment'></div>厚卿竦然曰：「我事吾志，不他有悔矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297815_comment'></div>乃识其事于诗末，以成厚卿之志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1297815_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1233&endYear=1233')">1233年1月1日</a>　亡友家炎入葬，应其子家寅翁之请，为撰墓志铭。作品：知富顺监致仕家侯炎墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知富顺监致仕家侯炎墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍定六年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1233年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298103")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298103'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298103'>余蚤识家侯季文甫，吉士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298103_comment'></div>假守眉山，于乡大夫士之贤者益知侯为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298103_comment'></div>侯筮仕年已四十五，练洽于物情者熟，重以世载清约，视万事退然如不胜，而勤小物，临大节，凛不可乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298103_comment'></div>余尝识侯在富顺时与诸郡守谋讨贼曦檄及为侯记积善堂，以为尽所当事而无计功蕲获之心，庶乎知侯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298103_comment'></div>记之年侯八十有四，后三年，余蒙恩归自靖，则侯已卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298103_comment'></div>厥子寅翁以葬告，累其行请铭诸碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298103_comment'></div>余按家氏见于《节南山》之乱及《春秋经》，至晋大夫仆徒、唐侍御史方，世济休闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298103_comment'></div>方事德宗，以言事忤奸臣𣏌，出刺戎州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298103_comment'></div>自戎居眉，族乃大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298103_comment'></div>方五传曰季遵，为导江令，耻仕孟氏，隐岷山之麓，宝庆初锡号冲洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298103_comment'></div>三传为大理评事正，正生朝议大夫隐，隐生太中大夫定国，历怀安、渠、嘉三郡守，是为侯之高祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298103_comment'></div>曾祖彬，元丰三年进士，哲宗朝为尚书吏部郎中，六持使节，赠银青光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298103_comment'></div>祖彦，知资、荣二州，绍兴间用赵忠简公荐召，未造朝卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298103_comment'></div>考铸，知隆州，赠宣奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298103_comment'></div>妣淑人孙氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298103_comment'></div>侯讳炎，季文甫其字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298103_comment'></div>为人笃谨端静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298103_comment'></div>自侯之高、曾、祖、祢宰郡持节，而家无厚藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298103_comment'></div>淳熙□年贡于潼川路转运司，后以父任入官，主金州石泉县簿、雅州司理参军、知潼川府郪县、通判叙州、知富顺监，丁内艰，起知资、彭、普三州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298103_comment'></div>自始为吏，已能为邦人延师，士知敬业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298103_comment'></div>去之日，尽籍所载书留于庠，使学者稽焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298103_comment'></div>为理官，捐廪给以葺囹圄，植庭楠以荫系囚，茶马使故入洪雅簿赵璧赃几万缗，侯直其枉，使者加盛气诟病，不能屈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298103_comment'></div>砦将诬两平人为蕃人盗边者，必寘之死，侯瞷其非，请于郡贷之，弗听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298103_comment'></div>守既知其冤，益重侯，侯终以鞅鞅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298103_comment'></div>郪县二十年皆摄令，人疑其不利，虚正寝弗敢居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298103_comment'></div>侯至，新其寝以将母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298103_comment'></div>积负三万缗，侯疏滞己责，未几县以治，则又辟斋居以燕宾友，甓经涂以利民旅，无复近世简陋莽卤之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298103_comment'></div>叙州译将言夷人将以某日绝马湖，意叵测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298103_comment'></div>及期而至，人情恟动，侯曰此译所为耳，召而令之曰：「一夷人过江来，乞汝首以殉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298103_comment'></div>译奔命不遑而夷駾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298103_comment'></div>渠、广剧贼罗从义为民害，既逮，泸帅欲徙之沉黎，以责后用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298103_comment'></div>侯言黎接六诏，万一从义走夷中，是资寇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298103_comment'></div>帅动色，为改之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298103_comment'></div>侯之晰情制变率类是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298103_comment'></div>抵富顺之明年，曦以蜀叛，侯愤惋至忘饔寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298103_comment'></div>母问故，侯具以对，且曰：「万一变作，守城臣当死，为母忧，奈何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298103_comment'></div>母曰：「死城郭，分也，非吾忧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298103_comment'></div>侯乃夜自为书告本道使者，吏窃稿去，侯不问，驰使四出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298103_comment'></div>告至叙，叙守薛君九龄亟和之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298103_comment'></div>至帅府，帅府布其言十四州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298103_comment'></div>已而叛势鸱张，皆沮且怖，侯不为变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298103_comment'></div>曦诛，侯亦不自言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298103_comment'></div>母丧去官，除丧，宣抚使安公上富顺抗伪事，请知开州，又荐充监司科，侯辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298103_comment'></div>起知资州，宣谕使吴德夫猎奏移西师屯成都以实内郡，安公举以问侯，侯曰：「虽仅救目前而有二虑，凶年粮不足则聚而逋掠者难制，岁久长子孙则浮而骄脆者难用」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298103_comment'></div>安公然之，奏留四分之三不遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298103_comment'></div>资西门曰珠江，侵齧城下，侯捐钱千万筑五堤而北之，又捐三百万置卤井，岁收羡为修堤费，刘文节公实记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298103_comment'></div>又捐二千万有奇代民赋，葺王子渊诸贤祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298103_comment'></div>筑奇文馆，朔月月半属学士试艺，优奖风厉，岁大比得人为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298103_comment'></div>置内江井，增隶于学以养士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298103_comment'></div>资人谓侯三世守此土，筑世德堂为生祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298103_comment'></div>祠吏非古，生祠又非也，亦以识怀允之诚云耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298103_comment'></div>守彭，会虑真批大安，叛卒践普、遂，赤白囊星火急，而三邑期会弗应，助边犒师之费凡五百有奇，皆取诸节缩之馀财，不以厉民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298103_comment'></div>县告豪民匿税版，民未就逮，冯气力越诉于监司以屈郡县，侯辩折其奸，使者不说，捃拾无所得，反以是知其廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298103_comment'></div>最后守普，承兵火盗创残之馀，折嚚讼，简冗费，代民输者又视资为赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298103_comment'></div>学故有没盗田，载祀四十，乡人有为盗谋，并缘宣抚司檄反其田，士论弗与，犹欲为盗地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298103_comment'></div>侯具本末白宣抚使，复归于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298103_comment'></div>侯自普归，即谢事里居，听聪视明，神正志彊，婚友往来，细书十行下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298103_comment'></div>仕至朝奉郎，不复迁，曰：「吾仕最晚，幸不坠先泽，有官遗子，足矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298103_comment'></div>十九年三遇异霈及磨勘所当陈乞，凡五官不迁，尝请诸朝，以襚其先人，弗许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298103_comment'></div>事孙淑人极其孝敬。<div class='inline'
