id='poem_sentence_59_1298103_comment'></div>侯雅不以吏能名，而治剧邑，宰彫郡，未尝如今人皇皇求利于搉酤米粟之征，率能兴仆补滞，去之日必裕于始至，又能推有馀以为民赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298103_comment'></div>平生践行以约为主，温敝甘粝，大行不加，族燕酒不过三酌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298103_comment'></div>自富顺丧母而归，室燬于火，脱輤于僦居，庙无序宾之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298103_comment'></div>自退休始有室庐，岁视租之入，盛暑祁寒周族人之急者至于再，凡三十年不易其则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298103_comment'></div>故居官号良吏，居乡称善人，是宜寿考康宁，膺受遐福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298103_comment'></div>或谓侯尝昧旦见天上宫阙，隐隐有朱书「寿圃」二字，为侯上寿之證，是诞漫之说，不于其本焉求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298103_comment'></div>《书》曰「天寿平格」，彼动于怪神者安知此也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298103_comment'></div>绍定四年六月甲子，以疾卒于积善坊之里第，年八十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298103_comment'></div>元配丹棱史氏，故夔州路安抚司准备差遣寿朋之子，继室峨眉杨氏、林氏，赠、封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298103_comment'></div>二男子：羔，先卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298103_comment'></div>寅翁，前修职郎、绵州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298103_comment'></div>二女子，长适从政郎、前文州曲水县丞郭守中，次适故从事郎、邛州大邑县丞虞珏，再适宣教郎、新知成都府新繁县李温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298103_comment'></div>男孙三：森，以侯致仕恩补将仕郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298103_comment'></div>双荣、双顶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298103_comment'></div>女孙三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298103_comment'></div>葬以六年月正元日，墓在金仓山之原，祔于隆州府君之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298103_comment'></div>余早入仕，及接海内诸儒先，每见昔人言论风指，务存有馀不尽之泽为可继可传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298103_comment'></div>今之君子小有才智，则势相冯，利相诱，得之不翅杪忽，厥丧固已丘山，甚至斩艾其先世所以遗后者，豪发不疑于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298103_comment'></div>此余于侯之葬深嘉屡叹之，而系之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_1298103'>成周取人，曰常与吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298103_comment'></div>家邦浚明，载祀绵历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298103_comment'></div>下逮春秋，曰德匪才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298103_comment'></div>字敬则裕，汰愎则灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298103_comment'></div>人之一心，与天地贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298103_comment'></div>盛穷寿短，非可智算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1298103_comment'></div>家侯存存，动与善俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1298103_comment'></div>所感所遇，吉祥毕储。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1298103_comment'></div>彼巧捷者，则殆且棘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1298103_comment'></div>谓予不信，于侯是式。</div><div id='poem_sentence_87_1298103_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1233&endYear=1233')">1233年</a>　春，始赴知泸州任。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='f17aa992f572424f9bcdd8771fad453a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f17aa992f572424f9bcdd8771fad453a");'><span id='f17aa992f572424f9bcdd8771fad453a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年</a>，58岁</div><div id='f17aa992f572424f9bcdd8771fad453a' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>临行，祭奠先墓，有祝文。作品：赴召辞先墓及诸庙祝文。焚黄告先墓文。<div id='poem_1298225' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298225' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298225?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赴召辞先墓及诸庙祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298225")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298225_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298225'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298225'>上亲揽万机，凡为权臣所嫉者以次召还，某误在选中，辞不获命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298225_comment'></div>神灵阴相，职是侥踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298225_comment'></div>将简元辰，往趋严诏，不负所学，是报神庥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1298225_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
杭州（钱塘）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8006f2ea75f04def8ad93d6ffb8230db_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8006f2ea75f04def8ad93d6ffb8230db");'><span id='8006f2ea75f04def8ad93d6ffb8230db_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年</a>，22岁</div><div id='8006f2ea75f04def8ad93d6ffb8230db' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年3月</a>　与韩甲、乐新同赴京应进士试；路遇章相士，称其可中高第。作品：赠章相士。<div id='poem_253616' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253616' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253616?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠章相士</a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253616")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253616_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253616'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253616'>我本三生人，寄身软红土。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253616'>方困京华老，谁识新丰旅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253616'>稠中有章生，道周忽会顾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253616'>谓余有奇骨，往往私告语。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253616'>许予两无心，解后适相遇。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253616'>闻余趋集英，一声耸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_253616", 253616, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>胪句</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253616'>自谓吾术神，诵言诧俦侣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253616'>我无百金装，生无箕帚女。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253616'>沘毫赋此诗，为生邮梁楚。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253616_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253616'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_253616_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年5月7日</a>　廷试，御擢第一；因策论道学，置第三名。作品：己未唱第后谢恩诗。<div id='poem_253061' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253061' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253061?labeling=true' target='_blank'>己未唱第后谢恩诗<span class='inlineComment2'>（得本于昌州卢兄）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年5月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_3_1298122_comment'></div>万日喁喁，白麻在廷，引疾求谢，午桥幅巾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298122_comment'></div>人傒公归，帝图乃廑，天下憖遗，胡啬厥龄！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298122_comment'></div>远道折轴，扶桑成薪，逝如可赎，何直百身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298122_comment'></div>如壁等辈，生长西岷，自公之西，实眷我仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298122_comment'></div>粤来周行，日睇衮衣，一去不复，今将畴依！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298122_comment'></div>莫往予哭，郁陶余思，一奠矢诚，终古之违。</div><div 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253511")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253511_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_253511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253511'>著意护本根，虚怀阅忠厚。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253511'>上游屹长城，归来秉机宥。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253511'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_253511_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年1月</a>　召试学士院，谏开边之事，忤韩侂胄，御史徐柟劾其狂妄。作品：答馆职策一道。<div id='poem_1297828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297828?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答馆职策一道</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297828")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297828_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297828'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297828'>对：自三代以还，王政不明，而天下无善治，寥寥千百载间，岂无明君令辟，修立法度，讲明政刑，欲以挈其国于久安长治之域者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297828_comment'></div>然撑东而西倾，捉衿而肘见，治之形常浮于乱之意，则亦未明乎纪纲而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297828_comment'></div>使吾朝廷之上，君制臣承，淑慝有别，国是归一，士心不偷，则纪纲一定，自可以立万世法程而无变，而况目前小小节目之未备者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297828_comment'></div>不然，所以为立国之规者，方抢攘舛逆，未甚有纪，则四肢虽强，而脉已受病，庸医之喜，而仓、扁之惊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297828_comment'></div>我国家之有天下也，以仁厚立治体，以宏大植规模，真儒硕才，肩袂摩接，相与修明纪纲，以为子孙帝王凭藉扶持之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297828_comment'></div>奸憸权慝，胥史舆隶，不得以挠宪章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297828_comment'></div>后家阉尹，宠昵嬖倖，不得以干朝政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297828_comment'></div>国论出于一，而士大夫以名义自检，不以枉进，不以苟偷立人之朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297828_comment'></div>一政事之失，则大臣请对面列，台谏留班伏閤，小臣封章扣匦，随即正救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297828_comment'></div>诚以大纲之或紊，则败法乱纪，纷裂四出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297828_comment'></div>任使非人，而军政堕矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297828_comment'></div>耗蠹无艺，而财力殚矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297828_comment'></div>有司失职，而刑狱繁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297828_comment'></div>一丝之棼，而头绪如猬，是安可不循其本而为之忧乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297828_comment'></div>当是时选用将帅，内则拔之禁近大臣，试以藩岳而后用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297828_comment'></div>外则取之都漕待制杂学士，迟以岁月而后授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297828_comment'></div>武臣不过为总管，领兵马，受节制，未尝俾之得专制一道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297828_comment'></div>纪纲一定，故择帅不挠于私，而绩用咸著，况祁若水能使老师宿将屏气慑息，韩、范诸人能使悍羌黠贼骨寒胆破，其将帅之效，有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297828_comment'></div>财用悉归三司，内外帑藏非条例之有定数者，不得擅支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297828_comment'></div>而军器土木河防之费，皆有专案，以关防出纳之名数，人主不得与知，宰臣不敢取索，计相不肯供具，皆所以防微杜渐，不欲以隙横恩滥赏之门也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297828_comment'></div>纪纲一定，故财用不病于耗，而公私俱利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297828_comment'></div>初年不过有千六百馀万之入，而内帑金帛如山积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297828_comment'></div>而至于宝元、康定间，民不加赋而帑藏盈溢，其财用之裕有如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297828_comment'></div>犴狱之寄列圣尤重，既分遣朝臣提点刑狱，又间遣近臣分录刑禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297828_comment'></div>凡有奏谳，则棘寺与审刑详覆之，同书以上于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297828_comment'></div>又虑有司之交委其责也，则令详断官不得避事，紊烦朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297828_comment'></div>乾德诏书，列圣遵守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297828_comment'></div>纪纲一定，故司臬者各供其职，而狱讼用稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297828_comment'></div>盛度知审刑院，而在京及诸路止有断案三道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297828_comment'></div>庆历之间，郡数奏狱空，其刑狱之清有如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297828_comment'></div>自熙、丰大臣以私意误国，引用资浅新进之士布满中外，要官右职皆出其门，废弃典章，隳紊经制，凡祖宗所以维持斯世之纪纲荡无复存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297828_comment'></div>血脉受病而外邪交攻，众證皆由此始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297828_comment'></div>河朔增置诸将而勤兵费财，韶、向、充、谔之徒，出师屡败，使貂珰节制诸军，而士莫肯为用，则军政失律矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297828_comment'></div>凿《周官》以符新法，分三司使权以归朝廷，置旁通簿以说上意，则国用无节矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297828_comment'></div>杀伤自首之律，议论蜂起，奏谳驳勘之条，删著无常，鞠狱或由内降，必傅重议，则法令滋章矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297828_comment'></div>方熙、丰大臣锐意求治，悉从更张，未尝不曰：「吾将以振起偷惰，作新弊政也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297828_comment'></div>而庙堂纪纲之所自出，乃使国是多岐，憸佞竞进，举措不审，条章纷错，以伤吾立国之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297828_comment'></div>使无元祐，则阳九之厄，盖不待后日而见矣，而何特是三者之不满人意哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297828_comment'></div>即是而观，则知出治有本末，施置有先后，治本既立，则节目所不必虑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297828_comment'></div>区区然随事以为之图，而纪纲之地谩不加意，则亦终于无成而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297828_comment'></div>善计天下者，常于是而致察焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297828_comment'></div>厥今天下何病哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297828_comment'></div>国是挠于浮言，朝变夕改，而无成规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297828_comment'></div>士大夫狃于苟偷，阿意顺旨，而无特操；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297828_comment'></div>法度屡更，主威不立，爵赏轻滥，流品混淆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297828_comment'></div>庆元之初，尝为变更之说矣，未几而易以安静；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297828_comment'></div>未几又为皇极之说矣，未几而易以振作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297828_comment'></div>上既无一定之论，以把握国势，而士大夫迎合苟容，不自爱重，倖门邪径，抉关毁垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297828_comment'></div>其嗜利亡耻者，往往剽掠传闻，追媚时好，求容左右，扣阍投匦，指心誓日，以功名自诡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297828_comment'></div>而朝廷之上所以植立纪纲，以为出治之本者，虑不动于耳目，以为上之人无意于是，而时论所不尚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297828_comment'></div>嗟夫，安有为天下阽危若此，而充塞周行，掠禄养谀，独无正人为上分明之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297828_comment'></div>姑以将帅言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297828_comment'></div>国家休兵四十馀年矣，旧臣宿师日替月零，骄将騃夫久縻廪稍，未尝有横草尺寸之功，而高官厚禄宠异逾等，不复有功名之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297828_comment'></div>剥下媚上，背公首私，升差夺于货贿，拣汰挠于请嘱，庸者有输，假贷子钱者有输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297828_comment'></div>每旬宣限，帮给银会，或以铁钱兑给，而规其倍称之息，戍兵之愤惋不恤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297828_comment'></div>市刍草以给战骑，往往抑配均备，而乾没其四分之三，将队之怨嗟不问也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297828_comment'></div>甚者收房廊，掌回易，置箄筏，建第宅，古人之所与同甘苦者，今役使科抑，几同奴隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1297828_comment'></div>方时晏安而专事朘削，士有离心而无斗志，万一有犬吠之警，则忧不在敌而在我矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1297828_comment'></div>是安可不讲求其故乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1297828_comment'></div>问遗公行，货赂旁午，或求召对，或觊节钺，或图移镇，倾囷垂橐，莫非责偿于得请之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1297828_comment'></div>此其溪壑之欲，岂曰仅偿宿负而已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1297828_comment'></div>此可忧者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1297828_comment'></div>姑以财用言之，中兴以来，以十六路百七十郡之地，不能当天下全盛之半，岁入乃增至六千五百馀万，而经制月桩等钱二千万不预焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1297828_comment'></div>两浙之岁输缗钱千二百万，四川之盐钱九百五十馀万又不预焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1297828_comment'></div>校之祖宗取民之数不知凡几倍矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1297828_comment'></div>而平居无事，版曹无累月之储，大农无旬时之积，鳃鳃然若不能一朝居者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1297828_comment'></div>祠牒积滞而亟出空名，祗以重商贾之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1297828_comment'></div>而拘以折纳，使胥吏得以交通为市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1297828_comment'></div>扈农急阙，而招诱纲运，反以致诸郡之窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1297828_comment'></div>而掯期始至，使官吏得以旁缘为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1297828_comment'></div>方时晏安，而小小举措，首尾呈露，动招窥议如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1297828_comment'></div>万一有赤白囊之警，虽百弘羊，亦不知所以为吾计矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1297828_comment'></div>是可不讲求其故乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1297828_comment'></div>苞苴成风而贪吏满天下，名器轻滥而节察防团满京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1297828_comment'></div>后家之庙侈于畴曩，掖庭内人动以千数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1297828_comment'></div>今其甚者，封桩内帑，破坏阜陵之成规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1297828_comment'></div>御前军器，修内司营造之需，关拨无时，比部不得而驱磨，庙堂不得而致诘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1297828_comment'></div>宣和以天下之全力，侈汰无节，犹不过月支百二十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1297828_comment'></div>而今乃与之等，此可忧者二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1297828_comment'></div>姑以刑狱言之，祖宗立法，罪疑惟轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1297828_comment'></div>令甲所载，凡无證佐，不经检验，法轻情轻，疑虑可悯，皆得以上于朝，盖虑其冤抑而无告也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1297828_comment'></div>因循日久，而胥吏缘法舞文，应大辟下吏，不先考正情实，或导之以前六者之条，迁就周回，以为奏谳之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1297828_comment'></div>狱司受贿而饰词，法吏交通而弃法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1297828_comment'></div>天下之狱，岁上于朝廷者，充曹牣府，而皆无證不验也，皆法轻情轻也，皆疑虑可悯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1297828_comment'></div>文书盈几，披览莫遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1297828_comment'></div>福建、湘、湖、川、广之间，报可之命，近辄逾年，远或再岁，瘐死者不可胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1297828_comment'></div>详刑之职，无案可覆，是可不讲求其故乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1297828_comment'></div>守令务为姑息，不肯任责，而宪吏之于州胥，吹毛求疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1297828_comment'></div>甚至呵问勘官，逮治推狱，毫氂之差，便入一案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1297828_comment'></div>推结之文，若径从奏裁，则省部据案铺法，不复駮难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1297828_comment'></div>举天下无一可死之刑，凶徒之所以轻犯法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1297828_comment'></div>而狱讼繁多，寇盗之兴，实基于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1297828_comment'></div>此可忧者三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1297828_comment'></div>夫将帅所以捍吾圉也，财用所以强国势也，刑狱所以戢奸暴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1297828_comment'></div>先王经理天下，孰有外于是？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1297828_comment'></div>而今皆未能一焉，则纪纲之不可忽者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1297828_comment'></div>上拊髀思将，固尝申节诸帅，至谓「专事脧削，藉为苞苴」，可谓深中弊源矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1297828_comment'></div>将帅之弊至今日极矣，非大有以更张之不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1297828_comment'></div>诚能如祖宗故事，参用儒将，自宰职禁从以至藩方帅守，其有年劳素深，威望素著，谙历山川道路，甲兵财谷者，命大臣各以一二姓名条上，蔽自圣志，俾之分领重镇，假之以权而久其任，隆之以名而厚其礼，使位貌威名诸将素所屈服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1297828_comment'></div>遇有缓急，则授以大将旗鼓，俾得以尽护诸将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1297828_comment'></div>而武臣不过领兵马，受节制，出入战守，为所指纵耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1297828_comment'></div>舍是不思，而必待夫临事仓卒，然后辍大臣以宣威，则上下捍格，举措乖方，往事可鉴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1297828_comment'></div>况介胄之夫，寡廉鲜耻，而恣为聚歛，又堪专委乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1297828_comment'></div>上旰食渴治，固尝申命大臣兼总邦计，且使之参考内外财赋所入，经费所出，可谓深中时弊矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1297828_comment'></div>然今日之帑藏，不难于理其外，而难于理其内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1297828_comment'></div>盖外之出内有常，可以考覈，而内之耗蠹无节，不容预知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1297828_comment'></div>所闻国用司已遍行取会诸路上供赋入及所在钱物名数，诚能始自内帑，取一岁非汎支费，严加覈实，一毫之出纳，国用使别得以制其可否，而参计官得以覆其虚实，毋若平时比部驱磨之具文，则内帑金帛当无欺隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1297828_comment'></div>然后以绍兴制度为率，约为定数，月支不过八九十万，比今所支则岁可省三之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1297828_comment'></div>以三十年之通，当有馀财万万，遂可为十年之蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1297828_comment'></div>以绍兴兵戈扰攘之际，所费仅尔，岂其承平无事而独不可行乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1297828_comment'></div>上好生恤刑，固当申饬宪臣，俾之条具详覆失职之因，可谓深中弊源矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1297828_comment'></div>然今日之弊，有未易言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1297828_comment'></div>狭其奏谳之涂，则省部固无壅积之患，而非古人「宁失不经」之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1297828_comment'></div>不问其可贷可杀，而皆得以上闻，则朝廷固有好生之名，而又非古人「刑故无小」之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1297828_comment'></div>今不若行下敕令所，将奏裁之法详加订正，比类问难，疏于其下，俾上下晓然，易避难犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1297828_comment'></div>仍责任宪司，凡州郡所当上之狱，审勘结录，止得申宪司详覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1297828_comment'></div>有当取裁，则宪司独衔具奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1297828_comment'></div>夫宪司岂专以杀为事者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1297828_comment'></div>而今也州郡欲予之死则申，欲予之生则奏，甚失夫详覆之本意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1297828_comment'></div>如前二说，不犹愈于刀笔之吏巧为傅会，而冤死长奸者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1297828_comment'></div>三者之病，愚既推源夫受病之由，而陈所以治疗之方矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1297828_comment'></div>然脉候有虚实，药石有先后，敢终言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1297828_comment'></div>自晋之东，中原遗黎未尝忘晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1297828_comment'></div>晋之诸君进筑以广地，增募以强兵，储粟以厚粮，亦知所以用强其国矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1297828_comment'></div>然纪纲不立，初无一定之规，而谋国之臣议论矛盾，亦无同心徇国之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1297828_comment'></div>古之举大事者，必上下一心，臣民协志，议定而后行，谋审而后发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1297828_comment'></div>而今也国无定是，人怀异情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1297828_comment'></div>一人举事则一人蹑其后以议其失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1297828_comment'></div>庾翼徙镇而王述非之，褚裒北伐而蔡谟非之，殷浩出师而王羲之非之，桓温议迁洛而孙绰非之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1297828_comment'></div>夫事未及举，而内之人心乖离不一如此，则其连年出师，随即败衄，间虽小有克捷，实为温、裕僭窃之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1297828_comment'></div>然则非其外治之不讲，皆以在内之纪纲未尝素立故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1297828_comment'></div>有国者岂可徒计在彼而不计其在我者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1297828_comment'></div>今日之势，愚谓莫若急于内修，而缓于外攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1297828_comment'></div>内修若无所事乎急也，救弊如支倾，极力撑柱，不急则仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1297828_comment'></div>外攘若不容以缓也，然对敌如弈棋，当量彼己，不缓则失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1297828_comment'></div>请先言其内者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1297828_comment'></div>人主恭俭寡欲，渊默临朝，固未尝有失德，而立政造事，未闻与外廷之士推诚临问，熟议而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1297828_comment'></div>虽日御经筵，亲近儒生，而罕垂咨访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1297828_comment'></div>日御便殿，轮对百官，而未尝可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1297828_comment'></div>政令之阙失，纪纲之废弛，宵旰之忧，亦尝及此否也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1297828_comment'></div>庙堂，政本所出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1297828_comment'></div>今体貌浸轻，威望不著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1297828_comment'></div>旬岁之间，免两执政，如逐奴隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1297828_comment'></div>异时犹曲示宽假，俾之自为去就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1297828_comment'></div>今一封朝奏，则仓皇就道矣，殆非所以重朝廷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1297828_comment'></div>台谏，公论之所系也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1297828_comment'></div>今论监司则反为所诋，甚至诬抗台臣，而快其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1297828_comment'></div>论一郡守，则反为所慢，甚至迁延岁月而不肯去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1297828_comment'></div>简墨未乾，而已畀祠廪矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1297828_comment'></div>烦言在耳，而复造班行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1297828_comment'></div>事势陵夷，殆非所以崇国体也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1297828_comment'></div>进一贤焉，惟恐用之或后也，未及施置，寻即罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1297828_comment'></div>退一不肖焉，惟恐去之不速也，未及旋踵，寻即收用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1297828_comment'></div>则贤否混殽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1297828_comment'></div>千馀缗之赃，褫爵窜徙可也，而百馀万计者，或夤缘以求祠，则赏罚无章矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1297828_comment'></div>事之不得其当者如此，而欲以振天下趋事赴功之心，不几于却行而求前乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1297828_comment'></div>愚故谓急于内修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1297828_comment'></div>请复言其在外者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1297828_comment'></div>自一二年来，道路籍籍，皆谓朝廷将议北伐，移戍兵，修战舰，蓄边储，备犒赏，缮城郭，文移往来，项背相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1297828_comment'></div>曾未有衅，而两淮之间人情汹汹，若王师之将至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1297828_comment'></div>不知朝廷果有是耶，抑不过坚边设备而已？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1297828_comment'></div>有之则不当使敌知，知则彼有备，而我无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1297828_comment'></div>无之则不当使敌疑，疑则敌生衅，而我无应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1297828_comment'></div>二者皆非我之利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1297828_comment'></div>今进言者皆曰：「虏人困于鞑靼，而有危亡之形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1297828_comment'></div>遗黎不忘本朝，而起讴吟之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1297828_comment'></div>彼其民困于屯戍，而签刷未已，财匮于给饷，而赋歛横兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1297828_comment'></div>若我以义兵临之，不遗一矢，而境土可以坐复」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1297828_comment'></div>此近日规恢之说，所以上下鬨然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1297828_comment'></div>然尝静而绎之，今虏人积衰之势虽犹强弩之末，然其奄有秦、晋、齐、鲁、燕、赵之地，并吞大辽幽、蓟、瀛、莫之区，地广形强，未易卒图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1297828_comment'></div>而求其在我，则廪廪然未有可以胜人之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1297828_comment'></div>为今日之计，莫若振纪纲，定国是，一人心，作士气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1297828_comment'></div>使吾内治修明，国势增壮，使精神之运固足以詟敌人之心，然后徐举而图之，此万全之利，不可以腐儒常谈忽之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1297828_comment'></div>不是之思，而欲举二百年祖宗之天下以轻试于一掷之暂，则举足之间，庙社之安危存亡系焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1297828_comment'></div>愚故谓缓于外攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1297828_comment'></div>区区謏儒，不识忌讳，妄有窥度如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1297828_comment'></div>若曰国家大事，我不当言，言之有罪，则狂僭之诛，所不敢辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_176_1297828_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年1月</a>　乡人擢进士禄坚复来访，二人定交。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年1月</a>　为六安县尉顾士龙诗卷作跋。作品：跋六安县尉顾士龙诗卷。<div id='poem_1297633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297633?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋六安县尉顾士龙诗卷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297633")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297633'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297633'>开禧初正，余以职事课诸生射于右庠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297633_comment'></div>或挽石五弓，神色闲雅，若无意于射中，而未尝有虚镞者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297633_comment'></div>或挽不及石而汗颜掉腕，其发不能以三十步者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297633_comment'></div>或既取其大，引不能满，而易其次者，又易其下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297633_comment'></div>齐量之浅深，气格之高下，毫末不能以强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297633_comment'></div>余方舍然有感于为文之法，顾为同僚语，会顾六安以一编诗求跋，因为书目前所见以赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297633_comment'></div>顾君今能挽强矣，其必如无意于射者而后止也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1297633_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年3月</a>　除秘书省正字。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_content_253537'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253537'>凉风厉萧辰，秋事已一半。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253537'>日日送行人，青衫浃流汗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253537'>安得此老宿，为世洗愁叹。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　冬，与友人张从祖唱和。作品：和张大著颠字韵二首;章大著以韩持国绿樽红妓事再和见戏复次韵;再和颠字韵。<div id='poem_253215' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253215' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253215?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和张大著颠字韵<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253215")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_4_253215_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253214?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_253095'>鸷形不匿麇投麓，剑影虚张蛟绕船。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253095'>壮观要还全盛日，图回须似中兴年。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　友人宋德之知阆州，作诗相送。作品：送宋常丞德之知阆州（十年痼丘壑）<div id='poem_253519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送宋常丞<span class='inlineComment2'>（德之）</span>知阆州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253519")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253519'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253519'>十年痼丘壑，厌食青山薇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253519'>不作时世妆，短褐怀明玑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253519'>出门歌一曲，听者魂为飞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253519'>方骑将军马，旋闯师氏闱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253519'>清名满双宇，宥画裨枢机。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253519'>便面障俗尘，不肯缁素衣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253519'>一朝典仪蕞，云步方峨巍。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253519'>顾怀锦屏胜，见谓天下稀。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253519'>彤幨下青冥，骢马黄金鞿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253519'>假道浙以东，袖有四明归。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253519'>我来今二年，几度与客违。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253519'>名位偶君似，临分重依依。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253519'>风节耐岁晚，富贵倏晨晞。<div id='poem_sentence_12_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_253519'>相期久远看，努力踵前徽。<div id='poem_sentence_13_253519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_253519'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_253519_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1205&endYear=1205')">1205年</a>　应友人乐新之请，为其亲撰墓志铭。作品：乡贡进士乐君材墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298018' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298018' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298018?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乡贡进士乐君材墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（开禧二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1205年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298018")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298018_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298018'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298018'>嘉泰三年秋，同年友乐新过予于里舍，拜泣曰：「新之先籍邛安之延贡，世以儒学授乡里，俱死韦布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298018_comment'></div>逮先君克绍我家，而身复不显，弃诸孤十有五年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298018_comment'></div>昔者尝有治命曰：『我死则以依政县北界里之原葬我焉，祔以元配苏氏』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298018_comment'></div>兄弟贫，举不以时，今百用始戒，识竁未有铭也，用敢请于吾母，状行义年以惟子也属」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298018_comment'></div>余不敢曰不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298018_comment'></div>粤三年乙丑，新以书抵余于京曰：「癸亥之会，子尝坠言焉，今蔡食于明年某月之某日矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298018_comment'></div>余愧谢使者，书以授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298018_comment'></div>君讳材，字元脩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298018_comment'></div>大王父讳周，王父察，父潮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298018_comment'></div>君少颖悟，仲氏叙南推官林俱以词赋著，里中子及旁郡邑竞从受业，著录者率能取科第、预宾贡，而仲亦擢进士，独于君觖望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298018_comment'></div>太学博士李石以文名重许可，绍兴壬午来较乡举，奇君文，上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298018_comment'></div>既又就见，诵不失一字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298018_comment'></div>类省报罢，益痛自軥录，取韩文公「文章绍编刬」之句名所居堂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298018_comment'></div>益肆于学，取古今一言一事可为训戒者揭寘屋壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298018_comment'></div>三女子，适同郡杨瑊、罗一谦、朱叔厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298018_comment'></div>内外孙二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298018_comment'></div>君性方重，事母罗夫人无违志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298018_comment'></div>苏夫人州文学声之女，火井人，其卒先君二十八年，恪共妇职，手写书盈箧，以相其夫，复以授诸子，宗族取式焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298018_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1298018'>维殖弗年，维蓄弗施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298018_comment'></div>有醇其衷，之死靡移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298018_comment'></div>瞻彼兆矣，君荒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298018_comment'></div>兆维固矣，子孙其皇之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1298018_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年2月6日</a>　太学行释奠礼，与友人胡有开唱和。作品：和胡秘书有开学中释奠。<div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年8月</a>　以亲老侍养不便，乞外补，改知嘉定府。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　彰明崇仙观道士赵道川至京师拜谒，以崇仙观记相请，因补外之事，辞未作。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　友人何大圭告以蜀将乱，劝其稍留，未果。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1206&endYear=1206')">1206年</a>　临行，友人辅广以朱熹《语孟集注》相赠。<br /><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253528")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253528_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253528'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253528'>共惟仁义心，无贤愚圣狂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253528'>纷纷万弓箭，独以寸铁当。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253528'>毫氂有不察，居然失其乡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253528'>察则我固有，而失岂真亡。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253528'>周君海内秀，清姿竞球琅。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253528'>牛刀十九年，犹顾善而藏。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253528'>用世无内外，意行独安详。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253528'>乃知旦昼物，特为弱者彊。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253528'>许时京尘中，解后两匆忙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253528'>前日同李郭<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：近陪西湖之游。）</span>，它日盟范张<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：尝有虎丘之约。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253528'>岂谓客逢客，乃或得相羊。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253528'>此道日寥落，此意谁平章。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253528'>为人作生活，悠悠老扶桑。<div id='poem_sentence_12_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_253528'>勉哉迪嘉猷，岁晚垂令芳。<div id='poem_sentence_13_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_253528'>我亦从此去，后会丘之阳。<div id='poem_sentence_14_253528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_253528'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_253528_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c44e33add6954498ab43f346eef97ec9_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c44e33add6954498ab43f346eef97ec9");'><span id='c44e33add6954498ab43f346eef97ec9_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1223')">1222-1223年</a>，45-46岁</div><div id='c44e33add6954498ab43f346eef97ec9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年9月</a>　抵京。于友人杜安石处见杜才叔所作《和归去来辞》，为作跋。作品：跋青神杜才叔和归去来词。<div id='poem_1297724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋青神杜才叔和归去来词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297724")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297724_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297724'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297724'>三马食曹，叔夜有宜去之书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297724_comment'></div>一龙禅宋，渊明兴归来之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297724_comment'></div>然而渊明虽勇退而能雍容不迫，若将微罪行者，视叔夜之婞直而轻愠殆有间矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297724_comment'></div>史载渊明之去在义熙三年，以其时考之，盖宋高祖杀刘仲文之岁，昭明所谓耻复屈身异代者，为得其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297724_comment'></div>夫岂以一督邮为此悻悻哉，而古今罕有能发之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297724_comment'></div>杜君此文作于蜀盗未平之日，其尚渊明之心乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297724_comment'></div>某昔守君之乡，顾不及识君，嘉定十五年九月解后其子安石于临安，始见是作，因推本昔人所未发者识诸篇末，而归其书杜氏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1297724_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年9月</a>　以兵部郎官兼国史院编修官、实录院检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　其时，上书乞荫补表侄高斯谋。作品：申尚书省乞荫补表侄高斯谋状。<div id='poem_1297312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>申尚书省乞荫补表侄高斯谋状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297312")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297312'>某伏睹庆元重修令，带职朝奉郎以上，初遇大礼，应荫补子孙，而陈乞荫补期亲，谓见有子或孙白身者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297312_comment'></div>照得期亲，则嫡兄弟之子皆是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297312_comment'></div>若使同姓嫡兄弟，则固不待言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297312_comment'></div>然亦有元是嫡兄弟，而偶因出继者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297312_comment'></div>若缄嘿不言，则朝廷无由悉知，敢犯严谴，辄有控陈，以冀垂察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297312_comment'></div>伏念了翁之祖父，娶高氏，生七子男，其第六子曰孝璹，以祖母之兄高黄中无子，自襁褓间取养孝璹为子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297312_comment'></div>后来孝璹既知为魏氏子，尝欲归宗，却因以请本州文解，有名籍在礼部，恐费申明，遂遣了翁代归本姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297312_comment'></div>比岁本生父母殁，了翁两次并乞解官，持心丧，已蒙朝廷允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297312_comment'></div>惟是生育劬劳之恩，终未有以报塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297312_comment'></div>又念今官及带职员郎，而本生父母不得封赠，合该奏荐，而嫡兄弟之子不得与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297312_comment'></div>欲归本宗，而父母之命不可违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297312_comment'></div>一念及此，莫知攸措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297312_comment'></div>偶因读史至《三国志》，其间一事，偶与此合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297312_comment'></div>且朱然本施氏子也，朱治未有子，然年十三，治取以为嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297312_comment'></div>然尝请归本姓，吴主不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297312_comment'></div>然既卒父丧，乃表其子续还为施氏后，以奉本生祭祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297312_comment'></div>乃知此事揆诸人情，或在可察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297312_comment'></div>了翁伏见本生父嫡长子奉议郎高载，与了翁系同胞兄弟，辛勤一第，官末及员郎而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297312_comment'></div>有子斯谋，在了翁为本生父之嫡孙，亲兄之嫡长子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297312_comment'></div>前一次明堂大礼，了翁合该奏荫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297312_comment'></div>缘丁本生母丧，有碍陈乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297312_comment'></div>今再遇大礼，了翁虽有二男并系白身，若论人情，岂不欲先任其子？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297312_comment'></div>缘本生之恩未报，私心实有未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297312_comment'></div>今来妄意欲将合得恩泽一资奏补亲兄之子高斯谋，庶几凭藉寸禄，以奉本生父母祭祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297312_comment'></div>则上以彰圣朝孝治之意，下以慰人子报亲之心，委非小补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297312_comment'></div>如蒙朝廷矜其区区报本之诚，出于真切，别无它觊，即为敷奏，特依所乞，则续当依条式别具状召保官陈乞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1297312_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　其时，叶适寄书来，贺魏了翁返京。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年10月18日</a>　宁宗生日，召上殿，赐坐，作诗记其事。作品：十八日上寿退赐坐十九日贡院赐宴二十一日紫宸殿御筵即事七首。<div id='poem_252772' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252772'
