id='poem_sentence_2_252767_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252766' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252766' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252766?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年10月18日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252766_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252766'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252766'>十七年间作外臣，重来三日齿嘉宾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252766'>天颜不减当年泽，点检同朝共五人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252766_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252766'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252766_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年11月</a>　为吏部司封郎中，并兼国史院编修官、实录院检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年11月28日</a>　亡兄魏仲翁、亡弟魏景翁、魏少翁入葬，为撰墓志铭。作品：魏府君纯甫墓志铭。魏府君景翁少翁墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298037?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏府君纯甫墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十五年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298037")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298037_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298037'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298037'>昔我祖父生七子男，其第三处士府君和孙，以后同姓乡贡府君邦达；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298037_comment'></div>六曰承事府君孝璹，以后舅氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298037_comment'></div>既而伯、仲、季皆早世无嗣，我祖妣高孺人命承事以季子了翁为仲朝散府君某后，命处士以仲子仲翁与七季父乡贡府君孝璹之幼子越翁偕为季父某后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298037_comment'></div>时诸父惟乡贡在，以诚长者为乡里所称，饥寒丧疾凡不获者皆求焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298037_comment'></div>家事丛委，而我从父兄弟凡八人俱未昏嫁，头戢戢立，阃以内米盐靡密之事又重为季父忧，君为分其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298037_comment'></div>居数年季父卒，而君益不得自脱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298037_comment'></div>兄弟以次有室有家，门户日大，赀用浸屈，人犹以望于季父者望君，廪廪乎若有不克负荷之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298037_comment'></div>了翁时佥书西川判官，数以书勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298037_comment'></div>寻召入学省，于是越翁已卒，所与同爨惟景翁、文翁、少翁三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298037_comment'></div>其有志于学者，君为除塾聘师以成其志，或耆好之不齐，则委曲缝护，惟恐稍伤弟顺之义，用能食指数百，无一间言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298037_comment'></div>自叔父卒后凡二十馀年，而了翁与文翁得以一意宦学，无所挠夺，则君之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298037_comment'></div>少翁既先卒，嘉定十三年冬十月甲子君卒，后两月景翁亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298037_comment'></div>君年四十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298037_comment'></div>于是兄弟之仅存者二人，了翁出守潼川，文翁亦以举辟交至，将为令新繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298037_comment'></div>既各有简书之畏，而孀号稚泣又不无返顾之忧，于是又重叹吾兄三十年干理经缉之为功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298037_comment'></div>君取张氏，生子男辄夭，仅存者三女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298037_comment'></div>君卒后长女亦夭，嫂张氏以君之同产弟德翁之子某为君后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298037_comment'></div>又以君之治命营兆，得卜于某乡某里某山，而龟日未食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298037_comment'></div>厥十有五年，了翁再召为郎，秉笔太史氏，文翁以书来曰：「龟食于十有一月壬申矣，兄其为书」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298037_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298037_comment'></div>余不得与于临穴之哀也，莫为之识，将永负神明，乃移书新繁，俾代余治事笃匠，以是志诸圹，且为<span class='inlineComment2'>（后缺）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1298037_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1298038' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298038' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298038?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏府君景翁少翁墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年11月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298038")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298038_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298038'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298038'>呜呼，余尚忍志余二弟之葬邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298038_comment'></div>余叔父讳南寿，元配同郡樊氏，继室以承事郎赵某之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298038_comment'></div>生二子男：景翁字清甫，少翁字仪甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298038_comment'></div>清甫资谨实，不妄语，仪甫机悟多智虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298038_comment'></div>二人尝与里少年游，为所訹，几越足绳检外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298038_comment'></div>裁自觉即屏谢不与交，杜门扫室，沈思微吟，累岁间步上下不失尺寸，虽族姻有不见其面者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298038_comment'></div>前书后图，左炙右酒，弟兄相对醺如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298038_comment'></div>仪甫寻得疾，嘉定□年□月甲子卒，年三十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298038_comment'></div>清甫益自饬畏，食酒有节，抑远声色，惟义所当为者勇不可夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298038_comment'></div>不漫为言论，言辄近理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298038_comment'></div>余嘉其彊善而壮于礼也，会守潼川，将挈以自助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298038_comment'></div>既治任，忽夜半自执其手，呼从弟文翁炳烛视之，曰：「此谁手也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298038_comment'></div>曰：「兄左手也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298038_comment'></div>清甫恍然曰：「吾今日病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298038_comment'></div>吾有四体而忘其半，吾焉得长乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298038_comment'></div>急从眉山取医治之，则已成淫痹之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298038_comment'></div>厥明年五月□□，竟以此卒，年四十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298038_comment'></div>余仕中外二十馀年，畏涂危机，摇落齿发，每有下泽车、款段马之慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298038_comment'></div>呜呼，孰知其遂止此邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298038_comment'></div>清甫取姨之子吴氏，再取李氏，故佥书剑南西川判官惟正之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298038_comment'></div>生一女子，未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298038_comment'></div>一男子，尚志，则故奉议郎、知灵泉县高君载之仲子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298038_comment'></div>清甫未病时，以为同气所出，取为己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298038_comment'></div>仪甫取同郡韩某之女，生一男子，某，以疮失明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298038_comment'></div>呜呼，既不假之以年，厥子又弗克大有所振立，匪命也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298038_comment'></div>匪命也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298038_comment'></div>葬以今年十一月壬申，墓在□□乡□□里□山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298038_comment'></div>余方以尚书郎待罪史官，不得往视窆，乃为书此以纳诸圹。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1298038_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年12月8日</a>　僚友送诸葛安节赴湖北任，有诗。作品：腊日同舍郎即湖上送诸葛吏部赴湖北常平次汪吏部立中韵。<div id='poem_253303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253303?labeling=true' target='_blank'>腊日同舍郎即湖上送诸葛吏部<span class='inlineComment2'>（安节）</span>赴湖北常平次汪吏部<span class='inlineComment2'>（立中）</span>韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年12月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253303")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253303_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253303'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253303'>绣衣衔命去，祖帐为王留。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253303_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253303'>大舶满青镜，寒云明玉舟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253303_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253303'>岁馀官事省，蜡毕吏功休。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253303_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253303'>千古行藏意，梅边细讲求。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253303_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253303'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253303_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　是冬，蔺恭甫返蜀，有送行诗。作品：和杨汝明韵送蔺恭甫归永康（梦绕秦祠月半棱）<div id='poem_253220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253220?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和杨尚书<span class='inlineComment2'>（汝明）</span>韵送蔺恭甫归永康</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253220")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253220'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253220'>梦绕秦祠月半棱，归寻岷岭雪千层。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253220'>傥来富贵垤藏蚁，尽大科名笔误蝇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253220'>须验家庭真事业，更追简册淡交朋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253220'>他年再出为时用，莫遣功夫似不曾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253220'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253220_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　是冬，袁甫赠诗，咨以学事，并索奏劄录本。作品：袁都官甫同前韵赋二诗一章问易边赋唐律二章索奏劄录本。<div id='poem_253028' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253028' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253028?labeling=true' target='_blank'>袁都官<span class='inlineComment2'>（甫）</span>同前韵赋二诗一章问易边赋唐律二章索奏劄录本<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253028")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253028'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253028'>那得閒功咏雪晴，风光自解凑诗成。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253028'>须知精粗无非易，千古人心只一声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253028'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253028_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253027' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253027' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253027?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253027_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253027'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253027'>一天西雨又东晴，唤作阴晴雨不成。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253027'>朝睡着人浑未觉，鸣嘤枝上一声声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253027'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253027_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　是年，为李惟正撰墓志铭。作品：佥书剑南西川判官李君惟正墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298036' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298036' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298036?labeling=true' target='_blank'>佥书剑南西川判官李君惟正墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十五年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298036")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298036_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298036'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298036'>李君讳惟正，字中父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298036_comment'></div>其先本唐宗室，占名数于眉之彭山，后徙邛之蒲江，至君八世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298036_comment'></div>曾祖仲昉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298036_comment'></div>祖隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298036_comment'></div>父大受，该庆寿恩，累封承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298036_comment'></div>妣□氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298036_comment'></div>君少力学，诵书穷晨夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298036_comment'></div>长游成都学官，受知于仙井李公舜臣、遂宁杨公辅、公甲、成都勾公昌泰、眉山苏公诜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298036_comment'></div>李公亲授《尚书》，小杨公亦相与下上其议论，月书季考，率在颜行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298036_comment'></div>淳熙七年以后，凡四冠乡举，士之为科举者皆想闻风采，负笈从之游，邛蜀大家争走书币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298036_comment'></div>登绍熙四年进士，时年四十有一，犹以读书未广，调汉州户掾，凡待戍六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298036_comment'></div>时相豫章京中远镇蜀日知公为名进士，遗君书有曰：「处閒六年，人为子惜，吾欲用子，恨未有历官月日也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298036_comment'></div>嘉泰改元，蜀旱甚，君令仁寿，适雨旸协序，农用有秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298036_comment'></div>明年而禾麦甘露呈祥者七，邦人绘为《七瑞图》以侈其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298036_comment'></div>次任佥书大安军判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298036_comment'></div>逆曦变起，蹇蹶西归，辟地于县之长秋山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298036_comment'></div>大安距武兴六舍而近，太守安公濡迹以平贼，摄守杨公舍生而取义，学掾史君次秦以膏油熏目获逃伪聘，而君亦洁身以自全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298036_comment'></div>数人者为善不同，归于明分义以正人心，猗其盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298036_comment'></div>制置使杨公辅尝知君于学官，至是欲为君白大安时事，君谓此臣子常分，终不自名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298036_comment'></div>长沙吴公猎继至，俾摄崇庆府新津县令，又辟佥书剑南西川节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298036_comment'></div>先时君尝著书翼《论》《孟》，至是《翼孟》犹未成书，公退则竟其说，内外劳勚，遂得疾以卒，盖嘉定五年正月某甲子也，年六十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298036_comment'></div>临终无他语，独以九十之亲为念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298036_comment'></div>夫人乖阴阳之和致疾以贻亲忧者有矣，君乃以著书得疾，以不终养为无涯之戚，是可悲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298036_comment'></div>十五年十二月某甲子，其孤仲庄将葬君于县之善何乡至和里兑山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298036_comment'></div>葬有期，以状来，且曰：「先君子亡恙时，汲汲以赙丧殣死为念，至控于有司，严停尸缓葬之禁，其孤不能嗣服先训，乃贸于阴阳合祔之说，迄今始克襄奉，若又不得公铭，将无以显先人之魂」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298036_comment'></div>余悲其言，且念君在吾乡为先达，君校类省试，余在得中，荷君知遇若此，乃不果辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298036_comment'></div>公元妃同郡费氏，继室成都史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298036_comment'></div>一男，仲庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298036_comment'></div>五女，长适成都王序之，次魏景翁，次杨伯森，次樊梦镗，次费友龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298036_comment'></div>适杨、樊者今皆卒，王序之与余从弟亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298036_comment'></div>孙男一人，克昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298036_comment'></div>女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298036_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1298036'>士志利禄，诗书为媒，茍得所欲，弃如寒灰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298036_comment'></div>孰能如君，于役于仕，研磨编刬，之死靡二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298036_comment'></div>死亦奚憾，有子有书，谷尔嗣人，永念拮据。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1298036_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　是年，为亡友曹易撰墓志铭。作品：朝奉郎通判台州曹君易墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298040' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298040' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298040?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎通判台州曹君易墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十五年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298040")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298040_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298040'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298040'>嘉泰间，余佥书剑南西川节度府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298040_comment'></div>方是时，承平日久，民物阜蕃，公私交裕，虽卑官贱有司，簿书筐箧之外多可称纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298040_comment'></div>有曹君一致，时为干办四川茶马司，笃实而聪，艺于余，相友善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298040_comment'></div>余为国子正，又与偕至在所，山行水涉，于泳于游，交儆互发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298040_comment'></div>后十有九年，再点班行，访一致何官，曰：「尝通判台州」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298040_comment'></div>「焉在」，曰：「死矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298040_comment'></div>呜呼，其中若是而用若是邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298040_comment'></div>其子惟日寻过余曰：「吾先君子葬未有铭，惟先生之尝同寮也，是以不敢他请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298040_comment'></div>余乃叙之曰：一致名易，其先闽人，避五代乱徙温，居安固之许峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298040_comment'></div>曾祖文甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298040_comment'></div>祖迪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298040_comment'></div>父广居，累赠朝奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298040_comment'></div>母蔡氏，宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298040_comment'></div>一致少敏晤耆学，于书无所再读，下笔数千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298040_comment'></div>登淳熙八年进士第，调尉明之慈溪，教授开州、南安军，由四川茶属用举主改官知福州长溪县，主管江浙等路坑冶司文字，坐言者主管某观，起家通判台州，年六十八而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298040_comment'></div>始未第，已名闻太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298040_comment'></div>其再为校官，能使遐陬僻峤咸奋于业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298040_comment'></div>在蜀，惟买书数千卷以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298040_comment'></div>长溪豪猾屏息，闽人称之，方伯监司闻诸朝，录名中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298040_comment'></div>食祠官禄七年，泊然将终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298040_comment'></div>余知一致深，信其所挟负者得施于时，必有出于人，而仅行乎职业之间，又不合以退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298040_comment'></div>士遇则见于世，不用则亦已矣，所惜者非才也，时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298040_comment'></div>娶同县陈氏，赐号安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298040_comment'></div>子二人：惟日，迪功郎、新上饶县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298040_comment'></div>惟月，业进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298040_comment'></div>女适承信即、前监□海酒税平阳林湜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298040_comment'></div>一致之卒以十三年十月甲子晦，年六十有八，葬以十五年十有一月壬申，墓在许峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298040_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1298040'>皙乎动容，浩乎蕴中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298040_comment'></div>曷亨其禀，而塞彼逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298040_comment'></div>不惠于极，以彦我邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298040_comment'></div>松邪柏邪，右斯幽宫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1298040_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年1月20日</a>　是日，叶适卒，闻讯后，撰文哭之。作品：哭阁学叶侍郎适文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（彭东焕《魏了翁年谱》将此事置于5月后，据周梦江《叶适年谱（三）》改。）</span><div id='poem_1298161' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298161' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298161?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭阁学叶侍郎适文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1223年1月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298161")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298161_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298161'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298161'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298161_comment'></div>合散消息，阴阳之分，奚独于公，感深涕霣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298161_comment'></div>匪伤吾私，我忧孔殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298161_comment'></div>舟流莫届，行迈靡臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298161_comment'></div>匪学弗济，匪才弗乂，苟尚有存，毋间中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298161_comment'></div>如珠在渊，如玉在山，木石何知，枯润所关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298161_comment'></div>公居海滨，奚与人事，海内同气，视为荣悴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298161_comment'></div>门墙孤峻，基宇邃深，披剥传注，贯融古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298161_comment'></div>东南诸老，收声戢影，轩裳所忻，公力未慭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298161_comment'></div>前年为诗，寄我鹤山，去年贻书，喜我东还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298161_comment'></div>精神风采，英晤踔轶，言论风指，间见层出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298161_comment'></div>迨我造朝，公诗未赓，公书未报，公体不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298161_comment'></div>然犹私谓，人畸天耦，天如有意，则俾单厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298161_comment'></div>胡然藐藐，不吊我师，三朝旧人，所存几谁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298161_comment'></div>年开八秩，不为夭蹙，天骘斯文，宁有绝续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298161_comment'></div>独嗟人物，如千丈松，封植培养，匪一旦功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298161_comment'></div>日零月替，世道攸系，公知不知，我未有届。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1298161_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年1月25日</a>　任省试参详官，得蒋重珍等人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>　立春日，作诗与杨汝明唱和。作品：次韵杨尚书汝明立春。<div id='poem_252873' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252873' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵杨尚书<span class='inlineComment2'>（汝明）</span>立春<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1223年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_252873")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252873'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252873'>帽屋钗梁剪䌽新，谁知井底及池濒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252873'>只从阳月方中日，已作明年第一春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252873'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年3月</a>　迁太常少卿，仍兼国史院编修官、实录院检讨官。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='adbf30facefa4d32a07c3cfa91e4bc2c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("adbf30facefa4d32a07c3cfa91e4bc2c");'><span id='adbf30facefa4d32a07c3cfa91e4bc2c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1225')">1223-1225年</a>，46-48岁</div><div id='adbf30facefa4d32a07c3cfa91e4bc2c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年8月15日</a>　回临安复命。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>　是秋，友人杨汝明出知泸州，作诗送之。作品：送杨尚书汝明知泸州（断雁怀归芦叶秋）<div id='poem_253525' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253525' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253525?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送杨尚书<span class='inlineComment2'>（汝明）</span>知泸州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1223年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253525")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253525_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253525'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253525'>断雁怀归芦叶秋，离鸾感照菱花羞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253525'>五更呼儿拭残泪，淹速有命吾归休。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253525'>殿头三拜疏，去意浩莫收。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253525'>内前宣辞赐颜色，外间祖帐如云稠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253525'>往年长安道，笑谈取公侯。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253525'>白璧抵山车断流，黄金牣屋花满楼。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253525'>万钉围腰笏头带，廷绅啧啧悬两眸。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253525'>吁嗟此何物，白尽人间头。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253525'>二十年重来，见此勇退杨泸州。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253525'>平生志气未肯倾，卷怀归洗岷峨愁。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253525'>我往送之门，感事增百忧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253525'>匆匆别公上车去，怕鬼见笑君奚留。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253525'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_253525_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>　是秋，友人张午以直宝谟阁知眉州，临行，访魏了翁，了翁为书“言忠信，行笃敬”六字勉之，并作诗送之；同时，友人任逢出知汉州，与张午同行，亦作诗送之。作品：送任大卿知汉州张少卿午知眉州。<div id='poem_253515' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253515' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253515?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送任大卿<span class='inlineComment2'>（逢）</span>知汉州张少卿<span class='inlineComment2'>（午）</span>知眉州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1223年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253515")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253515_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253515'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253515'>冬卿怀绂行清秋，又送两卿归作州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253515'>寄声三州之父老，从今安用思故侯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253515'>朝廷择守重于昔，亲擢名卿畀华职。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253515'>两卿更是扬历深，元把麾来复麾出。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253515'>双骑紫马去朝天，羁金络月凌虹烟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253515'>逡巡似惜锦障泥，急流欲渡不肯前。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253515'>好官岂为多荣禄，两卿之归得吾欲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253515'>昨夜流星声撼屋，光芒照人不成宿。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253515'>起看北斗行云端，驱策四运无停鞭。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253515'>旁穿上透多风寒，九州霜露方漫漫。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253515'>人间分位各有制，行得一分一分是。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253515'>两卿去矣吾亦归，多为天公怜赤子。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253515'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_253515_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年11月5日</a>　上书论蜀边垦田事。作品：奏论蜀边垦田事。<div id='poem_1297223' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297223' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297223?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏论蜀边垦田事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1223年11月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297223")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297223_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297223'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297223'>臣曩蒙一再赐对，尝极陈三边利害之实，三虏强弱之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297223_comment'></div>虽蒙圣慈不以其狂瞽，曲赐容贷，而事会无穷，隐忧莫释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297223_comment'></div>每念古人守边备塞，可以纾民力而老敌情，惟务农积谷最为要道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297223_comment'></div>然而言之者烂熟，闻之者讪玩，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297223_comment'></div>以未尝精讲而力行之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297223_comment'></div>臣生长于蜀，虽幼习百氏，长游四方，于国中之事粗所素讲，然身履目击之久，真知而实见，则莫如父母之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297223_comment'></div>姑以蜀事为陛下陈之，则三边固可类推矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297223_comment'></div>臣比者窃闻四川制置司遵奉圣旨，措置利州路营屯田，委监司分任其责，见已置局经理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297223_comment'></div>朝廷明见万里之外，凡在边鄙，莫不踊跃思奋，犹有说焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297223_comment'></div>西边自罹虏寇已来，利东之大散、黄牛，利西之皂郊、水关等处，五六年间原堡多隳，地利悉弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297223_comment'></div>以故流人久不复业，谷粟日贵，兵民交弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297223_comment'></div>今若遽行屯田，则合葺边堡，合用兵耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297223_comment'></div>而边堡则诸将虑事谨审，欲及冬时伺乘机便，乃可修筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297223_comment'></div>兵耕则自顷年累减军额以来，以之坐守，尚多阙数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297223_comment'></div>矧今久戍之馀，难复再加役使，是屯田之事卒未可举，而边实之储无时而可议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297223_comment'></div>然则遂置之不复问，则岂不甚可惜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297223_comment'></div>臣窃谓有屯田，有垦田，二者相近而不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297223_comment'></div>垦田者何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297223_comment'></div>大兵之后，田多荒莱，如诸路有閒田，寺观有常住，皆当广行招诱，使人开垦，因可复业，则耕穫之实效，往往多于屯田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297223_comment'></div>盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1297223", 1297223, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>并边</span>之地，久荒不耕，则谷贵，贵则民散，散则兵弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297223_comment'></div>必地辟耕广则谷贱，贱则人聚，聚则兵强，此理所必然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297223_comment'></div>惟毋责屯田之虚名，而先究垦田之实利，则庶几矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297223_comment'></div>臣请试陈今日所当垦之田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297223_comment'></div>如利之西路，则皂郊之内湫池诸谷，水关之内崖石诸镇，利之东路则洋川之内青座华阳，凤集之内盘车诸岭，大率昔为膏腴，今成荒弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297223_comment'></div>至于金州近里，亦多有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297223_comment'></div>其田去虏或百里，或二三百里，有高山大陵之险可据，有原堡兵戍之援可恃，亦有贼骑从来所不曾至之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297223_comment'></div>若更得土豪之助，则指日可成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297223_comment'></div>今闻三路土豪之为忠义者，有愿自备费用，自治农器，自办耕牛，自用土人，各随便利，趁时开垦，及秋布种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297223_comment'></div>其间亦有愿略资官司给助者，亦自不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297223_comment'></div>若听其施工，略计所耕可数千顷，则明年此时便收地利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297223_comment'></div>纵官未立额，或量行输租，其潜裕兵民，使渐食贱粟，比之顷岁人苦斛贵，官苦籴贵，其利害岂不万万相绝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297223_comment'></div>何况耕田之民，又皆可用之兵，不数年间，边食既丰，兵丁亦足，万一有警，呼吸成聚，家自为守，人自为战，比于仓卒遣兵戍守，亦万不侔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297223_comment'></div>若是则虽无屯田之名而有屯田之实，无养兵之费而又可潜制骄蹇之兵，不惟不畏残虏，亦可不畏他盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297223_comment'></div>积以岁月，则今之垦田又可为后之屯田，今之耕夫可为后之精兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297223_comment'></div>救蜀大弊，为蜀永图，无出于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297223_comment'></div>顾何惮何惜，而久不为也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297223_comment'></div>或者之所虑不过寇抄耳，然虏尝荡劫我梁洋及五州，知无所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297223_comment'></div>今方与鞑夏相持，未必遽议再入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297223_comment'></div>目前可以暂纾，失今不为，则后悔无及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297223_comment'></div>臣比得蜀中近闻，兴元、金州两戎司探报，虏方科民牛具，开耕凤翔荒田，又闻西和一带边民觇知虏亦厌兵，愿各耕种，人自为守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297223_comment'></div>夫垦荒之利，虏犹知为之，而我不敢为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297223_comment'></div>原堡之固，虏知葺之，而我弗敢葺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297223_comment'></div>悠悠岁月，坐长寇雠，臣不知所以为策矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297223_comment'></div>比者关外连岁荒歉，今年荞麦大熟，边民无里外咸知耕播之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297223_comment'></div>闻朝廷施行屯田指挥下日，西和一带愿耕者云合风偃，动以千数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297223_comment'></div>人心若此，何可失也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297223_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈申命四川制置司，据目今已行，就令利路提转司因人心欲为之机，抚天时难失之运，先切选用土豪，渐渐耕垦细民所不能垦之田，则一寸有一寸之功，一日有一日之利，皆实效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297223_comment'></div>事半功倍，惟此时为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297223_comment'></div>若夫屯田，则先督诸将修葺原堡，候毕日并将极边荒田尽数耕播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297223_comment'></div>行之以渐，要之以久，不数年之间，边备隐然，以战则胜，以守则固，保蜀之策，无大于此，惟陛下财幸。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1297223_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年12月20日</a>　领客登介亭，分韵唱酬。作品：十二月二十日领客登介亭分韵得梅字。<div id='poem_253363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十二月二十日领客登介亭分韵得梅字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1223年12月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253363")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253363'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253363'>晨镳载宾从，披雾陟崔嵬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253363'>宇宙敛盈握，江湖大容杯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253363'>孱颜石丈人，玉立山之隈。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253363'>山前大第宅，马头涨黄埃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253363'>独此<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>抱昭质，萧然侣寒梅。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253363'>有客以问余，豫为地为雷。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253363'>雷出地为奋，何取于石哉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253363'>人以动为境，沄沄不知回。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253363'>而能介然存，神气斯有开。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253363'>相对得深省，欲归重徘徊。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253363'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_253363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_253363'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_253363_0'>⑴ 原作北，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_253363_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>　是年冬，陆九渊之子陆持之入朝，二人一见如故。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>　是年，应毛居正之请，为其父《增韵》作跋。作品：跋毛氏增韵。<div id='poem_1297773' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297773' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297773?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋毛氏增韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1223年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297773")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297773_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297773'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297773'>三衢毛氏《增韵》奏御之六十二年，其子居正义夫应大司成校正经籍之聘，始克锓梓于胄庠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297773_comment'></div>然人情异向，趋简厌烦，故校其始著尚多刊削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297773_comment'></div>世之不遇者，非特一《增韵》也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1297773_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>　是年，应宋伯熙之请，为其父撰墓志铭。作品：知嘉定府宋君之源墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298039' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298039' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298039?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知嘉定府宋君之源墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十七年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298039")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298039_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298039'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298039'>余昔守广汉，与什邡令宋君深之为寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298039_comment'></div>君贰吾州，又获升君之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298039_comment'></div>尝涕泣而语余曰：「昔者朱文公既铭吾先君子吏部之竁矣，子其为我书之，以诏来者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298039_comment'></div>余即铭词而知宋氏之种学累善非一日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298039_comment'></div>他日又出文公所与问答，曰中、曰性、曰知止、曰格物，此类凡数帖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298039_comment'></div>方文公以讲道云谷，四方学者皆归之，君之群从首得其《语》、《孟》、《中庸》、《大学》、小学诸书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298039_comment'></div>君名之源，字积之，文公更曰深之，所以期君者若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298039_comment'></div>吏部使湖南，刘子澄清之守衡阳，文公谓五峰胡子、南轩张子流风遗韵多在湖湘，俾君即刘访焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298039_comment'></div>至衡则又得永嘉戴少望，从而师之，由是闻见日广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298039_comment'></div>余尝因是而重有感焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298039_comment'></div>且吏部使闽，未遑他务，而访道于文公，又遣其三子从之游，彼之俗吏能知是乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298039_comment'></div>三子克承父志，数以经史疑义请问于文公，今见于书疏者凡五六往返，彼居骄习靡者能知是乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298039_comment'></div>三子年少初学，而文公已汲汲然翕受而循诱之，降心空臆，若施诸大徒高弟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298039_comment'></div>既又以见此道孤立，茍以是心至则未尝无诲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298039_comment'></div>余与君相得之深盖昉乎此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298039_comment'></div>后十年，其子伯熙来告曰：「吾父以嘉定十四年□月□日卒于官舍，今将以十七年□月□□日葬于成都县阳侯乡祖茔之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298039_comment'></div>昔者吾祖之墓，文公铭之而公书之，今父之铭不可以他请也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298039_comment'></div>会余造朝，谢未皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298039_comment'></div>明年，以书抵京请益力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298039_comment'></div>追惟曩事，乃不果辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298039_comment'></div>君系出唐宰相璟，今居成都双流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298039_comment'></div>曾祖杰，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298039_comment'></div>祖维，赠奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298039_comment'></div>父若水，绍兴三十年中进士乙科，淳熙中为秘书丞，兼吏部郎，终江西路转运判官，累赠中大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298039_comment'></div>母张氏、宇文氏，皆令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298039_comment'></div>君以父任入官，尉江原县，盐酒城固，司户茂州，令龙游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298039_comment'></div>会吴曦之乱，解印绶去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298039_comment'></div>贼平而返，当路者以名闻，诏进秩二等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298039_comment'></div>寻以荐举改官知什邡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298039_comment'></div>𭶚戎绎骚，部使者檄君摄通判嘉定府，未几通判邛州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298039_comment'></div>会威州阙使，君又往摄事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298039_comment'></div>所至吏畏，民尤怀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298039_comment'></div>初知龙州，秩满移洋州，未上又易雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298039_comment'></div>属南郑溃卒为乱，制置司命将将御前军讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298039_comment'></div>君谓皆故等夷，恐不可任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298039_comment'></div>黎、雅土兵号牌手者劲悍可用，请自将而前，卒赖其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298039_comment'></div>少保安公丙开宣威幕府，与参谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298039_comment'></div>始君未至雅，沙平夷盗边，既抚柔之，及君暂去则夷又来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298039_comment'></div>君倍道还州，夷厥角请命，君曰夷德无厌，不大治不创，绝其饷道，示必剪灭，复款塞矢死无犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298039_comment'></div>玺书褒嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298039_comment'></div>会宣抚司以调度急括隐户，拘绝产，郡民刘子壬托为奸利，君请身任其事，以免憸人倚法之弊，有志未遂而殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298039_comment'></div>始余观于汉儒，自谓得《易》于何师，受《书》于某氏，门标户列，窃亦病之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298039_comment'></div>及观申公诸生为守、尉、内史者，治官民皆廉节，王式诸生颂《礼》甚严，试诵有法，使诸博士惊问何师，信知师道之有益于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298039_comment'></div>如王、谢家子弟耳濡目染，气质随改，藉今稍佚前闻，于所尝言终不能忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298039_comment'></div>夫惟有不能忘也，则有触乎事而不可已，隐于心而不敢为者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298039_comment'></div>如君之得于师友者若此，使假之年，尊闻行知，庸可限其成邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298039_comment'></div>君娶洪雅孙氏，封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298039_comment'></div>二子男：伯熙，以遗泽补官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298039_comment'></div>次伯显，早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298039_comment'></div>女适迪功郎、监崇庆府酒税杨子泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298039_comment'></div>孙男女各一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298039_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_1298039'>万里寻师，难疑反覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298039_comment'></div>师不倦诲，友不虑渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298039_comment'></div>始初清明，旦昼未梏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298039_comment'></div>如彼苌楚，夭之沃沃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298039_comment'></div>循是初心，以御物欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298039_comment'></div>迹其所就，宁有绝续！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298039_comment'></div>我作铭诗，后人其谷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_57_1298039_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>　是年，潼川转运司重建东衙，役成，撰文记其事。作品：潼川转运司重建东衙记。<div id='poem_1297903' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297903' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297903?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潼川转运司重建东衙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1223年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297903")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297903_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297903'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297903'>遂宁为东川要藩，转运使治焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297903_comment'></div>异时使、副、判官参寘并列，不常厥居，乃数十年，始从省并，有判官则阙使副，故来者惟吾东廨岁修月蠲，吾用永存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297903_comment'></div>嘉定十有二年夏，兴元卒张福、莫简叛，灰利撇阆，抄果践遂，于是东廨之仅存者一二，乃皆燕游不急之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297903_comment'></div>使者移寓西廨，廨以久虚弗葺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297903_comment'></div>番阳汪侯来领使事，过故廨，徬徨踌躇，顾谓寮吏：「是观听攸属，久而弗复，不自羞乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297903_comment'></div>程事期，度有司，凡缗钱六万、米千石、丁匠四万六千九百，侯曰：「损无益之费，假以岁月，不溃于成乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297903_comment'></div>府人效实，梓匠授规，列辟闻风，毕献厥力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297903_comment'></div>昉十四年秋八月，讫十六年之四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297903_comment'></div>室寝堂奥、荣序门庑、筦库庖湢，以次备具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297903_comment'></div>至于宾掾有馆，文书有庋，府史有舍，视旧规寘殆将过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297903_comment'></div>役成，属余识其颠末，余怃然有感焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297903_comment'></div>国朝自削方镇，以诸道赋租、筦搉属之转运，以房廊地利、坊场河渡、二税则额付之郡守，操重制轻，易危就安，此权时之妙算也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297903_comment'></div>然权任虽分，财力犹裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297903_comment'></div>自熙宁分使搉利，郡守之权始削，脱有城郭甲兵之费，必以控于转运，往往滞吝不予，则违时而旷事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297903_comment'></div>政、宣之末，交受其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297903_comment'></div>至中兴以后，乃又以外司农护饷，而所谓转运者仅为催科团并之司，设官初意愈传愈失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297903_comment'></div>故封疆之吏无所于告，则城坏弗葺，兵阙弗治，祗以示弱诲奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297903_comment'></div>呜呼，流弊至此，宁得无以变通之乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297903_comment'></div>然而此盖在上者之所当知，而非居是官者之责，是官之责将簿书期会之问乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297903_comment'></div>非直然也，学校以明伦理，科举以兴德行，举刺以别淑慝，听断以达幽枉，凡皆典礼命讨之所关，为君师者建牧立监而分治之，所以共天命而系邦国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297903_comment'></div>今之分道置使，则犹立监之仅存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297903_comment'></div>况我祖宗惠绥远服，四蜀漕寄在今尤重，四时铨拟得以通掌，四选遇有空官，则听其举辟，假以移注，许之就权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297903_comment'></div>然则非所谓厚望隆指邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297903_comment'></div>若之何其称之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297903_comment'></div>非平心不能以烛理也，非虚己不能以尽下也，非刚毅有守无以塞侥倖也，非清淳履道无以厉廉隅也，非孜孜夙夜、恫瘝乃身则又不足以济登兹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297903_comment'></div>《诗》曰「职思其居」，谓尽瘁于所当事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297903_comment'></div>又曰「职思其外」，则虑广而志宏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297903_comment'></div>其乱曰「职思其忧」，盖无时而可也者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297903_comment'></div>余昔居是官也，尝以自厉而未之能信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297903_comment'></div>汪侯乾道枢使庄敏公之家，宦学远有端绪，兹事也，固已习闻而笃践之矣，尚敢诵闻以复于侯，将书诸石，与同志者共焉。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1297903'></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1297903_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1223&endYear=1223')">1223年</a>　是年，题写“毗庐庵”匾额。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年1月1日</a>　为秘书监，仍兼国史院编修官、实录院检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年2月</a>　友人张午在归蜀途中，行次芜湖而卒；应其子张世永之请，为撰墓志铭。作品：朝请大夫太府少卿直宝谟阁致仕张君午墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298043' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298043' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298043?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫太府少卿直宝谟阁致仕张君午墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆元年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298043")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298043_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298043'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298043'>嘉定十六年秋，朝散大夫、太府少卿张君年六十有九，引疾求谢，疏四五上，天子重违其意，诏直宝谟阁知眉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298043_comment'></div>君出国郊意甚得，在道犹喜见歌诗，厥明年春二月戊辰朔，舟次芜湖，寝疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298043_comment'></div>赴闻，诏赠朝请大夫，下所过郡国发民护其丧以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298043_comment'></div>于是孤世永叙次行实，求铭于史官魏了翁以葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298043_comment'></div>自惟得生最后，淳熙五年君举进士，了翁始试吏为西川佥书判官，君不屑管库之卑，获为寮焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298043_comment'></div>最后复侍同朝，为忘年交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298043_comment'></div>然则铭莫如了翁宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298043_comment'></div>张氏故晋人，晋别为韩，张氏相韩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298043_comment'></div>五世留文成侯，八世为司空皓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298043_comment'></div>生纲，为广陵守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298043_comment'></div>广陵葬犍为武阳，今黄龙赤水，大墓岿然，子孙守坟有千馀年不去者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298043_comment'></div>广陵三世孙为广陵守，则崇宁张氏之祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298043_comment'></div>名德相望，蜀之世其家者莫先焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298043_comment'></div>君之曾大父孟程，大父弼直，再世登科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298043_comment'></div>曾大父官至左朝散大夫，赠朝议大夫，大父官至左朝请郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298043_comment'></div>考浒，仅改宣教郎，然二子皆以儒术世其科，赠中奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298043_comment'></div>配临邛韩氏，赠令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298043_comment'></div>君讳午，字智夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298043_comment'></div>事亲不忍一日去左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298043_comment'></div>父没，事伯兄申尤谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298043_comment'></div>资简重，诺呐呐不出诸口，而遇肯綮立解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298043_comment'></div>始调尉新繁，以外艰不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298043_comment'></div>再调尉籍县，监司檄摄洪雅、龙游二县，又两易江原尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298043_comment'></div>既还，郡守寘幕府，凡三书考而食籍县之粟，才半年为令贵平，辟干办潼川路转运司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298043_comment'></div>以内艰去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298043_comment'></div>除丧，堂差监成都府军资库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298043_comment'></div>用举主改通直郎、知宣化县，通判隆州，知广安军，又知达州，召为工部郎中，迁兵部，历军器监、太府少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298043_comment'></div>居官催科仅足即捐以遗民，曰赋有常数而求赢焉，是厉民也，与其无赫赫名而不失抚字之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298043_comment'></div>公退，读周公、孔、孟氏书，曰：「是扶世立教，可一日不亲乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298043_comment'></div>宣化以军兴调民出庸，县为钱三千万，当四年之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298043_comment'></div>君召里民，俾自推择，秋毫不出吏手，见谓平允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298043_comment'></div>吴曦叛，谒守薛九龄，勉以讨贼，自募士即剑外伺缓急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298043_comment'></div>首得平贼诏书，驰白泸、叙守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298043_comment'></div>其后薛侯以有备蒙赏，君谓此臣子常分，终不自言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298043_comment'></div>广安有永讼怙势者，君戢之不少假，反见谮于大制置安公，檄君上印，君即诣台劈析中理，安不能夺，命反厥次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298043_comment'></div>寻以制置使董君居谊属理讼牒，事情俱得，上姓名于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298043_comment'></div>未报，徙知达州，诏任满赴行在奏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298043_comment'></div>君入对，首言君德三事，曰仁、曰明、曰武；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298043_comment'></div>次论蜀祸已极，愿早择帅臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298043_comment'></div>寻因转对，又极论军政之弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298043_comment'></div>轮对言：「朝廷未尝主和，人乃意其必和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298043_comment'></div>未尝讳兵，人乃以为深讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298043_comment'></div>士心疑沮，内治作辍，愿明国论，以一人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298043_comment'></div>推诚于刚方之士，毋以虚文进之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298043_comment'></div>致审于剀切之言，毋以文具听之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298043_comment'></div>其间又论内帑、版曹之弊及三边制阃、山东归附甚悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298043_comment'></div>上曰「内帑诚不及向来」，又曰「蜀中兵火可念」，又曰「事当虑后」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298043_comment'></div>上临朝渊嘿，至是为公改容，陛楯者皆愕眙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298043_comment'></div>其后又以兵部对，论蕲黄虏祸、三边功赏，语多激切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298043_comment'></div>方骎骎向用，而归志浩不可挽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298043_comment'></div>早岁与淡斋王公灼游，为文平实典雅，有家集二十卷、《皇雅铙歌》二卷、《西汉评》五卷、古律诗五卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298043_comment'></div>元配某郡王氏，知昌州拱辰之女，继室同郡苏氏，皆赠宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298043_comment'></div>今夫人郫县宇文氏，封宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298043_comment'></div>男一人，即世永，修职郎、广安军岳池县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298043_comment'></div>女三人，长适进士惠脩，次适文林郎、新奏辟夔州路提刑司干办公事章夷清，季适进士黄褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298043_comment'></div>适惠、黄者亦先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298043_comment'></div>孙男一人，牛僧，当以公致仕恩补官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298043_comment'></div>孙女二人，外孙男女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298043_comment'></div>世永卜宝庆元年三月甲子，以治命葬君于本县至德山庾冈之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298043_comment'></div>公且去国，访了翁于休沐舍，请以「言忠信、行笃敬」二语书诸深衣之绅，了翁敬诺而篆焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298043_comment'></div>迨启手足，曰：「以是歛我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298043_comment'></div>然则君所质行果在是与，奚之死而弗忘也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298043_comment'></div>是可以铭，铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_1298043'>言忠信，行笃敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298043_comment'></div>斯二者，天所命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298043_comment'></div>言若易，圣犹病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298043_comment'></div>嗟张君，服是训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298043_comment'></div>非此绅，目不瞑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298043_comment'></div>谁无死，毙于正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298043_comment'></div>我作铭，表终令。</div><div id='poem_sentence_68_1298043_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年3月</a>　郑损任四川制置使，作诗送之。作品：送郑侍郎损四川制置分韵得盖字。<div id='poem_253530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253530' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253530?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送郑侍郎<span class='inlineComment2'>（损）</span>四川制置分韵得盖字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253530")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253530'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253530'>恭惟皇上心，纳纳天同大。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253530'>明命辍禁游，往抚蜀彫瘵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253530'>蜀山在何许，斜阳点鸦背。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253530'>家住扶桑东复东，却望斜阳铁山外。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253530'>金头奴子扼熙秦，银州兵马冲兰会。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253530'>使我六年望烽火，征人穿空枕戈祋。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253530'>使我千里致钟石，居人轑釜泣粗粝。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253530'>县官无蓄租，百姓无藏盖。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253530'>上有苍苍之高天，卒然叫呼不可待。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253530'>阃外万戚休，只以一身佩。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253530'>我于公行无所赠，筮言得咸为艮兑。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253530'>艮山本中虚，兑泽乃上溉。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253530'>独于九四论心体，而以朋思为障碍。<div id='poem_sentence_12_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_253530'>愿公书此象，长于卧兴对。<div id='poem_sentence_13_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_253530'>蜀道青天蜀平地，君侯一心即难易。<div id='poem_sentence_14_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_253530'>思耕亭前先郑碑，更看他年后郑记。<div id='poem_sentence_15_253530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_253530'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_253530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是春，应蒋重珍之请，为其母撰写墓志铭。作品：顾夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298042' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298042' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298042?labeling=true' target='_blank'>顾夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十七年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298042")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298042_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298042'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298042'>嘉定十有六年夏五月戊申，蒋重珍举进士第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298042_comment'></div>故事，京师给驺哄，自端门骑至期集所，侯王大第供帐，左右观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298042_comment'></div>时重珍迎侍母顾夫人于京，下马称寿，都人荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298042_comment'></div>留两月馀，授佥书建康军节度判官，御其母以归于常之无锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298042_comment'></div>方荣闻四驰，惕然如将弗胜，韬煇潜实，益求其可愿者，窃所器爱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298042_comment'></div>明年重珍以书来曰：「走也不天，以祸吾母，曾不及豆区之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298042_comment'></div>呜呼，尚忍言之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298042_comment'></div>吾母馀十岁，鞠于外家管氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298042_comment'></div>一日父母家绝粮，母祝发而号曰：『天乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298042_comment'></div>吾亲之未慭也，此发其有售乎』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298042_comment'></div>命粥于市，得百金以给炊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298042_comment'></div>自是父母家生理浸苏，若有相之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298042_comment'></div>迨归我先君，事大母轩氏，乐而忘其疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298042_comment'></div>我诸父七人，或夭或贫，先君不能自振，假馆于人，吾母赞治室事，既备且戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298042_comment'></div>能诵习五经、《论》、《孟》，亲以授重珍，有关于孝义则伸而复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298042_comment'></div>重珍既孤，诸父给以饘粥，母治丝枲，取毫末之赢以衣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298042_comment'></div>尝骤寒无衾，重珍觉而温如，则吾母纫纩以覆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298042_comment'></div>且语曰：『保汝以奉先祀也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298042_comment'></div>重珍泣数行下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298042_comment'></div>孀孤之人，不堪其苦，或以赀訹重珍为之子，而夺母志以配累举得官者，吾母叱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298042_comment'></div>吾先君之未泯，则母之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298042_comment'></div>重珍年十七，为人授小学，有襦鹑结，忍敝以待束脩之入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298042_comment'></div>他日吾母持敝襦于诸父曰：『愿藏此，俾无忘贫贱时』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298042_comment'></div>有欲妻重珍以女，室庐田土皆具，母谓幼孤得不死者，诸父之力，谨毋他徙，乃固谢焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298042_comment'></div>重珍年四十馀，始获齿名于进士籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298042_comment'></div>冬至之前日，亲党贺吾母生辰，母曰：『吾雅惮宴娭，今不听汝为之，后将有悔』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298042_comment'></div>重珍艴然以疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298042_comment'></div>季冬得疾，月正元日而卒，身后惟破楮败衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298042_comment'></div>呜呼天乎，使吾母居约蹈困而曾不食子之报也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298042_comment'></div>今将以三月庚申葬于谢堰之原，祔先君兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298042_comment'></div>重惟昔试礼部，尝以文字受知于先生，由是幸有录于门，心授神予，非他人面交势合比也，墓中之石不可以它属」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298042_comment'></div>某尝闻之国人，曰重珍之父南式资方严，为学该赡，不事举子业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298042_comment'></div>其卒也，重珍方生十年，顾夫人持家教子有仪法，读书至男子由右、妇人由左诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298042_comment'></div>尤喜言李氏断臂事，以为妇人义当若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298042_comment'></div>所居虽容膝，而检防内外，凛不可越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298042_comment'></div>然则今于重珍之请也，曷敢不诺！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298042_comment'></div>顾氏晋散骑常侍、赠侍中荣之后，世居建业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298042_comment'></div>入国朝，徙毗陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298042_comment'></div>曾大父某，大父某，父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298042_comment'></div>子男一人，即重珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298042_comment'></div>女适李大年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298042_comment'></div>孙女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298042_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1298042'>先儒有言，妇适不再。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298042_comment'></div>妇适而再，饥寒之害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298042_comment'></div>然饥寒之事小，而失节之罪大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298042_comment'></div>此岂妇之责也，抑为士也之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298042_comment'></div>自义理之不竞，渺世途之焉届。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298042_comment'></div>虽本无饥寒之迫，已莫知此身之爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298042_comment'></div>伟哉夫人，七十九载，困穷堙阨，而若是介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298042_comment'></div>百挫一忻，亦莫之待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298042_comment'></div>瑑铭幽宫，其永勿坏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1298042_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年4月20日</a>　与友人游西湖，分韵唱酬。作品：四月二十日领客寻龙井前盟以雨阴晴未定不果往买舟下西湖步至玉泉观鱼分韵得东字。<div id='poem_253385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_10_253385_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年6月1日</a>　除起居舍人，兼国史院编修官、实录院检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年6月5日</a>　皇孙铨生，进劄称贺。作品：贺皇子国公诞生皇孙劄子。<div id='poem_1297529' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297529' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297529?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺皇子国公诞生皇孙劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年6月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297529'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297529'>恭审帝胄绵休，文孙毓秀，宸欢允洽，民气咸和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297529_comment'></div>恭惟皇子国公迪德温恭，秉心端厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297529_comment'></div>佩陆离而中度，玉孚尹而含辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297529_comment'></div>仰承燕翼之谋，爰叶熊占之梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297529_comment'></div>世之不显，益隆周室之本支；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297529_comment'></div>国以永存，丕启汉家之苗裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297529_comment'></div>有室大竞，无疆惟休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297529_comment'></div>某叨侍严宸，幸逢熙旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297529_comment'></div>覃吁载路，已觇嶷嶷之姿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297529_comment'></div>蕃衍盈升，更兆绳绳之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297529_comment'></div>厥为忻跃，罔既敷棻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1297529_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年6月8日</a>　生日，友人赠诗词，作启答谢。作品：生日谢人惠诗词。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年6月</a>　友人盛申之出知永康，乡人设宴送之，分韵赋诗赠行。作品：六月十四日后殿侍立新永康太守成嘉甫朝辞奏事词气恳恻上为嘉纳尝随笔纪其事今乡人祖帐分韵得西字遂书以赠行。<span class='inlineComment2'>（彭东焕《魏了翁年谱》作成申之。）</span><div id='poem_253374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253374?labeling=true' ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253374")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253374'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253374'>严精伐鼓趋晨鸡，龙媒戒仗喑无嘶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253374'>宰臣奏事左墄降，史臣曳履东阶跻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253374'>永康太守臣申之，上殿音吐干虹蜺。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253374'>曰臣前领大农簿，试郡得请今当西。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253374'>鞑人求通反其使，金人匿壮招吾携。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253374'>勿言残金继前好，将贰鞑靼摇青齐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253374'>时将有反事有间，玩岁愒日忧噬脐。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253374'>皇帝瞿然曰是是，伸颐颔首天听低。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253374'>贴黄更请磔叛将，褒恤死事不可稽。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253374'>陛下亦闻西事否，昔号险阻今多蹊。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253374'>散关皂郊已平地，白环黄牛犹溃堤。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253374'>分台列阃越秦视，体统涣散人情睽。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253374'>上云私意误大事，谆谆切切重提撕。<div id='poem_sentence_12_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_253374'>申之又言故臣丙，昔尝有德于坤倪。<div id='poem_sentence_13_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_253374'>上顾指臣曰安丙，申之顿首如含悽。<div id='poem_sentence_14_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_253374'>纷纷交情异生死，独此推本祛群迷。<div id='poem_sentence_15_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_253374'>臣时张拱立帝傍，螭头恨无千赫蹄。<div id='poem_sentence_16_253374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_253374'>为王留行力不足，戴目处此羞梁鹈。<div id='poem_sentence_20_253374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年7月24日</a>　友人杨约生日，赋诗庆贺。作品：杨仲博生日。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年闰8月16日</a>　上书请祠。作品：丐祠申省状。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年闰8月21日</a>　再上书请祠。作品：再乞祠申省状。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年闰8月21日</a>　再上书史弥远请祠。作品：再乞祠上史丞相。<div id='poem_1297379' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297379' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297379?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再乞祠上史丞相<span class='inlineComment2'>（弥远）</span>书<span class='inlineComment2'>（闰月二十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年闰8月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297379")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297379_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297379'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297379'>某前日自力控祠，出于冒昧，大丞相海涵地负，姑逭谴何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297379_comment'></div>特为敷陈，未赐俞允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297379_comment'></div>自应退听造命，而危厉所迫，日就衰槁，惧鸣号少缓，将有先犬马填沟壑之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297379_comment'></div>敢据丹忱，上冀矜念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297379_comment'></div>某起身寒门，少所疾苦，是以病出意外，不谙药石之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297379_comment'></div>始初作寒，骤投刚剂，丹砂雄附，错杂并进，务欲驱除宿冷，而变證作热，极天下冰寒之药无不备尝，生犀鳖甲不足以涤骨髓之烦，三黄二胡不足以解表里之燥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297379_comment'></div>加复喘嗽上逆，腥涎秽沫，昼夜数盂，四旬不得就枕，群医无所用力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297379_comment'></div>每一热至，则诸證交作，气息闷耗不苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297379_comment'></div>自抱病以来，一食不能以一合，肌肉消尽，骨立可骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297379_comment'></div>深念孤逖之踪，向者一去修门，垂二十年，分绝荣望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297379_comment'></div>忽叨收召，再忝朝迹，两岁之间，五叨迁擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297379_comment'></div>诚愿毕精竭力，图报万分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297379_comment'></div>顾病势日侵，颓龄难制，愿大丞相动心兴念，曲为开陈，赐以骸骨，使归故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297379_comment'></div>若幸保馀生，则尚有图报之日，或即没于地，亦无忘结草之报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297379_comment'></div>迫切之情，无由面愬，伸笺引领，魂目俱销。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1297379_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年9月</a>　为起居郎，仍兼国史院编修官、实录院检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是年秋冬间，应友人真德秀之请，为撰《潭州惠民仓记》<div id='poem_1297900' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297900' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297900?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潭州惠民仓记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297900")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297900_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297900'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297900'>嘉定之季年，潭州守臣真德秀言：「所领州生齿阜蓄，地力不足以给，率仰谷于商舟，舟至之不时则上下狼狈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297900_comment'></div>虽有常平义仓之蓄，而令非凶岁毋发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297900_comment'></div>顾守地于斯，使民盻盻然无以谷其腹，教恶乎施？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297900_comment'></div>臣窃见淳化中张咏守成都，以市估准田税，使民岁输米于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297900_comment'></div>明年春籍城中之民，粜以元直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297900_comment'></div>其后王曙、韩亿父子、文彦博、胡宗愈诸贤又相与修其法而守之，至于今不能易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297900_comment'></div>臣尝视诸故府，有秋税米，合正耗凡五万馀石，石出钱四千二百以给郡用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297900_comment'></div>臣请得如成都故事，断自嘉定十六年，使民输米，贮之别仓，榜曰『惠民』，蠲槩量之嬴，罢转输之费，较以输泉轻重略等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297900_comment'></div>于公家既无损，而粜之日自二月讫七月，正新陈未接，民苦贵籴，而计口给券，视时直加损焉，则于一城生聚为利甚博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297900_comment'></div>况又什其民以相保受，有丽于罚则毁券住籴，保受者同之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297900_comment'></div>盖非特谷之也哉，又将使休戚察其奇邪，而教寓焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297900_comment'></div>既又疏其事以上于尚书，而以时属记于某，曰：「是职分当然，毋庸书，然吾患来者之不吾悉而莫我继也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297900_comment'></div>某慨然曰：公无患焉，仁义之心，岂独贤者有之而他人不然也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297900_comment'></div>在《易》之《临》：「泽上有地」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297900_comment'></div>其象曰：「君子以教思无穷，容保民无疆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297900_comment'></div>夫地临泽上，切近而相滋，君子临民之象也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297900_comment'></div>君子之于民类也，而出乎类以长之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297900_comment'></div>茍是心之常存，则尔过予责，尔痾予恫，其欲教训而容保之也，亹亹乎，洋洋乎，有自不可已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297900_comment'></div>吾将见是法之行，人心所同，有推行而无沮挠，有变通而无改更也，又将见仁逊之兴、争讼之息自是法始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297900_comment'></div>民惟恐法之不久也，而谁以易之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297900_comment'></div>或者不过曰郡少府之仰给于泉其来以久，不知以粟易泉固无乏于供也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297900_comment'></div>输泉始冬而尽春夏，粟之期会亦莫不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297900_comment'></div>其或粜未竟而去官，则粟亦泉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297900_comment'></div>古人论事惟义之是否，而利害所不可计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297900_comment'></div>今始以利害计之，则亦见其为利尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297900_comment'></div>仆蜀人也，尝仕于成都，于忠定之法盖身履目击之，阅祀二百，莫之有改，则以考诸义而叶，虽千载一心也，公何患焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297900_comment'></div>公名某，字希元，建安人，以正学直道历中外几二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297900_comment'></div>其守潭也，崇社修学，复税酒，兴社仓，营义冢，行和籴米，建赈惠局，凡以利民者无不为也，敢并记之以谷来者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1297900_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年12月27日</a>　宰执请宁宗谥于南郊，作诗记其事。作品：十二月二十七日宰执率百官请大行皇帝谥于南郊曰宁宗纪事诗四首。<div id='poem_252765' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252765' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252765?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十二月二十七日宰执率百官请大行皇帝谥于南郊曰宁宗纪事<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年12月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_252765")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252765_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252765'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252765'>骑至南郊晓色苍，须臾陪拜俨成行。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252765_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252765'>两班吉带罗朱紫，惟有斋官服冕裳<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252765_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252765'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252765_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_252765'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_252765_0'>⑴ 自注：丞相当奏告，奉常官三员行事。朱侍郎著读谥，赵户部汝适、范礼部指奉谥匣外，除此七人者衣祭服，馀官并公裳吉带。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_252765_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_252764' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252764' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252764?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年12月27日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252764_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252764'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252764'>礼属群趋上宰前，两郎奉册侍臣宣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252764_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252764'>坛前拜跪升烟罢，随处群工署奏篇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252764_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252764'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252764_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252763' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252763' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252763?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年12月27日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252763_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252763'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252763'>遇雨权将屋作坛，昊天神主位中閒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252763'>吉凶异制今参用，今古殊宜亦并班。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252763'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252763_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252762?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年12月27日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252762'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252762'>却向慈云岭上还，梅花合道日笼山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252762'>马蹄十里摇归梦，疑在小园松竹间。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252762'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252762_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是冬，杜孝严出知遂宁，赋诗送行。作品：送杜兵侍孝严以华文阁待制知遂宁府（敝貂冲寒马声湿）<div id='poem_253523' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253523' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253523?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送杜兵侍<span class='inlineComment2'>（孝严）</span>以华文待制知遂宁府</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253523")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253523_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253523'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253523'>敝貂冲寒马声湿，馀杭门外送归客。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253523'>去年曾送六朱幡<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：杨泸州、任汉州、张眉州。）</span>，今年又送四千石<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：成永康及杜。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253523'>更有三令相后先<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，采不盈筐去如织。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253523'>濛濛风雪人气薄，漠漠烟尘剑花蚀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253523'>独立长空倚天壁，几度乞归归未得。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253523'>贰卿荦荦天与姿，不肯随俗相脂韦。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253523'>声名早落虞舜聪，霞裾云佩明春晖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253523'>虞舜已死不复返，云埋苍梧天地悲。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253523'>万物兴歇各有期，人生出处宁无时。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253523'>揽裾结佩下霄汉，苟得吾志官无卑。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253523'>史臣昨侍玉皇案，爱民一语何孜孜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253523'>愿公领此深长思，民力竭矣谁其知。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253523'>更须同志共此事，则公且去吾亦归。<div id='poem_sentence_12_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_253523'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_253523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_253523'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_253523_0'>⑴ 自注：是时，有同时得县者杨伯洪、杨仲博、杜阳安。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_253523_0'>⑵ 自注：公陛辞日，上云：卿到蜀中，切宜勉力爱民。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_253523_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是冬，应李巽宗之请，为妻舅李嘉量撰墓志铭。作品：承议郎通判叙州李君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298083' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298083' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298083?labeling=true' target='_blank'>承议郎通判叙州李君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298083")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298083_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298083'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298083'>余自昏于成都杜氏，道双流，必李氏乎馆，李则余之妻之舅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298083_comment'></div>其曾大父文显，大父庾，为里善人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298083_comment'></div>父大年，承议郎致仕，累赠中散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298083_comment'></div>娶同郡勾氏，赠令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298083_comment'></div>中散有六子，长嘉谋，为宗正丞，世号息斋先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298083_comment'></div>与仲氏嘉猷，同举乾道二年进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298083_comment'></div>其第五曰嘉量，是为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298083_comment'></div>君生之三月而丧母，中散念之，以属宗正教焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298083_comment'></div>宗正博通经子百氏，而深于《易》，晚得专气致柔之说，以《阴符》《参同》，博考精玩，笃信不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298083_comment'></div>君亲闻其说而好焉，余尝与之语，虽不尽合，迨嘉定十五年春余将造朝，过君于里舍，君曰：「吾尝为子诵所闻，子不吾予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298083_comment'></div>余以求诸《易》，盈天地间，致用之要，无越乎《坎》《离》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298083_comment'></div>而大较则体性相须，精神互足，体不立则性无以行，精不蕴则神无以发」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298083_comment'></div>余心异之，因相与推明本始，究极分际，勉之以圣贤之正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298083_comment'></div>盖语移日不能休，以是始信君之所蓄者厚，而世不能以尽知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298083_comment'></div>十七年冬，君之子巽宗忽以书抵余于京，曰：「先君以四月□日启手足于遂，不肖孤无以显扬厥考，今葬有日，敢以识墓为请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298083_comment'></div>呜呼，其信然邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298083_comment'></div>将俟后期以追前语，而忍铭君之墓也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298083_comment'></div>君字平仲，资醇实，不事华饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298083_comment'></div>宗正为淳熙朝士，旧闻遗献尚多接识，而君得周旋其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298083_comment'></div>况以尚书郎勾公昌泰为之舅，刘文节公光祖为姊之夫，闻见熏濡，趋向端正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298083_comment'></div>会科举不利，以宗正任为迪功郎，监嘉定府酒务、遂宁府司法、潼川府通泉县令，主管夔州路安抚司机宜文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298083_comment'></div>用举主，改宣教郎、知汉州绵竹县，通判遂宁府、叙州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298083_comment'></div>始为掾于遂，议法平恕，遂有米粟之征，责输赢馀而不察其沽滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298083_comment'></div>君请覈沽滥而罢赢馀，兵民两利焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298083_comment'></div>明年当输，民诣郡愿得李司法董其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298083_comment'></div>有为征官死不能归者，为经理其丧，二女亦各有适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298083_comment'></div>通泉揵江岁靡公私之力，而民懔懔不适居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298083_comment'></div>君躬任其劳，筑事坚久，至于今称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298083_comment'></div>绵竹邑大赋繁，吏缘为奸，比豪猾而愚善良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298083_comment'></div>君请覈登载、授券剂皆无过一日，厥明以方揭之。<div class='inline'
