id='poem_sentence_29_1298083_comment'></div>凡已输而未获券者，使告焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298083_comment'></div>或疑其不可继，公去之日视始至逾笃，以是民无横赋，官有馀蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298083_comment'></div>学校桥梁之政，皆以次举行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298083_comment'></div>最后在遂宁更历既多，财决滋敏，前后漕使者皆俾摄属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298083_comment'></div>君以郡事辞，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298083_comment'></div>迨转丞叙南，喜曰：「此吾兄所尝愒茇也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298083_comment'></div>会以职事之普，道暍，归而得疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298083_comment'></div>属纩之日，尚区画官事家政如平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298083_comment'></div>年六十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298083_comment'></div>君为吏三十年，居室衣食不替儒素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298083_comment'></div>与人交，平实而可久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298083_comment'></div>所居官皆以职事见知其长，固也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298083_comment'></div>而吴德夫猎、崔正子与之未有雅素，争先辟举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298083_comment'></div>杨恭惠公镇蜀，径上其姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298083_comment'></div>迨选部关移，乃克知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298083_comment'></div>其恬于荣利，大抵若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298083_comment'></div>元配唐氏，继室以文，皆赠孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298083_comment'></div>子男二人，长巽宗，次炳宗，以后宗正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298083_comment'></div>女适迪功郎、利州昭化县尉家寅翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298083_comment'></div>孙男一人，思问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298083_comment'></div>孙女二人，外孙男女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298083_comment'></div>葬以宝庆二年□月□日，墓在新津县会同乡艮山之原，祔宗正墓右，从治命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298083_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1298083'>居焉而熙熙，出焉而怡怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298083_comment'></div>脱略于姑可已，而黾勉于所当为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298083_comment'></div>其晚而有得于己也，盖有人所不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298083_comment'></div>知不知奚伤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298083_comment'></div>视此铭诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1298083_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是冬，友人杨约出知什邡，赋诗送行。作品：送杨仲博约归蜀。<div id='poem_253524' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253524' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253524?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送杨仲博<span class='inlineComment2'>（约）</span>归蜀</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253524")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253524_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253524'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253524'>江头送客雪初晴，木叶脱尽山空明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253524'>天高地迥著行客，昂昂野鹤相似清。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253524'>晓空霜唳三两声，扶木枝上阳乌惊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253524'>岂无枯蚓若残粒，宁肯俛首鸡鹜争。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253524'>伊人伊人此为客，不是伊人招不得。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253524'>固有比邻不往来，那能万里相追逐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253524'>泸涪江上初戒舟，荆江夏簟赤壁秋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253524'>长江镜滑无纤滓，致君肝鬲尔许侔。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253524'>竟成何事客先发，赢得满头桩岁月<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作星星发）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253524'>丈夫身在复何忧，莫作无相见期别。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253524'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_253524_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是年，友人毛居正著《六经正误》，为作序。作品：毛义甫居正六经正误序。<div id='poem_1297594' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297594' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297594?labeling=true' target='_blank'>毛义甫<span class='inlineComment2'>（居正）</span>六经正误序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297594")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297594_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297594'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297594'>自秦政灭学，经籍道熄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297594_comment'></div>迨隶书之作，又举先王文字而并弃之，承讹袭舛，愈传愈失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297594_comment'></div>蔡伯喈书石经，有意正救之，旋亦焚荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297594_comment'></div>张序所见石经，又不知果为蔡本否，其所引石经文多失字体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297594_comment'></div>魏晋以来，则又厌朴拙，耆姿媚，随意迁改，义训混淆，漫不可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297594_comment'></div>重以避就名讳，如「操」之为「掺」，「昭」之为「佋」，此类不可胜举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297594_comment'></div>况唐人统承西魏，尤为谬乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297594_comment'></div>陆德明、孔颖达同与登瀛之选，而《释文》与《正义》自多背驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297594_comment'></div>至开元新书五经，则又以俗字易旧文，如以「颇」为「陂」、以「平」为「便」之类，又不可胜举，而古书益邈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297594_comment'></div>五季而后，镂版翻印，经籍之传虽广，而点画义训谬误自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297594_comment'></div>本朝胄监经史多仍周旧，今故家往往有之，而与俗本无大相远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297594_comment'></div>南渡草创，则仅取版籍于江南诸州，与京师承平监本大有径庭，与潭、抚、闽、蜀诸本互为异同，而监本之误为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297594_comment'></div>柯山毛居正义甫以其先人尝增注《礼部韵》，奏御于阜陵，遂又校雠增益，以申明于宁考更化之日，其于经传亦既博览精择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297594_comment'></div>嘉定十六年春，会朝廷命胄监刊正经籍，司成谓无以易义甫，驰书币致之，尽取六经三传诸本，参以子史字书，选粹文集，研究异同，凡字义音切，毫釐必校，儒官称叹，莫有异辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297594_comment'></div>旬岁间刊修者凡四经，乃犹以工人惮烦，诡窜墨本以绐有司，而版之误字实未尝改者什二三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297594_comment'></div>继欲修《礼记》、《春秋》三传，义甫以病目移告，其事中辍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297594_comment'></div>或者谓纵令尽正其误，而诸本不同，何所取證？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297594_comment'></div>岂若录其正误之籍而刊传之，俾后学得以参考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297594_comment'></div>余观其书，念今之有功于经者，岂无《经典释文》、《六经文字》、《九经字样》之等？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297594_comment'></div>然此书后出，殆将过之，无不及者，其于后生晚学祛蔽寤疑为益不浅，因纵臾其成而序识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297594_comment'></div>《书》曰「若升高必自下，若陟遐必自迩」，学者其毋忽于斯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1297594_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是年，应黄大明之请，撰《道州宁远县新建濂溪周元公祠堂记》<div id='poem_1297901' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297901' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297901?labeling=true' target='_blank'>道州宁远县新建濂溪周元公祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297901")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297901_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297901'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297901'>嘉定九年，某奉使东川，为濂溪周先生、河南二程先生请所以易其名者，诏下如章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297901_comment'></div>十有五年，某召还，道九江，谒周先生故宅，以元公之命书告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297901_comment'></div>后二年，道州宁远令黄大明以书来曰：「吾闻古之乡先生殁而祭于社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297901_comment'></div>宁远虽蕞尔邑，而先生之流风未坠，不可以无祠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297901_comment'></div>子也学先生之道而尊其名，丽牲有石，将以识里人奉尝之思，子为记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297901_comment'></div>某尝闻人道之要有三：曰父，曰君，曰师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297901_comment'></div>无父无生，无君无以生，无师犹无生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297901_comment'></div>唐虞三代盛时，民生于风气之未漓，又得尧、舜、禹、汤、文、武、成王、周公为之君师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297901_comment'></div>今其法度纪纲犹可以槩见，大抵合以井牧，联以比闾，教以庠序，导以师长，维以谏救，考以德艺，无一壤一民不相联属焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297901_comment'></div>正岁孟月之吉，党里社禜之会，无一事一时不相警策焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297901_comment'></div>夫然，故教行俗成而君师之分尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297901_comment'></div>迨厉、宣、幽、平，已不能成周之旧，仁鄙、寿夭，民自为之，为君师者不及知也，矧自是以降乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297901_comment'></div>曾子曰：「上失其道，民散久矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297901_comment'></div>当斯时也，而民之散已二三百年，则虽以孔、孟之道而无其位，亦不能联属而维持之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297901_comment'></div>然犹不忍吾之同体伥伥然如穷人之无所归也，乃属其徒类而教之，近以淑其国人弟子，远以垂诸天下后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297901_comment'></div>民之久散者固已不能遽返，而为士者犹有所属，则斯文不琢，以俟来圣，犹将有望焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297901_comment'></div>而天未欲平治也，虽以孔门弟子一再传而失之，况秦、汉而后，学残文阙，师异指殊，泮涣滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297901_comment'></div>董仲舒尝请诸不居六艺之科、孔子之术者皆绝其道，庶几统纪可一，民知所从，而时君不足以行其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297901_comment'></div>迨其后也，才知之士各挟其所溺以行于世，不务记览则沦虚无，不为权利则衒词采，至是而不转，民散士亦散矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297901_comment'></div>不有先生发太极本然之体，明二五所乘之几，而示人以日用常行、至近至切之理，则异端小道将诬民惑世于无所终极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297901_comment'></div>又非二程子、张子推而大之，扶持绵延，以开中兴诸儒，则先生之绝学又将孑然孤立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297901_comment'></div>猗其盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297901_comment'></div>然而至近世朱文公、张宣公、吕成公诸儒死，士各挟其所以溺于人者溺人，而士之散滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297901_comment'></div>记问学之末也，今又非圣贤之书而虞初稗官矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297901_comment'></div>虚无道之害也，今又非佛、老之初而梵呗土木矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297901_comment'></div>权利谊之蠹也，今又非管、晏之遗而锥刀豪末矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297901_comment'></div>词章伎之小也，今又非《骚》、《选》之文而淫哇浅俚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297901_comment'></div>此宜忧世之士所以悼道之湮郁，而慨然有感于儒先之教，象而祠之、尸而祝之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297901_comment'></div>然而民既散矣，有士以属之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297901_comment'></div>士既散矣，终不可复属邪，有书以属之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297901_comment'></div>天命流行，亘千古如一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297901_comment'></div>先生见孔、孟之心于千五百年之久，先生之书烂如日星，家藏而人诵之，岂无见先生之心而兴起者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297901_comment'></div>先生初见二程子，使之求孔、颜之所乐也，日笔之于书曰：「志伊尹之所志，学颜子之所学」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297901_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297901_comment'></div>得孔、颜之所以乐，则必不以务记览、工词章、慕虚寂为能也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297901_comment'></div>得伊尹之所以志，则锥刀豪末之得失不足以为戚忻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297901_comment'></div>吾党之士盍相与懋明此理，尚庶几士有所属而民不失望焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1297901_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是年，包逊见访，为书《云萍录》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是年，直前奏事，论时事及士大夫风俗。作品：直前奏事劄子二。<div id='poem_1297224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>直前论事变倚伏人心向背疆埸安危邻寇动静远夷利害五几劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297224")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297224_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297224'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297224'>臣蜀之鄙人也，陛下过听，擢司记注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297224_comment'></div>每朝侍前殿，即东厢径退，侍后殿，则俟宰执臣寮奏事毕，乃得造前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297224_comment'></div>凡所奏陈，陛下罕所可否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297224_comment'></div>退而问所谓起居注，则岁月淹久，事情寂寥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297224_comment'></div>问所谓直前故事，则宾赞之臣，疑为久旷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297224_comment'></div>臣以记言司过为职，而每有含毫阁笔之羞，窃有惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297224_comment'></div>帝者之盛，中外无虞，而臣儆其君曰：「兢兢业业，一日二日万几」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297224_comment'></div>君戒其臣曰：「敕天之命，惟时惟几」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297224_comment'></div>盖未有一日不兢业，一时不整敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297224_comment'></div>诚以起居动作之顷，莫非天命之流行，斯须之不存，而吉凶判焉，悔吝生焉，可不甚惧矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297224_comment'></div>而况今日之事，几微既著，兢敕未加，则臣所未谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297224_comment'></div>今请试陈其略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297224_comment'></div>士风媮薄，世道颓靡，面誉背毁，心私迹公，此事变倚伏之几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297224_comment'></div>师老财殚，币轻物贵，常产既竭，本根易摇，此人心向背之几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297224_comment'></div>民夷杂居，客主不敌，齐淮两大帅乘异情，此疆埸安危之几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297224_comment'></div>金酋初立，委政旧臣，歛戍息民，招携弃怨，此其志不在小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297224_comment'></div>重迟不发，则情态叵测；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297224_comment'></div>脱请继好，则从违皆难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297224_comment'></div>此邻寇动静之几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297224_comment'></div>鞑使既至，行人亦还，情伪未明，邀求难塞，土疆岁赂，礼际盟约既费讲画，而越国以兆戎，交远以疑近，示弱以诲盗，此远夷利害之几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297224_comment'></div>然则即是数端，岂诚无一事者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297224_comment'></div>纵有识时务、通国体之臣，乃不得措一词于下风，使潜运密移，百废具举，则有司因人成事，已不无旷官之愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297224_comment'></div>脱有不虞之事，电发焱至，则沦胥之悔，将不及追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297224_comment'></div>是可置之悠悠，而不速图之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297224_comment'></div>臣今姑以事之关于节目者言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297224_comment'></div>沿边屯田，或请分授归附，或请杂募兵民，或请专招土豪开垦，而徐责其输租。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297224_comment'></div>岂无一可行？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297224_comment'></div>而累岁未能决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297224_comment'></div>楮币日轻，或请增铸铁钱以平铜会，或请改给新会以解折半抽兑之疑，岂无一可采？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297224_comment'></div>而累岁未之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297224_comment'></div>沿边忠义人，或请分处授田以涣其群，或请增招正兵以权其势，或请以补正兵之阙而自为一军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297224_comment'></div>沿边功赏，或谓荆鄂总军、西垂忠义皆尝立功而未蒙赏，或谓三边将士有得四五官资，累至数十，而无一真命者，或请帅守监司具其著者而拔用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297224_comment'></div>将帅之选，或谓沿边长官各举所知，或谓以次摄长，待其有功而后真授，或谓将非真授则无以令其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297224_comment'></div>疆埸之备，或请增淮戍兵之生券以厚其廪，或谓给沿边之閒田以资其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297224_comment'></div>粮运一事也，或谓徙平江百万仓于京口以省费，或谓增镇江、高邮诸郡赏格以劝功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297224_comment'></div>大抵若此类者甚众，不容遍以疏举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297224_comment'></div>然揆诸事体，则节目可举者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297224_comment'></div>或延访有识之士，精辩而众决；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297224_comment'></div>或分畀受任之臣，审度而力行，皆非有所甚难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297224_comment'></div>今旷日持久，且无成说，况有如臣之所谓事变倚伏、人心向背、疆埸安危、邻寇动静、远夷利害，此皆目前必至之患，及今汲汲图之已不可谓之知几矣，而不思所以应之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297224_comment'></div>人之精力终为有限，纵能兼览遍察，亦恐详小遗大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297224_comment'></div>窃见先朝旧制，或有弊事当革，则令侍从言语之臣条具闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297224_comment'></div>凡以察时几而共天命，尊道揆而尽法守，集众思而广忠益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297224_comment'></div>兼于当否之间，足验人才之实，此在政府，可举而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297224_comment'></div>臣愚欲望陛下速谕大臣，思天命之难谌，察时几之易失，裒取弊事久而未革者具以来上，断自圣意，命侍从台谏给授笔札，使退而即其听治之所，各尽所见以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297224_comment'></div>陛下与大臣详择其中而力行之，则一事有一事之益，一日有一日之功，几至能乘，事来能应，不犹愈于坐观事会，而听其势之所趋乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297224_comment'></div>卷卷之忠，惟陛下速图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297224_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1297224'>〔贴黄〕臣窃见鞑使方通，已费朝廷处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297224_comment'></div>又闻金酋新立，情态颇异，使其鸱张豕突，为计尚浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297224_comment'></div>万一蓄力养锐，而亦以和好之说尝试于我，将应之否乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297224_comment'></div>窃料人情厌兵，困役之馀，必幸其可以稍纾目前，而义理之是非，事情之利害，必有所不暇计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297224_comment'></div>臣今姑以利害观之，亦恐和金则鞑疑，交鞑则金疑，交金鞑则山东疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297224_comment'></div>况又事会方将，几微错出，皆未可逆料。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297224_comment'></div>诸戎群盗，亦将以是觇我浅深，所关甚不小也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297224_comment'></div>欲望并谕大臣，博访而审思，夙讲而豫定，使吾大体先立，而常有以应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297224_comment'></div>不惟可以折狡虏而消觊觎，亦使茍简迁就、幸变遂非之说，不得以乘间窃售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297224_comment'></div>伏乞睿照。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_1297224'></div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1297224_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1224&endYear=1224')">1224年</a>　是年，沈省曾出示其父沈焕淳熙八年太学私试策问，为作跋。作品：跋沈国录焕淳熙八年太学私试策问。<div id='poem_1297734' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297734' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297734?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋沈国录<span class='inlineComment2'>（焕）</span>淳熙八年太学私试策问</a><span class='authorDate'>（1224年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297734")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297734_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297734'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297734'>古之仕二，为贫、为道而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297734_comment'></div>为贫焉则苟以禄仕，然非饥饿不能出门户不为也，亦有饥饿而不肯为者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297734_comment'></div>夫苟为道则立乎人之本朝，大将行其道，次犹欲行其言，不则去之，虽穷乏者得我且不为也，况妻妾宫室乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297734_comment'></div>此义久矣不明，沈公乃能招诸生而诲之，人主不以为忤，宰相赵文定亟称之，此人心之所同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297734_comment'></div>不知位司成、职言责者独何人，而龂龂不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297734_comment'></div>《否》之三曰「包羞」，其象曰「位不当也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297734_comment'></div>三以阴柔居上，自知不当其位，亦赧然不能自安，然则彼龂龂者，夫非尽人之子与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297734_comment'></div>后四十有四年，临邛魏了翁抚卷太息，书而归其子省曾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1297734_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年2月5日</a>　上殿，进劄子。作品：乙酉上殿劄子三。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年3月</a>　陈元晋上书自荐。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年4月7日</a>　直前，上书。作品：直前奏六未喻论及邪正二论。<div id='poem_1297229' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297229' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297229?labeling=true' target='_blank'>直前奏六未喻及邪正二论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年4月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297229")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297229_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297229'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297229'>臣愚戆少通，充员柱下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297229_comment'></div>乃者误叨诏墨，令得与讲读诸臣悉心启迪，无有所隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297229_comment'></div>臣既倍入侍，复许直前，敢无一言以塞大问？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297229_comment'></div>臣闻人性无有不善，而后世有性恶之说；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297229_comment'></div>人情莫不欲安，而后世有喜乱之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297229_comment'></div>非后之人不古若也，孔子曰：「斯民也，三代之所以直道而行也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297229_comment'></div>言今此之民即三代之时，是以是是非非，公平正直，而无所回遹之民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297229_comment'></div>然古而好善，今疑其恶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297229_comment'></div>古而欲安，今惧其乱，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297229_comment'></div>古之人垂宪象魏，属民读法，其明白洞达，日星垂而河汉流也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297229_comment'></div>登进而吁之，叙情以闵之，其真实恻隐，疾痛呼而家人谋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297229_comment'></div>夫上以明白洞达、真实恻隐示其下，而下不以情事其上，则非人类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297229_comment'></div>自后世而猜防日甚，涂其耳目也，而曰以神道设教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297229_comment'></div>恶其议政也，而曰不可使知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297229_comment'></div>夫民至愚而神，决无可罔之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297229_comment'></div>今罔之，祗所以扰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297229_comment'></div>迨其哗然而不宁也，则疑其性恶，咎其喜乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297229_comment'></div>呜呼，此民也独非三代直道之民乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297229_comment'></div>而所习乃尔，则亦未有以通其志耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297229_comment'></div>臣尝以是求之，而有未谕于今日者凡六事，敢为陛下历陈其目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297229_comment'></div>陛下自即大位，中外翘首跂足以望治于期月间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297229_comment'></div>而天心难谌，事变狎至，民不见德，惟戮是闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297229_comment'></div>向也寝火于未然，今然矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297229_comment'></div>向也枕蛟于未噬，今噬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297229_comment'></div>伥伥行迈，曾靡所臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297229_comment'></div>有识之士，往往相谓，累朝初政，降诏求言，矧兹旰食之时，必首出此，而久未有闻，为惑滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297229_comment'></div>尝诏侍从、两省、台谏、卿监、郎官，日轮一员面对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297229_comment'></div>意虽甚美，然践祚累月，方闻诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297229_comment'></div>诏旨至今，又数月矣，而对者仅及十馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297229_comment'></div>盖由一旬之间，双日不坐，御殿之日，止引一班，故对群臣之时稀疏寥阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297229_comment'></div>若谓恭嘿不言，则便朝讲殿，固如平日，奚独于求言听言而用其简也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297229_comment'></div>祖宗盛时，受朝决事，或至日中，不遑暇食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297229_comment'></div>退食之后，再坐引对，或当假宁，犹御便殿，或引至四五班，不以为惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297229_comment'></div>臣侍先帝殿坳几一年，是时将倦于勤，犹日御前后殿，班引至再，和颜屈己，靡有厌斁，此陛下之所亲见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297229_comment'></div>今始初清明，顾在廷百执事且不得数望下风，则凡见辞奏事，封章扣匦，更无由至前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297229_comment'></div>夫生于深宫之中，不知稼穑艰难者，固有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297229_comment'></div>陛下习知民间疾苦，今遽尔隔绝，臣窃惑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297229_comment'></div>半年以来，都城之内但见屡捐赏金，以捕妄言之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297229_comment'></div>夫以妄言获罪，虽其自取，然而未睹求言之诏，但闻戢谤之令，此非初政所宜有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297229_comment'></div>昔人谓防民之口，甚于防川，盖言以宣意，使壅塞不通，则一旦溃裂，将不可复收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297229_comment'></div>故周以监谤之令削，秦以诽谤妖言之法亡，汉晋隋唐之季，大抵皆以灾异见于上而不悟，百姓怨于下而不知，变起萧墙，遄就衰替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297229_comment'></div>陛下所宜明白洞达，以是为鉴，而忽不加省，此臣之所未喻者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297229_comment'></div>陛下自即大位，宫壸行三年之丧，所以教民知孝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297229_comment'></div>帘帷侍五日之听，所以示民有尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297229_comment'></div>矧又定省温凊，秉礼不违，饮食起居，禀命惟恪，厥惟子职，若既无毫发之憾者，而臣犹有疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297229_comment'></div>天子之孝以安国家、定社稷为先，故德为圣人，尊为天子，富有四海之内，宗庙飨之，子孙保之，此大舜之孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297229_comment'></div>今内患外祸稠见叠作，而陛下未躬听断以弭豪萌，中外皇皇，未知陛下所以为宗庙子孙之计，而顾以承颜养体为足乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297229_comment'></div>且姑举一事以明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297229_comment'></div>陛下之于济王，锡之圭符，爵之茅土，居之辅郡，赞书旁午，恩意优渥，非特以全兄弟之伦，孔子所谓「父母其顺矣乎」，陛下盖深体此意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297229_comment'></div>然而为之师傅既无贾谊始终梁胜之忠，谨视盗贼又无张敞保全昌邑之智，不幸而见污匪人，以殒厥命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297229_comment'></div>而陛下未闻有「愧谢袁盎，辍食哭甚哀」之意，自三日罢朝之后，其馀恤典虽略讲行，而人不尽知，使陛下所以孜孜爱兄之初心，亦未能尽白于天下，遂使讹言胥动，并为一谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297229_comment'></div>且济王之卒，凡有耳目，谁不睹闻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297229_comment'></div>而小民无知，妄相腾播，莫肯奠居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297229_comment'></div>近在畿甸间，犹不能家至户晓，远而荆襄川广，袭讹承舛，抑又可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297229_comment'></div>万一有盗贼小人乘间伺隙，假托名字以为乱阶，虽亦终于自毙，而目前涂炭，无及于救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297229_comment'></div>臣恐古人所谓安国家、定社稷之孝，不若是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297229_comment'></div>夫子曰：「断一木，杀一兽，不以其时，非孝也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1297229_comment'></div>自春以来，其为一木一兽，不已多乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1297229_comment'></div>臣谓今日之所当明白洞达者，盖不止此，而此亦动摇人心之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1297229_comment'></div>今若内出手书，深惟既往之悔，明谕圣志，而图所以厚其终者，使天下晓然无惑于浮言，则日月之明，其食其更，莫不咸仰，此所以通天下之志而销祸乱之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1297229_comment'></div>何疑何惮，而久不为此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1297229_comment'></div>此又臣之所未喻者二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1297229_comment'></div>山东归疆，河北请吏，此百年所未有之机也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1297229_comment'></div>然而不井牧其田野，不城地其郡县，而移其民人，使之乌合蚁聚于淮甸间，抏民之精，夺士之籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1297229_comment'></div>犹以未足也，听其剽掠境外，以自衣食，此前代之所不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1297229_comment'></div>李全分阃授钺，受任山东，而倏往忽来，靡有定镇，亦前此之所罕见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1297229_comment'></div>然而尚有可诿者曰：「事无大小，禀命朝廷」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1297229_comment'></div>至于辩谤请祠，以明君臣之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1297229_comment'></div>执杖庭拜，以伸制阃之威，而二月丙辰之变，人情愤郁不平，全于斯时，复能引咎自劾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1297229_comment'></div>迨徐晞稷赴镇，全又属櫜迎拜，涕泣自陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1297229_comment'></div>此岂惟逆顺之理，晓然于全之心，有不可泯，亦以堂堂中国，德泽在人，小有陆梁，则自贻剪灭，此全之所必不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1297229_comment'></div>而况天下之恶一也，恶于朝廷而保于我，则出乎尔者，宁保其不反乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1297229_comment'></div>尔且主帅被害，而全无以治之，则全为主帅，亦将无以令其下，此亦非全之利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1297229_comment'></div>全以忠赤来归，名闻夷夏，虽其部曲，亦皆能以勋业自奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1297229_comment'></div>第功行赏，富贵方将，是岂肯芘一首恶以自隳前功？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1297229_comment'></div>若假以旬月，全必有以自见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1297229_comment'></div>臣谓若更自朝廷明白洞达，推赤心以喻之，使其速殄凶渠，以伸国宪，则名誉垂诸简策，禄泽及其子孙，全非木石，宁不乐为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1297229_comment'></div>若其姑托空言，而终无以自见，则神人共愤，曲直有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1297229_comment'></div>如汉侯王，如唐藩镇，纵能以阻兵怙恶，假息于一时，终亦以违理乱常，覆宗于异日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1297229_comment'></div>此在朝廷可以明谕此指，而久不为，此臣之所未谕者三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1297229_comment'></div>古今惟不次用人，如傅说、吕望之俦，最非易事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1297229_comment'></div>其次则莫若资望兼采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1297229_comment'></div>董仲舒曰：「小材虽累日，不离于小官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1297229_comment'></div>贤才虽未久，不害为辅佐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1297229_comment'></div>盖言不次用人必贤者而后可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1297229_comment'></div>若以其小有才也，而遂当贤者不次之任，则不待已试而人固已逆知其必不胜任矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1297229_comment'></div>国家盛时，储蓄将帅，先自远路监司，渐擢京东、西、淮南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1297229_comment'></div>俟其绩用既章，则擢任陕西、河东、北三路及成都路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1297229_comment'></div>自三路、成都具有成绩，然后召为三司副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1297229_comment'></div>或未可辍，则就理资序，遂升都漕，以备帅臣之阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1297229_comment'></div>夫其资历若此，则民情吏状、土风物宜、道路山川、甲兵财谷，皆已周知而悉察之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1297229_comment'></div>其历官既久，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1297229", 1297229, "Clauses/341/Comments/0")'>积伐</span>已多，则中外知名，华夷信服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1297229_comment'></div>如是举而付之方面，授以鈇钺，则未用而人期之，既用而人信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1297229_comment'></div>有所不为，为之可使事半而功倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1297229_comment'></div>今也不然，颐旨如意耳，不必资历；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1297229_comment'></div>侥倖尝试耳，不必誉望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1297229_comment'></div>呜呼，人之易其言也，无责耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1297229_comment'></div>人至于忠忱体国，真实任事，则图惟国事之济，言虑所终，事惟其是，而岂肯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1297229", 1297229, "Clauses/363/Comments/0")'>随声附和</span>，以侥倖万一乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1297229_comment'></div>臣姑以淮东近事明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1297229_comment'></div>臣以嘉定壬午造朝，其于事始不及尽知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1297229_comment'></div>但见应纯之之后为贾涉，涉之后为许国，国之后为徐晞稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1297229_comment'></div>盖涉见疑于纯之而代纯之，国见恶于涉而代涉，晞稷见忌于国而代国，皆以前者为不善也，而后取其所不合者骤迁以救之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1297229_comment'></div>然则宁保后之不非今乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1297229_comment'></div>美锦，微物也，犹不使人学制，岂百万生灵之命，尝试于数人之手，而恝然不以动其心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1297229_comment'></div>窃窥庙算，本欲弥缝祸隙，镇安人情，而乘间伺隙者遂得以窃售其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1297229_comment'></div>前帅未败，则阴为倾挤之计；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1297229_comment'></div>不幸而言中，则显任弥缝之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1297229_comment'></div>故朝廷但谓别用一人，则不谙本末，未识意向，如臣所数，以冀暂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1297229_comment'></div>岂谓此辈徒务营私，宁暇体国？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1297229_comment'></div>况其涉历尚浅，智识有限，以乱救乱，安有穷已？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1297229_comment'></div>此当及今明白洞达，尽惩曩误，更用老成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1297229_comment'></div>老成之人惟欲行道救时，岂是好高立异？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1297229_comment'></div>姑未问其才略，但资威望，亦足镇安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1297229_comment'></div>今金陵未谋帅，亦宜以是选择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1297229_comment'></div>诸镇近辅未得人，亦宜以是更张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1297229_comment'></div>此可以三隅反矣，而悠悠未决，臣之所未喻者四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1297229_comment'></div>古者国有大疑，则谋及庶人，谋及工商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1297229_comment'></div>汉议已狭于前，李唐以降，又不如古，然而尚于相维之间，默寓交儆之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1297229_comment'></div>中书进拟，门下审覆，尚书奉行，而两省之属有给舍、谏官，尚书省之属有长贰、郎曹，一政令之行，经涉非一，使之得以迭为正救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1297229_comment'></div>迨乎枢府，虽曰本兵，而同班分班，厥有深旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1297229_comment'></div>又使台臣得以纠察，侍从得以献纳，百执事得以封章奏对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1297229_comment'></div>盖以宇宙大物，非一人智力所能独运也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1297229_comment'></div>熙丰以后，宰掾始繁，而三省之属有不得其职者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1297229_comment'></div>中兴以来，务为省并，而三省体统有不能尽复承平之旧者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1297229_comment'></div>至于近世，则愈观愈失，往往事之已行，虽侍从、两省、台谏有不及知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1297229_comment'></div>方其未然，常若不知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1297229_comment'></div>迨其知之，则既无及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1297229_comment'></div>中外之所指目，莫不曰食君之禄，而辕驹仗马曾不少伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1297229_comment'></div>岂知君臣上下邈不相接，有一事焉，中外沸腾，远近传布，而有位之士犹罔闻知，但见府城增卫，关市戢言，始从而访问焉，则知其为有警也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1297229_comment'></div>然且莫名其为何事，问之同列，同列不知，藉曰知之，十不一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1297229_comment'></div>是故欲言而不得其要，虽言而无救于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1297229_comment'></div>《易》曰：「尊酒簋贰，刚柔济也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1297229_comment'></div>此言险难之时，君臣上下简易而相亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1297229_comment'></div>今事势愈迫则上下之情愈疏，盖必曰博访则张皇，多言则漏泄，百司各举其职则多事，于是咨谋之道益狭，委任之才日卑，是不亦过忧之甚欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1297229_comment'></div>范纯仁尝曰：「今所用之臣多是老于患难，奖之使进尚恐心志不锐，思虑太周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1297229_comment'></div>若是戒使远嫌，则顾避全身，自防不暇」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1297229_comment'></div>此言最近人情，最切今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1297229_comment'></div>而况家国之忧，人人所同，亦欲各尽所怀，以图国事之济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1297229_comment'></div>是岂张皇漏泄，洁身取名之时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1297229_comment'></div>若使上之人明白洞达，以总大体，以开忠益，以清中书之务，以尽百司之职，则合众智以为智，事简而虑周，何为不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1297229_comment'></div>而必欲掩匿覆护，智虑所不及，精神所不逮，则当断不断，常有后时之悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1297229_comment'></div>此臣之所未喻者五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1297229_comment'></div>夫国之恃以立者人心也，人心之所归则明白洞达，至公而无私也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1297229_comment'></div>今平居无事，以官资崇卑，轩轾天下士，以意向异同，亲疏天下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1297229_comment'></div>士而可以轩轾，可以亲疏，则所得者寡廉鲜耻之人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1297229_comment'></div>夫人幼而学之，壮而欲行之，今顾遏其欲而不得行，徒使之浮沉俯仰，充数备员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1297229_comment'></div>夫充数备员而不能以伸其壮行之欲，其势必将以不得其职而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1297229_comment'></div>则又积岁累月，牢辞固拒，必使之邪正杂揉，心迹莫明，是坏于天子之庭而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1297229_comment'></div>如此而欲以得贤士大夫，其决不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1297229_comment'></div>八九年间，边不撤警，财殚力屈，十室九空，而贪暴之吏以苛征趣办为能，根刷积负，重催豫借，横科抑纳，靡所不有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1297229_comment'></div>而以此欺朝廷曰：「吾能不费朝廷一镪一粒，而用度无乏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1297229_comment'></div>世安有是理？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1297229_comment'></div>然尚有可诿者曰：「此用之公家也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1297229_comment'></div>而又以丰溪壑之欲，又以供苞苴之馈，盖未偿前债，已迫后图，得失熏心，罔有艺极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1297229_comment'></div>所谓饰厨传，营土木，事游观，求赢馀，又不与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1297229_comment'></div>方币轻物贵，田里萧条，此何等气象？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1297229_comment'></div>而必使此辈肆于民上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1297229_comment'></div>人不以贪暴者为怨，而归怨于其上曰：「世未尝乏才也，胡为选择至此」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1297229_comment'></div>如此而望民心之不摇，又不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1297229_comment'></div>夫士大夫同寅叶恭而后纪纲立，百姓尊君亲上而后根本固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1297229_comment'></div>今皆无以得其心矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1297229_comment'></div>或者尚曰失士心民心，皆无损于事，惟不可失诸军之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1297229_comment'></div>呜呼，世安有士心民心胥失之矣，而犹可以立国也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1297229_comment'></div>况又物价翔踊，廪稍不给，士卒常有饥寒之怨，功赏皋缓，升黜不明，士卒常有疾视之意，而又以贪将债帅，次第椎剥，三衙两淮，近且不察，襄汉梁益，呼叫莫闻，而尚以诸军之心为皆可恃乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1297229_comment'></div>三者之心既无一可恃，则陛下孤立于上，大臣孤立于下，臣不知何所恃以立国？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1297229_comment'></div>窃意所恃者惟数有天幸尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1297229_comment'></div>穰侯曰：「天幸多矣，今又以天幸自为常也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1297229_comment'></div>陆贽曰：「幸不可以常觊也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1297229_comment'></div>夫天命不显其符，俾有国者兢兢以自勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1297229_comment'></div>今不明白洞达，拓开规摹，兢兢然图所以固结人心之本，而恃天幸以为国，此臣之所未喻者六也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1297229_comment'></div>臣既能极竭其毣毣之愚，条陈六者之所未喻，以冀陛下明白洞达，作新庶政，以振国势之久弱，以舒人心之积愤，尚虑知闻不广，包括靡竟，无以仰裨圣断，臣复定为邪正二端，以翼其说，而陛下试终听焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1297229_comment'></div>臣尝闻之朱熹曰：「天地之间，有自然之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1297229_comment'></div>凡阳必刚，刚必明，明则易知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1297229_comment'></div>凡阴必柔，柔则闇，闇则难测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1297229_comment'></div>故光明正大，疏畅通达，无纤芥可疑者，必君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1297229_comment'></div>回互隐伏，闪倏狡狯，不可方物者，必小人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1297229_comment'></div>臣尝以是为察言观人之鉴，而邪正之辨，了不可掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1297229_comment'></div>如谓人事有失，则天象谴告，此正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1297229_comment'></div>谓天命不足畏者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1297229_comment'></div>谓宪章法度所当遵守者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1297229_comment'></div>谓祖宗不足法者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1297229_comment'></div>谓丁宁恳恻可以感动人心者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1297229_comment'></div>谓失在推诚者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1297229_comment'></div>谓正人端士可以扶持元气者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1297229_comment'></div>谓卖直沽名者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1297229_comment'></div>谓政令之行当广谋博访者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1297229_comment'></div>谓徒乱人意者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1297229_comment'></div>谓事变之来，当防微杜渐者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1297229_comment'></div>谓亟当禁戢者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1297229_comment'></div>谓每旦视朝，孜孜访问者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1297229_comment'></div>谓尊严渊嘿，使人不可窥测者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1297229_comment'></div>谓勤恤民隐，哀矜庶狱者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1297229_comment'></div>谓峻法立威，使民莫敢慢易者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1297229_comment'></div>谓亲师讲学，以立政本者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1297229_comment'></div>谓俗儒不达时宜，好古是今非者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1297229_comment'></div>谓敌国外患宜急于内修者，正论也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1297229_comment'></div>谓虏无能为，贼不足忧者，邪说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1297229_comment'></div>大抵正论为阳，邪说为阴，阳开则为春夏，高明而发达；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1297229_comment'></div>阴阖则为秋冬，冥晦而歛藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1297229_comment'></div>臣愿陛下以臣前所陈未喻六条行之，以明白洞达为目前补偏救弊之策；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1297229_comment'></div>以后所陈邪正二端察之，于缭绕回互为自今考言观人之要，则取舍之极定于内，而安危之萌应于外矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1297229_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「天难忱斯，不易维王」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1297229_comment'></div>惟陛下汲汲图之，臣不胜区区。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_202_1297229'></div><div id='poem_sentence_202_1297229_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年5月</a>　友人张忠恕上封事陈八事，魏了翁闻之，激赏。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年6月</a>　以旧疾所迫，上书请辞，累月间凡五请。作品：五乞祠申省状。<div id='poem_1297321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>五乞祠申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297321")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297321'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297321'>某自六月以来，旧痾所迫，四上祠官之请，至今累月，未拜俞音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297321_comment'></div>所当陆续控陈，期于从欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297321_comment'></div>会从臣移疾，朝论纷纭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297321_comment'></div>某倘于斯时申述前请，则适以滋朋比之惑，重沽激之嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297321_comment'></div>姑且迟回，以须少定，盖欲稍全事体，庶几无骇观瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297321_comment'></div>而连日之间，积阴为沴，疾势益侵，不容更有迁延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297321_comment'></div>是用不避形迹之嫌，投诚造命之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297321_comment'></div>欲望朝廷特赐敷奏，检会累申，畀之祠廪，庶几偷安岁月，扶养病躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297321_comment'></div>傥未溘先狗马，尚有图报之日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1297321_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年7月2日</a>　上封事。作品：封事奏体八卦往来之用玩上下交济之理以尽下情。<div id='poem_1297230' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297230' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297230?labeling=true' target='_blank'>封事奏体八卦往来之用玩上下交济之理以尽下情<span class='inlineComment2'>（七月二日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年7月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297230")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297230_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297230'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297230'>臣伏睹诏书，凡内外文武小大之臣，有所见闻，以封章来上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297230_comment'></div>臣尝读《易》，至「天地定位」，则《乾》与《坤》对；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297230_comment'></div>「山泽通气」，则《艮》与《兑》对；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297230_comment'></div>「雷风相薄」，则《震》与《巽》对；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297230_comment'></div>「水火不相射」，则《离》与《坎》对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297230_comment'></div>此为先天八卦之序也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297230_comment'></div>然而语其用则地天而为《泰》，泽山而为《咸》，风雷而为《益》，水火而为《既济》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297230_comment'></div>盖天道不下济，则地气不上跻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297230_comment'></div>山体不内虚，则泽气不上通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297230_comment'></div>雷不倡则风不和也，火不降则水不升也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297230_comment'></div>于是而为《否》为《损》，为《恒》为《未济》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297230_comment'></div>又即其大体而言，则水雷山皆《乾》也，火风泽皆《坤》也，其要则《乾》《坤》《坎》《离》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297230_comment'></div>故先天之卦，《乾》南《坤》北，而其用则《乾》上而《坤》下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297230_comment'></div>后天之卦，《离》南《坎》北，而其用则《离》降而《坎》升也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297230_comment'></div>大率居上者必以下济为用，在下者必以上跻为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297230_comment'></div>天地万物之理，凡莫不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297230_comment'></div>况《乾》天也，《离》日也，皆为君之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297230_comment'></div>《坤》地也，《坎》月也，皆为臣之象，其理顾不晓然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297230_comment'></div>未有《乾》《坤》不交而能位天地，《坎》《离》不交而能育万物，君臣不交而能跻斯世于泰和也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297230_comment'></div>臣尝以是考诸今日之事，而未能无惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297230_comment'></div>行一事也，上之人以为是，而下或议其非；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297230_comment'></div>用一人也，上之人以为公，而下或疑其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297230_comment'></div>上之人其词常泰，而下之语常危；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297230_comment'></div>上之人其念常纾，而下之忧常迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297230_comment'></div>然则是居上者不能以孚于下，而在下者不能以达于上，此显然为上下不交之證，殆非细故也，而莫有为陛下言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297230_comment'></div>且上之人曰：方今事势庶几其暂安矣，内而畿辅之间，善政嘉令以次举行，谤讟讹言今且消弭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297230_comment'></div>虽曰旱势可畏，而浙东一道雨旸时若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297230_comment'></div>虽曰物价未平，而临安一城钱会稍通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297230_comment'></div>外而疆埸之事，则齐疆魏服，以次来归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297230_comment'></div>鞑虏金戎，日就衰弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297230_comment'></div>虽制阃遇害，而凶徒自劾，已从镌削；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297230_comment'></div>虽狠心难保，而委用得人，必能调护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297230_comment'></div>此上之说然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297230_comment'></div>而下之人则曰：内患外祸未有稠如今者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297230_comment'></div>正月而潘丙之叛，使我不得以全兄弟之爱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297230_comment'></div>二月而刘庆福之变，使我不得以全君臣之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297230_comment'></div>三月而纪邦瑞之亡，使我不得以保归附之民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297230_comment'></div>四月而苟梦玉之死，使我不得以芘勤事之吏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297230_comment'></div>五月而客星入于尾，六月而太白见乎昼，皆为盗贼兵戈之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297230_comment'></div>目前事变虽若粗定，而祸根乱孽元未剪除，号令赏刑元未畅达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297230_comment'></div>内则以贪吏治彫郡，以暴政涖怨民，而根本既拨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297230_comment'></div>外则以窾籍待悍将，以弱势操彊形，而威柄倒持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297230_comment'></div>尚曰可以暂安，谁实信之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297230_comment'></div>上之人曰：百官有司庶几其无旷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297230_comment'></div>内而有位之士兼收并蓄，以尽其才；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297230_comment'></div>年除岁迁，以旌其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297230_comment'></div>虽多用亲故，然非亲与故，则无由知其人也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297230_comment'></div>虽不拘资望，然纯取资望，则不必为吾用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297230_comment'></div>外而任事之臣茍见其可任，则试之以方面，虽违众背公，不遑恤也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297230_comment'></div>察其可制则待之以不次，虽淫刑黩货，不暇问也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297230_comment'></div>凡此规摹，自更化以来，二十年间，未之有改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297230_comment'></div>虽间亦非才，旋即消弭，此上之说然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297230_comment'></div>而下之人则曰：旷官败事未有甚于今也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297230_comment'></div>庙堂之上，大官倡声，一口附和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297230_comment'></div>侍从之臣，事不及知，知不敢言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297230_comment'></div>台谏之任，拟非所论，论非所拟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297230_comment'></div>给舍之官，号书词头，实注纸尾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1297230_comment'></div>经筵之选，职在切磋，动怀顾畏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1297230_comment'></div>百官有司，问例决事，计考望迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1297230_comment'></div>以至将帅所以折冲御侮也，而国人非笑，盗贼戮辱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1297230_comment'></div>监司所以扬清激浊也，而贿赂相先，贪暴相习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1297230_comment'></div>郡守所以平易近民也，而与胥为市，视民如雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1297230_comment'></div>夫所谓大臣者，所以表仪百工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1297230_comment'></div>今顾狃于得失利害之私，而使百工各不能以尽其职，尚得为无旷乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1297230_comment'></div>不特此也，尊礼耆老，所以劝贤也，下之人则曰不过隆以爵秩，锡以鞶带，未尝有所访问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1297230_comment'></div>此郭公父老所谓「善善而不能用」，子思所谓「以高爵厚禄钩饵君子，而无信用之实」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1297230_comment'></div>招延俊髦，所以重朝廷也，下之人则曰：不过趣以温诏，位之閒曹，未尝有所信任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1297230_comment'></div>此诗人所谓「召彼故老，讯之占梦」，孟轲所谓「终于此而已，弗与共天位也，弗与治天职也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1297230_comment'></div>朝廷未尝以言语罪人，虽事关廊庙，亦示优容，不可谓不受言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1297230_comment'></div>下之人则曰：虽外示优容，而疑其沽名，恶其不静，终于逐之，而实则喜佞谀而乐辩给也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1297230_comment'></div>朝廷未尝轻听士大夫之去，虽请至再三，必示絷留，不可谓不爱贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1297230_comment'></div>下之人则曰：虽外示絷留，而疑其求迁，恶其立异，终于坏之，实则私同己而用小才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1297230_comment'></div>朝廷之上，士大夫日以纲常名分不立为忧，下之人则曰：君命犯而主威夺，上无以表率，而何以责在下？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1297230_comment'></div>朝廷之上，士大夫日以礼义廉耻不张为虑，下之人则曰：苞苴行而女谒盛，上无以风厉，而何以遏其流？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1297230_comment'></div>虽然，不特下之论为然也，臣日在陛下之左右，而犹有未能释然于心者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1297230_comment'></div>陛下未明而尚衣进服，始旦而司辇出房，九门洞开，七萃森列，亲臣近戚鱼贯而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1297230_comment'></div>起居既毕，二府分班奏事，宰臣留身密启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1297230_comment'></div>然后赞者以新制引一班上殿，閤门报无公事，则大驾已兴，陛楯皆出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1297230_comment'></div>此人主御朝之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1297230_comment'></div>为上之人未始不曰：人主夙兴视事，无阙于礼，亦云足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1297230_comment'></div>而臣疑其不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1297230_comment'></div>古人自朝至日中昃，不皇暇食，犹若不给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1297230_comment'></div>乃今陛下临御几一年，中外非无事也，臣每旦侍立，但见陛下渊嘿临朝，顷刻而罢，未尝躬亲听断，屈己访问，岂为君者真若是易易邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1297230_comment'></div>臣又退而观于有位，虫飞而兴，会盈而退，乘轩列哄，以造厥司，涉笔占位，以书乃事，文案山叠，披阅未终，而鸣钟戒时，聚食而返，或造请权势，或奔走书谒，此百官一日之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1297230_comment'></div>为上之人未始不曰：人臣分曹列局，上下相承，亦云可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1297230_comment'></div>而臣谓不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1297230_comment'></div>古人谓「无旷庶官，天工人其代之」，其任至不轻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1297230_comment'></div>况今内讧外猘，事几错至，岂是茍安之时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1297230_comment'></div>臣每旦就列，但见群臣位卑势疏者犹能治常程文书，制钱谷出入；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1297230_comment'></div>位高势偪，则谩不敢可否事，优游拱嘿，交委其责，岂为臣者亦若是易易邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1297230_comment'></div>臣至愚极陋者也，固已惕然忧之，矧惟民至神也，下至众也，既神且众，而道谤市议，每与上之论若不相似，然则是岂可藐如不闻乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1297230_comment'></div>陛下潜邸旧学，讲究新功，阅天下义理，不为不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1297230_comment'></div>愿试以臣言体八卦往来之用，玩上下交济之理，而思古昔以来有偏听独任，忠言蔑闻，百官有司，不修其职，发号出令，不本于诚，而挈持虚器，长久而不坠者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1297230_comment'></div>夫危机屡发而旋止，此非美政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1297230_comment'></div>失今不治，痞鬲日甚，将为不可治之證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1297230_comment'></div>治之何如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1297230_comment'></div>一言蔽之曰：以下情达之上耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1297230_comment'></div>然而陛下便朝讲幄所对者不过三四宰执，十馀讲读官，纵下情未达，无由上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1297230_comment'></div>臣窃见祖宗时侍从近臣率是亲擢，且非时宣召，与之从容讲论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1297230_comment'></div>虽文武朝士至使臣选人，亦时得进见，而禁林馆职尤号亲密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1297230_comment'></div>司马光推本此意，尝请日轮侍从一员，昼直夜宿，以备不时宣召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1297230_comment'></div>今陛下便殿讲幄之暇，深居禁中，澹然无营，独不可亲擢天下之耆哲，位之禁近，日轮一员，时赐召对，从容讲论，以尽下情乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1297230_comment'></div>祖宗时除台谏亦由亲选，每当言事，虽于长官亦无关白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1297230_comment'></div>自庆元权臣用事，台谏遂与给舍同为庙堂私人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1297230_comment'></div>臣以为自今陛下于轮对群臣之日，察其议论之忠鲠，器识之醇明，柬自宸衷，或遇台谏有阙，独不可亲加选任，以尽下情乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1297230_comment'></div>祖宗时事关大体，必付之外廷集议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1297230_comment'></div>自比日以来，率是先期取纳议状，此制遂成文具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1297230_comment'></div>臣以为自今国有大事，独不可尽除近弊，一付外廷公议，庭辩众决，以尽下情乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1297230_comment'></div>祖宗时轮对群臣及见辞官，率是两三班，或食已再引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1297230_comment'></div>自比日以来，创引一班，罕所咨访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1297230_comment'></div>夫人臣将有所言，积诚以冀感格，蓄闻以待疑问，乃使之不得尽展所怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1297230_comment'></div>臣谓自今独不可数对群臣，反覆问辩，以尽下情乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1297230_comment'></div>祖宗时置登闻检院以达四方之书，朝政得失，公私利害，军期几密，皆得上达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1297230_comment'></div>今此制虽存，仅成虚设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1297230_comment'></div>自今独不可申严厥司，勿加沮遏，以尽下情乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1297230_comment'></div>大抵此数者，臣自省事以来，犹及闻前辈大老历历能言高宗、孝庙时，数对群臣及亲擢台谏等事，又有语及两朝集议，轮对上书，往往成诵，每使人有恨不同时之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1297230_comment'></div>自孽韩柄国，此制始坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1297230_comment'></div>今而复之，是乃所以述高、孝常行之规，继先朝未终之志，收人心于涣散，固邦本于荡摇，此陛下初政至近至切事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1297230_comment'></div>不然，悠悠岁月，上有失而下不谏，下有怨而上不知，如《乾》《坤》之否而天下无邦，如水火之未济而六爻失位，臣莫知所以为陛下计矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1297230_comment'></div>臣西蜀寒远，误蒙陛下不以人废言，亟下求言之诏，臣感泣思奋，恨无以报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1297230_comment'></div>今臣适以旧疾所挠，凡再上祠官之请，虽未蒙俞允，恐疾状转剧，无复瞻望清光之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1297230_comment'></div>故尚支持馀息，为陛下恳恳言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1297230_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_122_1297230'>〔贴黄〕臣窃见先朝奏疏，率是直书其事，无所讳隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1297230_comment'></div>乃自近岁，先颂君德，次陈时弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1297230_comment'></div>夫柔行巽入，以庶几万一感悟，固人臣之不得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1297230_comment'></div>不思本末源流，元自一贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1297230_comment'></div>故《大学》之道，自格物致知、正心修身，至于家齐国治而天下平，初无二本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1297230_comment'></div>今若曰君德已无阙，特朝廷未清，百官未治，方外多虞，如此则是心既正，身既修，而不能以治天下国家，万无是理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1297230_comment'></div>陛下嗣德之初，听言之道，尤当致谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1297230_comment'></div>如前所云，虽是人臣务取婉顺，引其君以当道，然恐伤于太易，昧圣贤正本之论，启人主自足之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1297230_comment'></div>是敢僭陈，并祈睿鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1297230_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_131_1297230'>〔又贴黄〕臣嘉泰间为学官，伏睹宁考以火灾求言，时封章者百馀，亦多有剀切者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1297230_comment'></div>虽曰降付后省，而不曾施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1297230_comment'></div>嘉定八年旱蝗封事，亦付后省看详，见之施行，此意视前加广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1297230_comment'></div>臣时持节东川，但见朝廷摘出攽行，惟唐天铎奏状，其词谄佞卑鄙，固已料其为反覆之人，后来果闻以邪谋被戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1297230_comment'></div>夫嘉泰求言而不行，固权奸之无识；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1297230_comment'></div>嘉定虽亦施行，乃取一唐天铎，则与其元无施行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1297230_comment'></div>况天铎始谄而终叛，以此尤见鲠直者虽稍忤而终可信，谄佞者虽易信而终可疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1297230_comment'></div>今来封事，欲乞睿旨严限督趣，委官选类，取其不阿者，用其言而显其人，毋为具文，天下幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_138_1297230_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年7月10日</a>　友人秦季槱出知潼川府，赋诗送之。作品：送秦秘监季槱以显谟知潼川。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年8月19日</a>　友人张忠恕出知赣州，赋诗送之。作品：送张匠监忠恕秘阁知赣州。<div id='poem_253520' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253520' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253520?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送张匠监<span class='inlineComment2'>（忠恕）</span>以秘阁知赣州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年8月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253520")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253520_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253520'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253520'>西南间气忠献公，一生心事天与通。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253520'>才高志广无处著，独倚衡疑望关洛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253520'>九州风露方漫漫，卷回残梦归馀干。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253520'>惟将一念遗孙子，长与世间立人纪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253520'>宣公端明今在无，我生不识惭非夫。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253520'>宁知中岁遇行甫，历历典刑犹父祖。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253520'>试从微处觇经纶，中边玉洁无纤尘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253520'>大河滔滔恣群饮，逡巡独惜障泥锦。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253520'>晓庭戒仗喑无声，掣缨振鬣时时鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253520'>京师邸吏自相语，张公立朝我良苦。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253520'>不知书疏何所言，每一论奏人争传。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253520'>好名之人能逊国，而于豆羹见词色。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253520'>反覆耐看不可瑕，此事无素能然邪。<div id='poem_sentence_12_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_253520'>我从同朝一千日，见公造次皆是物。<div id='poem_sentence_13_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_253520'>寄声为贺赣州民，朝廷为汝辍争臣。<div id='poem_sentence_14_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_253520'>却须更问萧太傅，中朝外郡谁当虑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_253520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_253520'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_253520_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年8月22日</a>　胡梦昱应诏上封事，论济王事，真德秀、魏了翁称叹曰“下寮乃有斯人，吾当端拜”<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年9月1日</a>　胡梦昱削籍，羁管象州，魏了翁为之饯行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年9月24日</a>　李知孝劾魏了翁首唱异论，史弥远畏公论，改了翁权工部侍郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年9月25日</a>　数上书请辞，并举虞刚简自代。作品：除工部侍郎上史丞相弥远。辞免除工部侍郎状。再辞免除权工部侍郎奏状。丐外再申尚书省状。丐祠再申尚书省状。丐祠上史丞相弥远。再上史丞相弥远。除权工部侍郎举虞刚简自代奏状。<div id='poem_1297383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除工部侍郎上史丞相<span class='inlineComment2'>（弥远）</span>书<span class='inlineComment2'>（九月二十五日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年9月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297383")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297383'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297383'>某猥以孱庸，久污化冶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297383_comment'></div>每念君恩未报，衰疢交攻，谒告请祠，诚非得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297383_comment'></div>今陈情四五，天听邈焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297383_comment'></div>襆被俟诛，无复生意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297383_comment'></div>忽叨误柬，躐贰冬卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297383_comment'></div>孤逖之踪，众毁所集，分绝荣进，而宠灵骤及，震恐靡宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297383_comment'></div>使非大丞相特垂矜轸，倍赐埏埴，宁以有此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297383_comment'></div>心非木石，感极涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297383_comment'></div>独念士之行己，惟于进退辞受最当致谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297383_comment'></div>今请祠谒告亦既累月，若饕荣冒宠，不知引退，则不惟病干未易支持，而内愧初心，外慊物议，此而无取，他亦奚观？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297383_comment'></div>伏惟大丞相尽人之情，爱人以德，必不使其周章错愕，以贸于去就之分，重为知人之累也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297383_comment'></div>某已具公牍控告朝廷，如蒙钧慈特为亟致回天之力，检会累牍，畀之祠廪，则始终恩遇，傥其未殒之年，莫非图报之日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297383_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1297383'>〔小贴子〕某尚以寒热交搏，不可以风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297383_comment'></div>未闻新命之前，尝申控朝廷，展假三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297383_comment'></div>用是不能即日供职，非敢逋慢，以留君命，仰乞矜察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1297383_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免除工部侍郎状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年9月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297322")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297322'>欻被宠灵，莫遑宁处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297322_comment'></div>窃惟天生五材，而民并用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297322_comment'></div>国有六职，而工与居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297322_comment'></div>是为要近之官，匪直缮修之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297322_comment'></div>况于侍从言语之列，当以论思献纳为忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297322_comment'></div>苟非其人，莫赞而长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297322_comment'></div>重念某涉世太早，属时多虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297322_comment'></div>始因取忤于权臣，不幸见称于公论，以是自信，不疑所行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297322_comment'></div>然守此而弗移，故动焉而得谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297322_comment'></div>尽言无隐，则人指为异论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297322_comment'></div>直情径行，则人疑为沽名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297322_comment'></div>惟其无愧此心，是以不遑他恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297322_comment'></div>今乃猥由薄命，久抱沉痾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297322_comment'></div>一年之间，移病半之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297322_comment'></div>六月以来，请祠屡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297322_comment'></div>久束装而俟命，忽出綍以误迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297322_comment'></div>喜惧交怀，进退维谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297322_comment'></div>藉曰饕荣而冒受，岂容力疾以自持？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297322_comment'></div>况其稍识去就之宜，粗知义命之戒，不知引退，将速颠隮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297322_comment'></div>欲望朝廷更赐敷奏，覆视累陈之牍，亟垂从欲之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297322_comment'></div>非敢具文，必期得请。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1297322_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297242' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297242' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297242?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再辞免除权工部侍郎奏状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年9月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297242")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297242_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297242'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297242'>臣窃见近来群臣请祠丐外，止是三两次不允，不敢更有奏申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297242_comment'></div>初除权从官，亦止是一次辞免，别无再辞体例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297242_comment'></div>臣今请祠已至四五，辞免已是一次，自不当更有烦渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297242_comment'></div>缘臣尚有不得已者，须至尽言，故敢昧死以陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297242_comment'></div>臣闻之道路，自数月以来，有人谓臣不当为异论之唱，以致众言纷纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297242_comment'></div>有人又谓真德秀初对，乃是臣实教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297242_comment'></div>又有谓朝廷疑臣多言，不令再侍讲筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297242_comment'></div>故有怨望，求去不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297242_comment'></div>后来台谏及轮对官文字，或论分朋立党，或要誉好名，大抵皆是指臣与德秀诸臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297242_comment'></div>以孤逖之踪，实是疑畏，不敢辩白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297242_comment'></div>会臣旧疾再作，寒热交战，昼静夜剧，恐渐成脧削，故因此引疾求去，不敢他有指陈，以费朝廷区处，又以取忤于议者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297242_comment'></div>然而臣之愚衷，终有未白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297242_comment'></div>故不足以仰回天听，致六颁不允之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297242_comment'></div>虽国家眷待重臣，亦不过若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297242_comment'></div>臣感深至泣，恨无以报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297242_comment'></div>若更有隐嘿，不尽以闻，则臣之本心，终无以自白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297242_comment'></div>且臣自嘉泰、开禧间，尝一再以狂瞽之言，触忤权要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297242_comment'></div>嘉定更化之初，首蒙收召以旌异，臣之出处，具有本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297242_comment'></div>比岁再玷班行，亦尝数有论建，非是今日方为慷慨激烈之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297242_comment'></div>况臣所论历历可考，且臣二月初对，首告陛下以此心即天心，不可一毫有所欺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297242_comment'></div>次论近来学术不明，气节不立；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297242_comment'></div>末言元祐宰执、侍从、台谏、经筵、翰苑，皆极天下选，今当以此为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297242_comment'></div>至四月初，陛下亲政，臣直前奏事，谓当下求言之诏，宽戢谤之令，当明陛下爱兄之心，当正山阳讨贼之名，沿边制阃当用有资望人，朝廷政事当令群臣得与闻谋议，天幸不可恃，当不失士大夫百姓诸军之心，末复辩析邪正二端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297242_comment'></div>至七月上封事，则又论上下之情不一，上以为是，下以为非；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297242_comment'></div>上以为公者，下以为私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297242_comment'></div>此皆臣赤心血诚，吐露倾倒，更无留藏，不过为陛下涵养心源，爱惜事体，扶持初政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297242_comment'></div>只愿陛下听断之初，大纲既正，事事光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297242_comment'></div>初无一毫容私其间，今议者乃指为异论之唱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297242_comment'></div>夫闪倏狡狯，朋邪害正，乃是异论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297242_comment'></div>臣今所言，證诸庶民而无疑，对越天地而无愧，谓之异论可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297242_comment'></div>真德秀学识文艺，为世所推，臣安能教玉人彫琢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297242_comment'></div>至谓臣不得兼官，故有怨望者，此尤为无据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297242_comment'></div>观人之法，亦当察其平素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297242_comment'></div>臣自蒙先帝亲擢以来，未尝有所依凭躁竞，奚乃今日，忽以不得兼官为怨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297242_comment'></div>人谁信之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297242_comment'></div>其如朋党之说，则臣但见今日士大夫以利合者甚众，以义合者极少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297242_comment'></div>然而以利合者，利尽则亦不可保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297242_comment'></div>今正恐义合者之不多，而非朋党之当虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297242_comment'></div>好名之说，此乃隋炀帝、唐德宗以来，为是以拒谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297242_comment'></div>今正患士大夫之不恤公议，而非好名之当虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297242_comment'></div>臣自闻此等议论，私自惟念陛下富于春秋，亹亹乎如川之方增，此正百官修辅，澄源正本之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297242_comment'></div>当养之以厚，不当导之以薄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297242_comment'></div>当养之以诚，不当启之以欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297242_comment'></div>况今天下事势，姑以一二言之，只如山东忠义已拊而尚多反侧，山西蕃族来归而未知区处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297242_comment'></div>正如寝火积薪，火而既然，所宜及今惜阴爱日，相与图回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297242_comment'></div>而上下相徇，无一人言之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297242_comment'></div>虽下诏而求，亦漠然不以为应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297242_comment'></div>盖迟迟两月，幸而有数人言之，则又相与环攻而圜视焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297242_comment'></div>甚者排根诋讦，使之不得安于朝廷之上，臣所未喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297242_comment'></div>然始也，犹幸陛下之不惑于浮言，故臣虽百喙交讥，不皇恤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297242_comment'></div>后来纷纷不已，卒至施行，轻者奉祠，重者镌罢，又甚而至于追削羁管，又甚而至于逮治其舆隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297242_comment'></div>臣尝欲为之辩白救解，又虑言或不从，则祗以益朝廷拒谏之过，非所以爱惜国体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297242_comment'></div>故且隐忍循嘿，而终非所安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297242_comment'></div>况始为求言之说，为厚伦之说者臣也，今以言得谴者相望于道，则是臣实创此说，以为阱于国中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297242_comment'></div>臣以此寝食俱废，恐亦将负谤于天下，故数数求去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297242_comment'></div>不但以疾，亦谓不得其言与夫众议所集，二者皆当去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297242_comment'></div>况今位之以论思献纳之职，班列浸高，则责望愈重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1297242_comment'></div>臣皇惧莫知所出，故辞之愈迫，非有他也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1297242_comment'></div>窃意陛下与二三大臣所以未听臣去者，不过曰真德秀诸臣方以罪行，今未欲使臣继去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1297242_comment'></div>臣一介寒微，误蒙先帝始终拔擢，陛下一再迁除，使之致位从列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1297242_comment'></div>臣非木石，方恨无以报塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1297242_comment'></div>且臣以应举得官，遇当磨勘，仍是自陈，非超然山林，不慕官爵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1297242_comment'></div>今于美官要职，牢辞固避，几若不近人情，陛下于此可以察臣必有不可留者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1297242_comment'></div>陛下若谓臣之去留，粗关事体，则今来差除已是报行，中外之人皆已共知圣朝宽容尽下，不以言语罪臣，自缘臣以疾病数求閒退，似于事体元亦无伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1297242_comment'></div>臣既以疾未能供职，留令累日，深恐人言日甚，不自皇安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1297242_comment'></div>已一面移文粮料院，截自十月分为头住帮俸给，听候指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1297242_comment'></div>欲望圣慈宣谕大臣，检会累申，收回今来新命，速除臣宫观差遣一次，庶扶病体，归伏田庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1297242_comment'></div>倘年岁间体力粗充，本心亦白，则东西南北奔走惟命，所不敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1297242_comment'></div>频渎圣聪，伏俟萧斧之诛。</div><div id='poem_sentence_68_1297242_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丐外再申尚书省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年9月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297323")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297323'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297323'>照会某自夏秋以来，旧疾发动，屡上祠官之请，未蒙俞允，反玷序迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297323_comment'></div>控避莫皇，眷留逾切，感深刻骨，涕下交颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297323_comment'></div>岂应固守不移之愚，徒取厌烦，上孤隆遇？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297323_comment'></div>故自效职以来，靖共朝夕，誓言报称，不敢言去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297323_comment'></div>而近日以来，积阴为沴，病本益深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297323_comment'></div>霜露所乘，寒热间作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297323_comment'></div>若不再申前请，必速颠隮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297323_comment'></div>敢望朝廷更赐敷奏，检会累申，速与宫观差遣，庶携孥累，暂寄江湖，以养馀痾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297323_comment'></div>候其痊安，别听驱策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297323_comment'></div>频渎公朝，无任皇惧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1297323_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297324' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297324?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丐祠再申尚书省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年9月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297324")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297324_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297324'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297324'>照会某真切之恳，已具累牍，兹不渎叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297324_comment'></div>窃惟法从之选，儒生所荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297324_comment'></div>矧在寒微，得此殊遇，所当体承眷宠，极竭疲驽，终守靖共，誓言报塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297324_comment'></div>而谆谆谢病，数数丐归，屡却而请不休，阅时而意逾迫，岂惟有伤事体，抑亦不近人情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297324_comment'></div>况于公朝当此多事，而百司庶府夙夜在公，乃独譊譊，屡陈私请，人皆谓其可已，己亦厌其太烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297324_comment'></div>而退自揣量，终难勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297324_comment'></div>若使少休岁月，暂寄江湖，心志稍纾，痒痾粗定，则麋捐效报，夫岂无时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297324_comment'></div>若必饕荣，不知引退，岂私心之有愧，亦公议之不容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297324_comment'></div>欲望朝廷特赐敷奏，俯怜累请，速畀真祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297324_comment'></div>毋令更有渎烦，以重贻方命之谴，即拜始终保全之赐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1297324_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297269' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297269' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297269?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免督视军马乞以参赞军事从丞相行奏劄<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月二十四日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年9月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297269")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297269_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297269'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297269'>臣生长西南，至愚极陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297269_comment'></div>陛下不忍终弃，拔之远屏之馀，付之藩翰，寘之周行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297269_comment'></div>以亲政招延之士言之，臣最为末至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297269_comment'></div>而躐居众俊之右，果以超踰过分，啧有烦言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297269_comment'></div>臣累疏求归，未蒙俞允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297269_comment'></div>陛下忧顾上流，俾臣以宥府视师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297269_comment'></div>自汉魏以来，督府之任，乃将相之雄权，其后始有督视之名，犹以执政之久次者为之，未有拔自从臣，骤当事任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297269_comment'></div>盖以尽护诸将，得专阃外之事，其任至重而不轻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297269_comment'></div>今臣乃以历代所无之故事，一旦自权尚书为之，令下之日，人谓创见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297269_comment'></div>臣自三疏丐祠之后，控辞新命，又至再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297269_comment'></div>陛下申遣诏使，促臣随班奏事，面谕丁宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297269_comment'></div>臣窃念主忧臣辱，义不得辞，跼蹐受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297269_comment'></div>退而差辟官吏，条列事目，调遣将士，凡所以为速发之计者，靡微不周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297269_comment'></div>不惟臣子体国之至情，亦所以避谗远谤，庶几无间可入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297269_comment'></div>然而所辟之官，始拟某某，皆不屑就，以至某某诸人，亦无一肯就者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297269_comment'></div>今仅馀二三人，如某某，相与随宜行事，而元僚无人，议幕机干以下尚多阙员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297269_comment'></div>至于统帅偏裨之任，亦岂容缓？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297269_comment'></div>而用一人焉，则曰殿司人之所忌也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297269_comment'></div>谋一将焉，则曰帅臣之所不乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297269_comment'></div>此皆托辞以避事，臣尚虑留令太久，亟僦民居以为幕府，而力驱刑劫，仅得密院数吏奉行文书，馀皆散漫不合，颇费收拾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297269_comment'></div>臣尝燕居深念，久而不得其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297269_comment'></div>或有过臣言曰：「尔何暗之甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297269_comment'></div>《师》之《坤》曰：『在师中吉，承天宠也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297269_comment'></div>九二以一阳居五阴，此为专属阃外之象，故必有天宠以假借之，然后事权可一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297269_comment'></div>茍不得乎上，则人谁信之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297269_comment'></div>故无人乎宣王之侧，则不能用吉甫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297269_comment'></div>无人乎缪公之侧，则不能安子思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297269_comment'></div>是故有吕夷简而后范仲淹得以宣威陕服，有赵鼎而后张浚得以督师诸路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297269_comment'></div>今尔独荷陛下之知，而素无左右之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297269_comment'></div>尔立朝数月，所请之事无一施行，受命半月，朝令夕改，无所禀承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297269_comment'></div>则自今一远君门，谁实主之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297269_comment'></div>臣麾之使去，曰：「安得斯言之陋也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297269_comment'></div>幸遭遇明主，得效尺寸于戎行，敢有他词」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297269_comment'></div>或又曰：「尔知所以来乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297269_comment'></div>陛下亲政之始，中外臣民封章奏疏，咸欲召臣德秀、臣了翁，而宰执一词以为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297269_comment'></div>陛下以二臣终不可忘也，排群议而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297269_comment'></div>陛下之圣明，孰不倾耸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297269_comment'></div>德秀既至，宰臣终不肯与之共政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297269_comment'></div>其后虽隆以虚名，而不及于用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297269_comment'></div>今尔也幸而无疾，又幸知几之早而求去之勇也，宰执无以中之，则出风雷之令，使之不及掩耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297269_comment'></div>夫汉高帝召拜韩信，付以军旅之事，而萧何谓其如召小儿，故斋戒设坛而后敢遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297269_comment'></div>今并命二人，而一人不及前知，虽假之恩宠以耀群听，实压之事任以杜免章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297269_comment'></div>故度越典常，一日而再命，是乃托此以逐尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297269_comment'></div>而尔不之觉乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297269_comment'></div>臣曰：「此出于圣断，而宰执焉得与闻」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297269_comment'></div>或又曰：「纵出于陛下之独断，而不能无可疑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297269_comment'></div>尔尝言八失尚存，谓如故臣专忌之类，而宰执不为之改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297269_comment'></div>尔尝言四不可恃，谓北军和好之等，而宰执不为之动也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297269_comment'></div>以至重江陵，复旧屯，守故疆等事，言之数矣，而谁实是之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297269_comment'></div>今不幸言而中，狄变作于外，人情摇于内，荆、襄一面，上而金、房、均、光，下而随、枣、安、信，事势日炽，然后急而求尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297269_comment'></div>异时师行日三十里，今以三千里之远，若使速行可五十里，加以沿途应酬军务，亦两月馀而后至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297269_comment'></div>至则春半矣，尔必有逗留之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297269_comment'></div>异时督府非千万缗不行，今楮轻物贵之时，而所给实数仅三百万，则不及异时百五十万之用，金仅得异时十之一，银仅及异时四之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297269_comment'></div>只以湖广总所供亿之数言之，约有二十万人，若人给十千，则二百万缗矣，倍之则又四百万缗矣，而制领将佐在外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297269_comment'></div>今支给之数仅供一犒，而沿途与住府之费不与焉，尔必有乏兴之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297269_comment'></div>异时督府应诸路之调遣，如叶义问遣虞允文趣李显忠交军，允文赍金银楮币告牒以行，故得以便宜纠合将士，乘机剿敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297269_comment'></div>今尔有馀力可以给遣行之官吏乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1297269_comment'></div>异时张浚董师川陕，使赵开措置财用，一岁之财可计者粮一百六十馀万石，而对籴居其半；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1297269_comment'></div>钱三千馀万缗，而盐酒税亦半之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1297269_comment'></div>盖是时藏之民者犹有馀力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1297269_comment'></div>今尔之为钱粮官者数百万缗，一犒而尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1297269_comment'></div>当此公私赤立之时，所馀用度将于何取之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1297269_comment'></div>夫士修之于家，而坏之于天子之庭，今宰执不得沮尔于去岁，而坏尔于今日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1297269_comment'></div>昔颜真卿之出使，举朝为之失色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1297269_comment'></div>韩愈之宣谕，穆宗为之悔惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1297269_comment'></div>至近世富弼之出疆，亦以执政不悦，因事罪之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1297269_comment'></div>今国人皆知尔之不得乎上，无应于内，故不尔从，而尚可行乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1297269_comment'></div>臣思之累日，方悟其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1297269_comment'></div>然犹不欲以仰渎天听，每朝奏事，面承圣训，犹不敢固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1297269_comment'></div>今以人情落落，作之不应，招之不来，孑然孤踪，块守陋屋，而忧厉熏其内，程期迫于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1297269_comment'></div>深念臣之事君，宁其触犯以取忤，不可欺隐而茍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1297269_comment'></div>臣伏见数日以来，左相慨然请行，而右相亦欲身任其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1297269_comment'></div>盖兹事当用亲信久任之宰相，不当用疏远骤进之书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1297269_comment'></div>而况二相服在大寮，多历年所，凡今专阃之臣，下逮将士，皆其亲所识拔，斡旋运掉，如身使臂，气势联属，靡不如意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1297269_comment'></div>岂可与一旦骤升无所援助者，同日而语？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1297269_comment'></div>陛下若从其请，则事体增重，人心胥奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1297269_comment'></div>或不欲强其行，则其次又有枢府二臣，翱翔要近之日久，究谙国事，阅习人才，亦岂不可与兹选，而必欲委其事于臣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1297269_comment'></div>使其冥行而不知退，则不惟使宰相蒙挤排士类之讥，亦使臣受不自揆度之谤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1297269_comment'></div>臣又见侍御史李鸣复，谓臣失之太轻，将有不审之失，有乖误之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1297269_comment'></div>又谓既有制帅，奚以督视为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1297269_comment'></div>局面既新，旧弊如故，奚以督视为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1297269_comment'></div>其言极为谆切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1297269_comment'></div>是虽出于忿激之私，其实知臣之病莫过于此论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1297269_comment'></div>督府之不当建，莫切于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1297269_comment'></div>臣既不为时论所容，今又被命半月，举辟而不见从，申请而不即应，益得以资谗惎者之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1297269_comment'></div>迟迟数日，必遭口语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1297269_comment'></div>或幸而得出都门，则决无吕、赵诸臣之应乎内，陛下虽欲保全而亦不能矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1297269_comment'></div>进退迟速，皆是获戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1297269_comment'></div>获戾不足恤也，宁不误国事乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1297269_comment'></div>夫古之受任者，上下交孚，表里相应，然后威棱气焰，有以号召奔走，何事之不可为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1297269_comment'></div>今焉以一人之深知，而宰执公卿以下无一主之，臣固知任重力微，有孤隆委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1297269_comment'></div>然犹勉自鞭策，冀效微劳以报上恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1297269_comment'></div>而未出都门，人情物议已纷纷如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1297269_comment'></div>况又有攻之者曰臣太轻不审，曰奚以督视为，斯言流播，固不待督府有所设施，内而统部，外而夷狄盗贼，皆已知督府之不足恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1297269_comment'></div>纵臣不自揆度，其为无益而有害也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1297269_comment'></div>欲望皇帝陛下矜臣孤远之踪，多忤寡与；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1297269_comment'></div>浅轻之才，动辄得谤，速为检会累牍，早从罢免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1297269_comment'></div>遵照绍兴、隆兴典故，别选宰臣，以当其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1297269_comment'></div>如以臣为避事，则臣乞仍守旧官，以参赞军事从行。<div class='inline'
