id='poem_sentence_98_1297269_comment'></div>伏乞睿旨，即赐处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1297269_comment'></div>臣惟是方命之谴，谨已阖门席稿，恭俟严诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1297269_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_101_1297269'>〔贴黄〕臣恰又见信阳军今月二十四日申状，德安叛贼已引虏骑到城下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1297269_comment'></div>德安距鄂州，不数日可到，而督府至鄂乃在七十日后，深恐远水不救近火，是徒以督府之虚名，有稽招捕之实务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1297269_comment'></div>臣旬日前已给榜劄付王旻、孟珙开谕叛兵常进等，诱以赏格，晓以祸福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1297269_comment'></div>又作赵范书并劄何元寿，使之随宜措置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1297269_comment'></div>昨又劄黄伯固，令权参赞军事，以督府议事厅一面行事，措置守御，皆从军递发行，约七日可到，庶几可以及时济事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1297269_comment'></div>今臣尚留阙下，纵使朝廷速办，指日可行，亦是来年二月方到，决是无益于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1297269_comment'></div>臣既阖门待命，今已一面截日住行书押密院督府文字，听候罢免旨挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1297269_comment'></div>欲乞睿旨宣谕，别议施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1297269_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_109_1297269'>〔又贴黄〕臣窃惟陛下假臣恩宠，以重事任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1297269_comment'></div>今臣既辞事任，则一时所假之恩宠，合行收寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1297269_comment'></div>窃见先帝时曹彦约除宝谟阁待制、四川制置使，彦约辞行，改知福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1297269_comment'></div>彦约以辞制置而受待制，于义不安，于是改集英殿修撰、知潭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1297269_comment'></div>盖人臣辞受之义，固当如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1297269_comment'></div>而朝廷一予一夺，亦不可以不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1297269_comment'></div>臣今既已控辞视师之役，所有执政恩数，难以冒受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1297269_comment'></div>已一面将元被受省劄缴纳尚书省，伏乞睿旨，速赐收回施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1297269_comment'></div>臣又照得今来未受告命，则犹侍从之臣，更不敢仿执政例，至门外待命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1297269_comment'></div>见留寓舍，听候回降，伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_118_1297269_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297243' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297243' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297243?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除权工部侍郎举虞刚简自代奏状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年9月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297243")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297243_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297243'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297243'>伏睹朝请大夫、权发遣利州路提点刑狱公事兼提举常平等事虞刚简才资开爽，学识粹明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297243_comment'></div>得善则笃行而无疑，见义则勇为而不释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297243_comment'></div>其再守郡符，遇红巾之变，给军饷，严江防，威声既张，寇不敢犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297243_comment'></div>其两持宪节，当多盗之冲，修保伍，明赏罚，规摹既立，境内用清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297243_comment'></div>盖学非空言，而才济实用，举以自代，实允公议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1297243_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年</a>　是秋，友人丁黼过访，以其父墓志铭相请。作品：赠奉直大夫丁公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298082' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298082' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298082?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠奉直大夫丁公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298082")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298082_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298082'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298082'>宝庆元年秋，军器监丁黼文伯过史臣魏某言曰：「黼不天，吾父奉直府君以庆元二年□月弃诸孤，厥□年□月葬于石埭县舒溪之南曰鸑溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298082_comment'></div>黼虽贫，凡以致其诚信于亲者既不敢不勉，惟未有以铭吾竁也，敢以前达州王侯东所次行治，将子是属」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298082_comment'></div>某曰：「墓必有铭，汉魏之末造也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298082_comment'></div>文伯方以正学直道为时闻人，兹其显扬不已多乎，而必铭之云」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298082_comment'></div>虽然，余定交于文伯既二十年，知其世为详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298082_comment'></div>余曷敢不铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298082_comment'></div>公讳泰亨，字岩老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298082_comment'></div>丁氏故梁人，自汉将军宽以《易》授同郡砀田王孙，砀沛相近，其后徙沛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298082_comment'></div>公之曾大父洪，赠训武郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298082_comment'></div>大父执中，武德郎，温、处、衢、婺四州都巡检使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298082_comment'></div>父逑，徐州乡贡进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298082_comment'></div>公生四年而遇靖康之变，江淮盗起，马吉等剽池之青阳石埭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298082_comment'></div>武德以尝中材武科入仕，与讨方腊有功，遂以选差青阳之武尉，督捕群盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298082_comment'></div>未几，虏入汴迫徐，贡士携家由清河趋淮阴，以达于青阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298082_comment'></div>丁于沛为右族，自经乱离，南来者仅两院，武德其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298082_comment'></div>武德往来石埭，经理平寇，爱其山水清丽，因托居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298082_comment'></div>相传至贡士，犹梦寐故疆之归，故流移再世，未尝治产业也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298082_comment'></div>公幼而明晤，日记二千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298082_comment'></div>时版本文字尚少，经传史汉书，皆昼抄夜诵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298082_comment'></div>汉晋以来诗文，亦手自编稡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298082_comment'></div>善古文，于诗尤长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298082_comment'></div>以馀力为举子业，率先诸子鸣，远近争辟塾延之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298082_comment'></div>其后疾不能出者十年，皆负笈踵门，诸从子亦从受业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298082_comment'></div>黼时年十四，已知为学之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298082_comment'></div>会永嘉徐子宜为郡教授，公慨然挈往从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298082_comment'></div>徐雅敬公，留与共学，参授后进，而训黼以《语》、《孟》、《中庸》、《大学》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298082_comment'></div>黼幼从公，诵言观行，渐渍已久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298082_comment'></div>至是一闻义理之诱，气竦神悟，卒为成材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298082_comment'></div>公资禀劲直，务质行，不蕲人知，不轻为然诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298082_comment'></div>在贡士侍侧，色庄而气恰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298082_comment'></div>贡士卒，号毁骨立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298082_comment'></div>事母臧夫人，晨兴候户外，昏定，率至夜分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298082_comment'></div>夫人自过江，痛家族流离，不肉食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298082_comment'></div>公食辄不择，有嘉疏旨畜，必问奉夫人已否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298082_comment'></div>夫人年八十二而卒，公老犹致毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298082_comment'></div>与二弟处，极其和孺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298082_comment'></div>呜呼，公之学，其亦异乎世之所谓学者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298082_comment'></div>享年七十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298082_comment'></div>元配章氏，继室孙氏，前后凡五男六女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298082_comment'></div>长男辉，次耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298082_comment'></div>次某，为叔父某后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298082_comment'></div>次黼，次黻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298082_comment'></div>辉、耀、某、黻寻卒，黼今以朝请大夫为军器监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298082_comment'></div>六女各得所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298082_comment'></div>孙男四人，铸、镒未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298082_comment'></div>镐以军器任为将仕郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298082_comment'></div>镕，从事郎、绍兴府司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298082_comment'></div>孙女五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298082_comment'></div>曾孙男女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298082_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1298082'>徐沛之间，邹鲁所邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298082_comment'></div>质实近本，故家典刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298082_comment'></div>公生不辰，逢世孔填。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298082_comment'></div>风气之感，则厚且纯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298082_comment'></div>冲约自持，硕蹇亨屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298082_comment'></div>东周之思，西方美人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298082_comment'></div>允毅丁公，则我思存<span class='inlineComment2'>（《鹤山先生大全文集》卷八一。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298082_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_1298082'>贡：原脱，据四库本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1298082_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年10月19日</a>　诏除职予祠。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年10月23日</a>　诏除集英殿修撰、知常德府，上书辞。作品：辞免除集英殿修撰知常德府状。<div id='poem_1297326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免除集英殿修撰知常德府状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年10月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297326")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297326'>右某今月十九日，准尚书省劄子，三省同奉圣旨，魏某除职予郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297326_comment'></div>二十三日续进省劄，备奉圣旨，魏某除集英殿修撰、知常德府，填见阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297326_comment'></div>某倏闻成命，倍惕危衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297326_comment'></div>伏念某顷因属疾之馀，数羾祝釐之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297326_comment'></div>一年之内，移告累旬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297326_comment'></div>六月以来，陈情八上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297326_comment'></div>会玷共工之贰，再腾控免之词，冀奉真祠，稍图私佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297326_comment'></div>兹叨误柬，终閟俞音，宠论撰之隆名，畀藩宣之重寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297326_comment'></div>况殿閤十有三等，集英独号于热官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297326_comment'></div>而荆湖十有五州，常武实称于重镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297326_comment'></div>岂以抱痾之久，属兹求退之频，知其不可为而为，是谓非所据而据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297326_comment'></div>周章失措，跼蹐靡皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297326_comment'></div>欲望朝廷，特赐敷奏，曲怜病体，覆视累陈，毋拘反汗之嫌，俾遂归田之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297326_comment'></div>所有恩命，某未敢祗受。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1297326_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年10月</a>　为友人陆持之撰写墓志铭。作品：陆伯微持之墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298045' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298045' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298045?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陆伯微持之墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆元年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298045")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298045_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298045'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298045'>嘉定十有六年冬正元日，先皇帝御路朝，特诏陆持之秘书省读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298045_comment'></div>持之字伯微，故象山先生文安公之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298045_comment'></div>固辞不获命，既至，又诏以迪功郎入省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298045_comment'></div>余时秉笔太史，一见如旧交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298045_comment'></div>明年之元日，余为秘书监，又得同省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298045_comment'></div>余尝榜所居室曰「自庵」，伯微问所以名，余曰：「《易》象于天行言『自彊不息』，于明出地上言『自昭明德』，天之健也，日之进也，非以为人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298045_comment'></div>伯微竦然曰：「吾所素讲也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298045_comment'></div>为余作铭，大要谓义袭而取之与集义所生，当致辨于内外宾主之分，以发名庵之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298045_comment'></div>余以是益奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298045_comment'></div>伯微凡再乞归，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298045_comment'></div>上即位，转修职郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298045_comment'></div>冬十有一月，诏与堂除属官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298045_comment'></div>宝庆元年春，差干办浙西安抚司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298045_comment'></div>命未下而伯微病矣，请致其仕，特命改通直郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298045_comment'></div>遂以三月甲子属纩，年五十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298045_comment'></div>诸公贵人嗟惜同声，竞致赙恤，始得脱輤于牖下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298045_comment'></div>厥十月，其孤以书来曰：「先君之葬，既卜兆于文安之墓侧，卜日于十一月之庚申，重惟知先君莫子若也，识竁之文，敢以他属？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298045_comment'></div>诸孤杖而执事于殡，使先君之门人张璞以冯曾所次行实请，子其毋辞也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298045_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298045_comment'></div>伯微余益友也，铭不敢不诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298045_comment'></div>陆氏之系，语在文安志状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298045_comment'></div>伯微曾大父戬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298045_comment'></div>大父贺，赠宣教郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298045_comment'></div>生六子，季曰九渊，学者尊其道，称之曰象山先生，终奉议郎、知荆门军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298045_comment'></div>娶吴氏，封太孺人，生二子，伯微其长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298045_comment'></div>生而英晤，七岁援笔成文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298045_comment'></div>文安授徒于家，伯微侍侧，从容出一语，同堂生莫能易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298045_comment'></div>为敕局删定，伯微年才十三，严重如成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298045_comment'></div>开讲象山，徒众百人，有未达，伯微为敷绎厥旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298045_comment'></div>出守荆门，会郡治失火，伯微仓卒指授中程，文安器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298045_comment'></div>文安没，伯父梭山先生九龄言动必识，事太孺人以孝谨著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298045_comment'></div>盱江利文伯，文安高弟也，佐邑金溪，伯微将师事之，谢不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298045_comment'></div>与人语，有所启发，诵之终身，凡可以资取成德者，如愤如失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298045_comment'></div>迨其划然启，油然得，气豁神竦，昆弟友朋或讶其日改月化，伯微不以自足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298045_comment'></div>尤善观人，气有纯驳，才有高下，抑扬开阖，各中其会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298045_comment'></div>开禧北征，伯微屏居且二十年矣，忧时不怿，乃历聘时贤，将以有告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298045_comment'></div>过九江见徐公谊，时议防江，伯微请择僚吏察地形，孰险而守，孰易而战，孰隘而伏，毋专为江守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298045_comment'></div>徐又问，伯微具言：「自古兴事造业，非有学以辅之，往往皆以血气盛衰为锐惰，故三国、两晋诸贤多以盛年成功名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298045_comment'></div>公更天下事变多矣，未举一事，而朝思夕惟，利害分数先入于中，愚恐其为之难也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298045_comment'></div>徐怃然，留与语数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298045_comment'></div>又之鄂谒薛公叔似、项公安世，之荆谒吴公猎，争先延礼，寻皆谢归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298045_comment'></div>著书十篇，名以《戆说》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298045_comment'></div>嘉定三年，试江西转运司与选，既下第，即所居讲授生徒，有池旧名百荐，遂以荐名堂，著书有《易提纲》《诸经杂说》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298045_comment'></div>常平使袁公燮荐于朝，谓伯微议论不为空言，缓急有可倚仗，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298045_comment'></div>豫章建东湖书院，连帅驰书币，强起伯微长之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298045_comment'></div>寻以太孺人年高辞归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298045_comment'></div>居四年，卫公泾又致之，累辞乃就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298045_comment'></div>诸生习于閒放，出入无节，伯微每旦会揖，即编其姓名于牒，不至者麾之，由是皆集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298045_comment'></div>遇有讲授，卫公率僚属往听焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298045_comment'></div>其教大抵使人反求近思，以不失其性之本明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298045_comment'></div>与人言疏畅磊落，而自律严谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298045_comment'></div>骤见若和易，至反覆问辩，则壁立千仞，无少假借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298045_comment'></div>人有思念旬时不决，若累千百语不能竟，伯微判之俄顷，尽以一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298045_comment'></div>盖其生长见闻既加人一等，而精敏强济又足以践其所闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298045_comment'></div>然而晚得一官，阅十有九月而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298045_comment'></div>世之爵不称德、荣不盖愧者往往以是，独与儒生学士铢较寸量，呜呼，天果梦梦矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298045_comment'></div>二男子：湀、泂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298045_comment'></div>四女子，尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298045_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_1298045'>金溪之陆，自象山氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298045_comment'></div>昆令季彊，以学名士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298045_comment'></div>天啬厥施，罔庸于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298045_comment'></div>仅垂空言，以淑尔私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298045_comment'></div>谓天啬之，而寿厥后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298045_comment'></div>吁嗟焘矣，亦罔克寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298045_comment'></div>永兴之阡，英烈言言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298045_comment'></div>有稽陆学，兹维其传。</div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1298045_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年</a>　约于十月间，上书荐举杨子谟、李燔、陈宓、徐侨等五人。作品：应诏荐杨子谟等五人奏状。<div id='poem_1297244' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297244' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297244?labeling=true' target='_blank'>应诏荐杨子谟等五人奏状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297244")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297244_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297244'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297244'>右，臣伏睹陛下自即大位，尊礼耆老，招延髦彦，盖皆久在外服，不求闻达于时者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297244_comment'></div>凡以章示好恶，转移风俗之机，莫切于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297244_comment'></div>犹以为未足也，诏有位之士各举贤能才识之士，且诲之曰：「岂无才德道艺蓄而未用者待我后之人」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297244_comment'></div>臣敢妄揣圣意，于久蓄未用之中遍加搜索，凡得五人，谨用开陈，仰赞盛举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297244_comment'></div>臣伏见中奉大夫、直显谟阁杨子谟，端凝而质实，宽厚而粹明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297244_comment'></div>家居十年，信道益笃，讲明义理之学，以淑后进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297244_comment'></div>一方之士，执经受业，所趋向正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297244_comment'></div>虽已蒙朝廷为续祠廪，而精力未衰，久寘閒散，公论所惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297244_comment'></div>朝奉大夫、新知漳州陈宓，简廉而端方，忠荩而平实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297244_comment'></div>事所当言，宁犯患而不顾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297244_comment'></div>义所不可，虽见得而不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297244_comment'></div>朝廷累擢名郡，虽若深知其人，而久在外服，未究厥蕴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297244_comment'></div>朝请郎、主管建康府崇僖观徐侨，器资清方，基宇高邃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297244_comment'></div>孜孜体国，不以得失贰其心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297244_comment'></div>恂恂守道，不以贫约累其守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297244_comment'></div>朝廷畀之祠禄，虽已表其廉靖，而尚淹家食，未见于用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297244_comment'></div>奉议郎、通判潭州军州事李燔学精而识明，行安而节和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297244_comment'></div>家庐山之阳，坚苦刻厉，守其师朱熹之说，若将终身焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297244_comment'></div>尝除职事官，乃自诡以民事，朝廷嘉其靖退，特旨改秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297244_comment'></div>虽云旌别，而佥论所属，盖不止此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297244_comment'></div>从政郎刘宰，秉心静夷，迪德平正，居官尽瘁，不求人知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297244_comment'></div>行修于家，学修于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297244_comment'></div>人有缓急，必从扣问；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297244_comment'></div>事有曲直，必从取正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297244_comment'></div>今久不到选，抱材里居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297244_comment'></div>臣谓此五人者，或蒙朝廷擢用，寘之华近，则正学直道，随事救药，不惟有补于时，而清规亮节，表表朝端，亦足以彰好示俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297244_comment'></div>此于初政，关系匪轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297244_comment'></div>臣今所举，皆是事实，后不如所举，臣甘坐谬举之罪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1297244_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年11月27日</a>　朱端常论魏了翁欺世盗名，追降朝请郎，靖州居住。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年</a>　约于是时，友人谯仲午致信，论士习之弊。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年</a>　约于是时，楼治以其父楼钥文集序言相请，会得罪南徙，未果，仅为《内禅诏书》草稿作跋。作品：跋楼参政绍熙五年内禅诏草。<div id='poem_1297772' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297772' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297772?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋楼参政绍熙五年内禅诏草</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297772")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297772_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297772'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297772'>某未冠时，侍长老听绍熙末年内禅诏书，至所谓「虽丧纪自行于宫中，而礼文难示于天下」，为之色然以叹，知朝廷有人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297772_comment'></div>后此三十二年，乃获观藁墨于宣献楼公之季子，又见当时删易钩注，虽仓卒之顷，动中理道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297772_comment'></div>孟子曰「天子不能以天下与人」，然则言动机微之间，莫非天命之流行，岂一毫人力所能予夺其间乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297772_comment'></div>史官魏某谨书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1297772_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年</a>　临行，自朝臣至京城士子祖帐余杭门外，为之饯行，连日不绝。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='46f7b981acb14a8fabdfcd7b65fd6f62_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("46f7b981acb14a8fabdfcd7b65fd6f62");'><span id='46f7b981acb14a8fabdfcd7b65fd6f62_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1225&endYear=1225')">1225年</a>，48岁</div><div id='46f7b981acb14a8fabdfcd7b65fd6f62' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，友人丁黼欲刊行其师钱文子之《钱氏诗集传》，为作序言。作品：钱氏诗集传序。<div id='poem_1297606' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297606' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297606?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钱氏诗集传序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297606")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297606_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297606'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297606'>古之言《诗》以见志者，载于《鲁论》、《左传》及子思、孟子诸书，与今之为《诗》事实、文义、音韵、章句之不合者盖什六七，而贯融精粗，耦事合变，不翅自其口出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297606_comment'></div>大抵作者本诸性情之正而说者亦以发其性情之实，不拘拘于文辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297606_comment'></div>自孔、孟氏没，遗言仅存，乃皆去籍焚书之馀，编残简脱，师异指殊，历汉、魏、晋、隋，久而无所统壹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297606_comment'></div>上之人思所以救之，于是《尚书》存孔，三《礼》守郑，《易》非王氏不宗，《春秋》惟优左、杜，《诗》专取毛、郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297606_comment'></div>士岂无耳目肺肠，而不能以自信也，则宁倍往圣不刊之经，毋违时王所主之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297606_comment'></div>所谓传者，千百家中一人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297606_comment'></div>而一时好尚，遂定为学者之正鹄，佔毕训故悉惟其意，违之则曰是非经指也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297606_comment'></div>以他书且不可，况言《诗》乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297606_comment'></div>《诗》之专于毛、郑，其来已久，舍是诚无所宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297606_comment'></div>然其间有浅闇拘迫之说，非皆毛、郑之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297606_comment'></div>序文自一言而下，皆历世讲师因文起义、傅会穿凿之说，乃敢与经文错行，而人不以为疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297606_comment'></div>毛传简要平实，无臆说，无改字，于序文无所与，犹足以存旧闻开来哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297606_comment'></div>至郑氏惟序是信，则往往迁就迎合，傅以三《礼》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297606_comment'></div>彼其于《诗》于《礼》，文同而释异，己且不能自信也，而流及后世，则皆推之为不可迁之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297606_comment'></div>迨我国朝之盛，然后欧、苏、程、张诸儒昉以圣贤之意，是正其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297606_comment'></div>人知末师之不可尽信，则相与辩序文，正古音，破改字之谬，辟专门之隘，各有以自靖自献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297606_comment'></div>极于近世，吕成公集众善，存异本，朱文公复古经，主叶韵，然后「兴观群怨」之旨可以吟咏体习，庶几其无遗憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297606_comment'></div>永嘉钱公又并去讲师增益之说，唯存序首一言，约文述指，篇为一赞，凡旧说之涉乎矜己讪上、伤俗害伦者，皆在所不取，题曰《钱氏集传》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297606_comment'></div>又别为诂释如《尔雅》类例者，使人便于习读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297606_comment'></div>始公奉使成都，尝出以示予，至是门人丁文伯黼起家守庐陵，将为板行而属予题辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297606_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297606_comment'></div>圣人之经犹王室也，二牧三监九宗五正相与同心僇力，黜其不衷，疆以周索，虽《匪风》《下泉》之弱也，苟有是志，犹足以维持人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297606_comment'></div>况钜人价藩，实翰王略，予惧不得与于执事，其何敢辞！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297606_comment'></div>钱公名文子，字文季，永嘉人，蚤以明经厉志有声庠序，仕至宗正少卿，学术行谊为人士宗仰云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1297606_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，应友人李鼎之请，撰《夔州重建州学记》<div id='poem_1297926' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297926' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297926?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夔州重建州学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297926")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297926_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297926'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297926'>庐陵李侯镇夔之明年，大修学官成，以书抵某曰：「夔故有学，自淳熙之季帅守某侯某尝撤而新之，仅历三纪，蛊坏弗治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297926_comment'></div>今军器监丁侯黼与转运判官王君观之尝议更葺，且病其门术弗正也，为审端焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297926_comment'></div>各捐钱二千万，市材于恭、涪、黔，市竹于云安、大宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297926_comment'></div>既赋丈鸠功，会丁侯召去，余实来，乃与王君卒其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297926_comment'></div>各增钱千万，始嘉定十六年之六月，讫宝庆元年之五月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297926_comment'></div>礼殿、讲堂、斋馆、门序，次第一新，而云章有阁，从祀有象，先贤有祠，文会有所，直宿有舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297926_comment'></div>学故有李氏五桂楼，今复建于东偏，祠六君子其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297926_comment'></div>以至庖湢筦库，黝垩陶甓，率视旧加隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297926_comment'></div>役成，帅士者修舍菜之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297926_comment'></div>余又念堂曰明伦而无以训迪之也，乃摘六经、《语》、《孟》切于伦理者凡八条，大书深刻而壁寘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297926_comment'></div>士谓是役不可无纪也，以惟子也请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297926_comment'></div>顾某不佞，何足以与乎此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297926_comment'></div>虽然，尝闻之，斯民也三代之所与共学者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297926_comment'></div>然而古今异俗，则亦有幸不幸焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297926_comment'></div>三代建学立师之制，于周为详，今《周官》所述惟大司乐成均之法、师氏王宫之教、乡遂属民读法之节，而他未有考焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297926_comment'></div>参之诸书，则自二十五家之闾为塾，以里居之有道德者为左右师，所以合国人弟子，导以幼学之节而养其良知之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297926_comment'></div>由是升之党庠，升之术序，升之国学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297926_comment'></div>不特王公大夫士之子也，乡之俊选莫不咸在；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297926_comment'></div>不特小乐正教以威仪也，大乐正迪之以义理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297926_comment'></div>不特齿及宾介也，郊人之疏贱亦取爵于堂上之尊以相旅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297926_comment'></div>不特三岁而案比也，中年而校其进否；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297926_comment'></div>不特六乡兴贤也，自遂以降至三等之国亦如乡制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297926_comment'></div>盖曰天之生斯民也，仁义礼智之性、父子君臣夫妇长幼朋友之伦，民所同有也，而行之不著，习矣不察，是故立之后王君公，承以大夫师长，建之学校庠序，则所以为之耳目，导其所向，使充是四端，行诸五典，有亲、有义、有别、有序、有信，而无不尽其分焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297926_comment'></div>是先觉先知者之责至重而不轻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297926_comment'></div>又虑其笃近而遗远、详贵而略贱也，则联以井牧，书以比闾，合以射乡，考以节授，盈天地间无尺地一民不相属焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297926_comment'></div>夫然，故民生其时，出入有教，动息有养，所谓人有士君子之行者，非虚语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297926_comment'></div>自上失其道，莫知所以君之师之，上以权谋利禄为操世之具，下以揣摩迎合为取宠之资，于是小有才者捷出，居近利者速化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297926_comment'></div>至科目之设，则士自童习已有计功求获之志，而俗日以卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297926_comment'></div>其间岂无不待文王而兴者，然不能皆尔，而况小有才则溺愈深，居近利则坏愈速，记览而谓之学，词采而谓之文，虚无而谓之道，袭讹承陋，不自觉知，甚者则有口谈儒术，心是异端者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297926_comment'></div>夫后王君公、大夫师长、学校庠序，本所以为时人之耳目，使知有广居可居，正位可位，大道可行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297926_comment'></div>而千百年间，为之耳目者反有以误其所向，俾之旷安宅，舍正路，倒行逆施，伥伥然无所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297926_comment'></div>盖至于本朝之盛，诸儒迭出，正学中兴，然后士识所趋，知有人己义利之辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297926_comment'></div>然而二百年间，笃信而力行者犹可枚数，则以染濡既久，自奋维艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297926_comment'></div>呜呼，生于三代者，果何其甚幸邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297926_comment'></div>周始于后稷，夏商终于杞宋，皆二千馀年有国，圣贤后先，治化休盛，明伦立本，其效固若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297926_comment'></div>而秦、汉以下，乱浮于治，士鲜常心，则为人耳目者亦尝思其故乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297926_comment'></div>夔地虽陋而接壤二蜀，蜀之学者自先汉之初巳能方驾齐鲁，故史谓巴蜀好文雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297926_comment'></div>今夔之诸郡则巴之故壤也，重以孔明、子美之所熏渍，质实而近本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297926_comment'></div>况今幸生诸儒之后，理义精明，乃牧乃监又相与为之耳目以导之使趋，然则如前所谓揣摩迎合、为利禄计者，士既知所耻矣，则反其性之所自有，尽其分之所得为，士亦知所勉哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297926_comment'></div>谨以是复于侯而识诸牲石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297926_comment'></div>侯名鼎，尝为宗正丞兼驾部郎官，今以直敷文阁镇夔，苟可以崇化善俗者无不为也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1297926_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，应友人王自强之请，为其兄王自中撰写墓志铭。作品：宋故籍田令知信州王公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298056' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298056' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298056?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋故籍田令知信州王公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298056")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298056_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298056'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298056'>共惟乾道、淳熙之盛，俊乂错出，祖宗德泽之感，前哲风流之被，固非一日，亦惟我孝宗皇帝封培而兴作之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298056_comment'></div>是时官无小，士无远，姓名登闻，朝奏暮召，从容造膝，交启互发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298056_comment'></div>人知疑必问，问必辩也，莫不积诚以备对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298056_comment'></div>夫然，故事有中失不可诬也，人有能否不可掩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298056_comment'></div>淳熙十年，分水县令王公自中以中书舍人王公蔺特荐，诏赴都堂审察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298056_comment'></div>未至，帝数以问近臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298056_comment'></div>及见，帝曰：「望卿甚久」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298056_comment'></div>公曰：「昨诣堂，宰执已传谕圣旨，草茅贱微，何自得此」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298056_comment'></div>因反覆敷陈数百言，帝为动容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298056_comment'></div>徐出二疏，其略曰：「臣尝读唐《兵志》有言，蓄兵所以止乱也，及其弊也，反以为乱，又其甚也，至困天下以养乱，未尝不为寒心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298056_comment'></div>今去古既远，井地之赋不得而论矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298056_comment'></div>所可论者，唯唐初国无供军之费而军足以待事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298056_comment'></div>故自贞观至开元，百三十年间，战胜攻取，伸缩如意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298056_comment'></div>自其法废，致天下大乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298056_comment'></div>太祖皇帝有意于更革，而当时议者未能远谋，故为今日之计，莫若取唐之意推而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298056_comment'></div>唐初民田皆从官给，今两淮、荆襄、西蜀，三边之地田之在官者，往往散而为民田，民田正数之外，包占尚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298056_comment'></div>朝廷务宽边民，终不致诘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298056_comment'></div>臣请言之：曰营田，曰力田，曰屯田，曰宫庄，曰荒田，曰逃绝户田，此边田之在官者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298056_comment'></div>曰元请佃田，曰承佃田，曰买佃田，曰自陈、续陈田，此边田之在民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298056_comment'></div>曰义勇，曰神劲军，曰弓弩手，曰山水砦，此边军之在民者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298056_comment'></div>州曰厢禁军，县曰弓手，镇砦曰土军，其重地皆有戍军，此边军之在官者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298056_comment'></div>有官军、有民军、有戍军之地，又皆有城池，若可以为固矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298056_comment'></div>然有城而不能守，不如无城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298056_comment'></div>今戍军往来，仅同逆旅，人之多寡不与城称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298056_comment'></div>号为义勇者，又为生生之具，一旦有警，则民必先逃，而军亦不能守矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298056_comment'></div>守且不可，奚暇议攻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298056_comment'></div>臣愚谓宜尽以并边州县镇砦分缓急为上中下三等，以精卒配之，多者至三五千人，少者不下数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298056_comment'></div>然后以田之在民者家出一夫为卒，得免其田税六七十亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298056_comment'></div>家无常人，人无常数，取其强力武艺堪充军者而精其选，使勇者知贵，怯者知耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298056_comment'></div>其民之田多者，听以田募客为卒，卒五人以某生户为伍长，而免田税二百亩，十人则为什长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298056_comment'></div>田愈多者军愈众，军愈众者税愈轻，而阶级又愈进，入则有主客之恩，出则有部曲之分，租课悉循其初，官无所与，而新募流民者官更量给之，如此则主户乐出其田募民而为卒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298056_comment'></div>于是因民田之近于州者，三十里内皆使家于州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298056_comment'></div>近于县者，二十里内皆使家于县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298056_comment'></div>及新种之时，乃以古制即田为庐，田事毕而后反，使与所配之卒犬牙而居，不为营而为坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298056_comment'></div>为民者因农隙以事武，为卒者皆分为三番，而季一上，以给官司之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298056_comment'></div>盖一年之间，番上者仅四月，而馀月得自治生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298056_comment'></div>夫如是，则军民合一，通馈问，结婚姻，皆有安居乐业之念，而吾事集矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298056_comment'></div>下至镇砦，亦莫不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298056_comment'></div>去州县镇砦远则聚而居之，为之府如唐法，上府千二百人，中府千人，下府八百人，立都尉将校之官，为堡障战守之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298056_comment'></div>依险负阻，相度经营，务合事宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298056_comment'></div>名其军曰卫府，此民田也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298056_comment'></div>官田则官募军或民分屯之，悉从府卫之法，每屯上至千二百人，下至八百人，名其军曰屯府，此官田也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298056_comment'></div>如是，则并边之地无一夫非卒，皆思所以保家计，存骨肉，卒然有戎，莫不协心毕力，以事死敌，其与族寓之军闻风先溃者，功相万矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298056_comment'></div>积以数年，屯卫军益强，官军缺者勿补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298056_comment'></div>军益强，费益省，恢复之后，即推其法于西北，而卫屯之军满天下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298056_comment'></div>然又当先选天下忠良勤干之贤，不间文武，为之守令将帅，授以方略，责以事功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298056_comment'></div>贤焉则久其任，且使其子若孙之贤者得世其爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298056_comment'></div>尽罢诸司而专以总领者统治之，通融有无，品节劳逸，增鼓铸以给其资，置平籴以收其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298056_comment'></div>迁移招集，适于便宜者辄行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298056_comment'></div>于是练沿江之屯以壮边军之心，练三衙之军以为顺动之备，又练内地州县军以待不时之须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298056_comment'></div>令天下皆设武学，立子弟所，招效士以收翘楚之才，文武并用，军民杂居，化民为卒，化卒为民，使其声势足以相接，密疏足以相维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298056_comment'></div>四头八尾，触处为首，击其首则尾至，击其尾则首至，击其中则首尾俱至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298056_comment'></div>虏若猖狂来寇，则清野入守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298056_comment'></div>虏攻一处，必虞诸处之师，势不免立营置栅，分兵抄掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298056_comment'></div>则所在府兵依其乡井设伏，出奇以破之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298056_comment'></div>若长驱深入，则我表里之军夹而蹙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298056_comment'></div>欲全师而出，则我之诸军随而蹑之，持重徐行，见可则进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298056_comment'></div>于是六飞亲督侍卫之兵出临江上，气势既合，斟酌号令，明信偿罚，务尽众善，无一发差舛，则北方豪杰舍二百年父母之国将安之乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298056_comment'></div>其二略曰：「臣尝观自昔兴王之世，必有道同志合之士，此不可多得，得四三人或一二人足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298056_comment'></div>陛下必已有所属，臣不得而知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298056_comment'></div>臣徒怪所在州县或连数城，以守令问之，民鲜不非笑，是使元元安所倚赖？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298056_comment'></div>风俗奚由美？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298056_comment'></div>奸盗奚由戢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298056_comment'></div>或重用之，又将何以胜任」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298056_comment'></div>奏对之明日，特命改合入官，除籍田令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298056_comment'></div>数语大臣：「朕急欲用自中，可与超迁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298056_comment'></div>未几，又语大臣：「自中必有善类，令举其所知者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298056_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298056_comment'></div>君臣之间，未有相得之素，一朝陈谟，问对蜂出，无虑数千百言，猗其伟欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298056_comment'></div>后四十有四年，通判绍兴王自强以书抵余曰：「吾兄道夫有经世大虑，受孝、光两朝非常之遇，卒困于谗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298056_comment'></div>庆元五年八月癸未，赍志以没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298056_comment'></div>厥十有一月，葬仙坛故山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298056_comment'></div>中书舍人陈公傅良志其圹，今未有以铭之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298056_comment'></div>子秉笔太史氏，可使堙没无传？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298056_comment'></div>敢状其事，以惟子也请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298056_comment'></div>按状，王氏系出琅琊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298056_comment'></div>五季之乱，自闽徙温之莆门，高祖父母徙凤池，葬际坑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298056_comment'></div>公之曾大父正臣，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298056_comment'></div>大父成子，又徙四溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298056_comment'></div>父廷佐，累赠朝请郎，母安人施氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298056_comment'></div>生三子，公为长，气度超绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298056_comment'></div>年十八，丞相叶公梦锡尝辟塾延之，命诸子从学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298056_comment'></div>明年入都，诸公闻风愿交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298056_comment'></div>参知政事周公葵、给事中吴公芾、礼部侍郎王公十朋尤见器重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1298056_comment'></div>乾道三年，朝廷议遣归正人，公叹曰：「是绝中原之望也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1298056_comment'></div>诣阙上三疏固争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1298056_comment'></div>其意谓朝廷内虚无贤，掇时相怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1298056_comment'></div>初议罪，时相面奏云：「靖康因士人伏阙几召乱，尝著令伏阙者斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1298056_comment'></div>如自中者，陛下前欲从恕，且当远窜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1298056_comment'></div>帝曰：「不可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1298056_comment'></div>曰：「亦须编管」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1298056_comment'></div>帝又曰：「不可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1298056_comment'></div>曰：「送远郡听读」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1298056_comment'></div>帝曰：「送近处」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1298056_comment'></div>于是遣之徽州，仍谕知临安府姚令则，差晓事使臣发送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1298056_comment'></div>姚面宣上意以戒使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1298056_comment'></div>是冬，时相去位，戚方以贿败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1298056_comment'></div>公以书自通于尚书周公操，未之识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1298056_comment'></div>得书大悦，率同列白其事，以郊霈得自便，听读人该赦自公始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1298056_comment'></div>乾道六年春，谒范公成大于西掖，始识韩公彦古，距上书时四年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1298056_comment'></div>淳熙元年就试两浙转运司，为诗赋第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1298056_comment'></div>四年再举，登明年进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1298056_comment'></div>周益公必大为详定官，谓公论宣和、大观事皆人所不能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1298056_comment'></div>暨殿试，中第一，孝宗皇帝宣问，籍记其姓名，循修职郎、舒州怀宁主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1298056_comment'></div>两淮旱，以赈济有方，资政赵公彦逾以漕节行郡，举之以风诸郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1298056_comment'></div>燕公世良代之，以朝命下州敷买六合筑城砖，州县惧乏兴，勿敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1298056_comment'></div>公乃言曰：「旱暵为虐，而边臣遽请城筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1298056_comment'></div>且以蕲、黄、舒、和、无为五郡言之，砖以片计二百二十二万，片一十八斤，为钱三千六百重，人荷四片，为钱十四千四百，丁庸船僦，此何从出也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1298056_comment'></div>燕用其说，人两贤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1298056_comment'></div>其后为令奉常，会监察御史阙，帝善其前对，欲用公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1298056_comment'></div>王鲁公谓公尝言朝士皆不可用，今为御史则朝士皆当束担矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1298056_comment'></div>于是忌者并力索瘢，不可得，遂诬公布衣时纳韩彦古，今荐其才堪宰相，右正言蒋继周劾公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1298056_comment'></div>方公上书时，韩在下僚，未之识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1298056_comment'></div>公既去国，孝宗简记不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1298056_comment'></div>蔡邵州必胜陛辞，帝曰：「人才不易得，如王自中本无事，等閒教去，心颇念之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1298056_comment'></div>于是排沮者益力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1298056_comment'></div>明年二月，帝谕辅臣与边郡，辞以资浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1298056_comment'></div>上曰：「且与通判」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1298056_comment'></div>道授郢州通判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1298056_comment'></div>十四年三月之郢，道改知光化军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1298056_comment'></div>初，上谕宰执以见阙边郡授武学博士邹诩，及进呈，上特笔命公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1298056_comment'></div>公守边务在结人心，固保障，为民代输绍熙元年夏料役钱，减常贷直，免房廊河渡等钱，赏罚有章，人乐为用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1298056_comment'></div>绍熙二年入见，光宗皇帝云：「闻卿有忠直之誉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1298056_comment'></div>又问常时作郡来，当为何官，欲留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1298056_comment'></div>公谢曰：「朝列有不相乐者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1298056_comment'></div>帝曰：「朕嗣位之日，寿皇言卿可用，令朕记取」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1298056_comment'></div>公固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1298056_comment'></div>翌日，帝谓宰执曰：「王自中以母老再三不肯留，近郡孰阙守」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1298056_comment'></div>以常、信对，遂差知信州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1298056_comment'></div>为政简静知大体，六邑多逋负，公为宽补解之缗，严当上之数，皆感激思奋，课更以最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1298056_comment'></div>期年，被命奏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1298056_comment'></div>丁太安人忧，庆元元年二月服阕，监察御史王恬掇拾蒋疏再论公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1298056_comment'></div>四年四月差知邵州，中书谢舍人源明封缴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1298056_comment'></div>朝廷察其非辜，畀以祠禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1298056_comment'></div>五年，诏填兴化见阙，谢犹在后省，同舍又封缴，然未几公亦病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1298056_comment'></div>积阶至朝请郎，享年六十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1298056_comment'></div>以孝友称，自奉简，俸馀悉以给亲友之贫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1298056_comment'></div>尝以差役为风俗害，率同志为义社，第赀产以定役次，由是乡闾息争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1298056_comment'></div>博通古今，文气奇杰，尝注《孙子新略》前后序并历代年纪十二卷、《王政纪原》三卷、表启奏劄歌诗五卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1298056_comment'></div>公自号厚轩居士，因以目文集焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1298056_comment'></div>娶林氏，封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1298056_comment'></div>二子：长遵度，迪功郎、前安丰军霍丘县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1298056_comment'></div>次遵庾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1298056_comment'></div>四女子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1298056_comment'></div>凡皆状所述，而状作于卒葬之年，今追为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_144_1298056'>莫难乎时几之会，莫乐乎臣主之逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1298056_comment'></div>孰乘墉于陵之时，孰噬胏乎颐之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1298056_comment'></div>弗骏厥庸，以甸我邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1298056_comment'></div>呜呼，奈何乎公！</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_147_1298056'></div><div id='poem_sentence_147_1298056_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，应友人孙之宏之请，为其母撰写墓志铭。作品：太孺人吴氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298085' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298085' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298085?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太孺人吴氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298085")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298085_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298085'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298085'>宝庆元年，余待罪太史氏，粤人孙之宏与余雅相善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298085_comment'></div>一日泣而请曰：「之宏不天，夙丧我先君，吾母抚诸孤凡二十有四年而又弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298085_comment'></div>厥既得卜祔于吾父之兆而未有以铭也，敢惟子也请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298085_comment'></div>余曰：「子善自饬以成其身，兹其为铭大矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298085_comment'></div>曰：「是敢不勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298085_comment'></div>虽然，之宏之穷毒人有不及知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298085_comment'></div>我先君之五世自山阴徙馀姚，皆力穑自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298085_comment'></div>伯父早卒，大父修职某、大母胡夫人年浸高，先君独任家事，褚无私藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298085_comment'></div>吾母承顺其志，虽馀财斥币，恬不訾省，得故衣败絮亦与冢姒陆氏尺裂而均之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298085_comment'></div>讫先君之世，聚居雍睦无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298085_comment'></div>先君肆力于学，州荐其名，益从师友讲肄，矹矹穷晨夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298085_comment'></div>或寻师它州，动涉旬岁，吾母服劳馈事，不以累先君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298085_comment'></div>君性素刚，毋问戚疏，必觇其所趣而进退之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298085_comment'></div>吾母务为涵覆，承宁族姻，赒恤乡䣊，人人自以㥦志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298085_comment'></div>之宏兄弟年少长，又俾负笈千里以赴师友之会，多一时知名士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298085_comment'></div>课督诸孙，察其少进则喜见词色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298085_comment'></div>不靡衣食，不事游观，不溺佛老，惟致严于宗室之奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298085_comment'></div>岁时夙兴行事，子妇若孙咸在，翼翼如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298085_comment'></div>之宏举进士，试吏为某官，薄禄不足养也，吾母处之裕如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298085_comment'></div>闻楚朴声则曰：『焉事此』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298085_comment'></div>閒得其情以告则怿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298085_comment'></div>晚岁听聪视明，德性弘裕，未尝有厉声疾呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298085_comment'></div>会水心先生叶正则葬有日，之宏往会，吾母曰：『其已事即反』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298085_comment'></div>四月之吉，起盥洗簪珥，家人咸集，忽指头：『何岑岑若是』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298085_comment'></div>掖扶就衽，已眩不起，哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298085_comment'></div>之宏犹未反室，终天之恨，九殒莫赎，脱又无以铭之，于吾心独无恨乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298085_comment'></div>余瞿然谢曰：「如子之言，子之先君子上顺父母，旁睦兄弟，下宜子孙，则先夫人棐承之力，是乌可以无纪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298085_comment'></div>周公之诗曰：「妻子好合，如鼓瑟琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298085_comment'></div>兄弟既翕，和乐且湛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298085_comment'></div>宜尔室家，乐尔妻孥」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298085_comment'></div>孔子大之，曰「父母其顺矣乎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298085_comment'></div>夫道行于家而妻子好合，此刑善之著也，则兄弟以和，室家以宜，子孙以乐，顺亲之道孰大于是，非所谓风自火出者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298085_comment'></div>世降俗薄，二女同居，志不相得，而家道以睽、子孙是效者，往往而是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298085_comment'></div>呜呼，闻夫人之风，余惧夫词之不令也，以为神羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298085_comment'></div>虽然，余曷敢不铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298085_comment'></div>夫人吴氏，世为馀姚著姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298085_comment'></div>父讳端礼，赠武义郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298085_comment'></div>母喻氏，封太恭人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298085_comment'></div>夫人子男四人：之宏，今以承直郎新荆湖南路安抚司准备差遣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298085_comment'></div>次之亮，乡贡进士，先夫人卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298085_comment'></div>次之震，从荆湖制置幕府得官，知郢州长寿县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298085_comment'></div>次之颖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298085_comment'></div>女嫁知某州史弥忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298085_comment'></div>孙男九人：自中，乡贡进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298085_comment'></div>自道、自明、自昭、自诚、自牧、自强，馀未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298085_comment'></div>孙女四人，长嫁新晋陵县丞赵与昭，次外孙史巍之，余尚处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298085_comment'></div>夫人生以绍兴十一年四月甲午，卒以嘉定十六年四月癸酉朔，葬以十月壬午，墓在某县某乡某山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298085_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1298085'>士不遇，曷其望？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298085_comment'></div>维逑之良，式扶而将，浅于泳兮深于方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298085_comment'></div>既顺乃祥，厥基允荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298085_comment'></div>诏子孙，世其庆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1298085_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，为安蕃撰写墓志铭。作品：知文州主管华州云台观安君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298054' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298054' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298054?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知文州主管华州云台观安君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十七年五月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298054")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298054_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298054'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298054'>嘉定十有四年，知文州安君蕃以比岁劳勚，请致王事而归，诏主管华州云台观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298054_comment'></div>行至利州得疾，凡期月乃卒，实十五年四月戊子也，年五十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298054_comment'></div>其孤如埙等跣护还里，厥十七年夏五月癸卯，以治命葬岳池县施为乡龙旋下乾山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298054_comment'></div>先是君居郡日，遇玺霈，以弟之子如渊奉表入都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298054_comment'></div>如渊过余于休沐舍曰：「吾伯父之葬，未有以识竁，如埙兄弟奉母命，将以请于公，顾杖而即次，弗敢违也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298054_comment'></div>会某丐去已七八疏，未允，方阖门俟遣，辞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298054_comment'></div>亡何，如埙复以书请益力，乃为叙而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298054_comment'></div>君字叔衍，其先本太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298054_comment'></div>八世祖琼，为后唐检校太傅，出为遂州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298054_comment'></div>以王、孟之乱，不能北归，因家于遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298054_comment'></div>刺史之子景泛，为通州从事，赠太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298054_comment'></div>东游浓洄镇，爱其江山之秀润，家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298054_comment'></div>皇朝开宝中，升镇为军，遂为广安著姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298054_comment'></div>四世祖处厚，以崇宁二年为同知枢密院，系之详具载于邵公济博所为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298054_comment'></div>曾王考祁，荆湖北路转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298054_comment'></div>王考燮，尝与乡举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298054_comment'></div>考宿君，本朝奉郎寿域之子，贡士早世，张夫人器之，请以为己子，教之力学读书，习《春秋》三传，有声校官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298054_comment'></div>开禧初，与平吴曦，少傅安丙上其事曰：「进士安蕃，丙之族人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298054_comment'></div>遣之兴元，谕都统制孙忠锐合谋诛逆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298054_comment'></div>盖曦以遣其母弟晓为利州东路安抚使，不得不豫为之防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298054_comment'></div>蕃与忠锐既共诛晓，亦有微劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298054_comment'></div>丙已假将仕郎，权兴元府茶马司茶帛库」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298054_comment'></div>诏特授承务郎，凡四人并命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298054_comment'></div>其书曰：「吾下密诏讨贼，曾不逾时，克成隽功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298054_comment'></div>虽吾帅臣竭忠，诸将效顺，顾所以往来其间，合异为仝，非可泛然诿诸人者，则夫族党之助，安可诬也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298054_comment'></div>尔君玉能得其亲近之情，尔坤辰同任夫结约之责，尔焕尔蕃，分谕诸军，晓譬祸福，一朝唱义，远近翕然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298054_comment'></div>载披奏函，良用嘉叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298054_comment'></div>锡之京秩，布列幕属，士孰有起家而得此乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298054_comment'></div>益用勉厉，以称所蒙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298054_comment'></div>君拜书，奋厉图报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298054_comment'></div>茶马司檄兼秦司佥厅，府尹刘清惠公申召寘幕下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298054_comment'></div>少傅自新沔移治兴元，又辟君为属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298054_comment'></div>天水县旧隶成州，大制置司以道远表升为军，既又即军复县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298054_comment'></div>兵火之馀，人睨视莫敢向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298054_comment'></div>君佐幕才数月，自请试县，或犹谓毋以家往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298054_comment'></div>君曰：「是示人畏缩也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298054_comment'></div>召故老而谓之曰：「县当险阨之冲者，中原数扰，此最要道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298054_comment'></div>或治米谷，或治榆林，或治兴州平，或治沙川，虽迁徙不常，而迭遭焚蹂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298054_comment'></div>今不一劳，其后不安，将迁邑于赤丹堡，缭以险固，实以谷粟，使民得奠居，其亦可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298054_comment'></div>众皆诺，乃白制阃行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298054_comment'></div>官寺民庐，以次毕具，秋豪无所扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298054_comment'></div>制阃发缗钱五千，君复上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298054_comment'></div>忠义士兵故有春秋二阅，君更用农隙，因其力以筑县城，民不失业，官不滥费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298054_comment'></div>凡谯楼守具，旋观而毕置之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298054_comment'></div>民自离兵戈，有田者亦弃去，君大书《鸿雁》三章于堂壁，卧兴图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298054_comment'></div>从帅阃拨借耕牛种具，量所垦田散给，皆翕然归耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298054_comment'></div>会岁大亨，欢呼被野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298054_comment'></div>始期以秋输元钱，迨君之去，率多逋负，又为贷偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298054_comment'></div>主管成都府路转运司，使者刚褊自用，君随事救正，理冤释滞，人不知其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298054_comment'></div>至于推挽人才，尤所用意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298054_comment'></div>制置使聂侯子述至蜀，以果州守安侯癸仲为元幕，俾君摄州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298054_comment'></div>属时多事，民赖以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298054_comment'></div>寻谒帅府白事，其一：核实茶马司所积，暂以买马钱助边用，养马牵马之粮给军储，俟□自如旧制，约一年可得百万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298054_comment'></div>其二：今北边未静，忧在西南夷，宜谨择边吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298054_comment'></div>其三：赏罚所以劝沮也，今大败者未即就刑，而小捷者遽加醲赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298054_comment'></div>聂侯大说，辟君通判永康军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298054_comment'></div>会兴元卒叛，转掠果、阆，密迩乡邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298054_comment'></div>君念六世祖太傅尝出家赀以平贼，思所以继先志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298054_comment'></div>会少傅为之倡，君喜曰，是亦吾志也，亦紏合宗族佃丁数百人往运军粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298054_comment'></div>且躬临贼垒，毅然以公事为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298054_comment'></div>未几，朝廷起少傅为宣抚使，治利州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298054_comment'></div>州自乱后气象荒索，少傅改辟君为州贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298054_comment'></div>君请增米直以来商运，为军民利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298054_comment'></div>且旧例商就官交米则有出纳之弊，军就仓禀给则有陈腐之弊，使皆就船出入，则二弊皆除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298054_comment'></div>总饷者是其策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298054_comment'></div>继以君兼主管文字，兼粮料院，职并事丛，靡微不究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298054_comment'></div>初，西夏求好于我，自嘉定七年赍书者络绎竟上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298054_comment'></div>至十二年冬十月宕昌寨以夏招讨使宁子宁忠翼书来，宣阃委安抚司报之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298054_comment'></div>适东军郭威等焚戍庵遁去，宣阃移金州军帅陈立将东军，辟君充随军转运，置司西和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298054_comment'></div>君闻命引道，未至，令曰：「比岁冬夏之交，虏乘间再入，民未复业，馈饷用艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298054_comment'></div>今日使指，非招集忠义，按视营屯，惟先劝谕流民，各归土著，乘春耕种，且检视仓廪，督促移运，务以实边备、安人心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298054_comment'></div>民闻之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298054_comment'></div>凡漕运物斛，糗粮菱藁，夙夜尽瘁，漕四十二万三千七百六十石，驮户不该封桩并由子不到等钱四十三万六百券有奇，籴二十万一千二百石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298054_comment'></div>以罝口漕至西和、鱼关至白环，每石且以费钱一十七券、米一斗七升之约，为总所省三百四十二万六百五十九券、米三万四千二百六十五石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298054_comment'></div>初出边，仅有两月之积，未几可支半年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298054_comment'></div>嘉定十三年秋，夏书再至，宣阃未敢深然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298054_comment'></div>俄遣使至巩城，以书督期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298054_comment'></div>宣阃姑遣师应之，以利东路安抚丁公煜节制诸路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298054_comment'></div>君假参议官同措置副戎司边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298054_comment'></div>君酌酒饮诸将，愿毋杀戮，毋焚毁，以诞布我国家不嗜杀人之意，皆闻命感慨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298054_comment'></div>自丙申出师，己酉饮至，不科三路丁直，不起利路全夫，则君密赞之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298054_comment'></div>宣抚、茶马二司辟君知文州，居郡踰年，百废具修，然自是精力耗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298054_comment'></div>得年仅五十有一，积官至通直郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298054_comment'></div>取陈氏，姑之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1298054_comment'></div>男子五人：如山、如埙、如川、如愚、华孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1298054_comment'></div>如山尝与宾贡，为伯父士龙后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1298054_comment'></div>华孙先夭，今附茔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1298054_comment'></div>女子二人，长适将仕郎杨季衡，幼未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1298054_comment'></div>孙男女一十三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1298054_comment'></div>君资厚而气夷，与人交有终，轻财重义，不计家之有无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1298054_comment'></div>庆元三年岁荐饥，极力振贷，全活甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1298054_comment'></div>其后年谷屡登，折券不复责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1298054_comment'></div>尤嗜书，自经子、史传、百氏、小说、医卜、方伎，一览终身不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1298054_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1298054_comment'></div>其才若此，其用卒此，士闻而惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1298054_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_95_1298054'>有劳于国，有德于民，俄兴忽仆，位止专城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1298054_comment'></div>未为不遇，弗究弗宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1298054_comment'></div>弗振弗延年，其在后之人。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_97_1298054'></div><div id='poem_sentence_97_1298054_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>应友人毛居正之请，为高之问书“强斋”匾额，并作记。作品：强斋记。<div id='poem_1297925' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297925' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297925?labeling=true' target='_blank'>强斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297925")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297925_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297925'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297925'>宝庆元年，高侯德文自姑苏介余友毛谊父而请于余曰：「昔朱文公尝以强斋名吾所居室，子为我书之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297925_comment'></div>盖侯仕淮右，尝以输乎邻壤、折虏骄慢有闻于时，其后监登闻鼓院，忧职尽言，余甚慕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297925_comment'></div>今行年七十有六，而服行文公之训，强善无斁，余曷敢曰不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297925_comment'></div>亡何，侯以书来曰：「善矣，子之札也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297925_comment'></div>盍并记诸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297925_comment'></div>余谓谊父曰：人之患制于欲则愞，狃于习则安，气柔则沈于众，形躁则苦其难，有一于兹，策之而莫前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297925_comment'></div>而侯也，诱怵弗渝，华皓益坚，则所谓强者，侯其知之矣，而奚资乎余言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297925_comment'></div>虽然，吾请为义父试诵所闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297925_comment'></div>今夫天地四方与人若不相涉，而古人谓此为男子之所有事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297925_comment'></div>奚事也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297925_comment'></div>晦明寒暑，日夜相代乎前，此莫非事也，而人由乎其中，不知其为己之所当事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297925_comment'></div>是故《易》之大象凡六十有四，而于《乾》曰「君子以自强不息」，于《晋》曰「君子以自昭明德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297925_comment'></div>天行日进，凡皆自不可已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297925_comment'></div>圣人发此二象，示人以所当事者不为不切至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297925_comment'></div>然而日为众阳之宗，亦天下之健者，而独于《乾》曰「自强」，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297925_comment'></div>天左旋而日右转，其为三百六十五度四分度之一，穷昼夜而一周，盖未始相远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297925_comment'></div>然日之进也财足以当昼夜之运，而天之行则常超一度，积日以成岁，是则天常踰一度而日常不及一度，则所谓强健而无息，非天行不足以当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297925_comment'></div>先正安定胡公尝语人曰：「人之一呼吸是谓一息，一息之间，天行八十馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297925_comment'></div>人之一昼夜万三千六百息，故天行百馀万里」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297925_comment'></div>然则是孰使之然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297925_comment'></div>天之强而无息也，非有使之然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297925_comment'></div>则人之为善，其自强而不可息也，盖亦无与乎他人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297925_comment'></div>天之行也，左旋右复，前降后升，昼夜有常，古今无间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297925_comment'></div>人之为人，将以主天地而命万物也，而合散消息乃为大化所驱，固有由之终身而不知其然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297925_comment'></div>天固不蕲乎人之知，人之为善也而必蕲乎人之知，顾得谓之自强乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297925_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297925_comment'></div>侯之请也，余之记也，是将愈言而愈失矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297925_comment'></div>谊父以告侯，请书是为记，以庶几古人求箴儆于国人之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297925_comment'></div>侯名之问，字德文，家故通达，尝四举礼部，驰声胶庠，其驯行可纪盖不但如前所闻云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1297925_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>应徐润之请，为其父徐端卿撰写墓志铭。作品：镇江府教授徐君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298059' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298059' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298059?labeling=true' target='_blank'>镇江府教授徐君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298059")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298059_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298059'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298059'>婺武义徐君以淳熙六年十一月丙申卒于镇江府教授，明年十一月甲午葬溪上原徐家坞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298059_comment'></div>又四十有六年，其子润以学正胡缉所次行实求铭于史臣魏某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298059_comment'></div>某辞曰：「我生之明年而君卒，相去相后若此，吾不敢承」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298059_comment'></div>润泣而固请曰：「润不天，生十年而孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298059_comment'></div>既葬之二十有九年，润始克缀一名于进士籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298059_comment'></div>又十有三年，而伯兄淮之子澳始自上庠赐弟，然后乡之人皆知先君位不称德之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298059_comment'></div>然而墓前之石又未有识，润盖有待也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298059_comment'></div>昔者眉山苏公与南丰曾公为辈行，苏氏之大父待曾公书其碣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298059_comment'></div>古之人有以发扬其先美者，固不计夫地世之久近，人之识与不识也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298059_comment'></div>则又泣数行下，以其曾王父母、王父母四铭以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298059_comment'></div>始余将漕东川，润为之属，知润为最久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298059_comment'></div>今又参诸先铭，且矜其请之笃也，则不敢曰不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298059_comment'></div>君讳端卿，字子长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298059_comment'></div>曾王父惠，王父革，皆缊德不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298059_comment'></div>父安邦，早有誉于太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298059_comment'></div>晚从恩任为含山尉、会昌丞，以宣义郎致其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298059_comment'></div>妣汤氏，生四男子，君其次也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298059_comment'></div>幼贫，厉志于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298059_comment'></div>始事乡人章公楷，又从任公尽言，率读书至五夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298059_comment'></div>常曰：「士之学道贵于自得，岂徒以絺章绘句为事」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298059_comment'></div>举绍兴二十一年进士，监潭州南岳庙，再调鄂州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298059_comment'></div>未上，会妇翁胡彦国帅淮西，辟书写机宜文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298059_comment'></div>胡公移镇潼川，君转丞广安之新明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298059_comment'></div>秩满，教授汉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298059_comment'></div>胡公卒，君于是将改秩矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298059_comment'></div>或请少须，君曰：「是家子尚幼，非吾当谁托」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298059_comment'></div>乃解官护其輤以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298059_comment'></div>改教授邵州，丁外艰，服除，监文思院下界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298059_comment'></div>又罹外艰，仕进益落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298059_comment'></div>调教授镇江，请于长，修学舍，建贡院，至捐私帑以助其役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298059_comment'></div>其思职首公大较如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298059_comment'></div>既举主及格，忽寝疾，乃卒，得年五十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298059_comment'></div>呜呼，是可悲矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298059_comment'></div>元配曾氏，枢密院计议官讳□之子，继室以胡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298059_comment'></div>生六子男，曰淮、涟、源、潜、润，涟以后伯父集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298059_comment'></div>女适某人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298059_comment'></div>君平生清苦急义，不蕲人知，事亲尽道，事上官以义，待下以慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298059_comment'></div>盖其学志于自得，耻为絺绘，故造次中理道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298059_comment'></div>曾氏早世，于奁中物秋豪无所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298059_comment'></div>胡氏没，有田三百馀亩，悉以归其兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298059_comment'></div>人惟不役志于货利，辞受取予惟义之权，则胸中所存浩然与天地同体，而其耦事涉变，有不可夺、有不肯为者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298059_comment'></div>惜其所存若是，而其年其位仅若是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298059_comment'></div>平生所著有《麟经渊源论》十篇、《汉鉴》十篇、《覆瓿集》二十卷、集杜子美诗若干卷，藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298059_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1298059'>义理不竞，絺绘相沿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298059_comment'></div>承肤袭末，哗世取妍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298059_comment'></div>笃哉徐君，虽诱弗迁，虽挠弗夺，虽穷益坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298059_comment'></div>屈信之度，寒暑相嬗，是开厥绍，勿替有延。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1298059_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，应友人李刘之请，为其祖父李彦华撰写墓志铭。作品：藏修先生李公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298066' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298066' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298066?labeling=true' target='_blank'>藏脩先生李公墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298066")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298066_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298066'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298066'>宝庆元年，余待罪太史氏，新通判武冈军李刘移书言曰：「刘之王父年三十筑室山中，以藏脩名堂，隐居乐道凡五十有馀年，乡人号曰藏脩先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298066_comment'></div>以绍熙三年正月□日卒，三月□日葬于所居十里卢墓之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298066_comment'></div>取乐安县进士周光女，有贤德，先四十一年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298066_comment'></div>子男四人：琚、瑶、玖、琥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298066_comment'></div>孙男十有四人：师古、万里、好古、怀古、衷古、学古、复古、振古、希古、刘、存古、从古、博古、曼古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298066_comment'></div>孙女三人，适进士罗邦达、周山父、罗焕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298066_comment'></div>曾孙男女八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298066_comment'></div>刘于诸孙为晚出，王父孩提授书，教以孝弟谨信，馀力学文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298066_comment'></div>王父卒之十七年，刘以贫求仕，始获齿名于嘉定元年进士籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298066_comment'></div>今又十有八年，墓门之石未识，大惧因循岁月，无以光昭令德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298066_comment'></div>公知我者也，敢徼一言之惠」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298066_comment'></div>呜呼，余于公父何敢以它词为解，乃为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1298066'>公讳彦华，仲实其字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298066_comment'></div>李氏之先，世居成纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298066_comment'></div>唐支十三，曹明在季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298066_comment'></div>黎国公杰，明之次子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298066_comment'></div>杰生三男，曰绍、承、胤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298066_comment'></div>武虺其宗，绍流岭外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298066_comment'></div>胤归京师，曹爵滥继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298066_comment'></div>宣言于人，绍承乏裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298066_comment'></div>绍实生济，济生颖士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298066_comment'></div>踰岭西归，仕不得志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298066_comment'></div>南奔豫章，以章名子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298066_comment'></div>昌黎韩公，铭成王志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298066_comment'></div>或亡或微，曹始就事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298066_comment'></div>益微其词，为夺曹讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298066_comment'></div>克俭生懋，统承于章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298066_comment'></div>始自豫章，迁抚宜黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298066_comment'></div>懋生益柔，时允实承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298066_comment'></div>时允生兴，兴复生英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298066_comment'></div>又迁崇仁，白沙是营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298066_comment'></div>曰嗣务本，为公高曾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298066_comment'></div>侯为公祖，持为公考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298066_comment'></div>考登辟雍，踰冠而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298066_comment'></div>从祖曰仪，与从兄浩，言论风指，前脩是蹈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298066_comment'></div>欧阳公彻，吴澥沆氏，与严拙翁，皆公同里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298066_comment'></div>受书于严，欧、吴为友，内外熏烝，学成行美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298066_comment'></div>欧公上书，请诛六贼，与陈伯阳，殒命权慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298066_comment'></div>旧交夙好，辟影藏迹，公与同舍，楄柎窀穸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298066_comment'></div>家故藏书，至万馀轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298066_comment'></div>矻矻晨夜，鉥心刿目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298066_comment'></div>鸡初鸣兴，奉母饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298066_comment'></div>退即危坐，圣贤是即。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298066_comment'></div>天文地理，礼乐律历，兵谋方伎，毫分缕析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298066_comment'></div>体习既精，晚而有述，曰《藏脩堂》，与《巴谷集》，经传辨疑，礼乐遗录，合而成书，卷三十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298066_comment'></div>二吴著书，公与有力，吴吏部曾，编年《谩录》，亦尝从公，咨疑辨惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298066_comment'></div>先畴素薄，母陈好施，养志不违，惟躬自瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298066_comment'></div>虽一衣衾，或数十载，然尝约饬，以教子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298066_comment'></div>其言有曰，齐明在内，盛服在外，所以脩己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298066_comment'></div>母陈早嫠，养不遗跬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298066_comment'></div>九十六终，君七十矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298066_comment'></div>人以为难，执丧尽礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298066_comment'></div>昼之所为，至夕必纪，有不可纪，则如其已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298066_comment'></div>行年九九，尽道而死，士虽不遇，硕蹇亨否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298066_comment'></div>与其徇物，无得于己，呜呼仲实，又焉取彼！</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1298066_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>为友人李大有撰写墓志铭。作品：太常博士李君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298050' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298050' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298050?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常博士李君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆元年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1225年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298050")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298050_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298050'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298050'>嘉定十有六年，某为太常少卿，婺东阳李大有谦仲主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298050_comment'></div>谦仲习于礼，顾笾豆簠簋、登俎尊罍位置失次，脊胁臂臑肫肩亦多阙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298050_comment'></div>麷蕡白黑，礼以熬荐，今用生刑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298050_comment'></div>盐《传》谓象虎，今散盐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298050_comment'></div>黍稷稻粱而槩用粳，五齐三酒而槩清醑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298050_comment'></div>瘗燎徒具文，乐歌不卒章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298050_comment'></div>乃按三《礼》条具其仪法，请釐正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298050_comment'></div>余每叹礼有数有义，圣人事事而问，不以有司之事而忽之，所以明天地之性，体阴阳之情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298050_comment'></div>自周秦去籍，汉渎庙制，极于五胡之乱，先王礼乐荡无复存，故虽经生学士有不尽知其数者，况于难知之义乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298050_comment'></div>闻谦仲之说，舍然而喜，亦曰大者既难遽易，姑先其易者焉耳，即为上之尚书，而议者已曰事关奏审，必不可行，祗赘言焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298050_comment'></div>谦仲愀然，重有感于学术之不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298050_comment'></div>会当轮对，上疏略曰：「国朝自周敦颐、张载、程颢、程颐，学本于正心脩身，仕至于致君行道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298050_comment'></div>近世张栻、朱熹、吕祖谦阐而大之，而义理益明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298050_comment'></div>乃自庆元权臣创道学之名以排拫善类，而为士者始以道德性命之说为不足学，能者求中于科举，而怠者幸中于剽窃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298050_comment'></div>夫公卿大夫由此而选也，而胚胎之坏已若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298050_comment'></div>愿召宿儒，崇置迩列，推明儒先之训，扶植治本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298050_comment'></div>于外师儒之官，亦以此意风厉作成，毋徒为袭取利禄计」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298050_comment'></div>其二曰：「臣观自昔归附之徒，固有始于效顺，卒于反覆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298050_comment'></div>况今入居内地而左衽自若，窥我虚实，安知其中无伺间乘隙之人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298050_comment'></div>若其偃然自便者，视昔之拜表辄行又甚焉，是可不思所以处之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298050_comment'></div>国家自军兴以来，屡开督府，命大臣领其事，权尊而望重，亦足以阴弭豪彊，潜杜窥间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298050_comment'></div>惟陛下亟图之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298050_comment'></div>上独以前疏下有司，馀不及尽用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298050_comment'></div>寻迁博士，疽发背且殆，甥许元实往候，谦仲谓：「生知书，顾彊我以药邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298050_comment'></div>家人问所欲，惟以弟大同不及诀为憾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298050_comment'></div>而大同至，曰：「吾得见弟，幸矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298050_comment'></div>屏艾却药而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298050_comment'></div>呜呼，古所谓数有所不逮，神有所不通，其谓是乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298050_comment'></div>突梯絜楹则寿而昌，底厉名行或降之殃，岂荷重褐贵，得于此故啬于彼邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298050_comment'></div>谦仲所居官率善其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298050_comment'></div>主管官告院，书印既具，揭姓名于方，吏无所容其奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298050_comment'></div>边将李全受节钺，有司命侈所给告，谦仲白宰掾：「是有定制，岂容为一人轻易」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298050_comment'></div>大农簿书旧悉付吏抄转，出纳谩不可考，谦仲请先经主簿签阅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298050_comment'></div>为省试点检试卷官，时号得人者卒出谦仲，虽廷试三人皆其所拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298050_comment'></div>余时为参议官，联事旬月，凡皆得诸见闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298050_comment'></div>其在奉常，有言谦仲且为台谏，得言天下事，士莫不倾耳延颈，恨出命之晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298050_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298050_comment'></div>此岂惟践脩之素有以得斯于人，亦以见人之卷卷于忠臣良士，幸其有以植公道而福斯人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298050_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「行归于周，万民所望」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298050_comment'></div>是区区者，果孰为之然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298050_comment'></div>谦仲卒之明年，当宝庆之元，其孤卜十月丁酉葬于怀德乡蒋碑山之原，以今吏部侍郎乔公行简所状行实求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298050_comment'></div>某以声气之同，不敢曰不可，则叙而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298050_comment'></div>谦仲本唐宗室，世为婺东阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298050_comment'></div>曾大父悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298050_comment'></div>大父皓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298050_comment'></div>父侃，赠奉议郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298050_comment'></div>妣马氏，赠孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298050_comment'></div>谦仲气刚而质粹，幼与弟大同亲师力学，不幸早孤，遣大同受学于朱文公先生，而躬任家事，不以遗母劳，读书穷晨夜不释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298050_comment'></div>绍熙四年，补博士弟子员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298050_comment'></div>庆元二年中进士第，授迪功郎，主簿潭之益阳，教授平江府，知福州闽县，通判通州，主管官告院，历司农、太常寺主簿，迁太常博士，积阶至朝请郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298050_comment'></div>初仕益阳，考覈簿书，阁其贰于府，吏无敢出入赋役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298050_comment'></div>在平江，著录公明，不可干以私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298050_comment'></div>正岁，乡之大夫士属于序，谦仲为正齿位，仿古饮酒礼，且取前贤乡约乡仪锓梓以风示之，士习用劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298050_comment'></div>赵成公希怿将举谦仲，或请谒诸，辞曰：「求而得之则如勿得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298050_comment'></div>成公卒不能遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298050_comment'></div>时自春官黄文叔度、司成刘晦伯爚以次竞荐，遂以举将六员改秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298050_comment'></div>其为县，分三等以平役法，因民便以救弊，宽讼系以纡滥刑，闽人德之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298050_comment'></div>通民尝欲引江溉田，以五狼石麓所障碍辄阻，谦仲受职后不月乃通，更伐石峙闸以备潴泄，农田商舶皆利焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298050_comment'></div>转运司致粮于边，率拘民舟，而富者以贿吏免，谦仲白罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298050_comment'></div>更造郡学器服，缮城浚濠，建利民、海山二桥及西门堰，凡可以及人者无不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298050_comment'></div>会摄守，吏白事例钱数千缗，谦仲撝之曰：「有例可送，无法可受」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298050_comment'></div>秩满候代，遣家人先归，属疆吏告警，曰：「吾家行，民听惑矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298050_comment'></div>命止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298050_comment'></div>谦仲颂观严重廉直，不受请寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298050_comment'></div>昧旦衣冠，率诸子诵《语》《孟》若《诗》，参以先儒传释，精诵熟讲，日有常则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298050_comment'></div>处同产尤极友爱，内外四百指，五十年无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298050_comment'></div>居家颇采用古礼，祀不焚楮，巫觋不及门，送死不以浮屠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298050_comment'></div>尤笃于族姻乡党，赒贫字孤，殣死药疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298050_comment'></div>尝宛转请于当路，下常平司，以所没入富人财产为乡邑营社仓，用朱文公及建安吴氏旧法，岁凶贷民，至今守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298050_comment'></div>得年六十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298050_comment'></div>娶马氏，封孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298050_comment'></div>四子男：自勉、自牧、自得、自修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298050_comment'></div>自得先七年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298050_comment'></div>三女，适乡贡进士蔡秦琰、孙用庚、从事郎、新台州宁海县长宁盐场管押盐袋乔通孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298050_comment'></div>孙男女各一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298050_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_1298050'>家人之威如，兄弟之怡如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298050_comment'></div>靖共乃事，委如蛇如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298050_comment'></div>予奕奕令姿，孰媲而如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298050_comment'></div>未晡戢晖，孰阨而摧如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298050_comment'></div>正毙而全归，与其幸生之萎如。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_79_1298050'></div><div id='poem_sentence_79_1298050_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b92cffea06fe426eb9b7f6f080838c3e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b92cffea06fe426eb9b7f6f080838c3e");'><span id='b92cffea06fe426eb9b7f6f080838c3e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年</a>，58岁</div><div id='b92cffea06fe426eb9b7f6f080838c3e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年6月</a>　抵京，除授礼部尚书，连上五疏论国事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年6月</a>　闻喜宴，有诗。作品：恭闻喜宴御制（祖宗德泽被生民）<div id='poem_253552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253552' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253552?labeling=true' target='_blank'>恭和闻喜宴御制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253552")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253552_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253552'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253552'>祖宗德泽被生民，列服山川各效神。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
