id='poem_sentence_58_1297269_comment'></div>盖是时藏之民者犹有馀力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1297269_comment'></div>今尔之为钱粮官者数百万缗，一犒而尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1297269_comment'></div>当此公私赤立之时，所馀用度将于何取之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1297269_comment'></div>夫士修之于家，而坏之于天子之庭，今宰执不得沮尔于去岁，而坏尔于今日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1297269_comment'></div>昔颜真卿之出使，举朝为之失色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1297269_comment'></div>韩愈之宣谕，穆宗为之悔惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1297269_comment'></div>至近世富弼之出疆，亦以执政不悦，因事罪之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1297269_comment'></div>今国人皆知尔之不得乎上，无应于内，故不尔从，而尚可行乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1297269_comment'></div>臣思之累日，方悟其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1297269_comment'></div>然犹不欲以仰渎天听，每朝奏事，面承圣训，犹不敢固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1297269_comment'></div>今以人情落落，作之不应，招之不来，孑然孤踪，块守陋屋，而忧厉熏其内，程期迫于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1297269_comment'></div>深念臣之事君，宁其触犯以取忤，不可欺隐而茍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1297269_comment'></div>臣伏见数日以来，左相慨然请行，而右相亦欲身任其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1297269_comment'></div>盖兹事当用亲信久任之宰相，不当用疏远骤进之书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1297269_comment'></div>而况二相服在大寮，多历年所，凡今专阃之臣，下逮将士，皆其亲所识拔，斡旋运掉，如身使臂，气势联属，靡不如意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1297269_comment'></div>岂可与一旦骤升无所援助者，同日而语？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1297269_comment'></div>陛下若从其请，则事体增重，人心胥奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1297269_comment'></div>或不欲强其行，则其次又有枢府二臣，翱翔要近之日久，究谙国事，阅习人才，亦岂不可与兹选，而必欲委其事于臣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1297269_comment'></div>使其冥行而不知退，则不惟使宰相蒙挤排士类之讥，亦使臣受不自揆度之谤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1297269_comment'></div>臣又见侍御史李鸣复，谓臣失之太轻，将有不审之失，有乖误之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1297269_comment'></div>又谓既有制帅，奚以督视为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1297269_comment'></div>局面既新，旧弊如故，奚以督视为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1297269_comment'></div>其言极为谆切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1297269_comment'></div>是虽出于忿激之私，其实知臣之病莫过于此论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1297269_comment'></div>督府之不当建，莫切于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1297269_comment'></div>臣既不为时论所容，今又被命半月，举辟而不见从，申请而不即应，益得以资谗惎者之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1297269_comment'></div>迟迟数日，必遭口语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1297269_comment'></div>或幸而得出都门，则决无吕、赵诸臣之应乎内，陛下虽欲保全而亦不能矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1297269_comment'></div>进退迟速，皆是获戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1297269_comment'></div>获戾不足恤也，宁不误国事乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1297269_comment'></div>夫古之受任者，上下交孚，表里相应，然后威棱气焰，有以号召奔走，何事之不可为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1297269_comment'></div>今焉以一人之深知，而宰执公卿以下无一主之，臣固知任重力微，有孤隆委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1297269_comment'></div>然犹勉自鞭策，冀效微劳以报上恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1297269_comment'></div>而未出都门，人情物议已纷纷如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1297269_comment'></div>况又有攻之者曰臣太轻不审，曰奚以督视为，斯言流播，固不待督府有所设施，内而统部，外而夷狄盗贼，皆已知督府之不足恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1297269_comment'></div>纵臣不自揆度，其为无益而有害也明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1297269_comment'></div>欲望皇帝陛下矜臣孤远之踪，多忤寡与；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1297269_comment'></div>浅轻之才，动辄得谤，速为检会累牍，早从罢免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1297269_comment'></div>遵照绍兴、隆兴典故，别选宰臣，以当其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1297269_comment'></div>如以臣为避事，则臣乞仍守旧官，以参赞军事从行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1297269_comment'></div>伏乞睿旨，即赐处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1297269_comment'></div>臣惟是方命之谴，谨已阖门席稿，恭俟严诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1297269_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_101_1297269'>〔贴黄〕臣恰又见信阳军今月二十四日申状，德安叛贼已引虏骑到城下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1297269_comment'></div>德安距鄂州，不数日可到，而督府至鄂乃在七十日后，深恐远水不救近火，是徒以督府之虚名，有稽招捕之实务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1297269_comment'></div>臣旬日前已给榜劄付王旻、孟珙开谕叛兵常进等，诱以赏格，晓以祸福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1297269_comment'></div>又作赵范书并劄何元寿，使之随宜措置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1297269_comment'></div>昨又劄黄伯固，令权参赞军事，以督府议事厅一面行事，措置守御，皆从军递发行，约七日可到，庶几可以及时济事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1297269_comment'></div>今臣尚留阙下，纵使朝廷速办，指日可行，亦是来年二月方到，决是无益于事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1297269_comment'></div>臣既阖门待命，今已一面截日住行书押密院督府文字，听候罢免旨挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1297269_comment'></div>欲乞睿旨宣谕，别议施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1297269_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_109_1297269'>〔又贴黄〕臣窃惟陛下假臣恩宠，以重事任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1297269_comment'></div>今臣既辞事任，则一时所假之恩宠，合行收寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1297269_comment'></div>窃见先帝时曹彦约除宝谟阁待制、四川制置使，彦约辞行，改知福州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1297269_comment'></div>彦约以辞制置而受待制，于义不安，于是改集英殿修撰、知潭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1297269_comment'></div>盖人臣辞受之义，固当如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1297269_comment'></div>而朝廷一予一夺，亦不可以不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1297269_comment'></div>臣今既已控辞视师之役，所有执政恩数，难以冒受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1297269_comment'></div>已一面将元被受省劄缴纳尚书省，伏乞睿旨，速赐收回施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1297269_comment'></div>臣又照得今来未受告命，则犹侍从之臣，更不敢仿执政例，至门外待命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1297269_comment'></div>见留寓舍，听候回降，伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_118_1297269_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年11月25日</a>　受命开府；进封临邛郡开国侯。上《先事奏陈三事》<div id='poem_1297270' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297270' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297270?labeling=true' target='_blank'>先事奏陈三事<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月二十五日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年11月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297270")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297270_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297270'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297270'>臣误蒙推择，董师上游，威命所临，进退维谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297270_comment'></div>虽王事有严，义不敢辞，然有当先事奏陈者，谨具下项：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1297270'>一、照对自中都而趋荆鄂，约二千七百八十里，穷日之力，行五十里，约两月可至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297270_comment'></div>辎重迟缓，又须两月以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297270_comment'></div>若舟行，则三阅月亦未可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297270_comment'></div>盖陆行则日程有限，行役劳苦，兼有雨雪之淹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297270_comment'></div>舟行则逆流而前，步步牵挽，兼有风涛之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297270_comment'></div>今昼夜趣办，约须月初方可启行，势非二月初不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297270_comment'></div>若每州犒军兑会，非一日不办，又破十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297270_comment'></div>万一事势骤急，心虽欲驰，身不可到，则旁观者必有濡缓避事之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297270_comment'></div>当此之时，枉受谴责，更合取自圣裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297270_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1297270'>一、今闻德安叛卒牵引北寇，散在安陆，以至黄陂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297270_comment'></div>臣虽先已给长榜，发公劄，下都统王旻，俾之开谕，又设赏格，速其归降，犹未见回报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297270_comment'></div>今猖獗未已，万一道梗，不可进前，若所至逗留，必误国事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297270_comment'></div>若以乌合之卒数百人当不测之寇，臣虽不敢爱身，必至损威辱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297270_comment'></div>或前或却，不得不豫以闻奏，更合取自圣裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297270_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1297270'>一、臣今所管系是荆襄地分，于江淮地分非所干与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297270_comment'></div>而舟行道过京口、金陵、池阳、九江、黄州，彼虽非荆襄所隶，而守将必遣兵出迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297270_comment'></div>臣止是量其出接之人，斟酌支犒，其在寨者不该支犒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297270_comment'></div>若在处同所管地分阖营厚犒，添此一项则用度愈广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297270_comment'></div>更乞睿旨，令朝廷于今来五百万缗外添贴支降。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1297270_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年11月27日</a>　其时，台臣有论魏了翁者，遂上书请辞，复以“丞相行”为请。作品：再辞执政恩数乞以参赞军事从丞相行奏劄。<div id='poem_1297271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再辞执政恩数乞以参赞军事从丞相行奏劄<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月二十七日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年11月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297271")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297271'>臣昨具乞骸之奏，未蒙俞允，仍赐缄还，加以召入禁廷，申颁诲敕，天颜和说，圣训丁宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297271_comment'></div>臣感激恩私，罙深战惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297271_comment'></div>重念臣自辞不获命，固欲捐躯报国，凡所区画，夜以继日，细大毕举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297271_comment'></div>惟是庙堂志意之不孚，台谏议论之可畏，兵财调度之不应，求诸事宜，无一而可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297271_comment'></div>故宾僚退怯，无一肯从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297271_comment'></div>傥使冒昧而前，必是误国败事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297271_comment'></div>是以悾历愚衷，具陈前牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297271_comment'></div>所冀陛下俯回渊听，改命大臣，庶几事权益尊，体统归一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297271_comment'></div>臣盖为社稷谋，非为一身计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297271_comment'></div>而天高听邈，未亮血诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297271_comment'></div>重念臣夙以戆愚，自开禧、宝庆连拄大臣，今伤弓之馀，宁不知创？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297271_comment'></div>然而言出诸口者，驷马不及追；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297271_comment'></div>事决于心者，万牛莫能挽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297271_comment'></div>臣前日狂瞽之言既出，则自今忿疾者必益众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297271_comment'></div>虽欲勿去，势所不容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297271_comment'></div>若陛下未加诛戮，委曲处分，犹使之强颜朝列，则是臣辞避事任，贪恋误恩，舍危即安，辞难就易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297271_comment'></div>不惟公论之所不可，陛下亦安用此顽顿无耻之人也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297271_comment'></div>况臣粗知事君之义，于此多故之时，岂不欲见危致命，补报万分？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297271_comment'></div>实以如前所陈，抵牾牵掣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297271_comment'></div>咫尺天威，犹难感悟，一辞轩陛，谁其念之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297271_comment'></div>或陛下必欲责臣，俾效命于颜行，则臣乞以从官参赞军事，断不敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297271_comment'></div>所有先来执政恩数礼物等，已具申尚书省缴回，并乞睿旨，速赐收寝。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1297271'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1297271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年11月28日</a>　复上书请辞，其意甚坚。作品：三辞乞以从官参赞军事从丞相行奏劄。<div id='poem_1297272' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297272' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297272?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三辞乞以从官参赞军事从丞相行奏劄<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月二十八日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年11月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297272")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297272'>臣辄犯天诛，荐有陈述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297272_comment'></div>比于三乞祠、三控免之后，又尝两具奏篇，未蒙允俞，进退维谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297272_comment'></div>臣之前牍，大约以上下不孚，中外无应，深恐抵牾牵掣，事功不成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297272_comment'></div>今再三惟念，犹有未尽陈者，敢极言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297272_comment'></div>夫事必有终始，势必有缓急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297272_comment'></div>知所先后，然后可以因变制宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297272_comment'></div>伏自陛下躬揽万机，图任旧人，今两丞相实居百僚之右，不惟十数年间政事之本末，人物之才否，皆其所阅历，而灭蔡之役，朝陵之使，三京之出师，王楫之入贡，议论错出，又皆二相实主其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297272_comment'></div>远方贱臣，不及与议，但见《皇华》《采薇》之遣，交驰于道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297272_comment'></div>范、葵之责任方重，嵩之之召命已颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297272_comment'></div>谓之和则有战矣，谓之战则有和矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297272_comment'></div>窃意庙谟深远，必有弭变之良图也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297272_comment'></div>而报聘之使未返，上流之忧已急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297272_comment'></div>归附之众，方倚为爪牙，而叛服靡常，屡生于肘腋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297272_comment'></div>凡此利害，实关安危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297272_comment'></div>虽以朝士之身履目击者，犹不及究知本末，况臣来自下土，仅数月耳，奚从而尽知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297272_comment'></div>故于两相之请行，所以力赞睿断，而自请为僚佐者，非有他也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297272_comment'></div>譬之弈棋，规模布置，未及终局，弱形已见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297272_comment'></div>急使一人终之，终之者固不敢辞，而规模则前人之规模也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297272_comment'></div>冒昧继之，则前者立脱其责，后者与受其败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297272_comment'></div>今之规模，则二相之规模也，若以一相主乎内，一相行乎外，则表里相应，血脉流通，事权益专，财力益厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297272_comment'></div>不犹愈于孤远骤升之臣，举辟而不尽从，申请而不即应者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297272_comment'></div>此论既定，则臣以从官参赞军事，有不如言，臣请伏避事之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297272_comment'></div>陛下若不早决此议，日复一日，万有一赤白囊交至，则累年秉政造事之臣，得以移过于一旦受任而未行者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297272_comment'></div>虽身膏斧钺，无益治乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297272_comment'></div>如陛下尚守前日训谕，欲用隆兴故事，令在朝置局，则臣亦何颜以居其位？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297272_comment'></div>惟有累疏固请，阖门俟谴，不得其求不已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297272_comment'></div>叠犯雷霆之威，下情惶惧陨越之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1297272_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年12月1日</a>　以兵饷不足，再上书辞。作品：乞检会累牍收回执政恩例奏劄。<div id='poem_1297273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞检会累椟收回执政恩例奏劄<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297273")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297273'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297273'>臣自蒙隆委，屡控免章，未赐允俞，愚衷增惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297273_comment'></div>重念臣始焉揆义，不敢辞难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297273_comment'></div>既而深思，则知有甚难者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297273_comment'></div>臣前所陈，盖有未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297273_comment'></div>今所谓甚难者，兵财是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297273_comment'></div>中兴以来，所开督府，供亿调度，岁有常经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297273_comment'></div>考之故实，张浚之督师川陕，岁支可计者粮一百六十馀万石、三千馀万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297273_comment'></div>叶义问之督江淮也，启行所带者银二十万两、金一万两、见钱九百万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297273_comment'></div>臣昨条具所乞带行，以一千万缗为请，朝廷止许拨五百万缗，继而实有三百万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297273_comment'></div>寻行会计京湖见管兵数，约不足以供一犒之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297273_comment'></div>而况楮轻物贵，三百万缗仅有昔日五十万缗之用乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297273_comment'></div>近者沿江制置陈韡，差兵二千，随杨福兴往鄂州，人犒二十五千，制置将佐自三百千以下有差，而生券又不与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297273_comment'></div>以制司所犒二千人之数，已近六万缗，则督府犒军，岂容有减于制司？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297273_comment'></div>然则臣之所带钱物，决不足以充一犒之用，盖非空言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297273_comment'></div>大抵朝廷所科降之数，不过为数月计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297273_comment'></div>万一鞑虏未即尽退，或内寇尚逭天诛，于斯时也，内有督府官吏将士经常之费，外有应援捍御激赏之需，而当此楮贱物贵，又非绍兴、隆兴之比，每岁必费数千万缗，而未有已时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297273_comment'></div>朝廷府库今已窘束，臣欲于五百万缗之外更有增请，今所闻帑藏已无可出，则此三百万者尚不足以供目前，脱久不结局，不知何以继之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297273_comment'></div>又恐臣一出之后，国家用度何所仰给？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297273_comment'></div>臣所以日夜徊徨，非为身计，实为国家深长思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297273_comment'></div>若夫甲兵之事，则又有甚难言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297273_comment'></div>今虏自金、房而下，于光、化之境，绝汉而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297273_comment'></div>若自兴山可以捣秭归，自房可以趋峡之远安，自银池峪可以通荆门，若随、枣不固，则安、郢、竟陵、荆门之间，皆为虏区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297273_comment'></div>若信阳有警，则光山、麻城、黄陂之间，皆为叛卒之薮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297273_comment'></div>当此之时，所在镇戍，各守其地，岂可移东援西？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297273_comment'></div>其势必有告急之书，乞师于督府，乞给于督府，以至粮糗器械，皆有求于督府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297273_comment'></div>与之则无从而出，拒之则难于坐视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297273_comment'></div>且如督府之行，今欲差殿司人，或者难之，将取之镇江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297273_comment'></div>乃闻左丞相云，镇江已不肯抽那，将求之建康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297273_comment'></div>然建康新调二千人往援江陵，其势必不容再有抽摘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297273_comment'></div>江、池以往，又安得有宽剩之兵可那？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297273_comment'></div>盖不惟到司之后，难于运掉，而沿途次舍，元未有一兵可以为卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297273_comment'></div>万一寇盗瞷知督府之单弱，事有出于意料之外，宁不损威辱国？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297273_comment'></div>此臣所以日夜徊徨，欲行复却，盖非为身计，实为国家深长思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297273_comment'></div>欲望陛下密谕大臣，使之参臣所陈，反覆研究，俟真见得目前可以行，后来可以久，然后定为一说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297273_comment'></div>若臣前来控辞恩命，敢望睿断，仍为检会累牍，速赐收回施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297273_comment'></div>冒干宸严，不胜陨越俟命之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297273_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1297273'>〔贴黄〕臣窃谓枢臣督师，事大体重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297273_comment'></div>故人众而费夥，今陛下若惮于反汗，则臣乞用先朝旧例，以尚书为宣谕使，则行督视之实而无督视之名，事体既轻，结局亦易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297273_comment'></div>伏乞睿照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297273_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1297273'>〔又贴黄〕自初开府支犒诸军外，又有下项：调援兵，支江淮诸军之出迓者<span class='inlineComment2'>（非京湖地分者出迎。）</span>，犒暴露将士<span class='inlineComment2'>（如诸处守御久不可解者。）</span>，劳诸处战散之卒<span class='inlineComment2'>（如退卒有伤者亦须犒之。）</span>，给新招军钱物、衣甲、军器，赈流民，恤残破州郡，招溃叛，造军器，用间探。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297273_comment'></div>凡此又在五百万缗之外，伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1297273_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年12月2日</a>　诏令魏了翁兼督视江淮军马。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年12月3日</a>　再上书辞免兼督视江淮军马事，未获允准，上疏催促准备督府事宜。作品：辞免兼领督视江淮军马状奏。奏两府所辟官署截日供职。<div id='poem_1297274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免兼领督视江淮军马奏状<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297274")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297274_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297274'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297274'>臣伏准省劄，备奉御笔，督视江淮军马职事，令臣兼领者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297274_comment'></div>臣闻敝车不可以载重器，弱步不可以胜丰扛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297274_comment'></div>臣藐然书生，未闲军旅之事，误蒙眷简，剸属以上流之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297274_comment'></div>臣自量才力之不足，内外之不应，凡六具控辞，未拜允俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297274_comment'></div>方怀战惕，兹又申攽宸翰，兼畀江淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297274_comment'></div>任重力微，罔知攸济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297274_comment'></div>凡此七路，东西绵亘数千馀里，而以有限之知力应无穷之事会，脱有缓急，愈重顾忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297274_comment'></div>欲望皇帝陛下速收成涣，改畀时贤，使臣专心致志，从事上游，以仰副责任之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297274_comment'></div>岂惟孤踪之幸，实宗社幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1297274_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏两府所辟官属截日供职<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297275")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297275_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297275'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297275'>臣于初二日夜半，伏准省劄，恭奉御笔，令臣督视江淮军马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297275_comment'></div>臣虽具辞免，窃虑待报，有妨治事，除已一面具申朝廷，抽那江淮元辟官属及江淮督府人吏，及已行过文移案牍等，数日未见发到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297275_comment'></div>及催殿前司差拨制领将佐军兵，及合用旌旗衣甲等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297275_comment'></div>其临安府与两浙转运司，所合应副事件，并未见整齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297275_comment'></div>又闻江淮官属有辞行者，亦已一面不候朝廷回报，从行府径自严限催督，趁期起发外，欲望圣慈特降睿旨，应两府所辟官属内，见任人截日住行本职，日赴行府议事厅供职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297275_comment'></div>或有托疾辞行者，乞自朝廷重作施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297275_comment'></div>其馀殿前司、临安府、转运司等处，并自朝廷严限催督，庶几不致有妨行色，以误国事。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1297275'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1297275_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年12月6日</a>　上书请十一日朝辞，十二日出关。作品：奏别择日朝辞。<div id='poem_1297277' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297277' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297277?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏别择日朝辞<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月九日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297277")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297277_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297277'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297277'>臣六日尝具奏，欲以十一日朝辞，十二日出关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297277_comment'></div>昨蒙玉音面谕，退又谋之二相，则知十二日未可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297277_comment'></div>臣除已遵依圣训，欲别行择日朝辞起发，谨具奏闻，更合取自圣裁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1297277_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年12月9日</a>　上疏交待先期施行之事，并上疏催促早定日期，尽快启程。作品：奏随宜区处十事。别择日朝辞。<div id='poem_1297276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏随宜区处十事<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月九日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297276")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297276'>臣自被命以来，虽闻议论不一，然合行事件，窃恐有失机会，已一面随宜区处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297276_comment'></div>今略以有关事体者，谨条具下项：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1297276'>一、作私书与赵范，同公文榜劄等前去，付王旻、孟珙，招安常进、尚全等，并劄江陵府差官抚谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1297276'>一、劄何元寿，令一面措置捍御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297276_comment'></div>劄黄伯固充参赞军事，一面以督府议事厅帮衔行事，策应上流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1297276'>一、给榜付四川制置司及江陵府，又散印榜二百道于七路州郡，劝谕大家豪民，结集民丁，保护上流，以官资厚赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1297276'>一、劄李虎、王鉴、杨福兴、赵胜、刘虎，照元行星夜提兵，应援荆、襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1297276'>一、劄杨义充督府帐前都统制，就令任责鄂州江面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1297276'>一、遣属官万一荐同宫观人秦良谋前去刘溥处商议，遣人至郭胜处，仍带钱银前去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1297276'>一、劄沿江州郡聚集渔舡，以助水军防托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1297276'>一、劄会沿江州郡，自镇江而上直至荆鄂，凡几处隘口，兵若干，船若干，制领将佐是谁任责，令具夹密帐状申，以凭点视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1297276'>一、差官先期起发，赍会子于所经过州兑换见钱，庶几舡到不留滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1297276'>一、闻常进擒获，已一面从递嘱何大监，元寿如发到鄂州，且与存全，以为招徕之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297276_comment'></div>见一面分付万一荐等，陆续前去招谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1297276'>一、其馀随宜区处事件，更不一一详具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297276_comment'></div>伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1297276_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297277' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297277' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297277?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏别择日朝辞<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月九日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297277")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297277_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297277'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297277'>臣六日尝具奏，欲以十一日朝辞，十二日出关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297277_comment'></div>昨蒙玉音面谕，退又谋之二相，则知十二日未可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297277_comment'></div>臣除已遵依圣训，欲别行择日朝辞起发，谨具奏闻，更合取自圣裁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1297277_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年12月11日</a>　又上疏催促行期。作品：奏乞宣谕大臣趣办行期。<div id='poem_1297279' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297279' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297279?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏乞宣谕大臣趣办行期<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297279")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297279_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297279'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297279'>臣自被命督师，今既踰月，体承忧顾，不敢固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297279_comment'></div>然而人情玩于苟安，收之甚难而散之甚易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297279_comment'></div>臣始闻师命，辟置幕属，犹有从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297279_comment'></div>继准御笔别议行期，则人情观望，旋即涣散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297279_comment'></div>臣恐一旦又被趣行之命，则必仓卒误事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297279_comment'></div>故自朝至昃，凡先期施行之事，皆不遗馀力，既尝条具奏知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297279_comment'></div>忽又闻兼领江淮之命，臣于是申严约束，收拾官吏，庶几指日可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297279_comment'></div>而数日以来，有司调度，倍觉艰涩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297279_comment'></div>臣不敢见之奏篇，寻行访问，乃是惑于传闻不一之言，未肯支发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297279_comment'></div>如臣之不敢避事，固见之累牍，无用赘陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297279_comment'></div>然而目前所甚忧者，迟迟不行，则诸阃藉口以逃责，诸军张颐以望犒，诸郡举首以俟援，此皆必然之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297279_comment'></div>又其次则监司州县恐有不识事体者，以督府经过，旁缘科扰，或拘籍人船，或桩留夫运，则动是旬月，宁无怨嗟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297279_comment'></div>更稍辽缓，必有饥寒颠踣之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297279_comment'></div>殿步司所差制领将佐，各已到行府供职，屡请先期整龊人马，支俵居行钱物，亦无辞以应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297279_comment'></div>凡此皆当汲汲区处，不可复缓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297279_comment'></div>臣前一日虽又蒙玉音面谕，退又请于二相，皆谓少缓行期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297279_comment'></div>其在臣子，岂不仰体国力，宁敢再三趣迫，以取方命之谴？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297279_comment'></div>实以行期不决，则进退无据，中外皇皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297279_comment'></div>欲望圣慈宣谕大臣，如庙论一定，初无更易，即乞速下有司，照画一申请事理，严限两日尽数应办，庶可即日起发，毋使进退周章，以贻物议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297279_comment'></div>危迫之情，惟陛下速赐果断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297279_comment'></div>干冒天威，下情无任惶惧俯伏俟命之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297279_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1297279'>〔贴黄奏科拨钱物〕臣照得朝廷辍遣近臣，督师于外，岂不欲其卯受命，辰出师？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297279_comment'></div>然既速而复徐之，既分而后合焉，朝令夕改，甲可乙否，中外皇惑，不晓所谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297279_comment'></div>臣窃思之，只缘当来应办两督府，除金银告牒等外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297279_comment'></div>各许缗钱五百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297279_comment'></div>京湖一司，今恐仅得三百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297279_comment'></div>江淮一司，全未科拨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297279_comment'></div>契勘江淮官军民兵约二十五万，京湖称是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297279_comment'></div>若只以犒军一事言之，今所赍之钱，一犒即尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297279_comment'></div>此外如给官吏，招新军，遣援卒，处流移，受降附，发间探，收溃叛，造器械，募舟师，防江面等，又不在此数，皆立时支遣，不容贳贷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297279_comment'></div>掣肘如此，臣安得不一言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297279_comment'></div>臣虽至愚，岂不仰体国力？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297279_comment'></div>契勘到左帑除已交百十六万外，见在楮券，尽以零会凑之，或可得五百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297279_comment'></div>而江淮一府，终未有可以那移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297279_comment'></div>或谓淮盐每岁六十五万袋内拨借十万袋，臣自行区处，津载变兑，亦可以对折今来支降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297279_comment'></div>或又谓岂无诸司寄桩钱、诸郡交头钱之类，可以便宜取拨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297279_comment'></div>然只以江东一路言之，自兑换会子后，未与出豁，已是虚挂文历，恐至前途，有误指准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297279_comment'></div>今来只候朝廷处分既定，先将左帑零会凑五百万外，更增一二百万金钱等物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297279_comment'></div>纵不及两府元请之数，若姑可以备初到之费，则臣且一面起发，沿途便宜措置，徐俟诸司诸州有可那移者，接续应用，犹是一说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297279_comment'></div>更自陛下裁度，如以为可行，即乞速赐处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297279_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_1297279'>〔贴黄奏江陵从督府乞兵〕臣得江陵尤爚十一月二十九日书云，在城守御，适臣行府榜劄招捕叛寇邮置到后，旁缘声势，与将士喝转三官资，鞑虏闻之，上马东去，疑大兵之将至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297279_comment'></div>以此见得外阃所望于督府者甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297279_comment'></div>又得公状，欲从督府乞兵二万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297279_comment'></div>此等事正费区处，并具奏知，伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1297279_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年12月14日</a>　朝辞。赐便宜诏书如张浚故事，并赐金带鞍马，诏宰臣饯于关外。理宗御书唐严武诗二十八字及“鹤山书院”四大字送之；其后，魏了翁作跋记其事。作品：跋御书唐人严武诗二十八言。跋御书鹤山书院四大字。<div id='poem_1297817' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297817' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297817?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋御书唐人严武诗二十八言</a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297817")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297817_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297817'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297817'>臣尝妄谓《易》《书》《诗》《春秋》，凡仲尼所述不言「将」，盖出师于郊遂，而王朝之公卿董之，四代以来未之有改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297817_comment'></div>迨二《礼》三《传》后出，始有军将、将军之名，于是师久于外，往往不从中遣，非所以共武服、谨师命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297817_comment'></div>臣识闇能薄，独荷陛下殊尤之遇，自亲大政，召冠禁联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297817_comment'></div>会靺鞨披倡，受我乱民，整居王略，肆命臣以宥府视师，赐对禁中，假权阃外，籯金篚币，商赉优渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297817_comment'></div>既又亲御笔札，大书唐人严武诗二十八言以宠灵之，英云明露，膏耀菅茅，师乘传观，人百其勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297817_comment'></div>《师》之坤曰：「在师中吉，承天宠也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297817_comment'></div>王三锡命，怀万邦也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297817_comment'></div>此陛下为万邦计，臣独何人，遽当王朝公卿之选，赫赫王命以镇拊其干掫，下拜登受，曷云其酬！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297817_comment'></div>臣谨以宸翰被诸乐石，班其贰于侯氏，用答扬明天子亲命干方之意，为臣工劝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1297817_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297816' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297816' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297816?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋御书鹤山书院四大字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297816")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297816_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297816'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297816'>臣伏见庐山、嵩岳、衡麓、睢阳各有书院，自太平兴国讫大中祥符，锡之号荣，被以诏墨，至近世东湖、北岩、濂溪、象山之称，皆尝有请于朝，风声所形，闻者兴起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297816_comment'></div>臣生于邛之鄙，自开禧边议不合去，之古白鹤山之下，筑室聚友，将终身焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297816_comment'></div>两朝圣明，照知臣心，讫荷眷怜，致位通显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297816_comment'></div>兹又蒙陛下申锡宝翰，贲耀林庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297816_comment'></div>臣窃惟先朝赐书，必以名宾实，顾臣熏心患难，旧读荒芜，大惧无以称塞隆指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297816_comment'></div>其自今乞身得请，将归老鹤山之麓，顾瞻奎文，帝临有赫，誓毕馀齿，力求初心，以无忘君师训迪之意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1297816_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1235&endYear=1235')">1235年12月14日</a>　是日，上《赐便宜诏书谢表》、《陛辞奏定国论别人才回天怒图民怨》作品：赐便宜诏书谢表。陛辞奏定国论别人才回天怒图民怨。<div id='poem_1297283' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297283' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297283?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐便宜诏书谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297283")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297283_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297283'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297283'>臣伏以图上方略，敢专阃外之权；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297283_comment'></div>诏许便宜，爰重军中之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297283_comment'></div>丝纶播告，旗垒精明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297283_comment'></div>窃惟机会之来，间不容发；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297283_comment'></div>人臣之义，知无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297283_comment'></div>况推毂临遣之荣，任赐钺专征之责，故不从中覆，李牧所以破胡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297283_comment'></div>惟汝予同，裴度所以擒蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297283_comment'></div>允称重寄，可授非才？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297283_comment'></div>而臣曾蔑寸长，遽膺剸属，军务固难于隃度，敌情未易以测知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297283_comment'></div>若非因变而制宜，将恐违几而误事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297283_comment'></div>不图睿照，特假皇灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297283_comment'></div>兹盖恭遇皇帝陛下英武济时，聪明察物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297283_comment'></div>四郊多垒，政当事会之殷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297283_comment'></div>一札十行，特借威权之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297283_comment'></div>春温绝塞，风动列营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297283_comment'></div>臣敢不竭乃心诚，忠其职分？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297283_comment'></div>「兵以付卿，吾不中御」，仰蒙特异之知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297283_comment'></div>贼未授首，臣无还期，敢效糜捐之报。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1297283_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陛辞奏定国论别人才回天怒图民怨<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月十四日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1235年12月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297281")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297281_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297281'>臣以书生起家，未闲军旅之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297281_comment'></div>适丁多故，骤当事任，度时量力，负荷惟艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297281_comment'></div>窃自惟念先帝拔臣于疏远之馀，陛下起臣于废弃之久，受恩深厚，图报无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297281_comment'></div>是用祗承师命，敢有他辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297281_comment'></div>而旬浃之间，歘被宸翰，别议行期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297281_comment'></div>臣进退彷徨，是用再辞，上还恩数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297281_comment'></div>岂谓皇明委照，未肯终弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297281_comment'></div>而臣亦念主忧臣辱，义不得终辞，则拜疏请行，刻日就道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297281_comment'></div>而庙谟靡定，复缓行期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297281_comment'></div>夫赵充国自金城请事，戊申奏闻，甲寅报可，数千里之置邮，而奏报于七日之近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297281_comment'></div>高崇文奉诏讨蜀，卯漏受命，辰已出师，五千人之器械而毕陈于一时之顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297281_comment'></div>今服在迩僚，受命踰月，而一行一却，乃若久而未定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297281_comment'></div>所幸臣规模布置，初不敢以议论可否为之作辍，见之施行，粗有端绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297281_comment'></div>今陛下力排群议，仍听臣行，幸得豫戒，不愆于期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297281_comment'></div>今臣义所当为，不敢不勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297281_comment'></div>虽然，事有本末，治有内外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297281_comment'></div>臣之所任于外者末也，陛下之所运于内者本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297281_comment'></div>且国论所当定也，甲和而乙战，朝是而暮非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297281_comment'></div>彼或以马燧之盟而行浑瑊之劫，我又以郦生之辩而济韩信之师，则彼此相寻，而在内之本摇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297281_comment'></div>臣于此时纵知其不可信，然动则沮坏和好，不动则与受其败，牵制抵牾，将何所禀承乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297281_comment'></div>人才所当别也，用一君子而间之以小人，进一忠良而参之以奸佞，患失者引类以自助，怙权者托公以济私，日往月来，智藏瘝在，则在内之本拨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297281_comment'></div>臣于此时，建一谋焉，将恐谗间媢忌以危其身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297281_comment'></div>请一事焉，又恐拘挛文法而掣其肘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297281_comment'></div>动辄龃龉，将何以展布乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297281_comment'></div>夫在内者既不可凭藉如此，则臣虽欲集思广益，致命尽分，以报陛下之恩，决知其难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297281_comment'></div>臣愿陛下坚凝国论，而无和战之错陈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297281_comment'></div>甄别人才，而无邪正之并用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297281_comment'></div>持之以坚，断之以果，毋为人言所怵，嗜欲所移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297281_comment'></div>则臣秉钺于外，庶乎有恃无恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297281_comment'></div>抑臣区区所陈，关系固重，然犹涉于事物，若本之则有在矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297281_comment'></div>臣愚更望陛下恐惧修省，以回天怒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297281_comment'></div>恭俭笃实，以图民怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297281_comment'></div>盖天之怒，非田况所谓数祝板、一炉香所可禳除也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297281_comment'></div>民之怨，非息夫躬所谓遣一大将军行边兵、敕武备可以厌应也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297281_comment'></div>陛下不是之思，而谓遣一枢臣，足以上回天心，下慰民志，自今朝廷之上遂委其责，无复恫瘝憯怛之意，以行乎其间，则内外本末不相贯通，而陛下之事去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297281_comment'></div>臣虽鞠躬尽力，亦将奚为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297281_comment'></div>此臣所以勤勤恳恳，为陛下告，为社稷绵长虑，非为一身孤危忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297281_comment'></div>惟陛下审思之，力行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297281_comment'></div>臣违远清光，不胜瞻天恋圣激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1297281_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
成都

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年</a>　以佥书剑南西川节度判官试西川幕府，到成都就任。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年</a>　上书四川制置使刘德秀。作品：成都佥判到任谢刘制置。<div id='poem_1297499' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297499' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297499?labeling=true' target='_blank'>成都佥判到任谢刘制置启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1200年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297499")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297499_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297499'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297499'>耕东皋之云，方便野性；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297499_comment'></div>咏南梅之月，忽玷清游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297499_comment'></div>正惧贻取禾三百廛之讥，岂期得广厦千万间之庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297499_comment'></div>决眦星辰之履，委身造化之炉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297499_comment'></div>伏念某学懵痴龙，诂迷雌霓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297499_comment'></div>谬且揽扶桑之六辔，敢祈撠胶葛于九闳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297499_comment'></div>群青之盟未寒，五白之采过望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297499_comment'></div>榜花污署，滥窃小科头之名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297499_comment'></div>吏板混吹，径登大幕府之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297499_comment'></div>半生负长镵而斸黄独，一日泛渌水而依红莲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297499_comment'></div>许牒装怀，爰书眯目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297499_comment'></div>涉笔占位，墙面于凫鹜行之来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297499_comment'></div>尸禄空餐，芒背于麒麟楦之诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297499_comment'></div>惭非洛北之处士，赖有湖南之主人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297499_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇某官标一世之龙门，鼓九霄之羊角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297499_comment'></div>自当建上公府而躬吐握之任，顾乃坐元帅阃而加罗致之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297499_comment'></div>油幕风清，闲郾城之棋柝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297499_comment'></div>绿沈苔卧，省卫府之文书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297499_comment'></div>公迟两地之登，我获二天之庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297499_comment'></div>辉光耀凡草，既分甓社湖之珠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297499_comment'></div>文采被诸生，勿惜景阳机之锦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297499_comment'></div>誓期骖蹇，勉附绝尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297499_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1297499'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1297499_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年</a>　与同僚成都府路转运司主管帐司张大训定交。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年</a>　与同僚成都府路钤辖司干办公事虞刚简相识。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>　与同僚妻舅赵昱相识。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='67997bc0c9dc4740930f947deb736a06_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("67997bc0c9dc4740930f947deb736a06");'><span id='67997bc0c9dc4740930f947deb736a06_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>，24岁</div><div id='67997bc0c9dc4740930f947deb736a06' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>　成都人钱安国葬其亲，来请挽诔。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='9bd983be46f54d8ba547f4b3ad89d049_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9bd983be46f54d8ba547f4b3ad89d049");'><span id='9bd983be46f54d8ba547f4b3ad89d049_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年</a>，26岁</div><div id='9bd983be46f54d8ba547f4b3ad89d049' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年</a>　夏，召为国子正，未及行，女璧海生，妻杨氏产后感疾卒，遂解职，携女护杨氏之丧回蒲江。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='8ea6d8b3f51646a8b1de6840099e478d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8ea6d8b3f51646a8b1de6840099e478d");'><span id='8ea6d8b3f51646a8b1de6840099e478d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>，31岁</div><div id='8ea6d8b3f51646a8b1de6840099e478d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年3月3日</a>　岳父杜益卒。次日闻讯，遂携妻杜氏至成都奔丧。作品：哭外舅杜威州文。<div id='poem_1298127' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298127' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298127?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭外舅杜威州文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年3月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298127")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298127_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298127'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298127'>某昔官于公之乡，乃识公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298127_comment'></div>见其容貌恂恂，服用简质，夷考其行，其乡之人曰如其服若容，访其亲知，则皆蜀贤士大夫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298127_comment'></div>余心降焉，而未得□也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298127_comment'></div>后数年，取公之长子，公不我弃，远道送将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298127_comment'></div>塈余于居凡三日谷，敷衽论心，情义欸笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298127_comment'></div>始至如平生，且别，戒其子曰：「往之汝家，善事尔长，相尔夫子，其俭共是务」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298127_comment'></div>既去，则又数以书来会，期我乎莫之春，要我乎其家，其悃愊无华亦如其服若容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298127_comment'></div>余将撰日，越以妇迈，乃季春之四日，致土之毛，遣人问无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298127_comment'></div>未三十里而及公之家之隶遇诸途，来讣公丧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298127_comment'></div>致书之日而公死之明日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298127_comment'></div>踉蹡挈妇，昼夜倍道，行百八十里，逮至而不及冯其棺矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298127_comment'></div>余外姑以公之二子衰而逆我矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298127_comment'></div>吁嗟天乎，为善者果不必报乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298127_comment'></div>报而固若此乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298127_comment'></div>三十年州县，以考进阶，阶不过外郎，以资受任，任不过二千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298127_comment'></div>今日藩臣以威州奏可，而明日公寝疾，病以死，天胡夺之亟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298127_comment'></div>循分迪彝，不事矫竞，不见知于世固也，而苍苍者未知之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298127_comment'></div>善类惋嗟，里闾惊愕，而况余舅甥之至情乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298127_comment'></div>薄奠不腆，公乎，其尚能饮余酒，如畴昔将尔子以过余之日乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298127_comment'></div>呜呼！</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1298127_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年4月</a>　吴猎以四川安抚制置使到成都就任，召其至幕府。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　吴猎于成都府学揭白鹿洞学规，建三先生祠堂，祀周敦颐与二程，为撰文记其事；在成都时，友人度正请刻朱子之书，魏了翁以为尚非其时，故而未许。作品：成都府学三先生祠堂记。<div id='poem_1297858' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297858' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297858?labeling=true' target='_blank'>成都府府学三先生祠堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297858")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297858_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297858'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297858'>开禧三年，蜀盗既平，诏遣刑部侍郎长沙吴公猎谕蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297858_comment'></div>始至则以崇化善俗为大务，既遂以制置使治成都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297858_comment'></div>朔望即学官见诸生，讲授经义，退语寮属曰：「古之教者既为之建学立师，而有道有德者皆同祠于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297858_comment'></div>成都典治为西南剧，鼓箧学官者，盖六十州之士咸在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297858_comment'></div>顾倡明绝学以承孔孟，如濂溪周先生、河南二程先生，乃未有像设，甚非古人祠有道德者之意」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297858_comment'></div>会余表兄高文卿亦以书请于公，且曰：「三先生之祠遍天下，况周子尝仕合阳，传谓蜀之贤人君子皆喜称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297858_comment'></div>二程先生则尝侍大中公游于广汉、成都，最后伊川久居涪，著录甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297858_comment'></div>今其遗风馀泽，犹被诸人，春秋奉祠，安可独后」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297858_comment'></div>则以属知华阳县度正、郡教授杨寅恭、新简州教授王祖孙，度地于汉文翁石室之西祠焉，以建安朱氏、广汉张氏配，而属某为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297858_comment'></div>某固谢不敢，而教授复以公意来请，不得辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297858_comment'></div>窃尝妄论天命不已，物生无穷，人惟独禀阴阳五行之秀，以成乎两间，静虚动直，万理咸备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297858_comment'></div>有仁义礼知之性焉，有恻隐羞恶、恭敬是非之心焉，有口鼻耳目四支之用焉，有君臣、父子、兄弟、夫妇、朋友之伦焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297858_comment'></div>是数者析而言之若弗齐，合而言之其极则一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297858_comment'></div>皇王以来，生不并世，而行乎中国，若合符节者，率是道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297858_comment'></div>尧以天下与舜，舜授禹，曰：「人心惟危，道心惟微」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297858_comment'></div>夏德既衰，汤告民于亳，首曰：「惟皇上帝降衷于下民」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297858_comment'></div>殷既坠厥命，周誓众于孟津，首曰：「惟人万物之灵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297858_comment'></div>曰道心，曰衷，曰灵，凡皆三王有天下之初，首明此义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297858_comment'></div>相后各数百岁，如出一口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297858_comment'></div>至于成王言生厚，尹吉甫言秉彝，三代之衰而有刘子言天地之中，孔子言性与天道，子思言诚，孟子言善，不以世之相去有久近，与口授面命，曾不少殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297858_comment'></div>益以见性命之源，清明纯粹，可以参天地，宰万物，而关百圣者在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297858_comment'></div>虽天下之变一治一乱，而是理必不可殄灭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297858_comment'></div>孟轲氏殁，学者失其传，务记览、为词章者沈痼于卑陋，既不足与语此；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297858_comment'></div>其虚无寂灭者，自以为高明，又不肯事此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297858_comment'></div>是理虽卒不加损，惟大本之不究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297858_comment'></div>则惑世诬民者得以潜驰于世，而伥伥冥行于无所存主之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297858_comment'></div>盖降周秦以迄五代，治少乱多，君不得为尧舜之君，民不得为尧舜之民，凡以是焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297858_comment'></div>艺祖造宋，首崇经术，加重儒生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297858_comment'></div>列圣相承，后先一揆，感召之至，七八十年之间，豪杰并出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297858_comment'></div>周先生奋乎千有馀载之下，超然自得，建图立书，本于《易》之太极，子思子之诚，以极乎阴阳五行造化之赜，而本之以中正仁义，贯显微，该体用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297858_comment'></div>二程先生亲得其传，相与阐发精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297858_comment'></div>凡尧、舜、禹、汤、文、武至于孔子、子思、孟子授受之道，至是复皦然大白于天下，使学者皆得以求端用力于斯焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297858_comment'></div>呜呼，元气之交会，而天运人事之相参，乃至如此，猗其盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297858_comment'></div>由是异人辈出，又为之推衍究极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297858_comment'></div>至于朱氏，张氏，而三先生之蕴亦几于发露无馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297858_comment'></div>由三先生而来，虽不克皆显于时，究其用，然以其嗣往圣，开来学，潜辅治理，以建万世太平之源，则孔孟氏而下未有之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297858_comment'></div>淳熙以后，学者浸盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297858_comment'></div>气数屈信，庆元学禁已密，正理不竞，卒之士习日卑，极于内患外变之相仍，则斯道也，至是益信，夫不可一日不明于天下也决矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297858_comment'></div>吴公受学于广汉张氏者，故能尊其所闻，以淑诸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297858_comment'></div>既祠三先生，又刻其遗书于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297858_comment'></div>蜀自昔号多士，学于京师者，至此比齐鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297858_comment'></div>继自今登斯堂，拜遗像，退而复读其书，以索三先生之所以为学者何事，而反求诸己，幸而得之，则弗措焉，其必有兴起者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297858_comment'></div>顾余至愚极陋，何足以进此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297858_comment'></div>而幸尝有志，敢述所闻以告郡教授，使复吴公，且以自厉云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1297858_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　钱震之来拜谒，应其请，为撰其父钱安国墓志铭。作品：龙水钱君安国墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298019' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙水钱君安国墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298019")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298019'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298019'>今郡县荒政不讲，凶年饥岁，吏托劝分之名以科粜，令下，富人右族欢以户相推，升抄合歛，如艾其肤，否则以岁为利而闭遏焉耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298019_comment'></div>有能竭其力之所至，不费徵督而保辑乡井，蠲弭剽盗，若是者随其事功，亡小大咸有取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298019_comment'></div>东川壤地多硗少衍，而资为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298019_comment'></div>绍熙三年岁大侵，民糠糒不继，钱君安国继先首发私廪，不足则以控于转运、常平，粜郡国仓，分隅以给，择谨厚有仁术者主之，而俾君往来程督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298019_comment'></div>守宰既深听任，全活甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298019_comment'></div>嘉泰元年荐饥，台府议振粜，君信义既著，又以委属，所活视前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298019_comment'></div>呜呼，为郡邑大姓者钧是心也，则天下安有病岁者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298019_comment'></div>其年余仕成都，往往有道前事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298019_comment'></div>亡何，君以葬亲袖吾友张义立方所为铭求余诔挽，又得面质之，益信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298019_comment'></div>今年春，余客成都，有钱氏子震之介张君而以谒入者，余曰：「是非前发廪者钱君之子邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298019_comment'></div>吾闻活人者有后」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298019_comment'></div>亟揖而进之，则拜且泣曰：「震之不天，不幸昔岁丧吾父，今将以十月癸酉葬」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298019_comment'></div>方瞿然惊失，且问君亡恙时事，则曰：「不宁前事尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298019_comment'></div>余先君蚤孤，力学持门户，丧葬以礼，昏嫁以时，除馆聘士，训隶诸子，家用不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298019_comment'></div>少通经子百氏，期以文学稍自奋拔，游场屋辄不耦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298019_comment'></div>晚岁名堂曰孝友，与群从处融融然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298019_comment'></div>名亭以游息，与宾客对偲偲然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298019_comment'></div>以至承亲族，厚乡邻，凡人道所当为者先君既服行无斁，张君大有尝述之矣，独未有以铭诸竁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298019_comment'></div>昔者辛酉之会，先君尝辱察焉，非子谁属」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298019_comment'></div>余问其世，曰：「余先有举孝廉、为龙水令者，始家于资之西山倒植松下，世号松下钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298019_comment'></div>受之字明晁，则先君之三世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298019_comment'></div>吾母郡之蹇氏，柔嘉靖肃，宗族取为妇式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298019_comment'></div>一子，即震之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298019_comment'></div>女二，皆先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298019_comment'></div>内外孙七人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298019_comment'></div>问其葬，曰：「县之龙水乡双鱼池之兑山，君、夫人同兆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298019_comment'></div>问君、夫人之年，曰：「各六十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298019_comment'></div>夫人卒以嘉泰四年某月某日，君以开禧三年十一月某日」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298019_comment'></div>余既阅状，證以昔闻，宜为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298019_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1298019'>有隐其中，尔痾余恫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298019_comment'></div>匪誉匪交，维彝维衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298019_comment'></div>彼崇者丘，维君之宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298019_comment'></div>尔后有封，毋曰天梦梦。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1298019_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　与杨辅、李兴宗、钱文子等交游论学；钱氏示以所著《钱氏诗集传》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年闰4月26日</a>　召赴行在，以亲老不便为由，上书请辞。作品：辞免召赴行在状。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1208&endYear=1208')">1208年</a>　吴猎生日，赋词庆贺。作品：水调歌头（世界要扶助）<div id='poem_253669' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253669' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253669?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头 吴制置猎生日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1208年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253669")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253669_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253669'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253669'>世界要扶助，人物载耆英。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253669'>茫茫四海，谁识今代有宠臣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253669'>万顷青湖佳气，一片紫岩心事，天付与斯人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253669'>耸耸铁冠吏，表表白云卿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253669_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253669'>海沮漳，城汉郢，宅峨岷。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253669'>规摹妙处，胸次纳纳几沧瀛。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253669'>未说令公二纪，先看武公百岁，年与学俱新。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253669'>星弁百僚准，天宇四时春。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253669_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='0bb1c2afb6d74b9ab5f3fdb5fe230fa0_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>，35岁</div><div id='0bb1c2afb6d74b9ab5f3fdb5fe230fa0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　过成都，应友人虞刚简之请，为黄畴若送虞氏赴召诗作跋。作品：跋黄侍郎畴若送虞永康刚简赴召诗。<div id='poem_1297653' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297653' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297653?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋黄侍郎<span class='inlineComment2'>（畴若）</span>送虞永康<span class='inlineComment2'>（刚简）</span>赴召诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297653")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297653_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297653'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297653'>嘉定二年，豫章黄公被命帅成都，诏四蜀军民利病、吏治臧否咸得驿闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297653_comment'></div>明年，公至蜀，即以三士闻于朝，知黎州何侯德彦、知永康虞侯刚简、潼川通守杨侯洪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297653_comment'></div>而公于三人则未尝有一日之雅、左右之容也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297653_comment'></div>人谓是举，寔光前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297653_comment'></div>先是，制置使到官有所谓岁荐者，必攽诏旨，而安抚司则未有前比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297653_comment'></div>至是虞、何皆召，杨得升等郡旨挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297653_comment'></div>虞侯以私计不便，尝欲控辞，而亲友咸谓于义无当，乃谋以单车就道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297653_comment'></div>未行之数日，黄公自为诗以逆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297653_comment'></div>未及就稿，属部使者有言，诏予禄祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297653_comment'></div>暇日，公之僚属得公所为诗稿以示虞侯，侯请勒诸乐石以毋忘知己，而未有识其颠末者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297653_comment'></div>会某亦罢广汉，道成都，乃以属笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297653_comment'></div>某因惟公之诗所谓「才高真俊快，世隘多疑忌」等语，方其属思时，盖未知有此也，而所言已若此，公之识高虑远，且蔼然有赠言爱德之义，真不可企及哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297653_comment'></div>《诗》云「虽曰匪予，既作尔歌」，请以是复于侯而识诸篇末。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1297653_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1fde140c22294b0d8c99521c917e8e82_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1fde140c22294b0d8c99521c917e8e82");'><span id='1fde140c22294b0d8c99521c917e8e82_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>，39岁</div><div id='1fde140c22294b0d8c99521c917e8e82' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，至成都，会见友人虞刚简。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，在成都，与虞刚简、高稼同访同产兄高载，并拜谒朱熹祠，作诗记其事。作品：以使事过成都讫事而归虞万州成都尉高表兄拉访灵泉宰高表史风雨连明遂谒朱祭酒祠即事赋四首。<div id='poem_252790' id='poem_title_252790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252790'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252790'>薝卜风清醉骑香，满身花影踏斜阳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252790'>行花尽处山围郭，又听松风吹客裳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252790'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252790_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252788' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252788' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_2_253227'>多事鬓毛改，长途髀肉生。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253227'>随流浑未定，鼻息满舡鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253227'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253227_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，过双流，至妻舅李嘉量家。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='81e1aa8bed6c474081e56f2f5dcde037_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("81e1aa8bed6c474081e56f2f5dcde037");'><span id='81e1aa8bed6c474081e56f2f5dcde037_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1232&endYear=1232')">1232年</a>，55岁</div><div id='81e1aa8bed6c474081e56f2f5dcde037' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过成都，至岳父家，吊唁岳母及妻弟媳，居留数日。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过双流，应范埙之孙范子郯之请，作《题蕲州仪曹范埙元帅府牒后》<div id='poem_1297797' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297797' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297797?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题蕲州仪曹范埙元帅府牒后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1232年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297797")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297797_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297797'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297797'>靖康之祸，荐绅大夫士未尝不愤惋，于大官贵人无足倚赖，而冗曹稗官犹可与有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297797_comment'></div>赵哲一使臣，能以百骑束虏马；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297797_comment'></div>向拱一尉掾，能以培绳批游骑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297797_comment'></div>傅亮一文学，能以义旅造青城；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297797_comment'></div>陈淬一小校，能先诸将以败虏于南华；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297797_comment'></div>韩世忠一制将，能引部将以却虏于南京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297797_comment'></div>至于据神稷、破鹘眼者，乃安邑之士人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297797_comment'></div>日中碎虏五十壁者，乃石濠之小吏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297797_comment'></div>首渡河以复新、兴者，乃招抚司之属将；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297797_comment'></div>以千八百骑夜刺孛堇者，乃经略司之都监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297797_comment'></div>曰孟迪，曰种潜，曰张勉，曰张渐，曰白保，曰李进，皆翘关超距、雷动风从于王庶之檄，异时中兴诸将繇此其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297797_comment'></div>使当时得将相大臣有以用之，俾各竭所长，经营河朔，则虏当远伏凉淀之北，而祖宗境土遄归职方矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297797_comment'></div>蕲州仪曹范公其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297797_comment'></div>予归自靖，道双流，公之孙子郯诵公自蕲趍济颠末，咸叹世弊俗偷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297797_comment'></div>方时晏然，位骄禄侈者偃然物上，盗弄人爵，蛊坏士气，胚胎祸机；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297797_comment'></div>一朝溃裂，幸而有怀忠蕴义之士起济濡首之厉，然犹扼塞不得亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297797_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297797_comment'></div>「其车既载，乃弃尔辅」，自古祸乱相寻于无穷者类若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297797_comment'></div>曹器远辨纸尾三人乃汪、黄、耿，非宗忠简，此说甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297797_comment'></div>使忠简而在此位也，吾所谓某某者，必有以用之，范公当不至流落秦陕，待张忠献之荐而后受知于思陵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297797_comment'></div>后百馀年，临邛魏某歛涕书于下方。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1297797_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
眉山（眉州）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3b1aadb88bc740cd95e051226a35eb6b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3b1aadb88bc740cd95e051226a35eb6b");'><span id='3b1aadb88bc740cd95e051226a35eb6b_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>　到眉山校士，得程掌、史守道等人。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='8e1bf5a99441467986e4db0e27b3b3ba_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8e1bf5a99441467986e4db0e27b3b3ba");'><span id='8e1bf5a99441467986e4db0e27b3b3ba_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1215')">1213-1215年</a>，36-38岁</div><div id='8e1bf5a99441467986e4db0e27b3b3ba' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>　秋，知眉州。作品：知眉州到任谢安大使。<div id='poem_1297511' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297511' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297511?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知眉州到任谢安大使启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297511")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297511_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297511'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297511'>窃禄养亲，未满武夷之秩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297511_comment'></div>起家为郡，谬居文物之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297511_comment'></div>祗服宠灵，莫知报塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297511_comment'></div>伏念某猥繇科第，早玷班行，徒以狷直浅中之资，立于权奸专政之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297511_comment'></div>虽公孙丞相发蒙耳，如尹氏太师不平何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297511_comment'></div>乃自诡于民庸，冀稍便于亲养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297511_comment'></div>三辞商聘，再析汉符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297511_comment'></div>适承旷弛之馀，粗究设施之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297511_comment'></div>肃遏慢吏，训齐败民，崇学校以明伦，蠲租繇而厚本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297511_comment'></div>谓粗逃于瘝旷，冀无慊于承宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297511_comment'></div>而凉德挻灾，垂气致异，迄荷圣朝之鉴，仅从镌免之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297511_comment'></div>甫再阅于旬时，既即糜于祠廪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297511_comment'></div>寻膺误柬，复畀便麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297511_comment'></div>矧坡、颍之故乡，为西南之望郡，厥惟宠异，猥及庸虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297511_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇某官精识迈伦，吁谟经远，谓收士报国乃为臣之分，故达善引类不蕲人之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297511_comment'></div>凛乎有大臣之风，久矣非时贤所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297511_comment'></div>顾如不肖，虽荷夙知，然自获谴以来，亦知惟分之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297511_comment'></div>执事之庭既无韩愈之迹，主书之吏不识安世之名，而曲为蟠木之容，遽上公车之牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297511_comment'></div>言扬事久，彪列昈分，使王尊乍贤于一岁之间，而魏尚获免于六级之罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297511_comment'></div>所阶忝冒，咸轶故常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297511_comment'></div>某敢不益励后图，力惩前覆？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297511_comment'></div>观过斯知仁矣，此难为俗人言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297511_comment'></div>公举何私谢为，我当以国士报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297511_comment'></div>心之所蕴，言莫能殚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1297511_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年9月8日</a>　类省试，与友人潼川提刑张钧及同僚唱和。作品：次韵监试潼川提刑张兵部钧有怀家山木犀。九月八日类试别所与同事饮而癫作。<div id='poem_253140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253140' id='poem_sentence_1_253140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253140'>荣枯境里自殊观，造化机中无别香。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253357_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年11月1日</a>　族人魏天祐卒于眉州官舍，撰文哭之。作品：哭祖兄德先文。<div id='poem_1298128' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298128' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298128?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭族兄德先文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年11月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298128")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298128_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298128'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298128'>呜呼，德先甫其真亡矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298128_comment'></div>余生也后，不及知公于春秋鼎盛之日，迨其知之，则公既耄，而体冲虑澹，宇静气夷，则未尝与年俱耄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298128_comment'></div>脱有不知，视其抑抑之仪，而德之蕴于中者固可推见，矧余知公之深者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298128_comment'></div>圣贤精微之蕴，百家异同之论，二氏放遁之词，参稽遍考而融贯摆落，以溃于成，惟己之为，不蕲知闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298128_comment'></div>余虽甚愚不肖，而粗有志于学，仕止必俱，馆置必亲，观善之益既足以启发滞吝，而诱诲之切又足以警策惰偷，由是于公益亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298128_comment'></div>公一日谓余曰：「吾殆将死矣，姑听吾去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298128_comment'></div>余曰：「公奚为是言也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298128_comment'></div>不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298128_comment'></div>冬仲朔至之日，公执余手而言曰：「才知有馀者其陷溺深，吾子勉诸」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298128_comment'></div>余闻之悚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298128_comment'></div>明日，又与余论鬼神昼夜之蕴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298128_comment'></div>又明日，忽援笔书纸，曰「死生事大，惟当澄心静虑」等语，凡数十字，末又及孟氏六等之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298128_comment'></div>又明日，则已溘然去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298128_comment'></div>呜呼，德先甫果舍我而去邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298128_comment'></div>大化流形，聚散同体，既全而归，公则何憾，而影沉声谢，既自今安所复质也，宁不使我涕泗之横集也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298128_comment'></div>公今舍我去矣，郡祓是縻，不克从公于迈，尚几有以阴辅余志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298128_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1298128_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年11月24日</a>　友人李壁生日，赋词贺之。作品：水调歌头（曾记武林日）<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　春，同产兄高稼、高崇赴京廷试，赋诗相送。作品：送二兄三兄赴廷对。<div id='poem_253512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253014' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253014?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253014'>当年匣剑授彬时，都在将军颐指麾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253014'>谁者纷纷容易取，高皇约束变更为。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253014'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253014_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253013' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253013' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253013?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年3月2日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253013_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253013'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253013'>未须多买酂侯田，且可同乘曲逆舡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253013'>昨夜皛山云作雨，东流一水径通天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253013'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253013_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253012' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253012' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253012?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年3月2日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253012_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253012'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253012'>闭门睡息正齁齁，野卉蓬蓬烂不收。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253012_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253012'>只忧一夜西风急，恼乱东邻卒未休。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253012_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253012'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253012_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年3月3日</a>　约同僚视察堤堰，赋诗记其事。作品：上巳日约同僚过蟇颐晚视新开横江堰。<div id='poem_253058' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253058' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253058?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上巳日约同僚过蟆颐晚视新开横江堰</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年3月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253058")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253058_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253058'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253058'>朏魄双交气候新，古今为乐属兹辰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253058'>兰堂坐上皆豪逸，韦曲水边多丽人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253058'>顾我未能真免俗，邀宾聊复共行春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253058'>却因游豫思民事，检校城东白虎津。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253058'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253058_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年3月</a>　蟇颐堰筑成，撰文记其事。作品：眉州新修蟇颐堰记。<div id='poem_1297875' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297875' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297875?labeling=true' target='_blank'>眉州新修蟆颐堰记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297875")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297875_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297875'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297875'>距州城之东七里所曰蟆颐津者，唐拾遗孟公昭图以直道不容，为田令孜所沈处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297875_comment'></div>先是开元中，益州刺史张仇公兼琼为堰于吾州者二，由新津县之西曰通津，由蟆颐山之西曰永济，水利凡溉眉山、青神之田亩七万二千四百有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297875_comment'></div>国朝天圣末，使民输岁修之缗，亩算馀钱五十，元丰遂增至百四十有二，米为升者一，民患苦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297875_comment'></div>淳熙九年，郡守武信杨公辅易为官修，有所谓王景堰、北牙与田祖、田迪诸堰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297875_comment'></div>故叠石为堤，至是以竹落易之，衡广一百二十丈有奇，视昔用度盖已十损其二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297875_comment'></div>而比岁东流益悍，舂磨之家又壑之以浚其流，矶之以怒其势，故其下俗所谓芦花筒者日见漱齧，筒下之田疏恶不支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297875_comment'></div>迨嘉定五年，水又坌至，射王景堰仅馀寻丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297875_comment'></div>幸未决，决则堰高江庳，水且尽注之江，七万亩之种将不得下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297875_comment'></div>明年余来为守，访问民疾苦，多以是为言，欲为改作则筑事已动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297875_comment'></div>先是亩算不下八十钱，以给丁庸，会广汉张麟之来丞眉山，增科三十有八，且为教于民，约一年勿复歛，又节缩财用，损常年三之二，凡得钱三百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297875_comment'></div>于是畚武阳之石以为堤，下邛笮之竹以为楗，使植根既固，虽有涨潦不能侵噬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297875_comment'></div>一日戒余以竣事，余往观焉，且命客以俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297875_comment'></div>丞曰：「是亦庶几无憾」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297875_comment'></div>余曰：「不。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297875_comment'></div>是所谓随宜救弊然也，而长利乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297875_comment'></div>且州之水近自白虎江来，其为派二，东流直蟆颐则病堰，西流薄州溉则病城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297875_comment'></div>是虽三尺之童亦皆见之，而先是者弗此之图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297875_comment'></div>今东流日下，吾恐武阳之山可泐，邛笮之林可秃，而算亩增繇，抗民之精，将自是日极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297875_comment'></div>今为教曰尽一年勿复歛，丞能自信矣乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297875_comment'></div>曰：「然则徙东流而西之，其庶可久乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297875_comment'></div>曰：「西亦吾民也，东免于堰患而西为城忧，是以利易害而弗可为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297875_comment'></div>曰：「奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297875_comment'></div>曰：「移东而西偏也，移西而东亦偏也，吾欲截江为楗以捍东流，而洒渠于东西之两间，则城若堰将两利焉，不乃可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297875_comment'></div>丞瞿然曰：「命之矣，敢请事期」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297875_comment'></div>而客有难曰：「因其故而岁为之防可，截江为之以徼幸万一不可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297875_comment'></div>曰：「何由知其不可也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297875_comment'></div>曰：「闻齐人延年言于汉武，欲开大河上岭，帝谓此大禹之所道，不可改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297875_comment'></div>杜预将桥大河，或亦以为商、周所都，历圣贤而不作，殆必难立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297875_comment'></div>然则是堰也，昔人之经略于斯为不少矣，而顾未有及此者，子之知也诚足以尽出古人乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297875_comment'></div>吾恐洒渠之利未即见，算亩之缗未可罢，而截江为楗，岁一剿民，是以百仞之堤为阱于国中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297875_comment'></div>其能久居此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297875_comment'></div>使来者或不能卒子之志，岁一罢修，则今之消功殚贿以为之者将复溃而东趋，而前功废矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297875_comment'></div>曰：「抑余闻汉人之习于灌溉者曰，张戎尝言水性就下，疾则自刮除成空而稍深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297875_comment'></div>今洒渠以浚之，其势将日下，下则疾，疾则刮除而深，昔之东注而病堰者皆将为中道之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297875_comment'></div>岁不过损钱百万以为截江之防，而王景堰之役可渐省，以至于不必复事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297875_comment'></div>与其岁损二倍之费以救其末，而为害未有既也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297875_comment'></div>且是非之心，焉可诬也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297875_comment'></div>今惟其是，孰不我是？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297875_comment'></div>今而非也，安能强来者之不我非邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297875_comment'></div>况渠成，民之利也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297875_comment'></div>其不成也，所损不过异时所以待遇使客者，今少府损节之以复于民耳，而来者何得以非我」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297875_comment'></div>乃以控于刑狱、常平使者潼川杨公子谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297875_comment'></div>议未决，会行郡，相与按视，始尽得其利害之要，捐钱七十万，俾经始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297875_comment'></div>余亦以少府二百万足成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297875_comment'></div>命丞受役焉，会计金谷，兵马都监吴□戒事期，程护工作，水工以时，物土赋丈，庸丁以时，架筠楗石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297875_comment'></div>起冬十月，汔明年春三月，累日积工凡若干，民之无职事者受庸而为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297875_comment'></div>渠成而前以为非是者，往往自异其说，谬见称述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297875_comment'></div>余复谓之曰：始而非之者固未必是，今而是之亦不得为非乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297875_comment'></div>水为天下之至险，有非知力所能周者，而子为是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297875_comment'></div>《易》曰：「穷则变，变则通，通则久」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297875_comment'></div>若夫变而通之，使可久而不穷，则在来者，非吾所敢知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297875_comment'></div>乃以为记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1297875_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年3月</a>　蟇颐堰筑成，友人李壁赋诗庆贺，和之。作品：次韵李参政壁赋蟇颐新堰三首。<div
