class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252866?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252866'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252866'>夏秋雨集浍沟盈，雨过江空洲渚生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252866'>事到无根元易涸，要将心地作池城。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252866'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252866_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252865?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252865_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252865'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252865'>八表云昏气候偏，秋霖成泽市乘舡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252865'>平舟老子閒无事，看尽熙丰祐圣年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252865'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252865_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年6月8日</a>　生日，同官载酒庆贺，赋诗答谢。作品：生日谢寄居见任官载酒。<div id='poem_253639' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253639' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253639?labeling=true' target='_blank'>木兰花慢 生日谢寄居见任官载酒三十七岁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253639")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253639_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253639'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253639'>怕年来年去，渐雅志、易华颠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253639'>叹梦里青藜，间边银信，望外朱轓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253639'>十年竟成何事，虽万钟、于我曷加焉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253639'>海上潮生潮落，山头云去云还。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253639_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253639'>人生天地两仪间。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253639'>只住百来年。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253639'>今三纪虚过，七旬强半，四帙看看。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253639'>当时只忧未见，恐如今、见得又徒然。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253639'>夜静花间明露，晓凉竹外晴烟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_253639_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年6月8日</a>　生日，李塈贻诗相贺，和之。作品：和李提刑塈见贻生日韵。<div id='poem_253779' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253779' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253779?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红 和李提刑见贻生日韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253779")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253779_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253779'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253779'>宇宙中间，还独笑、谁疏谁密。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253779'>正从容行处，山停川溢。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253779'>钟鼎勒铭模物象，山林赐路开行荜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253779'>要不如、胸次秪熙熙，无今昔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253779_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253779'>便百中，穿牙戟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253779'>怕六凿，生虚室。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253779'>为幽香小伫，旋供吟笔。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253779'>人事未须劳预虑，天公浑不消余力。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253779'>看雨馀、云捲约帘旌，明红日。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253779'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_253779_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年6月11日</a>　友人虞刚简妻赵氏卒，撰祭文、挽诗。作品：哭虞万州刚简妻赵氏文。虞万州妻赵安人挽诗二首。<div id='poem_1298132' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298132' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298132?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭虞万州刚简妻赵氏文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年6月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298132")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298132_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298132'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298132'>嗟嗟夫人，而止于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298132_comment'></div>卫国之子，雍国之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298132_comment'></div>延阁之妇，万侯之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298132_comment'></div>生长见闻，不烦姆师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298132_comment'></div>终温且任，象服是宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298132_comment'></div>云胡弗讹，伊戚之诒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298132_comment'></div>天有六气，人有四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298132_comment'></div>孔惠孔时，福禄尔绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298132_comment'></div>哀乐乐哀，如何勿思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298132_comment'></div>矧是妇事，无非无仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298132_comment'></div>夫人之仪，则有过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298132_comment'></div>过焉弗节，则戾于彝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298132_comment'></div>干和违豫，卒以弗支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298132_comment'></div>显允夫子，秉德不疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298132_comment'></div>胡不偕老，为家之肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298132_comment'></div>夫前子后，哭踊涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298132_comment'></div>赴车之来，承问恐悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298132_comment'></div>莫往余哭，郡绂是縻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298132_comment'></div>亟陈圭荐，神尚鉴兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298132_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1298132_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253319?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞万州<span class='inlineComment2'>（刚简）</span>妻赵安人挽诗<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年6月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253319")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253319'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253319'>妇言加妇德，公子嫁公孙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253319'>澹泊于心慊<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：去声。）</span>，纷华入耳烦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253319'>晋秦称匹国，韩姞烂盈门。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253319'>乃与其夫子，十年江上村。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253319'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253319_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253318' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253318' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253318?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年6月11日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253318_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253318'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253318'>江上有何乐，萧然吾亦忘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253318_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253318'>午眠春寂历，晚步水沧浪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253318_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253318'>倦去推门入，忺来索酒尝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253318_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253318'>清风那复见，江阔莫云长。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253318_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253318'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253318_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年7月</a>　族人魏天祐入葬，应其子魏仲许之请，为撰墓志铭。作品：魏府君天祐墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298025' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298025' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298025?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏府君天祐墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定七年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298025")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298025_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298025'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298025'>始余丱角，知公端人也，尝欲从之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298025_comment'></div>既冠，偶又与偕试于春官，见其粹明而平实，则又知为纯体笃践之士也，由是为敬益加于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298025_comment'></div>一行作吏，涉艺荒浅，不得与之相周旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298025_comment'></div>逮还自策府，以汉嘉印绶里居，即为书币致公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298025_comment'></div>暨守汉守眉，除馆以舍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298025_comment'></div>望其容色辞气油油翼翼，使人滞吝之意消；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298025_comment'></div>验之不睹不闻，则懔乎若有临其左右者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298025_comment'></div>察其所安，则剥落枝叶，玩心高明，无所滞碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298025_comment'></div>由是将尽舍而学焉，而公固不起疾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298025_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298025_comment'></div>非公之学前后有浅深，而余之知公之晚，是故余今昨是非之候也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298025_comment'></div>公资性端靖，不妄言笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298025_comment'></div>少与伯氏天启齐名，伯氏早与计偕，公年四十有六，始以词赋登里选，累举不利，当以恩补官，公辞不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298025_comment'></div>于是年七十矣，益大肆于学，圣经贤传，历览博究，又即夫河雒之正传以上溯洙泗之源，历历乎其独得而的然亡所疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298025_comment'></div>旁及百家异同之论、二氏放遁之词，贯融异同，揽摘精粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298025_comment'></div>逮乎日迈月征，阅天下之义理熟，春华秋月，登山乱流，草木之枯荣，岁时之代谢，山川之流峙，禽鱼之飞跃，触处呈露，会心适意，陶然怡然，盖举世之可悦可慕无以易其乐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298025_comment'></div>余时在旁，则相与命酒张饮，啸歌夷犹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298025_comment'></div>往往余去，拊卷独会，援毫疾书，短楮横轴，寒灯细字，兀兀穷晨夜不能置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298025_comment'></div>或谓其迂阔于事情，或讥其汎滥于老释，而公之融液摆落，人盖不及尽知，虽与公同生长于乡者，亦鲜克知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298025_comment'></div>每燕坐，辄缓声微吟曰：「天何言哉，四时行焉，百物生焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298025_comment'></div>或问之，则曰：「学者须是识得到此地位，方是极至」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298025_comment'></div>其在眉也，一日忽诀余曰：「余殆将死矣，姑听余去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298025_comment'></div>余曰：「公奚为是言也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298025_comment'></div>不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298025_comment'></div>冬仲朔去之日，公执余手而言曰：「才知有馀者其陷溺深，吾子勉诸」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298025_comment'></div>又曰：「高南叔西叔待问阙廷有日矣，余虽形神彫谢，尚能勉赠其行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298025_comment'></div>索案上纸视之，则古诗数十韵，历历皆朝廷大议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298025_comment'></div>又明日与余论鬼神昼夜之蕴，又明日忽书纸曰「死生事大，惟当澄心静虑」等语，凡数十言，末又及孟氏六等之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298025_comment'></div>又明日则已溘然去矣，盖嘉定六年朔至之日丁卯也，年八十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298025_comment'></div>呜呼，今复有斯人矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298025_comment'></div>莫切于饥寒之厄，莫大于死生之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298025_comment'></div>公以伯氏搉酤不登，荡产以偿官负，终其身约居，不以累其守，泊如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298025_comment'></div>将死之他日，虑澹气夷，切切然以讲学为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298025_comment'></div>暨将启手足，无一语及家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298025_comment'></div>呜呼，是复有斯人矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298025_comment'></div>其子仲许将以七年七月乙酉，葬公于县之善何乡圣亥山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298025_comment'></div>先事，求余铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298025_comment'></div>噫，非余谁宜铭者！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298025_comment'></div>乃叙其世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298025_comment'></div>公邛之蒲江人，姓魏氏，讳天祐，字德先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298025_comment'></div>曾祖考□□，祖考大临，考□□，妣□氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298025_comment'></div>元配邑人吴氏，继室同里费氏，皆先卒葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298025_comment'></div>二子男：仲许、谦孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298025_comment'></div>二孙男：东震、祖传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298025_comment'></div>谦孙之卒，无后，公命以祖传为之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298025_comment'></div>孙女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298025_comment'></div>曾孙二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298025_comment'></div>公平生不事造请，居县之十里许，郡县长吏至必加延访，荐绅大夫过其门者必即之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298025_comment'></div>最后郡守今潼川漕臣张公师夔以公安贫守道闻于朝，未报而公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298025_comment'></div>世谓才难，固也，孰知亦有抱道怀德、白首而不见知者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298025_comment'></div>公平生论著有《语》《孟》《中庸》说、《卮言》《、赘言》、《信心编》、《自信编《、》鸡肋编》、《日录》诸书及《汉议》、《唐鉴》、《十国志》、《国朝史纂》，今藏于家，余将为裒次以广其传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298025_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_1298025'>大块噫兮推移，聚散同体兮又奚疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298025_comment'></div>羡生怛化兮小智之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298025_comment'></div>全而生兮，全而归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298025_comment'></div>公则奚憾，余将畴依！</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1298025_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年7月12日</a>　友人李炎震卒，应其子李世臣之请，为撰墓志铭。作品：朝奉郎权发遣大宁监李君炎震墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298028' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298028' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298028?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎权发遣大宁监李君炎震墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定七年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298028")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298028'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298028'>李氏系出颛帝，自唐高祖子郑惠王元懿十二世而为右仆射、韩文正公昉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298028_comment'></div>昉生宗谔，入翰林为学士，父子言德之懿，语在国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298028_comment'></div>宗谔生昭逢，为大中大夫、判登闻检院，赠金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298028_comment'></div>昭逢生清卿，为朝议大夫、提举鸿庆宫，赠金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298028_comment'></div>清卿生士观，登元祐六年进士第，为左朝散大夫、尚书工部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298028_comment'></div>自文正至工部居京师赐第，凡五世共爨，内外肃雍，无惎间言，京师号西李门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298028_comment'></div>至工部以建炎扈跸出守合州，卒于官，其妃张夫人，丞相商英女也，因家于合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298028_comment'></div>士观生敏随，为右宣义郎，赠中散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298028_comment'></div>敏随生如晦，朝请大夫，历知叙、邛、资三州，赠中大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298028_comment'></div>娶黄氏，生四子，侯其季也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298028_comment'></div>少与伯兄鼐同登淳熙十一年进士第，历任四十年，尉绵竹、青石，宰泸川、资阳县，通判洋、绵、汉、涪州，累官朝奉郎，权发遣大宁监，未赴而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298028_comment'></div>始登第时，资州公在邛，同年士争取近美官，侯重违亲侍，待戍凡四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298028_comment'></div>仅之官八阅月，丁母黄令人忧，除丧未夕，又丁父忧，执丧咸尽礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298028_comment'></div>及尉青石，勤恪被荐，注泸川令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298028_comment'></div>至县则偿旧令逋负，释其囚，表孝妇冤，脱其死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298028_comment'></div>值节守操下日急，侯微闻悖语，亟请閒宽其令，士心豫附，帅由是大见亲重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298028_comment'></div>移宰资阳，裁听健决，狱无系囚，邑人称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298028_comment'></div>宣抚司举辟通判洋州，未赴，大制司改辟绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298028_comment'></div>会守昏恣，事有不便于民，侯辄持不下，吏民益加敬爱，虽武夫悍卒亦知属心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298028_comment'></div>寻改倅汉州，且行，吏持金附耳语以旧比羡馀献者，侯叱责之，俾著于籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298028_comment'></div>顾谓亲友曰：「岂吾信未孚邪，此奚宜至我居」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298028_comment'></div>以此为大恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298028_comment'></div>至汉未几，民气浃和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298028_comment'></div>忽灯夕游人自蹂躏，侯以是例罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298028_comment'></div>去之夕倅寺堂宇尽压，人谓侯去不以罪，殆若有相之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298028_comment'></div>亡何，起家倅涪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298028_comment'></div>郡素蕞陋，随事整缉，剖决留讼，摧折豪民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298028_comment'></div>方伯知其能，俾摄忠州，辞不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298028_comment'></div>侯劲气庄色，不妄笑语，与人言必竭尽底里，以是信于亲友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298028_comment'></div>然不知者往往以厉己望之，久而察其无他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298028_comment'></div>工篆籀，得父笔意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298028_comment'></div>尤敏于词章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298028_comment'></div>乐施舍，分孤恤贫，如恐弗及，奉赐入家者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298028_comment'></div>初，开禧用兵，宣抚使程松檄侯至幕府，行至果州，权府召饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298028_comment'></div>酒半，闻边将以蜀叛，失声恸哭，倍道驰还，悒悒成疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298028_comment'></div>贼平，疾若稍夷，然自是精力萧然耗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298028_comment'></div>又以药误，浸成末疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298028_comment'></div>虽未能脱然全愈，而坐或移晷，语或淹夕，字或寻丈，书或累牍，尚娓娓不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298028_comment'></div>及大宁当上而疾作，属姻旧有所假贷，褚无馀赀，又义弗拒，于是冒甚雨入郛，为乞诸尝所往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298028_comment'></div>归而疾革，乃卒，盖嘉定七年七月己亥也，年六十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298028_comment'></div>侯讳炎震，字元脩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298028_comment'></div>元妃资中黄氏，妣令人之侄也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298028_comment'></div>继室杨氏，军器监朴之孙，先侯六年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298028_comment'></div>子二人，曰世臣、直臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298028_comment'></div>女一人，适杨縡，荆湖北路提点刑狱熹之子，即继室之甥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298028_comment'></div>孙一人，曰昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298028_comment'></div>世臣将以十一月甲申，奉侯之丧归于先大夫之兆，向侯所卜筑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298028_comment'></div>先事之二月，与其族谋，曰先君子平生有言有德，不可以不肖嗣罔闻于后，铭必图诸先友之亲且厚与笔之信且久者，则以状求余铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298028_comment'></div>余尝取于杨，盖侯之妻之侄也，比守广汉，又辱僚于侯，今又辱使其土，义不得辞，乃铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1298028'>皇肇区宇，烈烈耆耇，敷求厥绍，谁似谁有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298028_comment'></div>于维西李，源流滀厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298028_comment'></div>侯飏其芬，如酌孔取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298028_comment'></div>于役于处，于仕孔疚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298028_comment'></div>忠以被疾，惠以陨寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298028_comment'></div>唐高维先，文正维胄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298028_comment'></div>云深且厚，胡不焘后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298028_comment'></div>尚其嗣人，与邦俪久。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1298028_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　秋，开环湖于眉州城内，湖中建百坡亭，撰文记其事。作品：眉州新开环湖记。<div id='poem_1297873' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297873' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>眉州新开环湖记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297873")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297873'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297873'>临邛魏某居郡之明年，岁熟时康，教孚讼清，图惟宽閒之乡，有以节宣劳佚，疏瀹幽滞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297873_comment'></div>郡故有沼，而区分壤别，港绝潢断，昔人又多为矼梁以窒之，曾不能容刀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297873_comment'></div>乃宣乃理，倅以小艇于圃之西为洞，循洞之西为亭，榜曰「西港」，港有步，可上下舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297873_comment'></div>舟行而西为高梁，榜曰「环湖」，梁之下可藏舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297873_comment'></div>又西为传馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297873_comment'></div>由馆之北，湖光渺漭，从广百丈，其衡之长如从而加倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297873_comment'></div>北迤东为松菊亭，易亭榜曰「柏港」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297873_comment'></div>又东为亭菱屿，直百坡亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297873_comment'></div>又东北为雪桥，为游环靷梁乃济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297873_comment'></div>又东为起文堂，泓涵演湙，深广缭绕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297873_comment'></div>于是环圃皆湖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297873_comment'></div>乃因暇日，命客张坐饮，相与乱流而观，则翠筠苍樛，参差蔽亏，柔夷华芳，夹道绮靡，周阁曾槛，倒影参错，双鸧乘雁，浮深戏广，纤鳞巨介，頩首莘尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297873_comment'></div>目行心舒，俄顷变态，应接不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297873_comment'></div>客曰：「子之为是于圃中也，计庸程物，属役赋丈，非罢极人力恶可以为有也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297873_comment'></div>然则子无已剿民尔乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297873_comment'></div>曰：「不。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297873_comment'></div>吾未始有为也，山径之蹊间介然，用之而成路为间，不用则茅塞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297873_comment'></div>其塞也，山固自若也，其介然而成也，非袭而致之也，山之固有者然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297873_comment'></div>今余于是湖也，亦袭而致之与，无亦因其固有而导之然与，而奚剿民之有」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297873_comment'></div>客曰：「是则尔矣，而政非所急也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297873_comment'></div>曰：「吾闻诸柳文惠侯曰：『气烦则虑乱，视壅则气滞，故必有游息之物，使之清宁平夷常若有馀，然后理达而事成』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297873_comment'></div>是乃吾所谓节宣劳佚、疏瀹幽滞焉耳，斯其为政不已多乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297873_comment'></div>曰：「子之为是也，则吾既得闻命矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297873_comment'></div>抑闻之：『无已大康，职司其居』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297873_comment'></div>子之游也，亦有以寓其思职之意矣乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297873_comment'></div>曰：「有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297873_comment'></div>昔者扬雄氏有言：『乘国者其如乘航乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297873_comment'></div>航安则人斯安』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297873_comment'></div>吾将安航名吾舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297873_comment'></div>且航者，人之所以济也，而国似之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297873_comment'></div>吾知乘航之不可忽，则游豫之顷无非事也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297873_comment'></div>客曰：「唯唯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297873_comment'></div>非子吾不及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297873_comment'></div>虽然，请为歌之，愿无忘子之志也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297873_comment'></div>乃歌曰：「有㳽且盈兮谁揭谁厉，采蒲与荷兮采藻淠淠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297873_comment'></div>言鬷其迈兮匪航弗济，我引我拿兮我鼓我拽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297873_comment'></div>舒乎娧娧兮般乎裔裔，云吁且乐兮莫之止戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297873_comment'></div>卬兴我思兮此于湖底，我之泄泄兮民之蹶蹶，此非尔作兮维余于制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297873_comment'></div>终余永念兮是儆是戒，毋臭厥载兮庶其夷届」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297873_comment'></div>歌既阕，主人饮客酒，泯然思，辗然笑，复使反之，相与悠然而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297873_comment'></div>明日，书以为记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1297873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　秋，友人李塈生日，赋词贺之。作品：满江红（秋意冷然）<div id='poem_253776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红 李提刑生日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253776")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253776'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253776'>秋意冷然，对宇宙、一尊相属。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253776'>君看取、都无凝滞，天机纯熟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253776'>水拍池塘鸿雁聚，露浓庭畹芝兰馥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253776'>笑何曾、一事上眉头，萦心曲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253776_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253776'>兴不浅，船明玉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253776'>人更健，巾横幅。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253776'>问人间底处，升沉迟速。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253776'>气压暗岩虹半吐，眼明平楚云相逐。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253776'>但年年、屈指问西风，篘新醁。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253776_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253776'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_253776_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　秋，谒三苏祠，撰祝文。作品：谒苏文公祠祝文。<div id='poem_1298180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谒苏文公祠祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298180")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298180'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298180'>眉号士大夫郡，圣天子不以某不肖，奠守兹土，其在境内凡百辟卿士有益于民者，夙夜承祀无忒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298180_comment'></div>矧惟山川炳灵，世载苏氏，一翁二季，先后相望，文章事业，在太史氏之典策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298180_comment'></div>今居郡满岁，顾岁时奉尝阙然弗讲，殆非所以厉贤崇化、律我有民也，用修圭荐，展于宰下，以内翰太师文忠公、黄门文定公从祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298180_comment'></div>既齐既稷，神保攸歆，敢不永与多士承绎斯文，以毋忘德！</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1298180_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年9月8日</a>　与友人宴饮于环湖之西港，席间赋诗记事。作品：重阳前一日约寓公饮于新开湖之西港有歌词者。<div id='poem_253545' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253545' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253545?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重阳前一日约寓公饮于新开湖之西港有歌词者其乱曰会与州人饮公遗爱一江醇酎遂以此分韵赋诗某得一字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年9月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253545")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253545_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253545'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253545'>吾州远景楼，为天下第一<span class='inlineComment2'>（吴本、四库本作壮哉天下一）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253545'>下有千尺湖，长虹倚斜日。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253545'>烟云纷蔽亏，草树互蒙密。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253545'>人既位通显，湖犹困遗逸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253545'>一段云锦机，割截不成疋。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253545'>我来划见之，慨然为拈出。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253545'>凹者豁以舒，凸者疏而溢。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253545'>乃取半山句，以榜湖阴室。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253545'>晨舟乱平渺，日晏未云毕。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253545'>客喜以问余，幻成子何术。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253545'>余非袭而致，彼有是良质。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253545'>牛山木尝美，茅径人自窒。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253545'>一笑各会心，凉风送萧瑟。<div id='poem_sentence_12_253545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_253545'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_253545_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年9月</a>　友人李壁来访，游环湖，赋诗唱和。作品：次韵李参政壁湖上杂咏录寄龙鹤坟庐（龙鹤在吾西）浣溪沙（晓镜摇空髻耸丫）<div id='poem_253425' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253425' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253425?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵李参政<span class='inlineComment2'>（壁）</span>湖上杂咏录寄龙鹤坟庐<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253425")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253425_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253425'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253425'>龙鹤在吾西，昔年班荆处。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253425'>乃今五斗米，絷之不得去。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253425'>冬夜那何<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作向）</span>晨，斜河耿高树。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253425'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_253425_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浣溪沙 李参政壁领客访环湖瑞莲席间索赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年9月）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253748'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253748'>晓镜摇空髻耸丫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253748'>夜盘承露掌分叉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253748'>翠芳绰约总无华。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253748_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253748'>欲往从之空怅望，潜虽伏矣莫藏遮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253748'>淤泥深处瑞莲花。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253748_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年10月</a>　修江乡馆成，撰文记其修建本末。作品：眉州江乡馆壁记。<div id='poem_1297874' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297874' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297874?labeling=true' target='_blank'>眉州江乡馆壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297874")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297874'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297874'>眉为郡介居水陆之冲，公馆之西故有代舍以赢宾旅，余既略加葺焉，惟是溯沿来届者未有以舍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297874_comment'></div>濒江有亭，榜以「共饮」，故邑宰唐安胡文靖公所作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297874_comment'></div>郊之逆劳，仅仅容车，燥湿无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297874_comment'></div>乃嘉定六年，临邛魏某来为州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297874_comment'></div>明年，损少府用度，撤而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297874_comment'></div>知县事吕符，文靖之族也，寔相是役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297874_comment'></div>冠楼于堂，翼堂以室，联以步󰔶，高其闬闳，缭以周垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297874_comment'></div>盖经始于秋七月，汔其冬之十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297874_comment'></div>于是宾至之不时，得此托处则宾从有适，井匽有次，脱然如归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297874_comment'></div>或以谓余曰：「客必致馆，是谓友纪，故昔人以隶垣觇晋，以司里觇陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297874_comment'></div>今余亦将以是觇子之政之修也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297874_comment'></div>曰：嘻，而恶知余之始拓为不若是也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297874_comment'></div>余将左右宣亩树之台观，屏剔菑翳，艺之卉木，使高明平夷，倦客有以息斯游斯，节宣劳佚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297874_comment'></div>而后薄民壤，旁厄丛祠，卒未有以大厌余志也，而以是觇政也，祇其所以隘我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297874_comment'></div>姑识其事，尚来者卒成之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1297874_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　冬，李壁朝阳阁落成，赋词贺之。作品：鹧鸪天（月落星稀露气香）<div id='poem_253794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253794?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鹧鸪天 次韵李参政壁朝阳阁落成</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253794")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253794_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253794'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253794'>月落星稀露气香。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253794'>烟销日出晓光凉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253794'>天东扶木三千丈，一片丹心似许长。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253794_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253794'>淇以北，洛之阳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253794'>买花移竹且<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_253794", 253794, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>迷藏</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253794'>九重阊阖开黄道，未信低回两鬓霜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_253794_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年11月24日</a>　友人李壁生日，赋词贺之。作品：满江红（湖水平漪）<div id='poem_253777' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253777' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253777?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红 李参政壁生日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年11月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253777")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253777_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253777'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253777'>湖水平漪，与我意、一般容与。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253777'>任多少、双凫乘雁，落花飞絮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253777'>露冷云寒烟外竹，霜明日洁梅边路。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253777'>怪天随、人意作阴晴，无非数。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253777_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253777'>方寸地，图书府。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253777'>老太史，亲分付。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253777'>况身名四海，未为不遇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253777'>用舍行藏皆有命，时来将相还须做。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253777'>且闲中、袖手阅时人，摩今古。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253777'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_253777_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1214&endYear=1214')">1214年</a>　是年，为李壁所著《临川诗注》作序。作品：临川诗注序。<div id='poem_1297572' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297572' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297572?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临川诗注序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1214年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297572")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297572_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297572'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297572'>国朝列局修书，至崇、观、政、宣而后尤为详备，而其书则经史图、乐书、礼制、科条、诏令、记注、故实、道史、内经，臣下之文鲜得列焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297572_comment'></div>时惟临川王公遗文获与编定，薛肇明诸人寔董其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297572_comment'></div>虽曰出于一时之好尚，然其锻鍊精粹，诚文人之巨擘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297572_comment'></div>以元祐诸贤与公异论者，至其为文则未尝不许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297572_comment'></div>然肇明诸人所编，卒以靖康多难，散落不存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297572_comment'></div>今世俗传抄已非当时善本，故其后先舛差，简帙间脱，亦有他人之文淆乱其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297572_comment'></div>虽然，未足多辨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297572_comment'></div>而公博极群书，盖自经子百史以及于《凡将》《急就》之文，旁行敷落之教，稗官虞初之说，莫不牢笼搜揽，消释贯融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297572_comment'></div>故其为文，使人习其读而不知其所由来，殆诗家所谓秘密藏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297572_comment'></div>今石林李公曩居临川，省公之诗，息游之馀，遇与意会，往往随笔疏于其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297572_comment'></div>涉日既久，命史纂辑，固已粲然盈编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297572_comment'></div>会某来守眉山，得与寓目，见其窥奇摘异，抉隐发藏，盖不可以一二数，则为之喟然叹曰：是岂世所谓训故者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297572_comment'></div>训故之病，党枯护朽，守阙保残，有不非郑、服之陋，无是正左、班之忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297572_comment'></div>今石林之于公则有不然，其丰容有馀之词，简婉不迫之趣，既各随义发明，若博见强志、廋词险韵，则又为之證辨钩析，俾览者皆得以开卷瞭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297572_comment'></div>然公之学亦时有专己之癖焉，石林于此盖未始随声是非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297572_comment'></div>《明妃曲》之二章曰「汉恩自浅胡自深，人生乐在相知心」，则引范元长之语以致其讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297572_comment'></div>《日出堂上饮》之诗，其乱曰「为客当酌酒，何预主人谋」，则引郑氏《考槃》之误以寓其贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297572_comment'></div>《君难托》之诗曰「世事反覆那得知，谗言入耳须臾离」，则明君臣始终之义理以返诸正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297572_comment'></div>自馀类此者尚众，姑摘其一二以明之，则《诗注》之作虽出于肆笔脱口、若不经意之馀，而发挥义理之正，将以迪民彝、厚世教，夫岂训故云乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297572_comment'></div>石林尝参预大政，今以洞霄之禄里居，其门人李西极醇儒，必欲以是书板行，而属某叙所以作，乃书以授之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1297572_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年1月</a>　友人任逢之母史夫人九十岁生日，前往称贺并赋词。作品：醉落魄（无边春色）<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年1月</a>　在友人任逢之处读曹植帖，为作跋。作品：跋陈思王帖。<div id='poem_1297660' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297660' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297660?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋陈思王帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297660")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297660_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297660'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297660'>按隋秘府所藏有魏《黄初篇》，其书至唐初已亡，莫知为何等书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297660_comment'></div>以类推之，如子建之遗文在当时固多有存亡者，奚独《鹞爵》等赋云乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297660_comment'></div>唐太宗出御府金币致天下古本，命魏元成及虞、褚定其真伪，篇各有印，印以贞观为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297660_comment'></div>今《鹞爵赋》及《赠王仲宣》诗皆有此印，疑为唐秘府所藏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297660_comment'></div>亡何，遽为武氏子脂泽所得，良为可惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297660_comment'></div>最后有在建业文房而后归之浮休张氏，盖几于屡厄而仅脱者，一缣素之传固亦有幸不幸哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297660_comment'></div>今自隋炀帝至浮休居士所题，其为帖凡五，虽乏精神，颇多态度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297660_comment'></div>或疑赝伪，或谓临模，固亦在疑信间，然迹其所由来，则源流固自可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297660_comment'></div>今藏于新普安史君任公之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297660_comment'></div>嘉定八年春王正月，临邛魏某得与寓目，辄题其后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1297660_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　春，唐季乙等新科进士归自成都，宴请之，赋词庆贺。作品：水调歌头（古说士夫郡）<div id='poem_253660' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253660' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253660?labeling=true' target='_blank'>燕甲戌进士归自都城(水调歌头)</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a gray;'>▪</span>过嘉定府，友人张方迎送，二人酬唱。作品：水调歌头（千古峨眉月）水调歌头（檥棹汉嘉口）<div id='poem_253670' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253670' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253670?labeling=true' "魏了翁", "poem_title_253670")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253670_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253670'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253670'>千古峨眉月，照我别离杯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253670'>故人中岁聚散，脉脉若为怀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253670'>醉帽三更风雨，别袂一帘山色，为放笑眉开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253670'>握手道旧故，抵掌论人才。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253670_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253670'>山中人，灶间婢，亦惊猜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253670'>江头新涨催发，欲去重裴回。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253670'>世事丝丝满鬓，岁月匆匆上面，渴梦肺生埃。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253670'>酒罢听客去，公亦赋归来。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253670_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253657' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253657' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253657?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头 张太博方送别壁津楼再赋 即席和</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253657")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253657_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253657'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253657'>舣棹汉嘉口，更尽渭城杯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253657_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253657'>淩云山色，似为行客苦伤怀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253657_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253657'>横出半天烟雨，锁定一川风景，未放客船开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253657_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253657'>想见此楼上，阅尽蜀人才。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253657_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253657'>山猿鹤，江鸥鹭，亦相猜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253657_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253657'>滔滔日夜东注，全璧几人回。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253657_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253657'>客亦莞然成笑，多少醉生梦死，转首总成埃。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253657_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253657'>信屈四时耳，寒暑往还来。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253657_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1a0a804c60134af29fb8835b2cf8be6a_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1233&endYear=1233')">1233年</a>　过汉嘉，友人李骏置酒迎送。<br /></div>
