-----title
丹棱
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='450725ed52cf40e1970074ef355e6dc3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("450725ed52cf40e1970074ef355e6dc3");'><span id='450725ed52cf40e1970074ef355e6dc3_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>，32岁</div><div id='450725ed52cf40e1970074ef355e6dc3' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1209&endYear=1209')">1209年</a>　春，过丹棱，史伯学之子史之椅、史之樟携文造访。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='8bbacf15b73541febcc4dfa7981dcafe_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8bbacf15b73541febcc4dfa7981dcafe");'><span id='8bbacf15b73541febcc4dfa7981dcafe_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>，35岁</div><div id='8bbacf15b73541febcc4dfa7981dcafe' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　过丹棱，应友人史之椅、史之樟兄弟之请，为取字。作品：史之椅之樟字说。<div id='poem_1297850' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297850' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297850?labeling=true' target='_blank'>史之椅之樟字说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297850")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297850_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297850'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297850'>嘉定二年春，余适丹棱，史伯学二子袖文以过余，词采隽明，向趋近正，余固期之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297850_comment'></div>后三年，余又过其里，二子又辱临焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297850_comment'></div>进而与之语，则曰：「今愿窃有请也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297850_comment'></div>兄弟初名奇、章，所为从立者，盖摘诸先训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297850_comment'></div>少长，而吾父又欲托诸椅桐豫樟之义，字各从木，曰之椅，曰之樟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297850_comment'></div>命之名久矣，而未有以字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297850_comment'></div>昔者己巳之会，尝受察于子焉，敢惟昔也请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297850_comment'></div>余曰：「冠而字，成人之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297850_comment'></div>先儒谓贵其所以为成人而不敢名，故命以字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297850_comment'></div>春秋二百四十二年间，字而不名者十有二人而已，字乌可易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297850_comment'></div>而以属诸余，何哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297850_comment'></div>二子固以请，则字椅曰有仪，樟曰有本，而为之说曰：「其桐其椅，其实离离，岂弟君子，莫不令仪」，诗人之歌《湛露》也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297850_comment'></div>「枫柙豫樟，栟榈枸榔，擢本千寻，垂荫万亩」，词人之赋《吴都》也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297850_comment'></div>椅桐，美才也，其质厚故其实蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297850_comment'></div>亦犹岂弟君子，德盛仁熟，故蔚然有仪之可象耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297850_comment'></div>豫樟亦美木也，其本大故其荫广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297850_comment'></div>本之则无，且不能芘其身，尚垂荫云乎哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297850_comment'></div>二者虽其立言之各有攸托，然合而玩之，其旨则一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297850_comment'></div>是以古之君子不愿乎其外，思天之所以予我者而笃信自脩，纯体实践。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297850_comment'></div>逮其真积力久也，则睟于面，盎于背，莫不有威仪之则；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297850_comment'></div>出乎身，加乎民，莫不有本末之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297850_comment'></div>二子其归而求之，谨其所修，内美者故能有仪，荫广者由其有本，皆非可幸而致、袭而取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297850_comment'></div>二子于余既一再见矣，余知子审矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297850_comment'></div>其自今再见子，则冀子之有以不坠吾言也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1297850_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
都江堰（导江）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='baaed4f4f8aa49eb983babdc8f4b45ed_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("baaed4f4f8aa49eb983babdc8f4b45ed");'><span id='baaed4f4f8aa49eb983babdc8f4b45ed_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>，34岁</div><div id='baaed4f4f8aa49eb983babdc8f4b45ed' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>友人虞刚简筑美功堂成，应邀前往观摩，赋词庆贺，并撰文记其事。作品：永康军花洲记。水调歌头（江水自石纽）<div id='poem_1297860' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297860' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297860?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永康军花洲记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年5月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297860")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297860_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297860'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297860'>永康之城南曰花洲者，俗号果园，椔翳榛莽，岁久不治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297860_comment'></div>陵阳虞仲易父来守是邦，更今名而筑堂于其上，取刘子临河之叹曰美功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297860_comment'></div>纵广四仞，其衡之长如纵而加一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297860_comment'></div>以嘉定之四年五月端午落成，宾朋翕合，凭槛纵观，逝川腾辉，列巘献状，嘉卉输秀，古木樛翠，危堞突立，长桥卧空，奇云落霞，杲日霁月，随境变态，应接不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297860_comment'></div>客曰：「呜呼噫嘻，此天地之閟，若有待焉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297860_comment'></div>韩文公记燕喜亭，所谓斩茅而嘉木列，伐石而青泉激，天作而地藏，以遗其人者，盖不是过也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297860_comment'></div>余曰：「是则然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297860_comment'></div>自有宇宙，便有此江山，高明杰特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297860_comment'></div>天地初无隐乎尔，而亦岂私于虞侯也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297860_comment'></div>山径之蹊，人惟不用耳，用之而成路于介然之顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297860_comment'></div>夫岂自外求哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297860_comment'></div>山之所固有者然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297860_comment'></div>惟人亦然，与天地并立而为三才，居广居也，位正位也，万物备具，无少欠阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297860_comment'></div>人惟由之而不知其道，故私意横生，自为町畦，而失其所以为广且正焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297860_comment'></div>有能一日克己复礼而有以洞见全体，则将随处充裕，不假外求，胸次浩然，直与天地万物上下同流者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297860_comment'></div>今余于是洲也，亦以是观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297860_comment'></div>不然，久矣其为洲也，胡昔之昧而今之章？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297860_comment'></div>昔也过者弗顾，而今遽为部南之胜，岂侯之力所能袭而致之邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297860_comment'></div>侯瞿然曰：「非子不能发此，子其遂以斯言记斯洲也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297860_comment'></div>是为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297860_comment'></div>侯名某，乾道宰相雍公之仲孙，余则临邛魏某也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1297860_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253677' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253677' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253677?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头 虞永康刚简所筑美功堂于城南以端午落成唐涪州赋水调歌即席次韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年5月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253677")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253677_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253677'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253677'>江水自石纽，灌口怒腾辉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253677'>便如黑水北出，迤逦到三危。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253677'>百尺长虹夭矫，两岸苍龙偃蹇，翠碧互因依。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253677'>古树百夫长，脩竹万竿旗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253677_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253677'>画堂开，风与月，巧相随。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253677'>史君领客行乐，旌纛立披披。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253677'>慨想二江遗迹，更起三闾忠愤，此日最为宜。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253677'>推本美功意，禹甸六章诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253677_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
广汉（汉州）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8c96695d64174c1387027fe0ed51d71d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8c96695d64174c1387027fe0ed51d71d");'><span id='8c96695d64174c1387027fe0ed51d71d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1212')">1211-1212年</a>，34-35岁</div><div id='8c96695d64174c1387027fe0ed51d71d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>　冬，知汉州。作品：汉州到任谢表。知汉州谢安大使。<div id='poem_1297195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汉州到任谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297195")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297195'>六年去国，荐叨趣诏之严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297195_comment'></div>三命循墙，实获便麾之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297195_comment'></div>幸将亲之有所，荷从欲之无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297195_comment'></div>祗服恩灵，罔知称塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297195_comment'></div>伏念臣禀资愚戆，涉学迂疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297195_comment'></div>偶奋迹于儒科，遂饕荣于朝迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297195_comment'></div>寻被禁林之给札，以阶蓬省之雠书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297195_comment'></div>属疆事之方殷，沮权奸之轻举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297195_comment'></div>虽公孙丞相发蒙耳，如尹氏太师不平何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297195_comment'></div>惧久居中，亟求补外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297195_comment'></div>未书乘郡之绩，两奉赐环之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297195_comment'></div>于时多艰，遭家弗靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297195_comment'></div>神虽驰于魏阙，身重去于亲庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297195_comment'></div>冒贡忱衷，果回渊听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297195_comment'></div>乃荷分符之宠，靡拘反汗之嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297195_comment'></div>臣所领州，今曰望郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297195_comment'></div>旁接涪、潼之境，中居梁、益之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297195_comment'></div>民力渐殚，讵催科之敢急；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297195_comment'></div>土风微犷，尤教化之当先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297195_comment'></div>顾臣何人，蒙国分寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297195_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇皇帝陛下恭俭修己，缉熙亶心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297195_comment'></div>三后在天，动遵成宪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297195_comment'></div>五年更化，行底康功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297195_comment'></div>犹遴柬于班联，俾承宣于郡国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297195_comment'></div>臣敢不益肩素履，仰体眷怀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297195_comment'></div>视民如伤，冀发施于仁政；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297195_comment'></div>行己所学，尚对越于天威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297195_comment'></div>终竭微诚，永酬亲擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297195_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1297195_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297510' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297510' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297510?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知汉州谢安大使启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297510")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297510_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297510'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297510'>自诡外庸，尝控辞于严召；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297510_comment'></div>误分方寄，亟祗拜于俞音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297510_comment'></div>过蒙大阃之知，靡事繁文之徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297510_comment'></div>俾从便道，趣领左符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297510_comment'></div>载惟恩覆之私，敢后书邮之敬？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297510_comment'></div>伏念某禀姿愚戆，涉学迂疏，偶奋迹于儒科，遂饕荣于朝迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297510_comment'></div>擢升芸秘，赐对銮坡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297510_comment'></div>属边事之方殷，沮权奸之轻举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297510_comment'></div>虽公孙丞相发蒙耳，如尹氏太师不平何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297510_comment'></div>难久居中，亟求补外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297510_comment'></div>未知为郡之乐，两奉赐环之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297510_comment'></div>属时多艰，遭家不靖，谓置身华近而未能报国，盍效官州县而且以及民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297510_comment'></div>求无愧于食功，用力陈于试郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297510_comment'></div>荷公朝之从欲，特畀便麾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297510_comment'></div>辱方岳之异知，弗拘彝制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297510_comment'></div>免呈身而受察，俾爱日以奉亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297510_comment'></div>祗服厥官，恪修乃职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297510_comment'></div>载惟广汉，虽号望州，适承彫弊之馀，深费爬梳之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297510_comment'></div>大纲小纪，蔑有一存；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297510_comment'></div>百孔千疮，不堪数举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297510_comment'></div>匪蒙假借，曷究设施！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297510_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官功塞二仪，名在九牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297510_comment'></div>风飞雷厉，平大难于呼吸之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297510_comment'></div>乾清坤夷，奠全蜀于危疑之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297510_comment'></div>帝未宽于西顾，公少缓于东归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297510_comment'></div>谓大臣之虑四方，当求共理；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297510_comment'></div>得一士而制千里，务在急贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297510_comment'></div>臻使疏庸，亦叨分守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297510_comment'></div>某敢不推其夙学，励乃壮心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297510_comment'></div>不欲食浮于人，庶乎寡过；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297510_comment'></div>所愿民安其业，非以求名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297510_comment'></div>过此以还，未知攸措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1297510_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>　冬，应开元观道士段谦光之请，为撰文记其缮营始末。作品：汉州开元观记。<div id='poem_1297869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297869?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汉州开元观记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297869")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297869'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297869'>自《图》、《书》出于河、洛而天地之秘始露，迨八卦画、九畴叙、六经作而天地之间备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297869_comment'></div>以言乎天下之赜，至于阴阳变化，远而莫御矣，而卒归于默成而信，存乎德行，所以体物而不可遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297869_comment'></div>以言乎圣人之道，至于峻极于天，大而亡以加矣，而不遗乎礼仪三百、威仪三千，所以范其化而不过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297869_comment'></div>凡皆贯显微，该体用，形而上者之道，初不离乎形而下者之器，虽关百圣、历万世而无弊焉可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297869_comment'></div>后世九流之士，往往执一偏以求道，得本则遗末，循粗而失精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297869_comment'></div>亦岂无高明卓异之士游于其间者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297869_comment'></div>惟其诚明异致，道器殊归，殆将不免于贤与知者之过，而恶睹夫天地之大全也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297869_comment'></div>且道家者流，其始不见于圣人之经，自老聃氏为周柱下史，著书以自明其说，亦不过恬养虚应以自淑其身者之所为尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297869_comment'></div>世有为老氏而不至者，初无得于其约而徒有慕乎其高，直欲垢浊斯世，妄意于六合之外求其所谓道者，于是神仙荒诞之术或得以乘间抵巇而荡摇人主之侈心，历世穷年，其说犹未泯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297869_comment'></div>呜呼，道其不明矣夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297869_comment'></div>广汉为蜀望郡，郡即学官以奉尝先圣先师，惟春秋二祀耳，而老、释之祠则充塞区井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297869_comment'></div>郡有谓开元观者，实始于唐之玄宗，其始初清明，耆俊在服，有二氏之书，数加摈抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297869_comment'></div>河南参军郑诜、朱阳丞郭仙舟投匦献诗，语涉道法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297869_comment'></div>区区丞掾之卑，语言之末，未害于治也，诋之为不切事情，免所居官，废为道士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297869_comment'></div>于斯时也，其好尚盖如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297869_comment'></div>承平既久，怠忽荒政，乃始外事物，弃伦理，以委其心于无所执着之地，而仙人方士之说入矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297869_comment'></div>今日表庄、列，明日祠玄、元，且崇信方术，缮修宫庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297869_comment'></div>若绳以老氏清虚淡泊之本旨，则此又习讹踵陋，愈求而愈失之者，而上之所好若是，是宜天下靡然向风，而郡国皆有是祠，以迄于今也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297869_comment'></div>嘉定四年冬，余守广汉，观之道士段谦光来言曰：「观之圮久矣，相其旧址，西北隅地卑且凹，积为瓦砾之场，其旁之降者则荆棘狐狸之所居也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297869_comment'></div>观之始基今数百年，虽仅存不废，而蛊坏废缺若此，吾衣食其中，常忸弗宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297869_comment'></div>乃填乃阏，乃治乃削，凹者以凸，秽者以洁，则虑材鸠庸，前为□殿，后为□殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297869_comment'></div>陈太初真人，世传谓火解于是州者，今亦绘而祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297869_comment'></div>其事则眉山苏文忠公尝识之矣，子盍为我述其缮营之始末，以诏来世也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297869_comment'></div>余曰：「噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297869_comment'></div>儒者之道，欲其自得之而纯体实践焉，非求乎外饰以眩诸人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297869_comment'></div>况土木之崇侈，于余乎奚取？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297869_comment'></div>虽然，有一于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297869_comment'></div>异端之教，揆诸吾道之中皆弗合也，然而老氏绵绵若存之说者，盖有近于大《易》生生之旨，而其所谓专气致柔，归根复命，视夫穷大而失其居者则又有间矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297869_comment'></div>诚能守淡泊，去健羡，瀹神涤虑如洁其庭宇，脩身谨行如固其垣墉，则不惟可进于汝师之道，而存体明用，吾犹将有望焉，尚庶几归儒之意」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297869_comment'></div>道士怃然而作曰：「命之矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297869_comment'></div>乃书以授之，是为记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1297869_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1211&endYear=1211')">1211年</a>　约于是年，应同僚友李炎震之请，为广安士人陈震孙等撰文记安丙惠政本末。作品：广安军和溪县安少保丙生祠记。<div id='poem_1297879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广安军和溪县安少保<span class='inlineComment2'>（丙）</span>生祠记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1211年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297879")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297879_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297879'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297879'>恭惟国家承百王之敝，县县纷裂，藩臣恣睢，艺祖皇帝神武所运，乱本旋弭，以开亿万年无疆之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297879_comment'></div>太宗遹祗前训，卒其伐功，函生闿怿，夷狄顺轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297879_comment'></div>真、仁休养，英庙嗣承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297879_comment'></div>至于熙、丰，物众地大，而假儒为奸者乃始变乱典常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297879_comment'></div>元祐更化，纲目毕举，而绍圣以后，党祸再作，极于崇、观、政、宣，戎索弗戒，乃底于乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297879_comment'></div>高皇南狩，骏惠先烈，弘济大难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297879_comment'></div>阜陵继之，励精图治，志清全疆，大勋未集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297879_comment'></div>而崇陵享国日浅，肆开皇上，克念厥绍，始初清明，率吁群献，将有志于庆历、元祐之盛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297879_comment'></div>天下延颈企踵以需太平，而韩侂胄已居中窃弄威柄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297879_comment'></div>吴曦乳臭子耳，依冯世资，出入内閤，侂胄既倚为腹心，畀掌禁旅，虽宠任踰涯，而曦之为谋则盖不在是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297879_comment'></div>武兴则曦之窟穴也，玠、璘、拱、挺再世为将，忌刻少恩，士鲜为用，徒以积威之馀，知有吴氏，故曦密结侂胄，愿将西师，既遂所图，则轻蔑王室之心由是日甚，密以开边中侂胄之欲，而潜通于虏，乘时为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297879_comment'></div>士大夫繇学禁以来，义理益不竞，一旦利欲所焮，则大官唱声，一口附和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297879_comment'></div>凡以使命还自虏廷者，例曰虏有内变，虏有饥馑，设王师一动，关河必且响应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297879_comment'></div>是则然矣，而不思侂胄之可与共功否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297879_comment'></div>凡一时之躐登华要者，鲜不出此，虽廷策进士亦以是为举首，否则摈抑不容矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297879_comment'></div>先是，某蒙恩召试玉堂，尝力陈其不可，几触闻罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297879_comment'></div>明年将出朝廷，尚欲托之公言以排异论，遂建请宰执、侍从、两省、台谏官条具可否来上，爰蔇管军，咸得译闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297879_comment'></div>诏下，中外各以己见条奏，独曦不奉诏，而移书侂胄曰：「今戒严有日，忽出条具之命，士心惑焉，未知攸禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297879_comment'></div>进退迟速，愿明降处分」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297879_comment'></div>彼既不论可否，而反持短长以肆欺侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297879_comment'></div>侂胄得书，罔然以失，而公卿以下素为所请寄，恬不知察，不知识者固已觇其无君之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297879_comment'></div>迨郭倪、李爽攻寿、泗，皇甫斌攻唐、邓、虽皆覆军亡将而还，然尚可诿者曰庸，而曦悠悠不前，不惟蓄温、裕之志，盖又出于石晋、刘齐之陋策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297879_comment'></div>元师既遁，王人继逐，东归之士蔽江而下，至是所望以反正者，惟蜀人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297879_comment'></div>志仁者蹈死弗悔，固足以明人臣之义，而洁身者勇往弗顾，全躯者依违其间，下此者又置不复道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297879_comment'></div>方斯时也，虏蹂我淮甸，绕我襄、安以来，荡摇我江汉，顾瞻四方，蹙蹙靡骋，而六十州生聚遽隔王化，此何时也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297879_comment'></div>悠悠风尘，莫有能剸刃于贼者，视其污蔑衣冠，割截舆地，骎骎然朝异而晡不同，不过抚髀太息焉耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297879_comment'></div>今资政殿大学士安公奋由儒生，独能周全其间，濡迹以就事，部分既定，即矫诏诛曦，以间乘势尽复四州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297879_comment'></div>虏闻之，以为从天而下也，相与胆落神沮，谓吾中国有人，由是不敢有二心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297879_comment'></div>方反书之上也，朝论大震，上召群臣计事，咸谓无出公右，乃为札书赐公，勉以图曦报国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297879_comment'></div>书未至而捷闻，君臣动色相庆，以谓知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297879_comment'></div>拜公端明殿学士、中大夫、知沔州、充利州西路安抚使、四川宣抚副使，恩视执政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297879_comment'></div>亡何，曦首至阙下，诏礼官讲行受俘之仪，纳于武库，凡皆国朝所未有者也，猗与盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297879_comment'></div>蜀人于公饮食必祝，盖公之祠遍蜀中，而公广安人也，和溪县封山镇亦公之乡也，顾独阙焉，未有以识高山之仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297879_comment'></div>其乡之士曰陈震孙等德公之知，乃肖厥象，而走广汉，介通守李君炎震，欲得余文以识其颠末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297879_comment'></div>余惟公殊尤绝异之绩，垂之史册，镂之玉板，被之乐石者，何可胜数，尚安以余言为也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297879_comment'></div>而固请弗已，则三复其事，为之喟然叹曰：天下之生久矣，一治一乱，非以气数屈信之变、人事昏明之感，故反覆荡摩，所不容不尔邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297879_comment'></div>然天之爱人也，屈于前必有信于后，消于彼必有息于此，使生民之类犹有所依以自立，而不至于极敝大坏，则以天固生才以待其定也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297879_comment'></div>夷吾不死以康天下，绛侯屈意以安刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297879_comment'></div>方事之未白也，有友如鲍叔，有君如汉高帝，固以是望之，彼亦以是自信不疑，是乌可强而致然邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297879_comment'></div>贼曦之变，公虽以天下为己任，始焉自晦，而人主与群臣固已期之于千万里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297879_comment'></div>书诏下颁，露布上腾，以其时考之，盖项背相望于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297879_comment'></div>地之相去也若此其远，而君臣一心，如合符节，人果不可以无素也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297879_comment'></div>唐禄山之乱，河朔二十四郡独有颜真卿，玄宗犹谓：「我不识真卿何如人，所为乃若此」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297879_comment'></div>真卿固尝有位于朝矣，而玄宗不识之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297879_comment'></div>安公方守偏郡，已为人主所深知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297879_comment'></div>河朔久而未平，而蜀变定于俄顷，虽其气数屈信之异，而亦人事昏明之感，固自不侔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297879_comment'></div>今虏运既衰，群丑相噬，扫清旧都，兹维其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297879_comment'></div>以天下之公望、朝廷之夙知，盖未有以加于公者，入相天子，倚成厥功，则铿鍧炳辉，荡人耳目，其将有大于此者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297879_comment'></div>某虽不令，请赓皇武方城之雅，以备一代缺文云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1297879_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　春，撰文劝农于郊。作品：汉州劝农文。<div id='poem_1297337' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297337' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297337?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汉州劝农文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297337")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297337_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297337'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297337'>蜀地险隘，多硗少衍，侧耕危穫，田事孔难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297337_comment'></div>惟成都、彭、汉，平原沃壤，桑麻满野，昔人所谓大旱不旱者，较之他郡，差易为功，而民多游惰，不事本业，其所成往往视他郡无以相远，非古今异时，地有肥硗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297337_comment'></div>太守以天子命来守汉，职在劝农，自冬涉春，常旸为沴，震惧靡宁，既露宗祈，迄旋嘉泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297337_comment'></div>今以中春之望，率履官常，躬行阡陌，将进尔民而勉之以服田力穑之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297337_comment'></div>尔之生于平沃，亦云幸矣，毋旷土，毋末作，各服尔耕，以勤乃事，则丰年之报将不尔遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297337_comment'></div>养尔父母，睦尔兄弟，乐尔妻孥，速尔朋友，礼义廉逊将由是兴焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297337_comment'></div>若舍是不为，越其罔有黍稷，则因无常心，以陷于辟，虽悔奚及！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297337_comment'></div>谨之重之，明听我言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1297337_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　春，应友人李大辩之请，撰文记石泉军军学创建及增扩本末。作品：石泉军军学记。<div id='poem_1297868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297868?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石泉军军学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297868")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297868_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297868'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297868'>石泉故县，县故有学，政和升县为军而学未之有改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297868_comment'></div>绍兴十六年，知军事魏侯某始撤而大之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297868_comment'></div>越六十有七年，汉嘉李侯大辩来为守，故事见于先圣先师之庙，视其殿室堂序已坏漏弗支，则虑材鸠庸，乃复兴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297868_comment'></div>凡而赀用率仰奉赐，不足则益以郡少府之斥币，郡寮及里人之贤者又相与助力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297868_comment'></div>始于嘉定四年夏月，成于明年春月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297868_comment'></div>侯以书抵余曰：「愿有纪焉，以告于郡之士也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297868_comment'></div>使郡教授李君杰叙其事而来谂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297868_comment'></div>余为之喟然叹曰：三代之学莫备于周，降秦汉而后莫备于我国朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297868_comment'></div>周之制自王宫、国都、闾巷、党术莫不有学，司徒总其事，乐正崇其教，下至庠塾，皆以民之有道德者为左右师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297868_comment'></div>自天子之元子、众子，公卿大夫士之适子，以至庶民之子若弟，八岁则入小学，教之以洒扫应对进退之节，礼乐射御书数之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297868_comment'></div>厥十有五，是进乎大学，而教之以致知格物、正心诚意之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297868_comment'></div>士生斯时，藏修息游未尝斯须不由于学，故其成材也易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297868_comment'></div>国朝之制虽不若是详也，然有非秦汉以来所及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297868_comment'></div>盖自嵩阳、庐阜、岳麓、睢阳，各有师徒，锡之经传，至乾兴元年而兖州立学，景祐四年则藩镇皆立学，宝元元年则大郡亦立学，至庆历三年以后则郡县无大小咸得立学焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297868_comment'></div>此既为前代所未有，而职之以教授，领之以部刺史、守相、令丞，则又昔之所无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297868_comment'></div>降周而来，亦庶几无遗憾者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297868_comment'></div>然周之得士，彬彬济济，极于治化休明、风俗醇厚，而今之士修诸身、措诸事业，顾或有不逮周者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297868_comment'></div>天生烝民，有物有则，容有今昔之间乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297868_comment'></div>是不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297868_comment'></div>古者自入小学，学幼仪，肄简谅，则既有以固其肌肤之会、筋骸之束，而养其良知良能之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297868_comment'></div>其入大学也，所以为教之具，非强其所无也，凡以上帝所降之衷，生民所秉之彝，万物备具，而作之君师者特因其固有而为之品节以导迪之，使明其仁义礼智之性，以行诸君臣父子兄弟夫妇朋友之伦，而无不尽其分焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297868_comment'></div>今之为教者独何如哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297868_comment'></div>利禄之诱梏于其前，既不由小学以养其德性，厚其基本，又不进之于大学以明其本初而溃于大成，其父兄之所训迪、师友之所切劘，大抵务记览，为词章，以求合于有司之程，为规取利禄计耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297868_comment'></div>自始童习以阶成人，耳目之所濡，心志之所之，始进既若是，随事亹亹，往而不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297868_comment'></div>其以是干泽也，不至于得不已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297868_comment'></div>幸而得之，则又将以其所以教于人者教人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297868_comment'></div>彼是相寻，其流益降，充而为公为卿，皆由此选，其所成就有不逮古人者，盖不俟其入政而固可前知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297868_comment'></div>呜呼，为士者盍亦反其本，而职教者亦尝于是而加之意乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297868_comment'></div>今李侯之为是役也，则吾既得闻命矣，抑侯之为教可得而闻之与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297868_comment'></div>古者教人之目至简而易行，至近而易知，不过曰父子有亲，君臣有义，夫妇有别，长幼有序，朋友有信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297868_comment'></div>是理也，贯千载如一日，人非不能行之、习之，而患不著察耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297868_comment'></div>《诗》云：「民之靡盈，谁夙知而莫成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297868_comment'></div>愿以是复于侯，将告诸郡人，相与切磋究之，期有兴起者，以无负建学立师之意云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1297868_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='14056dda5c1b477faff28ce04be9e4bf_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("14056dda5c1b477faff28ce04be9e4bf");'><span id='14056dda5c1b477faff28ce04be9e4bf_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>，35岁</div><div id='14056dda5c1b477faff28ce04be9e4bf' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　知汉州数月，应友人虞方简之请，为撰文记其创建长宁军贡院事。作品：长宁军贡院记。<div id='poem_1297877' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297877' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297877?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长宁军贡院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297877")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297877_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297877'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297877'>长宁之为军，自政和四年始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297877_comment'></div>朝廷不鄙其远，俾得贡士视内郡，德至广也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297877_comment'></div>王泽既浃，士习用劝，风气开建，衣冠浸茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297877_comment'></div>初，合试于泸乡之士，弗便也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297877_comment'></div>绍兴十四年，始以士之请，寓试于郡之龙华僧舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297877_comment'></div>越十六年，增流寓贡额二名，合旧为三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297877_comment'></div>越十四年而单演之始登进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297877_comment'></div>由是数十年间，人才彬彬间出，接武科级，就试者因以倍于曩日，僧舍湫陋，既不足以容，校士其间者亦病于弗葺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297877_comment'></div>嘉定三年夏四月，陵阳虞叔平父方简来守是邦，涖事之逾月，士以为请，侯瞿然曰：「是登进贤能之地，顾苟焉若是，盍更诸爽垲者」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297877_comment'></div>乃陟南冈，顾见西门之左稼泽且数十丈，距郡宇百步而近，域王诸峰秀出于左，中为宝山，屹起百仞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297877_comment'></div>侯曰：「是殆可矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297877_comment'></div>明日，合寮吏与学之左右生观焉，不谋同辞，考诸龟亦惟丙食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297877_comment'></div>遂益市旁近地，捐钱二十万经始其役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297877_comment'></div>或曰地势卑淤，舁辇畚锸之事，得无消功殚贿，奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297877_comment'></div>乡之士进曰：「此地发祥效灵，寔盼于侯，请勿以烦官有司，吾侪小人愿加一力焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297877_comment'></div>则属役赋丈，为台门三，为誊录、巡防之位二，前为重阁，周以步庑，中为公堂，室东西向，居堂左右，校试之斋庐四，在堂后，又为虚明之馆，在斋庐后，凡大小六十楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297877_comment'></div>于是侯为大门，通守杨君师信、校官文君东寅为庐馆以继之，郡士以次各守事期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297877_comment'></div>起冬十月己巳，讫明年春三月戊辰，用丁夫万三千七百有奇，钱用诸费二十七万一百有奇，役成而不愆于素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297877_comment'></div>侯乾道宰相雍公之孙也，识济开远，克念厥绍，凡所居安，惟猷是程，盖不宁惟是役也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297877_comment'></div>崇学校以迪士，申孝弟以厚俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297877_comment'></div>覆茅之庐，为缮以瓦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297877_comment'></div>触舟之滩，开凿如席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297877_comment'></div>泥涂十里，伐山陶甓，化为康庄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297877_comment'></div>四溪病涉，为二修梁，直达郡治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297877_comment'></div>大葺官宇，爰蔇典学、司刑之官，咸妥厥居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297877_comment'></div>盐筴旧为民害，不加抑配而商贾阜通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297877_comment'></div>叠是成绩，类皆非他俗吏所能办者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297877_comment'></div>某守广汉之数月，郡之士以书来请，愿有记焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297877_comment'></div>某熟复其事而叹嘉之不置也，因惟君人者以天下为一家，不自治也，分千里之地寄诸郡守，害焉除之，阙焉修之，不便焉必图所以更张之，如此乃可以位天位、禄天禄而亡愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297877_comment'></div>弗是之思，视其蛊坏不治者懵懵然去之，奚以守吏为哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297877_comment'></div>侯之是心也，庶知所当务者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297877_comment'></div>然而<span class='inlineComment2'>（下阙）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1297877_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　夏，州境内有桥梁垮塌，民有死伤，事闻于上，降官一秩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年</a>　将离汉州，同官赋诗作词送行，士民遮道挽留，用韩推官韵赋词为谢。作品：念奴娇（万人遮道）<div id='poem_253693' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253693' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253693?labeling=true' target='_blank'>念奴娇 广汉士民送别用韩推官韵为谢</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253693")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253693_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253693'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253693'>万人遮道，拨不断、争挽房湖逐客。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253693'>臣罪既盈应九死，全荷君王矜恻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253693'>况是当年，曾将愚技，十字街头立。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253693'>恩波浩荡，孤忠未报涓滴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253693_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253693'>世事应若穿杨，一弦不到，前发皆虚的。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253693'>自判此生元有分，不管筮违龟食。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253693'>靴帽丛中，渔樵席上，无入非吾得。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253693'>倚湖一笑，夜深群动皆息。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253693_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1212&endYear=1212')">1212年6月8日</a>　生日，与友人黄畴若唱酬。作品：南乡子（万里载浮名）<div id='poem_253716' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253716' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253716?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南乡子 和黄侍郎畴若见贻生日韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1212年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253716")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253716_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253716'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253716'>万里载浮名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253716'>忆昔从容下帝京。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253716'>冉冉七年如昨梦，分明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253716'>赢得存存夜气清。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253716_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253716'>谁使滥专城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253716'>有罪当诛尚薄刑。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253716'>细数当时同省士，皆卿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253716'>落落韶阳独九龄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253716_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
剑阁（剑门）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b6a483a421624a0fa240f4290e942459_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b6a483a421624a0fa240f4290e942459");'><span id='b6a483a421624a0fa240f4290e942459_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年</a>，36岁</div><div id='b6a483a421624a0fa240f4290e942459' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过剑门，有人以武连尉汤君《丁卯檄稿》相示，为作跋语。作品：跋武连汤尉檄。<div id='poem_1297650' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297650' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297650?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋武连汤尉檄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297650")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297650_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297650'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297650'>嘉定六年夏五月甲子，余过剑门，有得武连尉汤君丁卯檄稿以相示者，陈义开伟，读之慨然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297650_comment'></div>因惟天下之生，一治一乱，盖气数屈信之变，人事昏明之感，所不能免也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297650_comment'></div>而使斯人犹有所冯依以自立者，则以天彝人纪未尝一日间断耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297650_comment'></div>晋侯不安于自制之服冕，更始愧汗于盛陈之郎卫，刘仁恭惭于自有之旌节，彼盗贼小人怀奸怙乱，盖陷溺之深者，其心术犹能时时发见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297650_comment'></div>本朝数巨寇，其冯阻作昏如益、如贝、如邕、如睦，其挟虏以叛如昌、如豫、如曦，莫不有死难反正之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297650_comment'></div>虽然，是受任典职者耳，而奋自布衣，无尺寸之柄，独以区区之笔舌扶植人心如汤君者，岂不益可尚哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297650_comment'></div>为我寄声谢之，毋矜焉而画也，毋挠焉而折也，毋不见知焉而措也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297650_comment'></div>士所当为盖不止此，汤君自重勉之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1297650_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过剑门，赋诗记其事。作品：题剑门。出诗剑门后日履危径戏集轿兵方言。<div id='poem_253605' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253605' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253605?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题剑门</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253605")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253605_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253605'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253605'>江有瞿唐限，陆有双剑蹲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253605'>如熊罴当道，如虎豹守阍。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253605'>屹然东北隅，奠此西南坤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253605'>昔岁在单阏，白日尘沙昏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253605'>人心不足倚，恃此两长垣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253605'>舟车之出入，筦钥有司存。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253605'>衔舻下鱼复，委辔充剑门。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253605'>薮逋乃如此，天险何足言。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253605'>况于多蹊隧，不逮昔所闻。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253605'>烈烈张睢阳，英英颜平原。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253605'>古之善守国，人心以为藩。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253605'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_253605_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>出剑门后日履危径戏集轿兵方言</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253381")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253381'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253381'>篮舆陟险隘，兀兀不停辙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253381'>主人眩头目，仆夫困唇舌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253381'>前疑树梢拂，后虑崖石擦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253381'>方呼左畔跷，复叫右竿捺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253381'>避碍牢挂肘，冲泥轻下脚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253381'>或荆棘兜挂，或屋檐拐抹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253381'>或踏高直上，或照下稳踏。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253381'>斯须有不审，偾舆在目睫。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253381'>深渊固可畏，平地尤险绝。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253381'>作诗告仆夫，审诸秋毫末。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253381'>识察既晓然，力行谨无忽。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253381'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_253381_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
宁强（三泉）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e59e915746964d9f9a95a3e5f01d0f7c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e59e915746964d9f9a95a3e5f01d0f7c");'><span id='e59e915746964d9f9a95a3e5f01d0f7c_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1213&endYear=1213')">1213年5月</a>　拜谒杨震仲旌忠庙，感而赋诗。作品：题大安军杨宝谟旌忠庙。<div id='poem_253600' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253600' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253600?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题大安军杨宝谟□旌忠庙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1213年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a -----title
广元（绵谷）
-----detail

金堂（金水）
-----detail

-----title
三台（郪县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='23736779831040c7bbe29f2609f59a93_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("23736779831040c7bbe29f2609f59a93");'><span id='23736779831040c7bbe29f2609f59a93_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1216')">1215-1216年</a>，38-39岁</div><div id='23736779831040c7bbe29f2609f59a93' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年10月</a>　至潼川就任，会漕职空缺，兼转运判官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　秋冬间，岳父杨熹卒，撰文哭之。作品：哭外舅杨提刑熹文。<div id='poem_1298135' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298135' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298135?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭外舅杨提刑熹文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298135")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298135_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298135'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298135'>呜呼，公而止于斯乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298135_comment'></div>生自名胄，倩于相阀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298135_comment'></div>玩心往籍，景行先正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298135_comment'></div>外视宽裕而中实缜密，即之粹温而察焉刚方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298135_comment'></div>虽州符簜节，皆三锡命，而位以劳授，官以次迁，去就始终，秉德不疵，非若世之诡获而倖成者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298135_comment'></div>某甚愚不肖，甥于公之馆者今十有四年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298135_comment'></div>公始一见，以为可教，往往异席而容礼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298135_comment'></div>泯然相投则喜见颜面，命酒张饮，双亮交照，洞见膺鬲，盖若不以世之常婿畜之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298135_comment'></div>脱有小异则反覆训诏，亦无留藏，每使人跃然以舒，复惕然以警也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298135_comment'></div>昔者公所扬历皆在蜀，某虽漫仕而投閒之日半之，盖未尝不得从焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298135_comment'></div>公之之楚，某以守郡，义不得往见，胸臆结约，良不可任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298135_comment'></div>既闻将自楚返，庶知见时以陶近忧，犹以自慰，然亦讶閒者之何阔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298135_comment'></div>一日公之子以书来谂，进使者而问故，则公之戢于木久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298135_comment'></div>呜呼，公而止于斯乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298135_comment'></div>克自抑畏，无有祗悔，于世果奚愠也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298135_comment'></div>世论浅隘，既加排媢，无已，则天乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298135_comment'></div>天谁云憎，顾亦梦梦于此乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298135_comment'></div>生不得撰杖屦以从，病不得执膳药以侍，死不得持楄柎以敛，归不得服缌襂以吊，惛惛此心，谁其愬之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298135_comment'></div>岷山之江，至于荆州，心契神交，共此一水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298135_comment'></div>魂其来归，以即安于华萼之故墟，尚有以歆予奠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298135_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1298135_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　冬，由友人度正之荐，召苏振文于官府。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年12月30日</a>　与同产兄高定子唱和。作品：虞美人（一年一度屠苏酒）<div id='poem_253783' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253783' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253783?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞美人 和瞻叔兄除夕</a><span class='authorDate'>（1215年12月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253783")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253783_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253783'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253783'>一年一度屠苏酒。老我惊多又。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253783_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253783'>明年岂是更无年。已是虚过、三十八年前。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253783_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253783'>世间何物堪称好。家有斑衣老。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253783_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253783'>相期他日早还归。怕似瞻由、出处不曾齐。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253783_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253783'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253783_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1215&endYear=1215')">1215年</a>　约于是年，上书荐牟桂。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年1月</a>　上书为周敦颐、程颢、程颐请谥。作品：奏乞为周濂溪赐谥。<div id='poem_1297216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏乞为周濂溪赐谥</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297216")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297216'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297216'>臣猥以晚学，误被柬注，擢司祥刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297216_comment'></div>既服攸司，会漕挽空官，复令共二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297216_comment'></div>顾职分所系，其于教学立师，崇化善俗，所不当后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297216_comment'></div>因惟国朝盛时，先正钜公多仕于蜀，其生有显秩，没有恤章，载在史册者，臣既不复赘陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297216_comment'></div>然其间有道德隆重，为世师表，而爵位弗称，未举易名之典，则臣职在劝学，所当敷陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297216_comment'></div>臣切见故虞部郎中周敦颐尝为合州佥书判官，州事不经其手，吏不敢决，苟下之，民不肯从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297216_comment'></div>蜀之贤人君子莫不喜称之，其流风所渐，汔今未泯，士竞讲学，民知向方，春秋奉尝，有永无替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297216_comment'></div>臣始到官，尝遣吏即其祠而用币焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297216_comment'></div>退复惟念是特颐所以施诸一方，见诸行事之一二焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297216_comment'></div>盖自周衰，孔、孟氏没，更秦汉魏晋隋唐，学者无所宗主，支离判涣，莫适与归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297216_comment'></div>醇质者滞于佔毕训故，隽爽者溺于记览词章，言理则清虚寂灭之归，论事则功利智术之尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297216_comment'></div>诬民惑世，至于沦浃肌髓，不可救药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297216_comment'></div>斯民也，尧舜三代之所以治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297216_comment'></div>涉秦而后千数百年，治之日少，乱之日多，宁不以此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297216_comment'></div>而颐独奋乎百世之下，乃始探造化之至赜，建图著书，阐发幽秘，而示人以日用常行之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297216_comment'></div>使诵其遗文者，始得以晓然于洙泗之正传，而知世之所谓学者，非滞于俗师，则沦于异端，有不足学者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297216_comment'></div>又有河南程颢、程颐，亲得其传，其学益以大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297216_comment'></div>虽三人者皆不及大用于时，而其嗣往圣，开来哲，发天理，正人心，其于一代之理乱，万世之明闇，所关系盖甚不浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297216_comment'></div>特以命秩弗崇，其于节惠之文，未有能发明之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297216_comment'></div>绍兴之初，侍讲胡安国尝有请于朝，乞爵程颢兄弟，使得从食于先圣先师之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297216_comment'></div>其后乾道间，太学录魏掞之又尝白宰相，请祠程颢兄弟于学，会不果行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297216_comment'></div>如周敦颐，则又程颢兄弟亲炙而师事之者，安国、掞之亦未及以为言，诚为阙典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297216_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈详臣所陈，如以为可采，乞下之礼官，如先朝邵雍、徐积等故事，将周敦颐特赐美谥，使海内人士咸知正学之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297216_comment'></div>其于表章风厉，诚非小补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297216_comment'></div>如程颐兄弟，并得在易名之典，则尤足以章明时崇儒重道之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297216_comment'></div>臣本为蜀人，致甘棠之思，而儳言及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297216_comment'></div>越职踰分，臣知罪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297216_comment'></div>惟陛下财幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297216_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1297216'>〔小贴子〕臣又照得周敦颐及程颢兄弟，倡明绝学，俱有功于斯道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297216_comment'></div>今不惟未举易名之典，而爵列未加，亦不得从食于先圣先师之庙，诚为未称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297216_comment'></div>欲乞并下礼官，检会胡安国等尝所建请，讨论施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297216_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1297216'>〔又小贴子〕臣切见朝廷近岁尝因中外臣僚奏请，如朱熹、张栻并蒙赐谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297216_comment'></div>然熹、栻之学，实宗周、程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297216_comment'></div>录其后而遗其先，恐于褒崇美意，犹有未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297216_comment'></div>并乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1297216_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年1月10日</a>　友人刘光祖生日，赋词贺之。作品：满江红（见说新来）<div id='poem_253778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红 刘左史光祖生日正月十日</a><span "poem_title_253778")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253778'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253778'>见说新来，把闲事、都齐阁束。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253778'>日用处、浑无凝滞，天机纯熟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253778'>帘捲春风琴静好，庭移晓日兰芬馥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253778'>笑可曾，些子上眉头，萦心曲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253778_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253778'>吞宇宙，船明玉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253778'>批风月，诗成轴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253778'>问人间底处，升沈荣辱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253778'>与我言兮虽我愿，不吾以也吾常足。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253778'>但年年、先后放灯时，篘新醁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_253778_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年1月15日</a>　观灯，与刘光祖唱和。作品：洞庭春色（花帽檐行）<div id='poem_253725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洞庭春色/沁园春 元夕行灯轿上赋洞庭春色呈刘左史</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253725")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253725'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253725'>花帽檐行，宝钗梁畔，还是上元。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253725'>看去年芳草，如今又绿，当时皓月，此夕仍圆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253725'>节序驱人人不解，道岁岁年年都一般。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253725'>看承处，有烛龙照夜，铁凤连天。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253725_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253725'>东风不知倦客，又吹向楼阁山巅。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253725'>任管弦闹处，诗豪得志，绮罗香里，侠少当权。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253725'>客与溪翁无一事，但随俗簪花含笑看。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年1月19日</a>　友人刘光祖妻李夫人生辰，魏了翁载酒前往祝寿并赋词贺之。作品：念奴娇（刘郎初度随春到）<div id='poem_253691' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253691' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253691?labeling=true' target='_blank'>念奴娇 刘左史光祖夫人生日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年1月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253691")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253691_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253691'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253691'>刘郎初度随春到，尚记䌽衣春立。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253691_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253691'>又上夫人千岁寿，相望不争旬日。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253691_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253691'>琴瑟仪刑，山河态度，长是春风识。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253691_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253691'>都将和气，蒸成满院红白。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253691_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年2月</a>　杨齐巽携黄庭坚、杨君全诗手迹来访，为作跋语。作品：跋山谷与杨君全诗帖真迹。<div id='poem_1297668' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297668' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_1297668_comment'></div>公尝自谓年衰病侵，百事不进，惟觉书倍增胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297668_comment'></div>前辈进学之功，虽于书翰馀事犹然。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253652'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253652'>山岳会元气，初度首王春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
