id='poem_sentence_2_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253652'>玉剑卧霜斗，金锁掣天扃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253652_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253652'>学宗师，人气脉，国精神。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253652'>不应闲处袖手，试与入经纶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253652'>磊落蟠溪感遇，迢递彭篯岁月，远到漆园椿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253652'>用舍关时运，一片老臣心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253652_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年</a>　约于是春，同产兄高稼赴任，兄高崇有词见寄，魏了翁次韵。作品：青玉案（中年怕踏长亭路）<div id='poem_253697' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253697' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253697?labeling=true' target='_blank'>青玉案 次西叔兄送南叔兄赴钤干见寄韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253697")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253697_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253697'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253697'>中年怕踏长亭路。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253697'>便自有、离愁苦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253697'>一自送君趋幕府。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253697'>惺憁莺舌，呢喃燕觜，那解春无语。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253697_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253697'>三年山月移朝莫。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253697'>独倚松风等闲度。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253697'>到得除书萦绊住。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253697'>却愁不似，当时皓月，长伴君来去。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253697_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年4月29日</a>　友人程德降修葺绵州新城，应其请，为撰文记其事。作品：绵州新城记。<div id='poem_1297895' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297895' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297895?labeling=true' target='_blank'>绵州新城记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年4月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297895")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297895_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297895'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297895'>自建炎南狩，国之守在淮汉，而蜀居江之上游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297895_comment'></div>绍兴西征，蜀之守在利路，而绵为益之外蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297895_comment'></div>如昔人由阴平以窥蜀，则自龙至绵不二百里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297895_comment'></div>如近岁由益昌以保剑，则自剑至绵不三百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297895_comment'></div>然则绵虽内郡，实并边也，而莫为之限蔽，颓墉坏堑，若有若无，三尺之童牧可挑达而踰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297895_comment'></div>缓急所恃惟右护军之移屯者二千八百馀人，然边戍未撤，则是屯也，日闻鸟乌之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297895_comment'></div>鸟乌弗声，犹弗可恃，矧若此乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297895_comment'></div>嘉定十二年，眉山程侯始至，考按图牒，则自淳化五年延平石侯某尝筑斯城，阅二百三十年间，莫有继者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297895_comment'></div>则瞿然曰：「为国若此，其不耦事涉变者，特幸尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297895_comment'></div>于是省少府不急之费，命法曹刘伯焕、部将陈元弼即农事之隙鸠庸而筑之，凡赀用则属之通守唐君祖献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297895_comment'></div>昉于十三年冬十一月庚戌，讫于明年夏四月癸未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297895_comment'></div>城成，袤一千三百丈，崇二丈，而堞五尺不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297895_comment'></div>用夫六万四千八百，米一千九百五十石，钱一千二百万有畸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297895_comment'></div>曾几何而成绩章章若此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297895_comment'></div>侯且以为未也，计甃石之费，储钱六千二百万，又以满戍请于朝，俾唐习竟其役，且以书谂余曰：「走也不佞，以民社之力而为此城也，是在臣子分所当为，敢辱论载？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297895_comment'></div>惟是兴废补坠，粗有颠末，惧久而失其传也，敢以记请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297895_comment'></div>余每叹国朝彊干弱支之弊，至于郡国空虚、城池弗葺，以熙、丰罔利之臣急近利而昧远图，郡益以削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297895_comment'></div>方承平之久，未见其大害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297895_comment'></div>政、宣之末，内讧外猘，炎、兴之初，大奔小降，则支弱之害著矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297895_comment'></div>极于比岁，贼曦盈尺之𥿄足以惊奔列雉，张莫千人之聚足以披靡群辟，虏闯梁、洋如履平地，虏窥江淮如升虚邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297895_comment'></div>呜呼，事势至此，恶得无以变通之乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297895_comment'></div>故闻程侯之为是举也，深嘉而重叹焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297895_comment'></div>抑又不能无感于此者，敢与侯平章之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297895_comment'></div>夫所患无城，今隐以金椎，蒙以石壁，岿乎如峭巘断岸之不可攀也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297895_comment'></div>所患无兵，绵之风气浸迫关陕，其人可作而使也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297895_comment'></div>所患无财，使人人如侯之约己奉公，帑廪之羡溢亦非有甚难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297895_comment'></div>虽然，孰为守之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297895_comment'></div>古者哲夫以为城，今也先几烛患则嫌于乐祸，鞠躬蹈方则疑于少通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297895_comment'></div>古者众心以为城，今也吏倚法为市，民与吏为雠，平居既不相孚，缓急无所与守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297895_comment'></div>古者礼义廉耻以为城，今曰是非所急也，货利可以维斯世而权谋可以徼近功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297895_comment'></div>呜呼，是三者之说行，虽有金城汤池，独如彼何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297895_comment'></div>余与侯各分地守，徒能为其所得为者耳，若前所忧则盖有任其责者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297895_comment'></div>易》曰：「天险不可升也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297895_comment'></div>是险也，无象无形，不兵而不可犯也，不城而不可踰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297895_comment'></div>造次必俱而不可离也，是又所以持山川丘陵者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297895_comment'></div>侯其以为然，则试为识诸城阴，以冀览者之一动心焉，斯其为金汤不已多乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297895_comment'></div>侯名德降，字廷迈，尝历蓬、蜀二州守，节用度以宽繇赋，所去见思云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1297895_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年6月8日</a>　生日，作启谢亲友。作品：生日谢亲友启。<div id='poem_1297519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>生日谢亲友启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297519")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297519'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297519'>四十四而佩鱼符，偶叶香山之咏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297519_comment'></div>六千六以数亥首，敢希绛县之年！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297519_comment'></div>有嘉声气之应求，无间山川之悠远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297519_comment'></div>特贻问遗，爰蔇輶微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297519_comment'></div>顾影自怜，正《蓼莪》之废业；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297519_comment'></div>幸生何益，惭蓬矢之记辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297519_comment'></div>视报未皇，铭心徒切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297519_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1297519_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年6月</a>　友人杨申之卒，为文哭之。作品：哭杨通判申之文。<div id='poem_1298156' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298156' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298156?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭杨通判申之文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298156")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298156_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298156'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298156'>曩余摄守武信，会君为长于属邑，精养而沈审，宽平而刚特，今又联事于潼，我警我导，我扶我翊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298156_comment'></div>方副车之来上，胡六月而遽息！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298156_comment'></div>呜呼，屈信聚散，虽物之常则，然父不哭子，是谓顺德，忍使八十之亲而至此极也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298156_comment'></div>善人之报，茫不可谓，楄柎衰麻之事，所得为者不敢不尽力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298156_comment'></div>虽然，是恶足以写余心之伤衋也！</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1298156_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年11月19日</a>　安丙卒，撰文哭之。作品：哭宣抚安少保丙文。<div id='poem_1298158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭宣抚安少保丙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年11月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298158")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298158'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298158'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298158_comment'></div>天之方懠，民靡有臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298158_comment'></div>金戎假息，银夏诡盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298158_comment'></div>达蒙称币，青冀欸庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298158_comment'></div>襮顺里睽，孰罔孰真？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298158_comment'></div>内奰外覃，孰抚孰宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298158_comment'></div>何恃不恐，福于王明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298158_comment'></div>其明维何，镇梁徂荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298158_comment'></div>英英安公，荦荦产仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298158_comment'></div>仁之云亡，志士失声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298158_comment'></div>曾未数月，梁亦陨星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298158_comment'></div>同诏并峙，犹惧国轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298158_comment'></div>又弱一个，天威孔频。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298158_comment'></div>昔岁单阏，鸱义血人，有狂者皙，有溃者黥，裒凶蔓毒，赤子昏酲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298158_comment'></div>公惟无出，大憝再清，胡不牧马，士不弄兵，赤子晏眠，妇织男耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298158_comment'></div>视公未至，川臊谷腥，视今年春，淮甸震惊，掀蕲掇黄，此乌可泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298158_comment'></div>如千丈松，磥砢轮囷，虽多节目，可任栋楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298158_comment'></div>公今已矣，事变日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298158_comment'></div>岂终无才，如公英英，畅练军事，究谙戎情，回翔西鄙，几四十春，则匪骤致，积习以成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298158_comment'></div>缿筒摘伏，隐户罢征，闭门谢质，保境息民，图惟厥终，以逊名卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298158_comment'></div>公则奚憾，我忧方殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298158_comment'></div>汎汎舟流，渺未有程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298158_comment'></div>天命难谌，人心孔填。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298158_comment'></div>一哀之涕，匪蜀父兄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1298158_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年11月24日</a>　友人李壁生日，作诗六首贺之。作品：李参政生日。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年11月</a>　诏明年元日受宝，作表称贺。作品：贺受宝表。<div id='poem_1297206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297206?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺受宝表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297206")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297206'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297206'>恭睹诏书，以来年元日受宝文于大庆殿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297206_comment'></div>明命诞膺，披地图而数贡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297206_comment'></div>远人咸慕，奏天府以效珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297206_comment'></div>播告维新，奉安有恪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297206_comment'></div>臣闻方物虽昭德之致，宝镇则为国之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297206_comment'></div>得古印于咸阳，哲庙所以成太平之治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297206_comment'></div>献元玺于兴化，高皇所以开再造之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297206_comment'></div>然虫书尚袭于秦遗，而螭纽犹沿于唐制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297206_comment'></div>矧兹旧物，至自殊方，远参乎嘉祐之文，申述于元丰之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297206_comment'></div>图书具在，检玉偕来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297206_comment'></div>昔铲采中原，殆似鲁弓之未得；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297206_comment'></div>今观光上国，咸歆赵璧之全归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297206_comment'></div>于昭受命之符，光启中兴之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297206_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下聪文稽古，神武御时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297206_comment'></div>山东三十馀州，复行王化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297206_comment'></div>河北二十四郡，喜见官仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297206_comment'></div>归疆来涖于职方，执玉宜归于典瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297206_comment'></div>肆卜大朝之吉，聿修诞受之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297206_comment'></div>景光流闻，时谓创见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297206_comment'></div>臣心存阙北，身滞周南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297206_comment'></div>握乾符，阐坤珍，幸际兴隆之兆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297206_comment'></div>畏天命，念祖业，更观保右之申。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1297206_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年11月</a>　友人李侨卒，为撰墓志铭。作品：承事郎李公侨墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298041' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298041' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298041?labeling=true' target='_blank'>承奉郎致仕李公侨墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉定十四年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298041")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298041_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298041'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298041'>国朝士大夫致为臣而归，有谢辞祖饯之礼，若朱昂、王周、李东之、李受，公卿以下皆为赋诗，则又汉庭饯客之所未有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298041_comment'></div>然而昔之去者，大抵位高而宠极，禄厚而家温，其父祖襚印廞爵、其子孙重侯叠组者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298041_comment'></div>不然，则韩文公所谓「贺问未归，吊庐已萃，未燕于堂，已哭于次」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298041_comment'></div>又不然，则三马食曹而作宜去之书，一龙禅宋而兴归来之叹者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298041_comment'></div>乃若奋身寒苦，老不待年，恩宠漏泉，歌诗载道，则自临邛李公始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298041_comment'></div>公讳侨，字德秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298041_comment'></div>早从方舟先生李公石、寂通先生宋公兴游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298041_comment'></div>考卒，诸弟事公如师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298041_comment'></div>迨仲氏何贡于乡，厥三年公与叔氏民彝继上，而民彝第进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298041_comment'></div>公以索居益得肆力于学，昼诵夕惟，凡十有六年，刘起居光祖始拔公于类省试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298041_comment'></div>明年擢第廷中，授司户成都，以禄不逮亲，愿上所得官以爵考妣，朝论谓非故事，不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298041_comment'></div>光宗皇帝御批「其志可嘉」，特依所乞，其训词谓「非追远报本不解于心者不能」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298041_comment'></div>于是公年五十有四，赠考迪功郎、妣孺人，仍赐公初品官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298041_comment'></div>公卿百执事荣其行，歌以送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298041_comment'></div>宰相为摘上语，名所居堂曰「嘉志」，郡表其宅里曰「节行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298041_comment'></div>厥十年而成都京悱、又十年而眉山史公亮天应，皆援公以请，诏悉如故事，而二史特官从事郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298041_comment'></div>先是宣献楼公钥为公草制，且尝为诗，及是秉政，尚述前事以饯二史，而公之节益著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298041_comment'></div>公有别业在白鹤山下，为小室曰「枕流」，号「枕流居士」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298041_comment'></div>前后镇蜀者率致书币，咨以阙失，太守下车，首加存访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298041_comment'></div>长沙吴公猎谕蜀，荐士五十馀人，以公为首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298041_comment'></div>部使者李公兴宗继以名闻，诏特转承奉郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298041_comment'></div>公笑曰：「身既隐，焉用文之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298041_comment'></div>屏迹田里，宾至无留门者，虽晚进末艺若缓急请叩，率容接无厌斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298041_comment'></div>公取蒲江谢氏，先公五十五年而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298041_comment'></div>萧然一室，领袖群从，内外千指无私烹炊，无疾步大声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298041_comment'></div>启居以时，食饮有节，尤致严于宾祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298041_comment'></div>诸从子学连案，食共器，教养均一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298041_comment'></div>用谦与宾贡，履登世科，公虽喜见词色，所期不止是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298041_comment'></div>一日跌伤，久又苦气淋，遗命棺不过三寸，歛止时服一衾，丧从约，葬从速，毋徇俗为佛老供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298041_comment'></div>以嘉定十有四年十有一月丙子卒，远近民士吊哭不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298041_comment'></div>公系出唐曹恭王，繇唐入蜀，家成都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298041_comment'></div>治平间徙蜀州新津县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298041_comment'></div>曾大父安道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298041_comment'></div>大父泽，游学辟雍，以恩得官，监酒邛州，又徙邛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298041_comment'></div>父證，累赠通直郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298041_comment'></div>母大安人廖氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298041_comment'></div>公之子用常、孙男愿卜十一月壬申葬公于磐石乡孝义里癸山，甥叙守文侯诚之为状其行，以属铭于了翁，会君命召，不克铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298041_comment'></div>用常又以书请曰：「凡书太史氏之策皆有彝品，惟士以节行著则例齿于达官，子非忘诸」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298041_comment'></div>某愧谢，既为登诸史册，又志而铭之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1298041'>刘起居之诔曰：「公之归盖伤夫三纲五常之扫地，而士不尽知其心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298041_comment'></div>制置使崔公与之亦曰：「举世鼻息，于中独醒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298041_comment'></div>然则公之进退存亡，其所关甚重而不轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298041_comment'></div>是为铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1298041_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年</a>　是年，应友人黄申之之请，为撰文记叙州蠲役之事。作品：叙州蠲役记。<div id='poem_1297894' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297894' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297894?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叙州蠲役记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297894")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297894_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297894'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297894'>临邛黄侯守叙之明年，以书来潼川，谂其同郡魏了翁曰：「申所领州近薄诸囤生夷，远控两江蛮部，地狭隘，夷赋且半，岁入为缗八万，不当中州一小县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297894_comment'></div>民劳苦多瘠，而调度科繇视于他郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297894_comment'></div>设不幸有疆埸之警，他郡且供亿弗赡，矧是首当其锋，残困立见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297894_comment'></div>乾道间帅臣晁某建请得具常赋，它役无所与，岁为缗若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297894_comment'></div>诏下如章，而吏格不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297894_comment'></div>申甚病之，则条其事以白于西南大诸侯今少保安公，公立除之，尽如乾道诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297894_comment'></div>公尝以边用不给遣吏调丁括帑金，既又舍之不尽责，民罔不欢呼，请于州曰：『昔公荡乎泸戎，戎不复反，民立祠肖像，饮食祝焉，而未有以纪也，盍并是书之，以诏罔极』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297894_comment'></div>侈少保之赐，嘉邦人之请，而莫以塞也，必子也为我记者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297894_comment'></div>余阅其事而有感焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297894_comment'></div>古之士用有以行，舍有以藏，凡以不失吾本心焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297894_comment'></div>今之士受中秉彝以生，非有以异乎古人也，而见诸行事，往往不得夫恻隐羞恶、辞逊是非之本心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297894_comment'></div>是心固未尝亡也，蚀于利，夺于势，狃于习耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297894_comment'></div>侯填拊其州，乃能讲数十年久坠之政，控于大诸侯，并力役之征而施舍之，盖有戚戚于其心而不能自已者，是心岂自外至哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297894_comment'></div>虽然，微少保安公则孰为听之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297894_comment'></div>世道日狭，褊衷护前，自敌己以上且不能容之，矧勋位既崇，权任亦剧，则鲜不吝骄以自封者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297894_comment'></div>少保居之若固有然，有告必听，有闻必行，盖不独于叙然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297894_comment'></div>方其再命来宣，适承公私彫瘵之馀，帑缗仅数千计，殆不可一朝居者，公奋繇忠诚，耆定坤极，若兵若赋，徒手再造，未尝一加赋于民，斯亦虽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297894_comment'></div>乃所谓收隐户，括羡田，征幸民，鬻沽肆，凡皆不得已而为之，使吏奉行如公之心，虽夺人之邑可使无怨，其如倚势以丰己，失公之本心何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297894_comment'></div>方公心未孚，民德胥惑，有位者勿敢言也，而公瞷知之，速返前令，曾无留难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297894_comment'></div>既传檄州县，风晓百姓，犹以未得惩也，逮污吏以警馀慝，设讼缿以吁众戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297894_comment'></div>然后上自荐绅大夫士，下至矜寡孤独之民，始知为是纷纷，非公之本心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297894_comment'></div>既相与抗手交庆，而其有识之士又曰：「吾侪小人，连岁被兵，不皇宁处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297894_comment'></div>今年春，虏大入江淮，光、舒、蕲、黄之间，莽为盗区，虽随即殄歼，而死伤横道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297894_comment'></div>公自旬宣以来，三年之间则未尝有一尘之警，力所得勉，宁敢有爱？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297894_comment'></div>况公歛不及农，其不得已而算及游末也，亦遄止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297894_comment'></div>公之本心则日月之昭明，其食其更，莫不家至而户知之，非虚心无我，畴克尔邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297894_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297894_comment'></div>泽山而为咸，山高泽下，位不易也，高者内虚则下者上通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297894_comment'></div>地天而为泰，天尊地卑，位自定若也，高者下降则卑者上齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297894_comment'></div>以至水火之相济，雷风之相益，夫莫不然也，而谓居高位者无所资于下乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297894_comment'></div>古之人任大责重则心愈畏，年高德卲则礼滋恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297894_comment'></div>周毕公弼亮四世，而罔不惟师言之祗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297894_comment'></div>卫武公年过九十，惟惧交戒之不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297894_comment'></div>下逮秦穆，困而后知者也，其言尤为深切，曰「余誓告汝群言之首」，继之以「责人斯无难，惟受责俾如流，是惟艰哉」，此非以身体之不能及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297894_comment'></div>盖一于责人固甚易易也，受人之责则茍有一毫未克之私横于其中，纵能变色受之，然未能全无所捍格如顺流，然则犹不受也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297894_comment'></div>故曰「是维艰哉」，信乎其用力之不易；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297894_comment'></div>又曰「群言之首」，信乎天下之善无以先于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297894_comment'></div>穆公阅变既久，故知斯言之有味，而少保则机识英晤，见义勇为，闻过速已，无所吝滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297894_comment'></div>况前后在镇，内敉外宁，非若穆公有所惩创而后耳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297894_comment'></div>余故乐道其事以复于黄侯，亦使今之君子因是而得公之本心，皆言轻千里而乐告焉，罔俾毕、卫专美有周，则孟子所谓「优于天下」者殆将见之，岂惟用蜀乎哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1297894_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年</a>　是年，招游似至官府，相与研讨学事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1221&endYear=1221')">1221年</a>　是年，叶适以《魏华父鹤山书院》诗寄赠。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月1日</a>　是日受宝，大赦天下，作谢表。作品：元日受宝肆赦谢表。<div id='poem_1297208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元日受宝肆赦谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297208")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297208'>效珍绝徼，爰开受命之符；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297208_comment'></div>班朔正牙，式霈昭天之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297208_comment'></div>皇欢四洽，舆诵一词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297208_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下命于帝庭，奄有方夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297208_comment'></div>坚好生之一念，得多助于两间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297208_comment'></div>眷言宝镇之维新，实我袭藏之自旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297208_comment'></div>由元丰而来百四十载，烂其检识之文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297208_comment'></div>迨建炎而后九十六年，昉此会朝之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297208_comment'></div>肆商大赉，胥锡群元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297208_comment'></div>臣属守遐藩，亲逢盛典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297208_comment'></div>嘉与堪舆之蠢植，咸钦庙社之威灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297208_comment'></div>民劳汔可小康，愿益思于先备；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297208_comment'></div>胡灭诚为大庆，宜深轸于后图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297208_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1297208_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月7日</a>　约友人应懋之同游南山，作词记其事。作品：醉落魄（无边春色）<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月10日</a>　友人刘光祖生日，赋词贺之。作品：水调歌头（山岳会元气）<div id='poem_253652' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253652' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253652?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头 刘左史光祖生日庆 八十</a><span class='authorDate'>（1221年1月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253652")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253652_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253652'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253652'>山岳会元气，初度首王春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253652'>扶持许大穹壤，全德付耆英。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253652'>二万九千日力，四百八旬甲子，酿此杰魁人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253652'>玉剑卧霜斗，金锁掣天扃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253652_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253652'>学宗师，人气脉，国精神。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253652'>不应闲处袖手，试与入经纶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253652'>磊落蟠溪感遇，迢递彭篯岁月，远到漆园椿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253652'>用舍关时运，一片老臣心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253652_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月15日</a>　上元节，与友人应懋之有唱酬。作品：南乡子（连夕雨盈畴）<div id='poem_253717' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253717' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253717?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南乡子 上元马上口占呈应提刑懋之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253717")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253717_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253717'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253717'>连夕雨盈畴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253717'>先为农家做麦秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253717'>更放年头晴甲子，知不。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253717'>应是天公及尔游。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253717_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253717'>随事与民求。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253717'>又与随时验乐忧。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253717'>民气乐时天亦好，休休。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253717'>为尔簪花插满头。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253717_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年1月</a>　上书论人心。作品：论人心与天地相似者五。<div id='poem_1297219' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297219' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297219?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏论人心不能与天地相似者五</a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297219")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297219_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297219'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297219'>臣疏逖之踪，自请郡西还，十有七载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297219_comment'></div>两蒙聘召，三授郡寄，以至按刑将漕，分阃守藩，忝窃殆遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297219_comment'></div>以书生分量，寡欲易足，日有满盈之惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297219_comment'></div>乃今月正元日，陛下亲御正牙，诞受宝镇，会朝之盛，观听攸属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297219_comment'></div>而臣顾以是日，首被特召之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297219_comment'></div>传曰：「敬其事则命以始」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297219_comment'></div>今陛下既施其敬于一介外小臣，而臣不以仁义言，不以尧舜陈，是谓不敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297219_comment'></div>有臣而不敬，陛下安用省记于积年之馀，收召于万里之远也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297219_comment'></div>臣闻人与天地一本也，天统元气以覆万物，地统元形以载万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297219_comment'></div>天地之广大，盖无以加也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297219_comment'></div>而人以一心兼天地之能，备万物之体，以成位两间，以主天地，以命万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297219_comment'></div>辟阖阴阳，范围造化，进退古今，莫不由之，其至重至贵盖若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297219_comment'></div>《易》于《坎》、《离》，互明心体者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297219_comment'></div>而先天居东西，则阴阳之正中也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297219_comment'></div>后天居南北，则天地之正中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297219_comment'></div>于日为戊己，则土之正中也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297219_comment'></div>于辰为子午，则时之正中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297219_comment'></div>《乾》、《坤》中交而生《坎》、《离》，则气之中也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297219_comment'></div>为卦承上经而接下经，则卦之中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297219_comment'></div>《离》体则虚中而文明，故应物而不穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297219_comment'></div>伏《坎》则刚中而孚实，故处险而常亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297219_comment'></div>其至平至正又若是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297219_comment'></div>人能以其至贵至重也，而不以小用之，以其至平至正也，而不以偏用之，则其主天地而命万物也，岂不绰绰乎有馀裕哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297219_comment'></div>尧舜以心相传，《尧典》一篇，惟「克明俊德」、「乃命羲和」、「畴咨四岳」等事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297219_comment'></div>尧无所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297219_comment'></div>舜之继尧，亦不过取诸人以为善，以天下之民谓之八元、八凯也举之，以天下之民谓之四凶也去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297219_comment'></div>是天下之民举之去之，人心之所同，则天也，舜无所私于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297219_comment'></div>九官之命，彼皆何等才分？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297219_comment'></div>而自宅揆以下，敷教者不以制刑，典礼者不以掌乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297219_comment'></div>选众而举，仅得其人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297219_comment'></div>分职而理，仅无旷事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297219_comment'></div>爰暨三代，曰「龥俊尊上帝」，曰「陟丕釐帝命」，曰「以敬事上帝」，凡皆推是心以答天意耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297219_comment'></div>乃自秦汉而后，千数百年，此意或寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297219_comment'></div>当事任者，岂乐于独劳，而常患乎莫与分其责；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297219_comment'></div>居有位者，岂乐于喑默，而常患乎莫与行其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297219_comment'></div>夫人之有伎，人之彦圣，秦臣知好之，以保子孙黎民，则秦臣之利也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297219_comment'></div>人之智虑，人之闻识，乐克知好之，以优于天下，则乐克之善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297219_comment'></div>岂必皆自己出？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1297219_comment'></div>而况屈信消长之运，乃天道之所当有，非人力之能制，不是之思，而憧憧往来者，皆徒思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1297219_comment'></div>此不能与天地相似者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1297219_comment'></div>孔子论天地之神，昭昭然示人于覆载间者，无非至教，而继之曰：「清明在躬，气志如神」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1297219_comment'></div>又举《诗》以證之曰：「维岳降神，生甫及申」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1297219_comment'></div>终之曰：「此文武之德也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1297219_comment'></div>是篇凡四言而意实相贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1297219_comment'></div>盖人与天地一本而分，使本心湛然，清明纯粹，与天地通，则志之所至，气亦至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1297219_comment'></div>动乎体而为梦，见乎龟而为卜，虽远在岩渭，夫孰非此心之感？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1297219_comment'></div>况山泽之气，亦我同体者也，毓灵产异以诒数世之仁，亦理之当然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1297219_comment'></div>而后世之君臣，所居者既狭，故所感者亦然，岂惟所感然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1297219_comment'></div>下之从上，后之视前，更相承式，而才气愈隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1297219_comment'></div>沈默拘挛，以为谨也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1297219_comment'></div>纤微烦蹙，以为能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1297219_comment'></div>以济时须，且弗暇给，况遗后乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1297219_comment'></div>夫天地山川之神气，亘千古犹一日，而人才绝无仅有乃至是，则以所感所效然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1297219_comment'></div>此其不能与天地相似二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1297219_comment'></div>夫人忧乐惨舒之度，本诸一心之微，而流行于阴阳，见于祲煇，未尝有毫发之欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1297219_comment'></div>是以昔之圣人有舒泰而无拘迫，有宽易而无狭隘，以天命自度而不敢以私意小知行乎其间，劳逸以时，喜怒以类，凡以节宣血气，专固精神，顺天地而理情性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1297219_comment'></div>爰自后世，或人主独运万几而乏群臣之助，或大臣兼总细务而行有司之职，其规模运量既日不暇给，则于长算远驭，宁无所遗？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1297219_comment'></div>光武，贤君也，视朝至昃，夜分乃寐，太子忧其失养性之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1297219_comment'></div>诸葛亮，贤相也，所啖食不至数升，而罚二十以上皆亲览焉，食少事烦，人以为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1297219_comment'></div>夫自一命以上，大小相承，积而至于君相，然后势重而形佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1297219_comment'></div>使人主每旦视朝而不得大臣之助，大臣鞅掌独贤而不资百工之助，分曹列局，阴拱默视，事无钜细，必经省览，下至众而上至寡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1297219_comment'></div>夫如是，则下逸而上劳，岂所以理性情之正，养寿命之源哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1297219_comment'></div>此不能与天地相似者三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1297219_comment'></div>《书》曰：「兢兢业业，一日二日万几，无旷庶官，天工人其代之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1297219_comment'></div>又曰：「敕天之命，惟时惟几」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1297219_comment'></div>夫内而宫庭屋漏，外而天下国家，莫非天命之流行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1297219_comment'></div>使几微之不敕，是谓旷天工而违时几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1297219_comment'></div>爰自后世，或自谓智足遍察，或例曰人多可疑，或言儒生皆是古非今，或咎直臣多取名归过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1297219_comment'></div>是心既胜，贤路益狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1297219_comment'></div>班固赞汉之得人，惟称武、宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1297219_comment'></div>而武帝中年，已谓名臣文武欲尽，诏求跅弛之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1297219_comment'></div>宣帝之后，仅一再传，往往见大夫无可使者，至外召盩厔令，拜谏议大夫以遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1297219_comment'></div>东京以后，朝会无宿儒大人可备顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1297219_comment'></div>人才固不易得，而亦非果无好臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1297219_comment'></div>所教茍用可制，故无以尽得天下之才耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1297219_comment'></div>唐中世以降，或至东省闭閤，南台阙员，正牙罢奏，庶官不对，此岂真无才邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1297219_comment'></div>其旷天工而违时几也多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1297219_comment'></div>此不能与天地相似四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1297219_comment'></div>士修于家，非积岁累月不成，而坏之于天子之庭，则一语一事间尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1297219_comment'></div>昔之人念其成材之不易也，故必扶植而容养之，相融于善意以图惟国事之济，而不敢逆疑于意向之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1297219_comment'></div>所以兼收并蓄，拟缓急而遗子孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1297219_comment'></div>汉之高、文，去古未远，犹有济时诒后之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1297219_comment'></div>而中世以后，则有不尽然者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1297219_comment'></div>辽西告警而李广起，罕幵略塞而赵充国用，五溪丧师而马援奋，冉肇迫夔李靖出，范阳煽凶真卿识，河东寇结子仪封，廷凑肆毒裴度见，伐蔡屡衄李愬显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1297219_comment'></div>使非仓卒需才，则广厄霸陵，充国、援以老弃，李、颜、郭、裴诸人将没身不见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1297219_comment'></div>此其不能与天地相似五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1297219_comment'></div>臣既历观前世，每见秦汉以后君臣大抵相寻于一辙，为之废书而叹曰：大哉心乎，所以主天地而命万物也，必休休焉与天地相似，乃可以无旷于天位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1297219_comment'></div>千数百年，莫有以是告其君者，毋惑乎治之时常多于乱之日，而危之意常浮于安之形也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1297219_comment'></div>今人才虽未易有，而亦非果无也，风俗虽不如古，而犹可以有为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1297219_comment'></div>拓而大之，则在人焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1297219_comment'></div>于是的然自信，以告于陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1297219_comment'></div>且念更迭既久，分绝荣进，今重观上国之光，诚出望表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1297219_comment'></div>用敢及时展尽，以冀君相之一动心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1297219_comment'></div>傥蒙陛下留神省揽，而或有取于其言，君臣之间共推此心，以一扫千数百年之弊，则规模既拓，人才将为时辈出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1297219_comment'></div>宗社幸甚，善类幸甚！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1297219_comment'></div>臣不胜区区。</div><div id='poem_sentence_95_1297219_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年3月</a>　上潼川印绶，被召入对，笔吏龙协惠、友人李肩吾、侄高斯谋等同行。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
遂宁（小溪）

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　秋，徙治遂宁府。临行，筑堂于玉台旧址，取名极堂。作品：玉台极堂柱识。<div id='poem_1297885' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297885' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297885?labeling=true' target='_blank'>玉台极堂柱识</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297885")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297885_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297885'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297885'>东川漕廨之东，故即城为榭，名以「玉台」，城圮台荒，有亭蔽其前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297885_comment'></div>嘉定八年冬，临邛魏某由祥刑摄漕，治潼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297885_comment'></div>明年春，坏城葺台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297885_comment'></div>暨秋，为真徙治，遂首撤亭，更为堂，东向，距台之仞旧址加辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297885_comment'></div>会以周颐氏请易名报可，乃取《太极图》、《易通》与朱熹氏义勒寘堂壁，名「极堂」，将俟考功奉常议下嗣刻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297885_comment'></div>又明年秋，台以雨坏，其冬更筑屋，仍为台其前，以无废旧名，徙道城址。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297885_comment'></div>堂容三仞，崇杀半，袤加容三之一，缭以周庑，广视容三杀二，台之容崇视堂袤加二尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297885_comment'></div>凡二役，费钱六十万，计粟六百，兵丁之庸二千日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297885_comment'></div>俱榜以秦篆，是为识。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1297885_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　秋，友人刘光祖进显谟阁直学士提举玉隆万寿宫，赋词庆贺。作品：满江红（许大才名）<div id='poem_253781' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253781' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253781?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红 贺刘左史光祖进职奉祠</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253781")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253781_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253781'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253781'>许大才名，知几许、功夫做得。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253781'>独自殿、三朝耆旧，岿然山立。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253781'>出处只从心打当，去留不管人忻戚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253781'>抱孤衷、脉脉倚秋风，无人识。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253781_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253781'>龙可养，凡鳞匹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253781'>鸾可挚，凡禽敌。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253781'>便翩然归作，玉龙仙客。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253781'>枰上举棋元不定，磨边旋蚁何曾息。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253781'>傥天公、有意要平治，须华发。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253781'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_253781_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　秋，友人许奕赴任潼川府，魏了翁亦将赴遂宁任，设宴话别，赋词记其事。作品：鹧鸪天（公在春官我已归）<div id='poem_253803' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253803' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253803?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鹧鸪天 别许侍郎即席赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253803")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253803_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253803'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253803'>公在春官我已归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253803'>公来东蜀我居西。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253803'>及公自遂移潼日，正我由潼使遂时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253803_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253803'>如有碍，巧相违。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253803'>人生禁得几分飞。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253803'>只祈彼此身长健，同处何曾有别离。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_253803_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　秋，临行，设祖帐于南郊，同官送行，赋词答谢；并与友人刘光祖、杨子谟、宋德之等酬和。作品：江城子（与君同醉梓州春）江城子（一襟满贮梓城春）江城子（如公何地不阳春）南郊祖帐赋五十六言呈刘左史光祖。与刘左史光祖同别杨少卿子谟于南郊舟中用宋兵部德之韵（玉龙老子访仙鹤）<div id='poem_253681' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253681' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253681?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江城子 同官酌酒相贺再和前韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253681")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253681_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253681'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253681'>与君同醉梓州春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253681'>不辞频。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253681'>漏更银。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253681'>尚记梅时，出郭喜相迎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253681'>又对西风斟别酒，云过眼，月分身。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253681_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253681'>傥来官职不关人。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253681'>等微尘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253681'>苦劳神。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253681'>更向中间，谩说假和真。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253681'>只有交朋关分义，无久近，与陈新。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_253679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253679'>笔挥银。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253679'>自有江山，长是管将迎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253679'>不似如今归去客，云外步，水边身。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253679_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253679'>萧然今代杰魁人。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253679'>混光尘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253679'>越精神。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253679'>不把浮云，轩冕拂天真。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253679_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253679'>化洽堂边应创见，人物旧，榜颜新。</div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253785'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253785'>无端嫁得龙头客。富贵长相迫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253785'>云深碧落记骖鸾。又逐东方千骑、到人间。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253785_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253785'>妇前百拜儿称寿。季也参行酒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253785'>最怜小女太憨生。约住两头娘子、索新声。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253785'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253785_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　是年，荣州试院有欺弊之事，上书奏明。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　是年，与曹彦约相识。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1216&endYear=1216')">1216年</a>　是年，表侄女高晋卒，撰祭文。作品：哭表侄女高氏文。<div id='poem_1298139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭表侄女高氏文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298139")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298139_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298139'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298139'>呜呼，汝亦止于斯邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298139_comment'></div>毓德于家，柔静有仪，以得重闱之欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298139_comment'></div>迨作嫔于闻人，又能敬共夙夜，以事舅姑，环佩穆然，克有令问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298139_comment'></div>云胡不淑，而止斯邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298139_comment'></div>古谓妇人，免乳大故，十死九生，是则然矣，彼林林而生斯世者，不属于毛、不离于里邪，而独于汝乎不利也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298139_comment'></div>余方以王事逖东土，不克冯棺一恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298139_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298139_comment'></div>汝溘然而归，则亦已矣，汝之祖母迨汝诸父，将何以为怀邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298139_comment'></div>哀哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1298139_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年1月10日</a>　刘光祖生日，赋词庆贺。作品：满江红（见说新来把闲事）<div id='poem_253778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红 刘左史光祖生日正月十日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1216年1月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253778")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253778'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253778'>见说新来，把闲事、都齐阁束。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253778'>日用处、浑无凝滞，天机纯熟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253778'>帘捲春风琴静好，庭移晓日兰芬馥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253778'>笑可曾，些子上眉头，萦心曲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253778_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253778'>吞宇宙，船明玉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253778'>批风月，诗成轴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253778'>问人间底处，升沈荣辱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253778'>与我言兮虽我愿，不吾以也吾常足。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253778'>但年年、先后放灯时，篘新醁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_253778_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年1月</a>　再上书为周敦颐、程颢、程颐请谥，并以张载为请。作品：周元公程纯公正公谥告序。<div id='poem_1297583' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297583' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297583?labeling=true' target='_blank'>周元公程纯公正公谥告序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297583")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297583_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297583'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297583'>臣自嘉定八年司臬剑东，兼摄漕事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297583_comment'></div>厥明年春，上疏请下礼官，为周敦颐及程颢、程颐议所以易其名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297583_comment'></div>玺封下都省，省下春官，时少常伯亦上疏请谥二程，遂并以下奉常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297583_comment'></div>博士曰事关名教，议不可轻，宜下都省集议，由是议久不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297583_comment'></div>厥十年，臣自漕臣再申述前奏，并以横渠张载为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297583_comment'></div>久之，礼官议以周敦颐谥元，程颢谥纯，颐谥正，上悉赐可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297583_comment'></div>厥十有三年六月，乃以命书与其贰付元奏请官，臣遂得受而藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297583_comment'></div>臣谓是举也，百年间鸿儒硕士偶未及言，今乃白发于一介外小臣，而圣断沈雄，不以人废，亶谓盛典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297583_comment'></div>然而郡国邸吏不得而传也，臣虑四方学者未能遍睹，则无以仰称圣上崇儒重道之指，乃摹勒乐石，龛置潼川校官，复锓板以广其传，俾凡承学之士有观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297583_comment'></div>若夫张载易名之请，诸儒从祀之议，则嗣此以闻，期于获命乃已也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1297583_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　春，遂宁进士期集，与会，即席赋诗送类省元刘炳。作品：送类省元炳奉对阙廷。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年2月</a>　撰文劝农于郊。作品：权遂宁府劝农文。<div id='poem_1297338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>权遂宁府劝农文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297338")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297338'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297338'>岁二月劝农于郊，太守事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297338_comment'></div>今部使者摄郡，乃得与尔父老周旋于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297338_comment'></div>且吾闻之，造物能予人以丰年，不能殖不耕之田；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297338_comment'></div>能遗人以安富，不能福不率之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297338_comment'></div>自比年来，江浙淮汉，蝗旱相仍，流莩蔽野，惟我蜀土，岁比有秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297338_comment'></div>乃去年之冬，三白呈瑞，入春雨旸以时，尔之得斯于造物也，亦云幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297338_comment'></div>幸乌何恃也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297338_comment'></div>挈率子弟，简而稼器，修而穑事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297338_comment'></div>若时和岁丰，锡尔多稼，则仰事父母，俯育妻子，岂惟尔利！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297338_comment'></div>赋租以时，无阙我饷事，盗贼衰息，无罹我宪网，吾与尔父老咸职有利焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297338_comment'></div>若子若弟，乃有不率于教，不服田亩，不孝养厥父母，以害于闾里者，其亦以告，我当与尔惩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297338_comment'></div>若郡若县，乃有官吏不体此意，兴不急之务以废而事，肆无名之求以害而力，亦当为尔去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297338_comment'></div>使者不妄语，敬听毋忽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1297338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年2月2日</a>　遂宁北郊迎富，作诗记其事。作品：二月二日遂宁北郊迎富故事。<div id='poem_253053' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253053' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_253726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253726'>顾我未能真自信，算三十九年浑是非。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253726'>上玉台百尺，天连野□，□楼千里，江射晴晖。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253726'>此意分明谁与会，但时把瑶笙和月吹。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253726'>吾归矣，有鸿相与和，鹤自由飞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253726_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　秋，友人李道传西归，其弟李心传赋诗迎迓，刘光祖唱和，并嘱魏了翁同赋。作品：李微之闻其弟贯之西归以诗迓之刘左史和韵属余同赋。<div id='poem_252934' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252934' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252934?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李微之<span class='inlineComment2'>（心传）</span>闻其弟贯之<span class='inlineComment2'>（道传）</span>西归以诗迓之刘左史<span class='inlineComment2'>（光祖）</span>和韵属余同赋<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_252934")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252934_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252934'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252934'>室中万象镇宽閒，舒卷风烟入凤山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252934'>俯听候虫坏户去，仰看倦雁绝云还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252934'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252934_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252936' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252936' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252936?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252936'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252936'>只期玉女是用谏，肯为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_252936", 252936, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>金夫</span>不有躬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252936'>想见江南两肤使，天涯憔悴鬓成翁<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：并谓真景元也。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252936'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252936_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252939' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252939' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252939?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252939_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252939'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252939'>行李营营遍八荒，曲车炙骑趁春忙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252939'>莞然独笑无人管，寒蕙墙东蜀海棠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252939'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252939_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252938' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252938' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252938?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252938_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252938'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252938'>公卿奏疏谩琅琅，谁刃楼兰槛鬼章。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252938_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252938'>巢燕豫忧江上<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作以）</span>北，幕乌未到岘之阳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252938_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252938'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252938_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252937' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252937' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252937?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252937_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252937'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252937'>滔滔斯世我谁归，置散投閒分亦宜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252937'>乾鹊颇惊仁鸟害，坚冰已向履霜知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252937'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252937_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252935' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252935?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252935'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252935'>曩与刘公同一邦，如今背我去堂堂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252935'>京师尊贵在朝者，为问谁能踰阿章<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252935'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_252935'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_252935_0'>⑴ 自注：《王章传》：京师尊贵人在朝者，谁能踰仲卿。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_252935_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年10月8日</a>　友人李道传卒于西还道中，闻讯，为撰祭文、挽诗。作品：哭李郎中道传文。（挽）李郎中道传。<div id='poem_1298145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭李郎中道传文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年10月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298145")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298145'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298145'>昔有人见子产如旧识、得鬷蔑如故知者，声应气求，既云匪易，而亦有未及一见，不交一言，往往旧识故知之所不若也，如某之于贯之者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298145_comment'></div>相距万里，行理之问无时不至，孳孳矻矻，先民是程，靡有二事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298145_comment'></div>他日直道犯患，奉身去国，尝使人劳诸江介，且遄其返也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298145_comment'></div>手书言报，尚期有以相观相切，以共图至善之归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298145_comment'></div>庸讵知其不复一见、一言而卒以丧返也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298145_comment'></div>藐藐昊天而遂恝于斯世也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298145_comment'></div>幸生滥贵，视人罔极者，天畀矜之弗敢伤也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298145_comment'></div>正道直学，将以康时否而济人穷也，何辜于天而夺之尔亟也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298145_comment'></div>民今方殆，匪贤弗乂，道丧俗薄，匪学弗经，而又弱一个焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298145_comment'></div>近忧遐感，郁其未憖，岂惟哀吾之私也！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1298145_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1217&endYear=1217')">1217年</a>　是年，应友人朱著之请，为其父朱倬撰神道碑。作品：观文殿学士左通奉大夫赠特进谥文靖朱公神道碑。<div id='poem_1298011' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298011' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298011?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观文殿学士左通奉大夫赠特进谥文靖朱公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1217年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298011")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298011_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298011'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298011'>共惟高宗皇帝聪睿神武，格知天心，自大难甫平，深惟国本之未建，乃绍兴元年四月戊申，以至和故事面谕宰臣宗尹等「厥既得人」，是为孝宗皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298011_comment'></div>由是诏书数下，圣意益白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298011_comment'></div>绍兴末，诏御史中丞朱公倬知贡举，举人刘朔论贾谊通达国体在于豫建太子，公擢为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298011_comment'></div>公平时造膝未尝不反覆及此，至是以典举复命，又论奏久之，上再三称善，由是被遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298011_comment'></div>迨建王正名从幸，时惟陈文恭公与公实左右高皇，事无小大，必以咨问，矧揖逊大事，盖熟闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298011_comment'></div>三十二年春二月，高皇还自金陵，公以年及七十，引礼律求谢，手书不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298011_comment'></div>请至三四，高皇谕之曰：「卿风采诚未复旧，然遽欲引去，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298011_comment'></div>知不可夺，乃六月己巳，诏以观文殿学士提举江州太平兴国宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298011_comment'></div>会孝皇升储，中外流传，疑信参半，谏大夫故与公有怨，乃以风闻上疏，孝皇知公无他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298011_comment'></div>比再上，降资政殿学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298011_comment'></div>词臣承望，至谓「元良天下之本，乃觊畴庸」，不知君臣之间未尝有异论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298011_comment'></div>授受之意，屡形诏谕，谁不知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298011_comment'></div>矧公自典举尝白发其端，继以臣邻陪扈出入，与闻政几，脱有欲言，当不待临事而发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298011_comment'></div>公之所启，不过曰：「靖康之事，正以传位太遽，盍姑徐之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298011_comment'></div>揆诸人情，此亦爱君之至者，高皇决不以为忤，而孝庙仁孝笃诚，未尝志于趣得，则亦必不以为疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298011_comment'></div>陛辞之日，高皇谕云：「所论于卿何与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298011_comment'></div>朕欲过德寿宫，卿且归，俟年岁当召卿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298011_comment'></div>明年，公以致仕闻，孝宗谓辅臣曰：「朱某有性气，如何便欲致仕」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298011_comment'></div>辅臣以赴闻，上曰「可怜可怜」，恤典一如前宰相，遂诏复元职，自通奉大夫赠特进致仕，遗表恩泽凡十人，然后人知两宫果不以为忤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298011_comment'></div>迨淳熙初，公之子端厚、端学侍魏国太夫人于行都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298011_comment'></div>六年以忧去，端厚自左藏东库除将作监主簿，易太府寺簿，端学自左藏南库除大理寺主簿，皆出自宸断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298011_comment'></div>服除，端厚又起家大理丞，端学太府簿，寻迁丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298011_comment'></div>至是人益疑传闻之谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298011_comment'></div>淳熙十四年，公之孙著举进士，唱第之日，上顾谓二相王淮、周必大曰：「此义方之训」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298011_comment'></div>二相出以语人，人又知孝皇于公历二十有六年柬记未尝忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298011_comment'></div>某每惟帝者之盛，犹曰「惟口出好兴戎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298011_comment'></div>盖授受之间，古人所甚畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298011_comment'></div>以范、文、富诸臣定策之功，人知勿敢言，微王同老自陈，宁没身不见录；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298011_comment'></div>王歧公与子之议未尝有异论也，犹曰指社稷为他家而谴之，微其子仲脩一言，亦将无以自白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298011_comment'></div>虽然，是尚有可诿者，曰出好自口，兴戎自口，故言之而不自为德也，不见知而不敢辩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298011_comment'></div>今高皇之蔽志踰三十年，而孝皇以继志为悦，不以位为乐，凡皆中外所共知，是岂较此迟速之间者！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298011_comment'></div>今如言者之说，则浅浅议圣德也，公之知不知庸何恤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298011_comment'></div>而揖逊古今之盛观，此不可以不辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298011_comment'></div>后此者四十年，著为左帑，某始获托交，每讶公前诬既白而铭谥未请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298011_comment'></div>又二十年，获侍同朝，始知以文靖易名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298011_comment'></div>著尝从容以语某曰：「先文靖即世既六十年，昔者任公文荐尝状其行治，寻厄于火，王公普尝铭其年阀，它未有纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298011_comment'></div>子于前言往行概尝有闻，盍为我志而铭之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298011_comment'></div>某弗敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298011_comment'></div>公字汉章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298011_comment'></div>朱氏自曹姓，其后颛帝之后曰陆终，终之子曰安，安之裔孙曰侠，周武王封之于邾，至仪父十二世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298011_comment'></div>后八世为楚所并，子孙去邑为朱氏，世居沛国相县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298011_comment'></div>至汉，大司马长史诩生大司空浮，浮生下邳太守永，永九世孙吏部尚书尚，生司徒质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298011_comment'></div>二子：禹、卓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298011_comment'></div>禹坐党锢之难，子孙避地丹阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298011_comment'></div>卓之后为唐宰相敬则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298011_comment'></div>唐末，公之七世祖又避地于闽，遂为闽县人，其丹阳之别乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298011_comment'></div>曾祖考翼，累赠至太师，追封卫国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298011_comment'></div>祖敏修，皇朝奉郎、广东路提举常平，赠少师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298011_comment'></div>考庭佐，皇从政郎、太学博士，累赠太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298011_comment'></div>取黄氏，赠吴国夫人，故宣奉大夫积之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298011_comment'></div>生四子男，公为适长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298011_comment'></div>生而秀异，曾祖妣周国疾亟，犹抚之曰：「是必兴我家，恨不及见之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298011_comment'></div>少长，诵书日万言，少师爱之，寝食必俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298011_comment'></div>朱氏世传《易》，公尤极精邃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298011_comment'></div>未冠，以乡举至京，补太学内舍生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298011_comment'></div>丁吴国忧，哀羸不胜衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298011_comment'></div>服除，又居太保忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298011_comment'></div>宣和三年复乡举法，公以选登五年进士第，调常州宜兴县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298011_comment'></div>虏将入寇，居民求辟地，公为具舟给食，全活甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298011_comment'></div>亡何，民告涝于郡，郡委公阅实，公为蠲田租至九分若全免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298011_comment'></div>守怒，将捃治之，既知公秉志坚确，乃俾摄属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298011_comment'></div>张忠献公荐公，召对，除广东路茶盐司干官，再用荐改除检察福建广东西经费财用所属官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298011_comment'></div>明橐为宣谕使至广，人惮其风声，独于公慰荐甚异，谓之曰：「宜兴寇至，脱民于死者，非公邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298011_comment'></div>民至今思之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298011_comment'></div>遂表于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298011_comment'></div>时方以刘豫为忧，因赐对策其必败，高皇大喜，诏改合入官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298011_comment'></div>与相秦桧忤，出教授越州，参知政事张守帅浙东，又以表于上，除教授诸王宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298011_comment'></div>桧恶言兵，公所论掩骼，又忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298011_comment'></div>会有边警，浙东制置使梁汝嘉以公详练，表摄参谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298011_comment'></div>有捕获群寇，梁属公与吕稽中鞠实，公独得二人黥窜之，馀释不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298011_comment'></div>曰：「吾大父尉崇安日，有获寇二百，坐死者七十馀，大父谓此饥民剽食耳，未可尽以三尺绳之也，悉缓其罪而不以徼赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298011_comment'></div>今吾其无愧大父乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298011_comment'></div>满秩还里，辟秦祸，食祠官之禄十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298011_comment'></div>家藏书数万卷，皆手自校雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298011_comment'></div>除通判南剑州，凡四年乃上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298011_comment'></div>建寇阿魏聚徒数千，建壤接而卒愞不可用，公以信赏擒获，一境赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298011_comment'></div>差知惠州，陛辞，因言尝策刘豫必败，高皇曰：「记得记得，卿久淹何所」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298011_comment'></div>公曰：「厄于桧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298011_comment'></div>上愀然，慰谕曰：「惠阳去朝廷远，赖卿抚百姓，如朕亲抚之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298011_comment'></div>目送公去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298011_comment'></div>旬日，忽问大臣曰：「前日之对，谁为荐之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298011_comment'></div>曰：「守臣陛辞，常典也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298011_comment'></div>上令亟召对，政府有未知公者曰：「已去矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298011_comment'></div>遂除国子监丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1298011_comment'></div>公闻命还，视事凡八阅月，以职事转对，建请勤恤民隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1298011_comment'></div>未几，除提举浙西路常平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1298011_comment'></div>二三大臣亦罔知上意，忽特命自今在内除提举官，令朝辞上殿，盖为公设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1298011_comment'></div>公首登对，上曰：「近来内重外轻，今卿以朕亲擢之人出为部使，人皆知内外之任均」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1298011_comment'></div>又曰：「人不知卿，惟朕独知卿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1298011_comment'></div>乃除右正言，二十七年秋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1298011_comment'></div>二十九年春二月，进侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1298011_comment'></div>秋八月，差国子监发解所监试官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1298011_comment'></div>冬十二月，进中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1298011_comment'></div>公自为台谏，眷滋厚而心益畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1298011_comment'></div>常言：「人主任我以耳目，托我以腹心，非报怨任气之地，必须上答天心，不为子孙植荆棘也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1298011_comment'></div>每上疏，必夙兴露告，赫然如上帝之我临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1298011_comment'></div>朝论方畏言边备，公悉力开陈，言详气定，虽逢盛怒不慑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1298011_comment'></div>在言路久，荐人论事以至发仓廪、蠲米价、减私盐、覈军籍抑配、禁州县科借，凡以兴利除敝，无虑数十条，率焚稿不传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1298011_comment'></div>公经学醇深，经筵侍上，多所称善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1298011_comment'></div>自典举还，迁参知政事，明年拜尚书右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1298011_comment'></div>公控免之词谓「一言寤主，讵缘左右之容」，人以为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1298011_comment'></div>月馀，诏提举三朝国史、详定一司敕令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1298011_comment'></div>明堂加恩，进封开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1298011_comment'></div>金亮寇江，公陈战、备、应三策，且谓兵应者胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1298011_comment'></div>上曰：「卿所言三策甚当，朕书于坐右，朝夕思之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1298011_comment'></div>虏势寖迫，公又策虏三事：「上焉者为耕筑计，中焉守备，下则妄意绝江，然臣谓多从下策，可无患焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1298011_comment'></div>既皆如公所料。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1298011_comment'></div>史忠定、张忠简、虞忠肃、刘忠肃之进用，公皆有力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1298011_comment'></div>王鲁公、陈福公及王公之望、芮公烨亦公所荐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1298011_comment'></div>有议敷编民助军者，公力止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1298011_comment'></div>有求迁进者，公曰：「此朝廷之名器，岂容以市私恩」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1298011_comment'></div>扈从亲征，忧边思职，寝食俱废，得鼻衄之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1298011_comment'></div>上方和药以赐，诏同知枢密院黄祖舜拊问，而公去意不可回矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1298011_comment'></div>公事亲诚孝，遇族党州闾以厚，未尝言人过，无声色之奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1298011_comment'></div>每饮食衣服，必曰：「吾父母恭俭积德，以遗子孙，吾德不逮，何敢享此」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1298011_comment'></div>昆弟姊妹凡八人，昏嫁衣食咸取给焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1298011_comment'></div>最嗜书，搜访古今图史不遗，博见而强志，天文历数之学尤所究心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1298011_comment'></div>元配刘氏，仅两月而卒，赠相国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1298011_comment'></div>继室李氏，右宣教郎陔之女，生膺九封，至□国夫人，年七十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1298011_comment'></div>二子，即端厚、端学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1298011_comment'></div>端厚终中散大夫、知汀州，赠中大夫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1298011_comment'></div>端学终中奉大夫、直秘阁，三历郡，四持节，赠光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1298011_comment'></div>女四人，长适某官刘浚，早卒，次适某官张耜，次某官李璹、某官陈宋衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1298011_comment'></div>孙男二人：曾，某官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1298011_comment'></div>著，今为□□大夫、吏部尚书兼侍读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1298011_comment'></div>孙女二人，适某官、某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1298011_comment'></div>曾孙男□人，某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1298011_comment'></div>曾孙女□人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1298011_comment'></div>公薨以隆兴元年六月甲戌，葬以二年五月辛卯，墓在怀安县灵山乡飞山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1298011_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_129_1298011'>维文靖公，器远识冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1298011_comment'></div>劢相中兴，而閟其能，敬保元子，而泯其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1298011_comment'></div>彼不我知，谓我觊庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1298011_comment'></div>赫赫两宫，照知臣忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1298011_comment'></div>有子有孙，简在帝衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1298011_comment'></div>明明上天，亦临尔躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1298011_comment'></div>有孙有曾，式亢厥宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1298011_comment'></div>观湜知渭，观火知风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1298011_comment'></div>我铭有徵，匪私乎公。</div><div id='poem_sentence_137_1298011_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
泸州（江阳）
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_1_253633'>共庆贺、娘娘七帙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253633'>此杯不比寻常，百年间、才是省陌。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253633_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253633'>眼前䌽绣成行立。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253633_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253643' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253643' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253643?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_253643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253643'>要把平夷心事，散作吉祥种子，春暖玉生烟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253643'>回首生处所，更欲与周旋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253643_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253643'>自归来，生处所，已三年。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253643'>山头白鹤候我，应讶久留连。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253643'>已作秋风归梦，忽递春风消息，吹我著泸川。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253643'>安得且归去，绵上饱耕眠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253643_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253631' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253631' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253631?labeling=true' target='_blank'>小重山 叔母生日同官载酒用去年词韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1218年3月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253631")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253631_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253631'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253631'>风雨移春醉梦中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253631'>忽然吹信息，堕泸戎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253631'>青炜风物换朱融。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253631'>吾归矣，家在月明东。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253631_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253631'>公等为人忠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253631'>年年称母寿，一尊同。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253631'>恨无佳句可酬公。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253631'>相期意，滴滴小槽红。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_253631_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1ff62edf794241b587a6b6591c938e2f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1ff62edf794241b587a6b6591c938e2f");'><span id='1ff62edf794241b587a6b6591c938e2f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>，45岁</div><div id='1ff62edf794241b587a6b6591c938e2f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1222&endYear=1222')">1222年</a>　过泸州，逢友人曹叔远生日，赋诗庆贺。作品：泸帅曹太博（叔远）生日四首。<div id='poem_252948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泸帅曹太博<span class='inlineComment2'>（叔远）</span>生日四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_252948")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252948'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252948'>荔香摇艇下泸川，自别君侯十八年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252948'>尉我调饥刻为岁，争如两日往南田<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252948'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_252948'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_252948_0'>⑴ 自注：二十七日，公欲供张南田，以侯二十九日相见，是日急欲见感，故径舣岸溉。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_252948_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_252947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252947?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252947'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252947'>天马无踪运四时，试将六十四年推。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252947'>后天八八方来数，加倍无穷自此基<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：公年今六十四。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252947'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252947_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252946' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252946' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252946?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252946_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252946'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252946'>十年更瑟不曾调，百载张弓未肯弨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252946'>随事提撕民受赐，宁论外服与王朝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252946'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252946_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_252945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252945?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1222年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252945_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252945'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252945'>荦荦圣门心事长，悠悠客路鬓毛苍。<div
