class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_252991")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252991_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252991'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252991'>肩吾名地古诚州，明日联车入界头。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252991'>草草三杯酌初度，恍如赤壁伴元脩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252993'>滔滔今古满双鬓，纳纳乾坤归两眸。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252993'>自有江山几千载，颇曾有此主宾不。<div class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252992_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252992'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252992'>道亨初不关穷达，身健何须问去留。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252992'>但愿王明天地泰，此生长共国同休。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1226&endYear=1226')">1226年</a>　至贬所，靖州守洪倬待之如使者。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1226&endYear=1226')">1226年6月8日</a>　生日，靖州士人来贺，作启答谢。作品：答靖州士人生日启。<div id='poem_1297533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297533' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297533?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答靖州士人生日启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297533")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297533_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297533'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297533'>抱五三六经之传，少尝有志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297533_comment'></div>阅四十九年之序，久乃知非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297533_comment'></div>矧以戮馀，藐然远屏，莫省我辰之安在，有惭皇览之揆初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297533_comment'></div>敢图善颂之词，犹记载生之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297533_comment'></div>老冉冉兮将至，拊事忧伤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297533_comment'></div>芳菲菲其弥章，絜兹报称。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1297533_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1226&endYear=1226')">1226年</a>　是年，应郭起宗之请，为友人董道隆撰写墓志铭。作品：朝散郎知宜州董君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298074' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298074' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298074?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散郎知宜州董君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298074")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298074'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298074'>君讳道隆，字德从，董氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298074_comment'></div>其先濮之雷泽人，自建炎南渡徙常德府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298074_comment'></div>曾大父植，皇奉议郎、开封府刑曹，累赠正奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298074_comment'></div>大父补之，皇朝议大夫，荆湖北路提举常平茶盐公事，累赠宣奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298074_comment'></div>父临，皇朝请郎、通判池州，赠中奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298074_comment'></div>妣钱氏，封安人，赠令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298074_comment'></div>君以冢适任为迪功郎、慈利县主簿，丁庶母王氏忧，不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298074_comment'></div>服除，调永州司户，辟差公安县主簿，改湖北京西宣抚司、四川宣谕司，皆准备差遣，珍州司法参军、潼川府路常平司干办公事、浔州推官、知建始县，改霍丘，江淮制置司干办公事、知南海县，改平乐，通判融州、知宜州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298074_comment'></div>君才资颖拔，神无滞用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298074_comment'></div>自补吏未上，湖北旱涝，部使者傅公伯成即以摄丞华容，任一道赈济之责，廪饥槥死，药疾贷贫，赖以全活者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298074_comment'></div>傅公总湖广饷事，仍寘君幕府，命按行边琐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298074_comment'></div>时柄臣方开边，趋和者立致通显，君自襄汉反命，条兵閒事甚悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298074_comment'></div>因奏记傅公，力陈兵端不可妄开，和议不可轻废，傅具以白诸柄臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298074_comment'></div>侍御史邓友龙劾免傅官，吴公猎、詹公体仁代之，皆倚君为助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298074_comment'></div>吴公安抚湖北，宣抚京湖，宣谕四川，又挈与俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298074_comment'></div>潜江有基城义勇三千为乱，县令方审父子遇害，君往摄事，戮其渠率而抚其馀，民用按堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298074_comment'></div>自开禧二年冬，我师偾于神马坡，又歼于卧虎谷，虏薄我随、郢，缳我襄、安，践我荆、复，人情震惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298074_comment'></div>君飞书走檄，捷如风雨，逋卒流民剽吏御人于四郊，而二围涉春未解，君招集不下万众，不惟威令复振，盗亦潜弭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298074_comment'></div>吴曦以蜀叛，君请扼归、峡以待王师，金州都统制彭辂来归，人情恟恟，君测其无他，单骑出迎，卒为我用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298074_comment'></div>从吴公入蜀，感激知遇，劬躬朝夕，乃以宣抚、制置二司议不合，知珍州郭槐劾君离次，考任举将皆格不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298074_comment'></div>君改辙之浔，诸台惜其才，委摄浔、贵二彫郡，抚养赒给，散鬻盐货，户口视昔阜蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298074_comment'></div>既而西融桑江蛮徭啸聚，势张甚，守得罪去，君又摄融，未旬日群寇徙避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298074_comment'></div>邕筦以马政坏，经略赵公崇宪又假君机宜文字摄邕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298074_comment'></div>罗殿、自杞二国闻之，效牵惟恪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298074_comment'></div>于是举将再及格，嘉定九年班见，改通直郎，自择鄙小县，期自韬歛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298074_comment'></div>未至建始，江淮制置使李公珏复以书招之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298074_comment'></div>君惟边遽若此，义不当辞，尽室以东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298074_comment'></div>霍丘焚荡之馀，披草莱，立民社，盖嘉定十一年之冬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298074_comment'></div>楚州俄易守，忠义军反侧，君单骑往，与守相议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298074_comment'></div>会有南渡门石圭之变，挽军帅翟朝宗以下登城守备，山东首领往来窥觇，犹豫不敢逞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298074_comment'></div>君亟遣使臣寇谦、赵洪喻之，圭等受命而盟，使复其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298074_comment'></div>会虏遣侯挚拥重兵迫涟水，或虑忠义人为之表里，君以成略授之，皆北向争死敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298074_comment'></div>凡再捷，人情乃安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298074_comment'></div>亡何，虏又举国入寇，犯宣化，流民争济，江面绎骚，制帅复以属君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298074_comment'></div>治战舰，分甲卒，明谍候，布旗鼓，夜遣使臣王文等尽驱滁河之舟大小三千馀，尽列南岸，以伐虏谋，城中士民咸服其敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298074_comment'></div>会制帅以母忧免官，君亦随去，不复以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298074_comment'></div>至南海仅两月，诸台辟循倅，未报，谏官张次贤以宿隙论罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298074_comment'></div>广西路经略胡君槻惜其才，复以平乐留之，且俾摄邕州守贰，检防马政之弊，群蛮悦服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298074_comment'></div>繇是台梱联椟改辟通判融州，仍摄邕莞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298074_comment'></div>徭寇黄炤、黄南卿掠省丁转鬻于交趾横山砦，民日受其困，而有司莫敢孰何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298074_comment'></div>君与刑狱使者钱宏祖调洞丁，立硬砦，禽南卿戮于市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298074_comment'></div>炤闻之，饮药死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298074_comment'></div>左右二江溪洞自是宁谧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298074_comment'></div>二江提举砦官俸给素仰溪洞，率为所胁制，君请于经略司，拨盐下州粜鬻以廪之，公私咸利焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298074_comment'></div>宣州饿莩满野，君至，发私财丐籴于邻郡，民赖以济，诸蛮纳戈请降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298074_comment'></div>有言于朝廷，召赴行在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298074_comment'></div>既解印绶，遄有沮前命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298074_comment'></div>君既出竟，诸洞徭结连宾、邕酋长犯柳、象，朝廷忧之，熟念无以易君，即令再任，诸徭速引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298074_comment'></div>密遣邕州洞官古兰、知县黄至大以兵袭之，俘馘甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298074_comment'></div>郡计匮乏，又倾私帑以犒勇士，且保任以闻，未报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298074_comment'></div>六月丙寅，卒于郡，年五十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298074_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298074_comment'></div>才非易得而亦非果无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298074_comment'></div>古人储才以拟用，匪惟缓急赖之，《棫朴》、《丰芑》、《嵩高》、《烝民》，往往为数世之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298074_comment'></div>乃自世降俗薄，无事则摧折弃置俾不达，有事则湔拔扶持惟恐后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298074_comment'></div>士惟知国尔公尔，缓而弃，急而求，一人誉而召，一人毁而去，士不以是戚欣也，徒示人不广，且俾夷夏闻之，得以浅深虚实我焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298074_comment'></div>初，余以馆职补郡，道荆及归蜀，吴公以宣抚制置司参议官见招至再，皆辞不就，然前后各为数旬留，因得遍阅吴公宾客，精明强济、绝出侪等如君者，固心期之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298074_comment'></div>然而才者名之府、忌之招，固疑君之老于行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298074_comment'></div>卒之一偾一起，以终其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298074_comment'></div>君取聂氏，故同知枢密院昌之孙女，封安人，前君四年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298074_comment'></div>子男二人，长衡，年二十以卒，次嗣孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298074_comment'></div>女适从事郎、佥书象州判官郭起宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298074_comment'></div>起宗挈其孤护輤还里，以其年十二月卜桃源县之仙洞乡杜青村，合葬于聂氏墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298074_comment'></div>起宗继为靖州理曹，会余迁靖，起宗慨然曰：「公，吾舅之所善也，铭不可以他属」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298074_comment'></div>乃为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_1298074'>山木自焚，雉文故翳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298074_comment'></div>材累则然，义命有制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298074_comment'></div>偾兴靡常，世涂自隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298074_comment'></div>于君何加，坎止流逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298074_comment'></div>武陵之原，山环水汭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298074_comment'></div>我铭章之，尚谷来裔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_69_1298074_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1226&endYear=1226')">1226年</a>　是年，从陈宿处得读宋孝宗御书其父陈俊卿用人论，为作跋。作品：跋陈正献公所藏孝庙御书用人论。<div id='poem_1297753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋陈正献公所藏孝庙御书用人论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297753")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297753'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297753'>正献公以乾道五年秋八月升昭文相，其冬对选德殿，诏撰《用人说》，今载在集中，与所被宸翰文虽异而指则同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297753_comment'></div>猗其盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297753_comment'></div>君以是戒其臣，臣以是复其君，开诚布公，兼众尽下，孜孜若弗及焉，凡以敕时几而釐帝命云耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297753_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「鸢飞戾天，鱼跃于渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297753_comment'></div>岂弟君子，遐不作人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297753_comment'></div>猗其盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297753_comment'></div>后五十又八年，靖州逐臣魏某获拜观于公之子宿，追惟一时明良之会，不胜忾慕，谨拜手稽首书于下方。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1297753_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1226&endYear=1226')">1226年</a>　是年，于城东纯福坡建鹤山书院。筑读易亭成，与友人李肩吾赋诗庆贺。作品：肩吾摘取傍梅读易之句以名吾亭且为诗以发之用韵答赋。<div id='poem_253501' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253501' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253501?labeling=true' target='_blank'>肩吾摘傍梅读易之句以名吾亭且为诗以发之用韵答赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253501")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253501_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253501'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253501'>三时收功还朔易，百川敛盈归海㡿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253501'>谁将苍龙挂秋汉，宇宙中间卷无迹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253501'>人情易感变中化，达者常观消处息。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253501'>向来未识梅花时，绕溪问讯巡檐索。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253501'>绝怜玉雪倚横参，又爱青黄弄烟日。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253501'>中年易里逢梅生，便向根心见华实。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253501'>候虫奋地桃李妍，野火烧原葭菼茁。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253501'>方从阳壮争门出，直待阴穷排闼入。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253501'>随时作计何大痴，争似此君藏用密。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253501'>人官天地命万物，二实五殊根则一。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253501'>囿形辟阖浑不知，却把真诚作空寂。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253501'>亭前拟绘九老图，付与人间子云识<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253501'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_253501_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_253501'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_253501_0'>⑴ 自注：五老峰前访梅招鹤，合余、肩吾作九（吴本九下有老字）。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_253501_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1226&endYear=1226')">1226年</a>　是年，鹤山书院落成，江埙等纷纷赋诗庆贺，魏了翁和之，并撰文记建书院事。作品：次韵永平令江叔文鹤山书院落成诗。靖州鹤山书院记。<div id='poem_253408' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253408' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253408?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵永平令江叔文鹤山书院落成诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253408")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253408_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253408'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253408'>天运驱人人不觉，古道违时时不学。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253408'>王相随<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作玉捐隋）</span>胫回荆山，昭质依然未经琢。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253408'>因思胥靡逢殷宗，精神动悟声气从。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253408'>砺舟霖雨到梅糵，变化气质天同功。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253408'>朝歌屠叟无与语，一日投纶见明主。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253408'>大车槛槛行周道，轮辐中规箱中矩。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253408'>人生天地同一原，自诚为圣明为贤。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253408'>地殊世远犹合节，矧此同宇相周旋。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253408'>自从浇风散遗直，世不乏材无匠石。<div id='poem_sentence_8_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_253408'>未能登车习射御，人人自视邮无恤。<div id='poem_sentence_9_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_253408'>出门浪战触与蛮，半生少得须臾间。<div id='poem_sentence_10_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_253408'>不为夷甫辱汝水，即似介甫逋钟山。<div id='poem_sentence_11_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_253408'>古人洒扫先庭户，岂问他人莫余顾。<div id='poem_sentence_12_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_253408'>只忧原头欠渟滀，才见天根便呈露。<div id='poem_sentence_13_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_253408'>人言阴浊胜阳清，阳一阴二分三亭。<div id='poem_sentence_14_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_253408'>谁知阳德本无间，根心枝叶长相亲。<div id='poem_sentence_15_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_253408'>君臣大分虽有止，终不能忘乃天理。<div id='poem_sentence_16_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_253408'>世无我知将自知，不待雷风问诸史。<div id='poem_sentence_17_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_253408'>投沙屈贾占所归，九州博大归何之。<div id='poem_sentence_18_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_253408'>虽云忠愤语伤激，律以洙泗犹津迷。<div id='poem_sentence_19_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_253408'>前村虎啸晚风起，跕鸢酸嘶雁将子。<div id='poem_sentence_20_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_253408'>君恩未报臣忧深，暇把壶头较乡里。<div id='poem_sentence_21_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_253408'>江公劝我姑少安，新诗肉好如璧环。<div id='poem_sentence_22_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_253408'>敢输忧诚谢庆语，仍戒牍史毋抄传。<div id='poem_sentence_23_253408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_253408'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_253408_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297924' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297924' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297924?labeling=true' target='_blank'>靖州鹤山书院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297924")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297924_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297924'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297924'>某泰、禧间尝仕王朝，会国有大事，议不合，补郡去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297924_comment'></div>筑室于先庐之北，曰「鹤山书院」，聚书求友，朝益莫习，将以质其所未信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297924_comment'></div>聘命三至，辞不敢进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297924_comment'></div>其后刺部守潘，粗更民事，先帝察其可用，即正岁大朝驰驿而召之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297924_comment'></div>居数年，又以罪戾徙湖北之靖，山囚濑絷，不通于中州，益得以静虑澄神，循念曩愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297924_comment'></div>寓馆之东曰纯福坡，五老峰位其左，飞山属其右，而侍郎山嶷立其前，冈峦错峙，风气融结，乃屏剔菑翳，为室而居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297924_comment'></div>安土乐天，忘其己之迁也，乃即故乡之名，榜以「鹤山书院」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297924_comment'></div>背夏涉秋，水木芙蓉更隐迭见，老梅稚杉，灌木丛筱，又将寻岁寒之盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297924_comment'></div>某息游其间，往辄移晷，而乐极生感，咏馀兴叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297924_comment'></div>或靳之曰：「优哉游哉，聊以卒岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297924_comment'></div>吾为子喜，而子戚诸」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297924_comment'></div>曰：「不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297924_comment'></div>君譬则天也，疾风迅雷，甚雨必变，天之怒而逸焉，是不敬也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297924_comment'></div>君譬则亲也，挞之流血，起敬起孝，亲之过而恝焉，则愈疏也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297924_comment'></div>或曰：「有一不慊则儳焉若无所容，而亦庶几有以自靖自献矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297924_comment'></div>曰：恶，是何言也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297924_comment'></div>阴阳五行，播生万物，山川之产，天地之产也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297924_comment'></div>身体发肤，一气而分，人子之身，父母之身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297924_comment'></div>是故穷天下之物无可以称天德，终孝子之身不足以报亲恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297924_comment'></div>而余也，猥繇寒远，被遇两朝，幸位从臣之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297924_comment'></div>夫使谏行而泽下，事称以意隐，斯亦报国之常分耳，顾无能丝发之益，乃蹈浚常之戒，自贻过涉之咎，祗以病朝廷、羞当世之士，而尚以自靖自献为足乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297924_comment'></div>昔之人量而后入，信而后谏，原筮而后比也，众允而后晋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297924_comment'></div>夫然，故上无怨而下远罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297924_comment'></div>而余也，亦尝审于所发乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297924_comment'></div>过位必色，过阙必下，路马必式，懔乎十目之所视，所以广敬也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297924_comment'></div>斋戒沐浴，书思对命，习容观玉，声赫乎上帝之有临，所以蓄诚也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1297924_comment'></div>自明善诚身顺亲信友，无几微之或怍，谨获上之道也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1297924_comment'></div>自本诸身證诸民，以及于三王百世、天地鬼神，无毫发之不合，重发言之机也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1297924_comment'></div>夫然，故显谏而君不疑，尽言而人不忌，而余也，又有一于是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1297924_comment'></div>有孝有德，以引以翼，嫌汲汲以末深也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1297924_comment'></div>吁谟定命，远犹辰告，恶数数以取疏也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1297924_comment'></div>衣锦褧衣，裳锦褧裳，虑皓皓以取污也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1297924_comment'></div>谨尔优游，勉尔遁思，忌悻悻以忘君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1297924_comment'></div>而余亦未能自信于斯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1297924_comment'></div>呜呼，裁者培之，倾者覆之，取之自彼，天何心焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1297924_comment'></div>贤则亲之，无能则下之，致之自己，亲何心焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1297924_comment'></div>故古今无未定之天，而亦无难事之亲，一或反是，则吾孔、孟之罪人耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1297924_comment'></div>于是识其语于室以自儆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1297924_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1226&endYear=1226')">1226年</a>　是年，魏文翁之子魏令宪来探望，及其归，赋诗六首送之。作品：送从子令宪西归。<div id='poem_253008' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253008' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253008?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送从子令宪西归<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253008")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253008_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253008'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253008'>弟兄亲友剑南州，别思如山浩不收。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253008'>家问稀疏人迹绝，眼明从子慰羁愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253008'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253008_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253513?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253513'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253513'>茆檐竹几对床头，晨暮参商未渠休。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253513'>宁用停云忆亲友，是身安健复何忧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253513'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253513_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253009?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253009_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253009'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253009'>古来明戒有弦钩，伯父胡为苦好脩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253009'>累尔南行数千里，我之自取尔何尤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253009'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253009_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253007' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253007' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253007?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253007'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253007'>自尔南来岁再周，新功培养气扬休。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253007'>且留数月须多益，归妹愆期母所忧<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：令宪将归聘妹。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253007'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253007_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253010' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253010' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253010?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253010_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253010'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253010'>古人为学戒悠悠，说命惟从务敏求。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253010'>识此味时那可已，更从来处验吾脩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253010'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_253010'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_253010_0'>⑴ 自注：厥修乃来，来字有源源不已之意。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_253010_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_253011' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253011' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253011?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1226年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_253011_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253011'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253011'>弘毅规摹本末周，既难分付又难酬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253011'>须知陋巷忧中乐，又识<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_253011", 253011, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>耕莘</span>乐处忧<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253011'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_253011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_253011'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_253011_0'>⑴ 自注：显道以敏名斋，以弘毅名堂，故云。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_253011_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年3月15日</a>　友人李肩吾应许晟大之请，以所书《乡党内则》相赠，魏了翁为作题识。作品：题李肩吾为许晟大书乡党内则。<div id='poem_1297765' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297765' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297765?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题李肩吾为许成大书乡党内则</a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年3月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297765")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297765_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297765'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297765'>吾友李肩吾彊志精识，尝为《字通》一编，以正法绳俗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297765_comment'></div>成大见而悦之，亟从问字，肩吾授以《乡党》《内则》二篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297765_comment'></div>夫《内则》，先王所以降德于民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297765_comment'></div>而《乡党》，吾圣人无行而不与二三子者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297765_comment'></div>民有是物，必有是则，顾习其读而弗之察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297765_comment'></div>呜呼，其能朝夕于斯，则不惟知言语容貌、居处饮食皆立诚定命之要，亦以见书名之学，偏旁点画具有颠末，乃知类入德之本，而世亦罕能知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297765_comment'></div>《诗》曰「朋友攸摄，摄以威仪」，成大其懋敬之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297765_comment'></div>宝庆三年三月甲子，临邛魏某书于靖州鹤山书院。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1297765_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　是春，友人家大酉自京返蜀，过荆州，驰书靖州，请魏了翁为其母撰写墓志铭。作品：安人史氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298084' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298084' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298084?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安人史氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298084")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298084'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298084'>宝庆元年冬，予得罪南迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298084_comment'></div>明年春，行至九江，友人家朝南被命造朝，其夏赐对便殿，擢主军器监簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298084_comment'></div>秋以丧弟求去，迁丞，请益力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298084_comment'></div>又明年春，差知隆庆府，寻改简州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298084_comment'></div>予时待放未返，朝南道荆州，状其母之行，驰书抵靖，乞文以识诸竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298084_comment'></div>盖朝南自先朝赐召，上申诏趣发，及是西还，凡阅四载，而立朝仅十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298084_comment'></div>余谓朝南秉谊据正，不亏其体，不辱其身，所以成其亲大矣，而奚以文为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298084_comment'></div>虽然，朝南之请也廑，余惧夫文之不足以发也，余曷敢不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298084_comment'></div>朝南之状曰：吾母史氏，讳稷，字虞卿，隋柱国太平公万岁之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298084_comment'></div>曾大父、乡贡进士慥，大父振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298084_comment'></div>父允谐，妣杨氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298084_comment'></div>母年二十归我先君，不幸三十而没，淳熙八年六月乙卯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298084_comment'></div>大酉兄弟五人，女为长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298084_comment'></div>一日大母苏夫人问曰：「能记而母乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298084_comment'></div>泪栖睫，莫能对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298084_comment'></div>长者曰：「母姿间靓，不事膏沐，儿所能记仅此耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298084_comment'></div>大母曰：「汝曾大父运干府君方严，家人不见其言笑，媪御尝进葛衣不惬，而母先意改为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298084_comment'></div>运干喜与士接，而母竭力酒羞，虽服用可辍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298084_comment'></div>汝之曾大母，而母之族也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298084_comment'></div>运干念外氏飘零，尝问其世墓，而母自是岁一展省，如运干临之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298084_comment'></div>吾母程夫人以礼法持家，子妇奔走承意，惟恐失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298084_comment'></div>见而母必为之康色，岁时庆贺，奉仪物以献如弗胜，而精巧绝人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298084_comment'></div>其事吾舅吾母若是，事我可知，吾不能悉数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298084_comment'></div>昔者我疾，而母朝夕卧内，膝行进药，久而疾间，膝有瘢焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298084_comment'></div>吾识之，今弗忘」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298084_comment'></div>语已顾女兄曰：「妇道不当如是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298084_comment'></div>而母师也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298084_comment'></div>及大酉龆龀粗省事，每侍先君，常曰：「吾大父年八秩，寝食必我俱，训言娓娓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298084_comment'></div>而母时起奉温凊，敬事不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298084_comment'></div>大父怜之，曰：『天何以报此妇也』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298084_comment'></div>汝生三季，大父卒，犹谓而母曰：『尔事我善，报其在是夫』」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298084_comment'></div>先君言之于邑曰：「使而母不孤吾大父之望，是在汝已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298084_comment'></div>先君尝挈大酉过舅氏，见者辄泣下曰：「而何以报而母乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298084_comment'></div>自归夫氏事重亲，拊而兄弟，至忘其身之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298084_comment'></div>岁时来宁，尚嫁时衣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298084_comment'></div>人谓弗堪，而母无几微见于言面，则又人所甚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298084_comment'></div>而何以报而母乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298084_comment'></div>呜呼，大酉尚忍言之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298084_comment'></div>赖吾母之泽，嘉泰三年齿一名于进士籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298084_comment'></div>母之殁逾二十年，男女婚嫁之事仅毕，未有以葬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298084_comment'></div>开禧俶扰，从三嵎陈勤节公咸出入戎马间，辙不及息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298084_comment'></div>侥倖升朝，则姑待之，又庶几泽及吾母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298084_comment'></div>嘉定八年，大酉试邑成都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298084_comment'></div>上祀明堂，吾母赠孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298084_comment'></div>将以命书之副告而卜葬焉，未及满戍而先君弃诸孤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298084_comment'></div>徒跣行营于青神县之长泉，曰绍远乡，母所居里也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298084_comment'></div>命龟惟某山食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298084_comment'></div>问远日，惟十二年四月癸酉食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298084_comment'></div>是兆盖考志也，孰知遂与吾母偕葬乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298084_comment'></div>除考丧之明年，南海崔公与之帅蜀，以大酉长莫府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298084_comment'></div>未几荐士，复先焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298084_comment'></div>大酉敬共夙夜，不敢坠厥绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298084_comment'></div>今幸有以归见先墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298084_comment'></div>昔者吾父之葬，刘文节公既为铭之，子之知我不后刘公，幸有以纾吾哀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298084_comment'></div>某自孤露以来，见人之思亲，则惕然以伤，不自知身之罹此咎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298084_comment'></div>读《国风》至《凯风》、《陟岵》、《河广》，读《小雅》至《小弁》、《蓼莪》，辄废卷，每谓彼以劳苦废养，以谗毁见逐，皆亲在而子长，且携离之暂耳，其词已悲伤不自聊若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298084_comment'></div>一日读韩文公哭兄子文，至「不省所怙，惟兄嫂是依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298084_comment'></div>嫂指愈及子言曰：『韩氏两世，惟此而已』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298084_comment'></div>兄子尚幼，不复省记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298084_comment'></div>愈虽能记，不知其言之悲」，某为之涕下不能止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298084_comment'></div>呜呼，未知情于文生，文于情生，而涕何从出乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298084_comment'></div>顾我复我，出入腹我，今乃至眉目间略不及訾省，仅从其大母若考闻一二言行以求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298084_comment'></div>然则朝南之请也，余宁能恝然乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298084_comment'></div>乃不果辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298084_comment'></div>朝南之考君某以封承事郎卒，今赠朝请郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298084_comment'></div>母以赠孺人葬，今赠安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298084_comment'></div>三女：长未笄而卒，次嫁张子辰，次孙景舒，尝贡于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298084_comment'></div>二子：长即大酉，今朝请郎、知简州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298084_comment'></div>次震巳，尝与乡举，以父命后族父，不幸死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298084_comment'></div>子之季曰丙仲，女之季嫁苏丞，则继母今程安人出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298084_comment'></div>内外孙曾十馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298084_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_1298084'>望秋而变衰，即去先时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298084_comment'></div>方春戢晖，孰㧖而摧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298084_comment'></div>祭以大夫之牲，歛以内子之衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298084_comment'></div>人谓母荣，孰知子悲？</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1298084_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年6月8日</a>　生日，与友人李肩吾唱和。作品：生朝李肩吾贻诗次韵为谢。<div id='poem_253388' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253388' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253388?labeling=true' target='_blank'>生朝李肩吾贻诗次韵为谢</a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253388")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_253388_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253388'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253388'>肩吾作诗庆五十，矜我颠跻授之絷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253388'>因思五十义最精，造化机缄斯出入。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253388'>君看五位相生成，前荡后摩如授揖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253388'>至于五衍宜有穷，泽火趋新承井汲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253388'>作圣工夫方自兹，为人生活知非急。<div id='poem_sentence_4_253388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_253388'>昔人于此叹始衰，血气虽衰义逾集。<div id='poem_sentence_5_253388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_253388'>蹇余不学晚知非，方把斯心验存蛰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_253388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_253388'>独嗟道远莫致之，愿与始终谋不及。<div id='poem_sentence_7_253388_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_253388'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_253388_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年11月13日</a>　闻知友人虞刚简去世，为文祭奠并哭之。作品：哭虞提刑仲易文。<div id='poem_1298165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298165?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭虞仲易提刑文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年11月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298165")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298165_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298165'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298165'>维宝庆三年冬十一月戊子，追降朝请郎、靖州居住魏某谨遣家隶明冲，以酒脯庶羞之奠告于故某官虞公而系以词曰：天之方懠，民罔攸蔇，言所当言而人疑其幸变，为所当为而人谓其轧己，恐谀相师，贪暴寡耻，苟一日之安则有一日之肆，腹败枝披，内讧外猘，此何时也，而越秦之相视！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298165_comment'></div>学之不讲，其流祸乃至是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298165_comment'></div>若仲易父，则天生是人以拟缓急之备者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298165_comment'></div>昔在先正，唱明大谊，风流文献，子孙是似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298165_comment'></div>公生其间，培以父祖诗书之泽，开以宇宙清明之气，瀹以师友道义之渊，养以世故更尝之味，志足以充其学，才足以达其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298165_comment'></div>其尤著者，阳安守御之绩，夔峡保伍之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298165_comment'></div>迨乎梁、洋之间，比邻节授，又军政之攸寄，募民垦荒，岁入已十馀万计，此在经济之胸，仅陈其一二，而惊愚骇俗，已无所容其身于斯世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298165_comment'></div>沧江之滨，习湖之涘，顺剥而遂困，硕蹇而亨否，渺世纷其无垠，屹金石而独止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298165_comment'></div>使得若人参诸宇内，何难之弗济，而又弱一个焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298165_comment'></div>嗟善人之难立，而正理之果不可恃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298165_comment'></div>合散消息，阴阳之常分，公全而归则亦已矣，而悠悠斯人，莫常安处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298165_comment'></div>抚事怀人，涕笔俱下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298165_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1298165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　约在其时，虞兟、范晞韩至靖州，以虞刚简墓志铭相请。作品：朝请大夫利州路提点刑狱主管冲佑观虞公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298055' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298055' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298055?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫利州路提点刑狱主管冲佑观虞公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆三年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298055")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298055_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298055'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298055'>粤自高皇帝狩杭之旬月，二凶构乱，时则有魏忠献张公帅师勤王，繇是被遇，以克复神州为己任，阨于嫚秦，志不得施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298055_comment'></div>封寇崇奸，凡二十有四年，以启金炀侯之侮，时则又有雍忠肃虞公歼虏于采石，于瓜州，而炀为僇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298055_comment'></div>繇是亦被遇，与魏公同心壹力，以任克复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298055_comment'></div>又不幸而阨于弃地归俘之议，不得卒其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298055_comment'></div>盖自中兴，于今百年，而是非之正靡有止戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298055_comment'></div>或曰天之梦梦，适遭其未定耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298055_comment'></div>呜呼，人心之昭昭则天也，而有未定者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298055_comment'></div>魏公自戡难，实生二子，为世儒宗，为时吏师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298055_comment'></div>雍公之子孙日以蕃大，而又有如提刑公耸善徙义，克绍正学，以恢厥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298055_comment'></div>或又曰，天固未尝梦梦也，然而是犹以善恶之报妄测天道，不知善而庆，不善而殃，亦各以其类感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298055_comment'></div>古之人上不敢负其君，下不忍欺其民，此岂有为然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298055_comment'></div>凡以事其心耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298055_comment'></div>事其心则事天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298055_comment'></div>日由于天理之中，则福自己求，命自我作矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298055_comment'></div>公讳刚简，字仲易，一字子韶，故直秘阁、赠光禄大夫公亮之仲子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298055_comment'></div>雍公以隆兴二年宣抚京西湖北，六月，公与今邛州守方简生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298055_comment'></div>雍公喜曰：「吾家自曾大父而下世传一子，今一产二孙，人世百不羡矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298055_comment'></div>乾道八年，雍公以武安之节宣抚四川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298055_comment'></div>明年郊，任公承奉郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298055_comment'></div>淳熙元年，雍公薨于汉中，公侍光禄护輤以归，执礼如成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298055_comment'></div>光禄除丧不仕，庐墓教子，厉以气节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298055_comment'></div>公自幼趣尚不凡，故相赵文定公奇其才，以子妻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298055_comment'></div>生长见闻，薰习益异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298055_comment'></div>铨选六年，未肯出仕，再举于礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298055_comment'></div>年二十有六，始监成都府郫县犀浦镇酒税，次华阳县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298055_comment'></div>丁母窦夫人忧，服除，辟差成都府路都钤辖司干办公事，堂差知华阳县，通判绵州，权知永康军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298055_comment'></div>末上，丁光禄忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298055_comment'></div>服除，再差知永康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298055_comment'></div>成都路安抚使黄公畴若以公闻于上，诏赴都堂审察，寻主管建宁府武夷山冲佑观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298055_comment'></div>起知渠州，改黎州、果州、万州，皆未上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298055_comment'></div>制置使辟公参议官，知简州，擢夔州路提点刑狱，兼提举常平，改利州路，主管冲佑观，积官至朝请大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298055_comment'></div>公在钤司，遇事敢言，曲畅军民之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298055_comment'></div>华阳地大事丛，又摄属茶马司，公旦理邑事，晡趋幕府，细大毕举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298055_comment'></div>县庠久圮，撤而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298055_comment'></div>异时县令于制帅进见有时，制帅乐闻公之言，蜀利病皆得关白，公论浩然归重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298055_comment'></div>治永康，晓民以义利之辨，讼牒用稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298055_comment'></div>正社稷，增黉泮，治沟洫，缮城池，甃道路，葺秦李太守祠，复废泉，即学官绘周、程、朱、张子象，招诸生讲肄经学，为士者识趋乡之正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298055_comment'></div>军有评事桥，岁费钜万，公愀然曰：「是有司之责也，而以厉民乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298055_comment'></div>节缩少府浮费代为之，且请于台梱以上诸朝，定为久比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298055_comment'></div>民大说，至今象而祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298055_comment'></div>将趋召察之命，部使者惑于浮言，尼公之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298055_comment'></div>未几，起家为守，又为御史李楠所劾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298055_comment'></div>凡七年居閒，聚同产子而教之，亲仁友善，安土乐天，若将终身焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298055_comment'></div>嘉定十一年春，虏盗边，制置使临川董公居谊徙治利州，辟公自助，公固辞不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298055_comment'></div>或劝之曰：「公事也，不可以弗之恤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298055_comment'></div>久之，黾勉就辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298055_comment'></div>首请收人才、明公赏、厚犒给以结人心，抽还忠义人之配隶内郡者以纾边人之愤，又请缓科内三路饟夫之直，皆见纳用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298055_comment'></div>何进归自秦而我拒其来，虏督其反，有言其可用者，公赞帅释之，进后以勇捷称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298055_comment'></div>大散关陷，利州东路都统制李贵遁去，天水、皂郊皆被兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298055_comment'></div>而西路副帅刘昌祖谓此正帅王大才地分，非己责也，有请遣属调护，皆莫肯行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298055_comment'></div>公慨然请往，且言自制司移利，凡再犒师，而人裁三缗耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298055_comment'></div>今宜有增益，于是视旧三倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298055_comment'></div>次沔，邀帅视师以作士气；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298055_comment'></div>次鱼关，以书抵帅，谓不当分析军分，不当遣老弱乘边，又当遣吏振恤天水、皂郊流民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298055_comment'></div>遂自杀金平次河池，檄主捋集创痍之士，躬自犒劳，士皆感说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298055_comment'></div>次西和，召刘昌祖督之曰：「必复皂郊、湫池，使是二堡归我，则虏气必夺，虽席胜执以乡秦、巩可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298055_comment'></div>昌祖壮之，遣何进、麻仲火杜株平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1298055_comment'></div>虏之守湫池者资粮在焉，悉力驰救，我师遂复湫池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1298055_comment'></div>昌祖喜曰：「可矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1298055_comment'></div>公曰未也，申前语督之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1298055_comment'></div>昌祖以近旨辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1298055_comment'></div>先是，边人恨虏残虐，皆有报复之志，而枢密院虑其生事，每以越竟为戒，人情愤郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1298055_comment'></div>公白帅请于朝，已去此语，而诸戎帅犹以是藉口，故虏得深入无所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1298055_comment'></div>昌祖既以公命如南谷，遣其爱将王逸偕忠义人进屯皂郊，于是阶、凤、成、和、天水五州之民闻之，无小无大皆荷戈以行，几三十万人，军声动天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1298055_comment'></div>士肉薄乘障，虏大败，毙其贵将郭赟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1298055_comment'></div>赟，虏之爱婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1298055_comment'></div>公既得捷，犹督昌祖乘胜捣秦、巩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1298055_comment'></div>秦州正虚，虏甚怖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1298055_comment'></div>公竣事还河池，会节制司参议官魏邦佐至，乃以密劄谕昌祖抽还忠义人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1298055_comment'></div>众大愤，拆矢倒戈，散而为盗，于是皂郊复受兵而虏入成、和矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1298055_comment'></div>公檄审官统制王仕信，以十八族之师捣巩上青野原，号召忠义人及溃卒，人犒钱三十千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1298055_comment'></div>数日间众至万人，仕信之师亦出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1298055_comment'></div>虏帅包长寿引军还，牵制之说至是益信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1298055_comment'></div>十二年春，虏又大入，陷河池，闯武休，公请听四戎司越竟牵制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1298055_comment'></div>俄闻虏已撇梁、洋，趋大安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1298055_comment'></div>诸司集议，公请督张威出师，而僚属各遁去，人心恟恟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1298055_comment'></div>公独不可，曰：「我师既出，虏必不能越大安」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1298055_comment'></div>乃独留利州，且以肩舆告谕军民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1298055_comment'></div>既而石宣剿虏于大安，皆如公料云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1298055_comment'></div>董公既召还，公如简视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1298055_comment'></div>裁五日，利东溃卒入利州，杀王人以叛，繇果、阆、遂宁趋简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1298055_comment'></div>公承窾籍枵帑之馀，誓言死守，且取家于成都，示无去志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1298055_comment'></div>募土豪，劝义助，贷缗于诸司，移粟于近郡，部伍其众，阻江为守，获谍辄纵弗治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1298055_comment'></div>贼知有备，去之普，保茗山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1298055_comment'></div>张威引军沿广汉而下，公迎劳之，给缗钱五万有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1298055_comment'></div>威至普，又四日绝粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1298055_comment'></div>公治糗糒扉屦而具药物牛酒，率三日一遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1298055_comment'></div>士百跃争奋，曰：「使我守边得此，岂惮虏邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1298055_comment'></div>凡饟师捍城，为缗八万有奇，而民不知役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1298055_comment'></div>刘文节公里居，与目其事，乃言于上，谓公料事无遗策，给饷无阙事，保守一城，蔽遮西川，人以为实录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1298055_comment'></div>至夔部，明保伍连坐之法，定里正差役之令，严巡尉侵牟之戒，开居亭自新之门，申黥隶逃归之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1298055_comment'></div>部故多盗，未踰时民得解衣而寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1298055_comment'></div>制置使崔公与之奏言，自古用蜀，多藉蜀才，请以蜀名胜之任四路藩节者兼制置司参议者，公与其一，众谓得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1298055_comment'></div>十六年春，建台于汉中，习知利路自被边多贼谍，且军骄不可令，繇田里不相联比，乃条保甲之法，视夔部加详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1298055_comment'></div>凡乡井长有小大，正有都副，有赀产者为团长，有干局者为提振，不数月而事济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1298055_comment'></div>边民器械夙备，又为放周人鼓铎旗物以辨乡邑之制，除器益备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1298055_comment'></div>无事则谍贼者不得作，军不得恣，有警则守望相助，戎虏知畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1298055_comment'></div>盖无熙宁间刺手遣戍、月就教阅及州县科差之劳，故人不怨而乐趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1298055_comment'></div>三年之间，一路团集凡三十九万二千馀人，汉中独占五万，剑、阆尚不与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1298055_comment'></div>公谓此法可久，上诸朝，利东西安抚丁公㥔、赵公彦呐亦谓便，诏从之，遂刻石以谂来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1298055_comment'></div>其后虏尝一入，制置使郑损自沔奔阆，蜀大震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1298055_comment'></div>赵公出师于沔，刑狱使者集保甲之民以守，虏知有备而去，至是人益服公远略云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1298055_comment'></div>公尝奏言梁、洋与关外五州宜为屯田，诏下制司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1298055_comment'></div>制司以营田隶转运司，屯田隶提刑司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1298055_comment'></div>公方选吏按行，都统制司径白枢府沮其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1298055_comment'></div>公又言曰：「屯田当修堡棚，而戎司谓衅不可启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1298055_comment'></div>然边民自修水关，虏未尝顾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1298055_comment'></div>当寓军于农，而戎司谓军不可役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1298055_comment'></div>然何进首遣师垦天水之田，士未尝怨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1298055_comment'></div>然而莫如以并边逃田听民自耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1298055_comment'></div>明年遄见其利，藉未输公，亦使民食贱粟，官无贵籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1298055_comment'></div>大抵耕广则谷贱，谷贱则人聚，人聚则边实」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1298055_comment'></div>诏下，民翕然从之，未几垦田凡百馀万亩，官耕者三万馀亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1298055_comment'></div>始时麦石为缗十有五，粟二十有五，期年麦十有二，粟十有六，边实人足，咸如公策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1298055_comment'></div>先是宣抚司以军饟不给，下四川州县括绝户田产，吏并缘乾没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1298055_comment'></div>公在夔在利，皆下所部归所歛而继绝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1298055_comment'></div>郑损涂炭衣冠，鱼肉军民，公随事救正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1298055_comment'></div>丁晦父资誉浸显，郑疑其代己，突至汉中，迫辱陵藉，吏民皆重足立，人毋敢造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1298055_comment'></div>公造之如一日，且言于郑，毋为已甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1298055_comment'></div>有此人来归者，公言于郑善遇之，俾为我用，且以系遗黎之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1298055_comment'></div>郑弗听，致有反侧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1298055_comment'></div>公亦自知多忤寡与，郁不得伸，凡五上归休之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1298055_comment'></div>宝庆元年十有二月，裁被报可之命，即日上道，汉中士民攀号载路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1298055_comment'></div>既还沧江，宾朋毕集，乐意融融，殆有人不及知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1298055_comment'></div>然公表里洞达，每朝廷有善政，必喜见色词，至忘寝食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1298055_comment'></div>人有寸长，亦谈不绝口，必荐进扶植之乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1298055_comment'></div>脱有不善，虽大官要人亦切责无顾畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1298055_comment'></div>盖其善善恶恶，惟义是比，不以利害得丧动其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1298055_comment'></div>反室既七月，郑卒以谰词劾公，镌秩罢祠，公亦不以怨尤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1298055_comment'></div>厥三年，鞑虏始入寇，郑弃阶、凤、成、和、天水五州，画守内郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1298055_comment'></div>公移书赵敏若，力持不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1298055_comment'></div>属何进毋去西和，属成都转运判官守文龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1298055_comment'></div>忧国一诚，纯终弗疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1298055_comment'></div>贰年秋八月辛亥，以疾卒，年六十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1298055_comment'></div>赵宜人先公十四年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1298055_comment'></div>男子二人：嘉，迪功郎、监雅州卢山县酒税；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1298055_comment'></div>奭，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1298055_comment'></div>女子二人，长适宣义郎赵婿，宜人之侄也，嫁未久而赵卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1298055_comment'></div>次许嫁登仕郎张景谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1298055_comment'></div>公资孝友，居光禄丧，庐墓三年，尽力茔垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1298055_comment'></div>二季知茂州秋、知荣州夷简蚤世，公拊育诸孤，丧纪昏嫁，一以身任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1298055_comment'></div>所得先畴推以遗季弟迪简，遇恩任以补族子圭寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1298055_comment'></div>所居西南都会，来者辐凑，公精力绝人，五官并用，殆如昔人所谓目数飞雁、耳节鸣鼓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1298055_comment'></div>援笔为文，隽明踔厉，词辨蜂出，辄屈其坐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1298055_comment'></div>四举于礼部，谓世繇此选，不敢忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1298055_comment'></div>壮岁于赵文定之子希先昱尽得程、张、吕、谢、杨、尹诸子《语》《孟》读之，犁然会心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1298055_comment'></div>为钤属，为华阳，又得与成都范公文叔仲黼、季才荪、少才子长、少约子该、豫章李思永修己、延平张子真士佺、汉嘉薛仲章绂、同郡陈叔达遇孙、李微之心传、贯之道传、唐安宋正仲德之、汉嘉邓元卿谏从相与切磋于义理之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1298055_comment'></div>最后了翁试吏，佐四川幕府，倾盖如故交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1298055_comment'></div>始犹以记问词章相尚也，既皆幡然改之，曰事有大于此者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1298055_comment'></div>公自上华阳印，筑室成都之合江，以成雍公卜居未遂之志，秀才范公为榜曰「沧江书院」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1298055_comment'></div>公已尽屏幼志，非益友不亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1298055_comment'></div>自绵州后，则又弃去科举业，于圣贤求仁立德之要益审思不释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1298055_comment'></div>沈潜六经，于《易》尤为精诣，以周、程诸子遗言与邵子先天书、汉上朱氏变玄之说参贯融会，随文申义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1298055_comment'></div>阅十有六年，书成而未出，尚朝惟莫习，以益所未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1298055_comment'></div>大抵赜诸阴阳五行之奥，必约诸躬行日用之近，读者玩词观变，则有所据依，以迁善远罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1298055_comment'></div>长沙吴德夫猎谓人曰：「湘中胡、张子流风所被，而得其学若此者鲜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1298055_comment'></div>永嘉钱文季文子亦自以不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1298055_comment'></div>潼川杨伯昌子谟尝从容论《乾》二五皆言大人，公曰否之，二五亦皆大人而时义不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1298055_comment'></div>因相与问辨，繇是定交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1298055_comment'></div>平生论著有《语解》《诗说》，皆未及编次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1298055_comment'></div>士之请益者肩摩袂属，谒无留门，坐无虚席，爨无停炊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1298055_comment'></div>自二十年来，知与不知皆曰沧江先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1298055_comment'></div>卒之日，蜀之士民涂泣巷吊，学于成都者二百馀人聚哭于沧江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1298055_comment'></div>焕章阁待制眉山李公𡌴亦为文以吊之，有曰：「天禀超轶之才，世传经济之学，知味千载之圣贤，结交四方之英俊」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1298055_comment'></div>人亦服其公云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1298055_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1298055_comment'></div>气质之禀，自非生知上知，宁能无偏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1298055_comment'></div>学则所以矫其偏而复于正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1298055_comment'></div>然今之学者有二：繇博以致约则落华而就实，故志为之主，愈歛而愈实，愈久则愈明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1298055_comment'></div>或者唯博之趋，若可以哗世取荣，然气为之主，气衰则志索，于是有始锐而终惰，始明而终闇者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1298055_comment'></div>学乎学乎，其记览词章之谓乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1298055_comment'></div>嘉既以宝庆三年十月辛酉葬公于嘉定府龙游县熊耳峡震山之原，与赵宜人同兆异域，而使其弟兟与公之门人范义父晞韩，以予同产兄高南叔稼之状抵予于靖曰：「昔者戚友之会，子尝有位焉，而丽习观摩，道同志合，莫子若也，墓道之铭，敢以累子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1298055_comment'></div>予执书以泣曰：非后死者之责乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1298055_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_173_1298055'>维忠肃公，剪戎植华，以兢有邦，以明有家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1298055_comment'></div>于维仲孙，雍祖是则，咀嚅圣言，浩然独得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1298055_comment'></div>歛华以实，律身以度，山泽之脩，雷风之裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1298055_comment'></div>摧奸不惧，见义必为，疏畅忱明，气改质移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1298055_comment'></div>匪光禄有子，忠肃有孙，维蜀有人，虽死而固存。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_177_1298055'></div><div id='poem_sentence_177_1298055_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　是年，应友人宋炎午之请，为其父宋祁仲撰写墓志铭。作品：宣教郎致仕宋君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298051' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298051' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298051?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宣教郎致仕宋君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆三年九月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298051")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298051_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298051'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298051'>宋氏为彭山右族，其家于县之江东者自淑始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298051_comment'></div>淑生某，某生才，才生觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298051_comment'></div>觉生熙，封迪功郎，早孤，克自奋厉，以行谊著于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298051_comment'></div>尝病三乡士民有虚市之征，控于部使者，为奏除之，民至绘其象与使者并祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298051_comment'></div>迪功娶单氏，是生君，名祁仲，字伯应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298051_comment'></div>自小即束书游学，志乡异齐等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298051_comment'></div>踰冠，以词赋试于转运司，与选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298051_comment'></div>后以淳熙十四年庆寿恩，父母皆受封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298051_comment'></div>十六年再举于乡，嘉定四年该累举恩，廷试入等，授忠州文学，阶迪功郎，调汉州什邡县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298051_comment'></div>六年，复以锁应试居亚选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298051_comment'></div>县境延袤，有媪挟镪于郊，盗夺之而缢于沟，后人至，援之得免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298051_comment'></div>君命求盗，召邻里子弟以次视媪，媪指一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298051_comment'></div>君曰未也，命三易冠服迭至，对如初，盗伏其辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298051_comment'></div>有杀人逮捕久弗获，君休吏憩佛舍，有卢山者自陈于庭曰：「我即囚也，愧公之诚，请就捕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298051_comment'></div>众至大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298051_comment'></div>县有马脚镇，引江溉田，曰牛栏堰，旁溉雒县，镇、县民争利，诉于州于监司，历岁不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298051_comment'></div>盛夏辄聚至千百，往往相杀伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298051_comment'></div>君行阡陌，退具其事，以江所从来远而镇之田视雒不及十一，镇田既足，以其馀溉邻可也，何示人不广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298051_comment'></div>帅阃卒用君言，讼平而利溥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298051_comment'></div>寻为邛州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298051_comment'></div>时红巾贼为乱，民有乘间剽掠，宣抚司下令，毋问魁从悉论死，吏请如令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298051_comment'></div>君谓是特大为之防耳，既付有司，则当别白定罪，守意未解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298051_comment'></div>君退白幕府，卒解于大司，止坐渠长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298051_comment'></div>郡当贡士，有司至不以时，士哗然诘之，乃以殴伤白郡，误执他士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298051_comment'></div>君时兼摄录事参军，传爰未具，部使者趣上其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298051_comment'></div>君列五可疑白之守，守以上于使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298051_comment'></div>会误执者为贡士第一，狱亦旋罢，士为歌诗纪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298051_comment'></div>其听狱务持大体率类是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298051_comment'></div>总领财赋任处厚辟差监大军库，辞不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298051_comment'></div>时郡县困于宿逋而邛为甚，君白任君曰：「国用不给固当虑，而根本虚竭尤可忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298051_comment'></div>况邛以盐铁曩号富饶，今利归饷所而虚额视他郡为多，愿亟图之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298051_comment'></div>任为邛蠲十三万缗有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298051_comment'></div>寻监嘉定府罗目镇酒税，君已倦游矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298051_comment'></div>该宝玺恩，循从政郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298051_comment'></div>会冢子炎午试吏夹江，摄邑龙游，刑狱使者张君方檄君诣郡，因就养县斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298051_comment'></div>寻以涖官入考致其仕，溯江还家，踰年不起疾，实十七年正月庚戌，年六十有四，以致仕特转宣教郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298051_comment'></div>娶同邑黄氏，故承事郎镇之女，前二十四年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298051_comment'></div>三男子：炎午，举嘉定十二年进士，前嘉定府夹江县尉兼主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298051_comment'></div>次丰之、祉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298051_comment'></div>祉之前五年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298051_comment'></div>女子长适故忠翊郎、监潭州南岳庙赵时剪，再适史良能，次适进士侯公璹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298051_comment'></div>孙男四人，外孙男女五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298051_comment'></div>诸孤卜宝庆三年九月丁酉葬君于县之安镇乡庆和里饮马溪申山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298051_comment'></div>黄夫人既葬于金牛溪祖墓之北，今改祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298051_comment'></div>未葬，炎午以书抵某曰：「吾父子与君之诸昆夙有契好，墓前之石，公为我铭之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298051_comment'></div>余阅君之阀阅行治，盖宋氏世有令德，迪功奋布衣，为民蠲市征，君以行谊克绍祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298051_comment'></div>尝筑室，榜曰「不欺」、曰「无愧」，凡三为吏，惟兹四言是依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298051_comment'></div>信知官无卑，事无难，即其分所得为，皆足以行其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298051_comment'></div>虽所及有广狭，与其高位厚禄、畏忤患失、谩不能可否事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298051_comment'></div>乃为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1298051'>维古命民，积于邻比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298051_comment'></div>使民自兴，还以长治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298051_comment'></div>风由火出，此岂容伪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298051_comment'></div>谁与舍本，而较末伎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298051_comment'></div>行修于家，信于党术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298051_comment'></div>举或多奇，宦亦寡遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1298051_comment'></div>恂恂伯应，无遂无退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1298051_comment'></div>克世厥心，尚开来裔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1298051_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　是年，戴令翿、戴立本父子造访，为作字说。作品：戴立本字仁夫说。<div id='poem_1297851' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297851' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297851?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戴立本字仁夫说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297851")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297851_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297851'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297851'>某被命南迁，涉绥宁境，戴令翿见其子立本，问奚字，曰仁夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297851_comment'></div>明年，令满戍，之靖请辞，仁夫侍侧，谒余字义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297851_comment'></div>余语之曰：学之道莫大于求仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297851_comment'></div>仁本我有，而恶乎求之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297851_comment'></div>孩提之童无不知爱其亲也，及其长也，无不知敬其兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297851_comment'></div>是理也，至切至近，而人由之不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297851_comment'></div>有子即人所共知者而还以示之，曰：「君子务本，本立而道生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297851_comment'></div>孝弟也者，其为仁之本与」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297851_comment'></div>其示人可谓切近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297851_comment'></div>释者曰：「先能事父兄，然后仁道可大成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297851_comment'></div>程子虑不达者误谓孝弟乃仁之本，又疑孝弟与仁异体也，则蔽之曰「孝弟是仁之一事」，谓行仁自孝弟始，其义滋益晓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297851_comment'></div>呜呼，仁夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297851_comment'></div>其无以他求，其亦内反诸心，凡家庭屋漏之隐、日用饮食之近，随事而著，皆是物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297851_comment'></div>是本既立矣，日引月长，其油然而生也，庸可已乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297851_comment'></div>《书》曰「宅心知训」，仁夫其尚懋敬哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1297851_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　是年，应友人江埙之请，为张宗说撰写墓志铭。作品：归州推官承奉郎致仕张君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298078' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298078' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298078?labeling=true' target='_blank'>归州推官承奉郎致仕张君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆三年四月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298078")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298078_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298078'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298078'>君讳宗说，字岩夫，系出东汉平子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298078_comment'></div>其后南徙，居广信郡，子孙散入闽岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298078_comment'></div>五代初，唐州长史乂追赠补阙，生五子，长保寅，次霭，官至左司员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298078_comment'></div>今居于崇安县之白石山前者，皆保寅之裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298078_comment'></div>曾大父德运，行成名立，学者称为白石先生，语在建安郡乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298078_comment'></div>大父禀，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298078_comment'></div>父璋，以累举恩得官，初尉池之石埭，转丞邵武之建宁，循从事郎，即所居官致其事，改承奉郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298078_comment'></div>母高氏，同县将村人，故武经大夫某之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298078_comment'></div>继母江氏，建阳北乐人，故通判某州杞之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298078_comment'></div>君刻志励行，尤善事继母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298078_comment'></div>未冠举于乡，游朱文公先生之门，得为学之要，耸善扶谊，厚亲睦邻，邦人爱重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298078_comment'></div>绍熙五年，有盗焚掠里闾，由西而东，尽君之乡境而返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298078_comment'></div>后五年复作，自东而西，亦及境而返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298078_comment'></div>咸曰：此善人也，谨毋犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298078_comment'></div>乡邻既赖以免，乃因人情倡为义甲，一家有警则甲众毕集，盗以屏息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298078_comment'></div>光宗践祚，君以累举恩授官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298078_comment'></div>时朱文公以忤权贵人免官，君率僚友逆诸武夷，会于精舍，君语及时事，感愤激烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298078_comment'></div>文公喟然曰：「岩夫真可与语」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298078_comment'></div>为张饮尽欢，书乐府一阕，命同志歌之，且题名以识岁月，今石刻犹存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298078_comment'></div>初调江州湖口尉，属开禧北征，县当孔道，师费百出，君董饷役，检吏奸，民以不扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298078_comment'></div>授归州推官，当上，即追惟考志，亦致其事，改承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298078_comment'></div>后二十年，今上嗣位，以恩转承奉郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298078_comment'></div>自号玉峰逸老，恬于宠利，无声色之奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298078_comment'></div>家事授之二子，唯诗书自娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298078_comment'></div>乐道人之善而略其过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298078_comment'></div>建丰为富沙之名乡，君刑善于里人，尊哲艾，礼名胜，振贫乏，字幼孤，而一门之内父慈子孝，兄友弟恭，故仁逊之风兴焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298078_comment'></div>以宝庆三年四月壬辰卒，十月己酉葬于崇安县仁义乡岚头芦山之下，其子婿江叔文状其行，求文以识诸竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298078_comment'></div>余惟士之进退去就，亦惟反诸心而慊，考诸义而协，所谓七十而致仕者，特约为之制耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298078_comment'></div>若乐行忧违，翔集色举，固不是之计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298078_comment'></div>夫使载高位，食厚禄，则大将行其道，次将行其言，非容容为禄仕计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298078_comment'></div>犹未免乎禄仕也，则辞尊而居卑，辞富而居贫，免死而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298078_comment'></div>若上焉不能以有行也，下焉不出于为贫也，礼际未善也，陈力不能也，有一于是而托尊富以为禄仕，假民社以自丰殖，其于义也何居？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298078_comment'></div>有如张君，老不待年，令德表里，纯名始终，吾故喜闻而乐书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298078_comment'></div>取同县胡氏，文定公之族也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298078_comment'></div>生二男子：<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1298078", 1298078, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>椿年</span>，南剑州将乐县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298078_comment'></div>樗年，与乡举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298078_comment'></div>女二人，江叔文即长婿也，今为承议郎、知靖州永平县，擢通判靖州；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298078_comment'></div>次适昭武黄顺之，故儒林郎、总领湖广京西财赋所干办公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298078_comment'></div>孙男五人：时燀、时煇、时焯、时燂、时燡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298078_comment'></div>孙女四人，长适江维宁，次适江燧，举宝庆二年进士第，调抚州宜黄县尉，即叔文之冢子也，馀未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298078_comment'></div>外孙男子六人，曾孙男女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298078_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1298078'>物竞而独止，人涉而卬不。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298078_comment'></div>精蕴而神内守，志彊而气亦至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298078_comment'></div>二十年閒退之味，八十三康宁之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298078_comment'></div>与其徇物以丧己，叹老而嗟卑也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1298078_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　是年，友人谯仲午遣其子谯埏来探望。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　是年，应友人李刘之请，为其父李琥撰写墓志铭。作品：李次琮墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298067' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298067' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298067?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李次琮墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298067")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298067_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298067'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298067'>抚崇仁有隐君子曰藏脩先生李公彦华，余尝以其孙刘之请铭其竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298067_comment'></div>厥三年，刘通判武冈军，走书靖曰：「既有以见王父于地矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298067_comment'></div>虽然，先君之葬，刘与弟博古支缀残息，仅识岁月于圹，今十有五年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298067_comment'></div>刘不佞，蒙宁宗皇帝擢自主管户部架阁，为国子录，寻以罪斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298067_comment'></div>今上起之祠官，命之郡贰，会郊祀恩赠先君承事郎，妣孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298067_comment'></div>将以命书告第，顾未有以铭竁，呜呼，公其终惠之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298067_comment'></div>余阅其状怃然曰：「士之堙阸乃至此邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298067_comment'></div>国朝以学校育材，以科举取士，济时贻后，亦云盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298067_comment'></div>然而笃信好学、守节厉志之士，有不必尽由此选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298067_comment'></div>盖其敝，上以权谋利禄为操世之具，下以揣摩迎合为攫宠之资，以位天地、育万物之身，顾为小小得失驱迫嗾使以终其年，然则毋惑乎李氏累世而不一逢也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298067_comment'></div>乃为之志曰：君讳琥，字次琮，系见父铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298067_comment'></div>五年丧母周，父怜之，扶携卧起授学，至仁义大端，必反覆开说，曰「人所为贵于物者，凡以是耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298067_comment'></div>故自幼通大义，不以章句为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298067_comment'></div>然性颖晤，援笔成文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298067_comment'></div>家储书万馀卷，皆父手泽，君口诵心惟，自道德性命之奥、名物度数之详、象纬山河之广，靡不究极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298067_comment'></div>国人弟子挟策问疑，豪析缕解，听之者如瞽得相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298067_comment'></div>惟深疾释老氏书，于事亲从兄睦族御下，咸叶义尽分，人谓克肖厥考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298067_comment'></div>客有叹老嗟卑者，君曰：「穷则独善其身，达则兼善天下，得志泽加于民，不得志脩身见于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298067_comment'></div>今穷不得志，则善其身以见于世者，吾侪所当汲汲，而暇忧其非我力者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298067_comment'></div>工部尚书何同叔异闻其言而壮之，引为上客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298067_comment'></div>尝从容为何言：「近世诸老讲明义理，过汉唐诸儒远甚，顾历象、钟律、氏族、军法之学，有讲焉而未尽者，吾欲从公借麻姑山房读书一二年，證其所见，以备阙文」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298067_comment'></div>何公忻然诺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298067_comment'></div>会刘迫官期，奉君济湘，乃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298067_comment'></div>故何公闻君之殁，为之出涕，且吊临甚哀云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298067_comment'></div>君娶吴氏，同邑青云乡进士讳洪之女，相夫教子，行应仪法，前君十七年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298067_comment'></div>子男二人：长刘，次博古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298067_comment'></div>女一人，适进士罗焕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298067_comment'></div>孙男四人，耘、耔、耕、耜，俱蚤世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298067_comment'></div>刘兄弟幼受义方之教，长以词赋应举，君语之曰：「科举累人，汝以贫故为之，吾不汝夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298067_comment'></div>盍自力一经，与其彫虫篆刻，又举业之下也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298067_comment'></div>刘以明《春秋》中嘉定元年进士第，调潭州宁乡县主簿，待戍五年，始得奉君为道林岳麓之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298067_comment'></div>参知政事卫清叔泾守长沙，召刘寘莫下，因留君东阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298067_comment'></div>嘉定六年冬，诏以刘干办成都府路安抚司，堂帖下州毋辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298067_comment'></div>七年春，君至江陵，谒湖北帅赵彦仁方，且告之曰：「吾观星象，狄难将作，公当训民练士以守襄汉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298067_comment'></div>赵公倾心咨策甚悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298067_comment'></div>俄感末疾，赵一再挟医问疾，不克起，为治丧，且以文哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298067_comment'></div>属纩无它语，惟曰：「小子刘，其正学直道，无负吾教」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298067_comment'></div>刘殊州独哭，跣护还里，以是年七月甲戌得卜，用治命葬于所居梅亭之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298067_comment'></div>后七年，博古惧梅亭地浅薄，改卜于同里卢墓之原，与藏脩先生兆相望，亦君志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298067_comment'></div>又为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1298067'>厥氏孰宗，唐大支兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298067_comment'></div>厥绍绵绵，弗弃基兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298067_comment'></div>厥考荒之，若有开兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298067_comment'></div>厥生而秀，报在兹兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298067_comment'></div>厥既开之，报则微兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298067_comment'></div>厥子是似，君何尤兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1298067_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　是年，为沈连撰写墓志铭。作品：华容县丞奉议郎致仕沈君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298075' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298075' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298075?labeling=true' target='_blank'>华容县丞奉议郎致仕沈君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆三年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298075")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298075_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298075'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298075'>故奉议郎致仕沈君讳连，字少逸，以宝庆二年四月庚子卒，年五十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298075_comment'></div>其孤奉遗令，卜分宁县仁义乡古城之原，以明年甲申窆，而介张忠献公诸孙，以君伯氏沔所书圹记、全州文学黄梦雷所状行实求铭于余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298075_comment'></div>维君系出吴兴，徙豫章之分宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298075_comment'></div>曾大父元，大父世瑛，父彦珙，妣郑氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298075_comment'></div>嘉定二年举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298075_comment'></div>三年，大理卿张孝曾为国信使，辟君为属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298075_comment'></div>还，循从事郎，调太平州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298075_comment'></div>未上，丁母忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298075_comment'></div>免丧，调静江府司法参军、京西路提刑司检法官，兼干办公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298075_comment'></div>以劳累迁至承直郎，调岳州华容县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298075_comment'></div>未上致其仕，转奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298075_comment'></div>君姿禀端粹，早有庠校声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298075_comment'></div>大理没于使事，君诹经订律，动合轨程，馆伴使惊异曰：「南朝士大夫精练若此」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298075_comment'></div>试吏为法官，每以所上成案识诸策，而书其上曰：「日监在兹，其审克之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298075_comment'></div>以是用法平恕，民无称冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298075_comment'></div>郡计仰鬻盐以给，吏往往抑配齐民，君禁防吏奸，视盐多寡为价高下，不限以常直，民乐为市而无损于公，岁入视前增倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298075_comment'></div>常平仓前后以缄鐍相授受，诘之吏，曰是腐不可校，故未尝孰何之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298075_comment'></div>君请阅实其数，以新易陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298075_comment'></div>会郡贰杨炎正亦主其议，人颇难之，君白于郡曰：「帑廪皆官物也，以帑羡补廪阙，其谁曰不可」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298075_comment'></div>守莫能移，官吏赖以免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298075_comment'></div>摄举事，诏延左右生，论说无时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298075_comment'></div>岁馀，百废具举，学廪用增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298075_comment'></div>或告以旧例当献于郡，公曰：「是朝廷所以养士，而可献乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298075_comment'></div>乃以修大成殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298075_comment'></div>刑狱使者方孚若信孺闻而善之，为助材用焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298075_comment'></div>蛮寇古县，焚掠生聚，经略司命君抚定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298075_comment'></div>受命不辞，讫事，为图某所当备，某事当更，帅长大悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298075_comment'></div>明年，再遣临桂薄正李闳祖问民疾苦，民指君昔所经理曰：「是皆可久，愿守之毋失」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298075_comment'></div>京西刑狱司治襄阳，以边防移汉东，且兼领郡事，寻又还襄，寮属惟君一人，往来劳勚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298075_comment'></div>会虏薄襄城，君入裨幕议，出厉将士，咸中机会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298075_comment'></div>制置使赵彦仁方亦移治襄，君修十事以献，赵称之不容口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298075_comment'></div>由是与参谋议，岁时犒士，亦惟君属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298075_comment'></div>秩满，荐书阙一，当路者欲留之，君辞去，曰：「奈何以己妨人」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298075_comment'></div>有宅在豫章城中，因徙居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298075_comment'></div>华容丞当上，即挂衣冠不复出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298075_comment'></div>平生事亲从兄，交友睦族，皆尽其分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298075_comment'></div>取叶氏，先二十一年卒，继冯氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298075_comment'></div>男子二人，曰本，曰荣发，俱世其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298075_comment'></div>荣发尝与乡举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298075_comment'></div>女子子二人，长适夔州司理同郡宋槻，次适贡士广汉张必大，皆相阀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298075_comment'></div>孙男二人，光述、进孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298075_comment'></div>女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298075_comment'></div>余蜀人也，不及与君接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298075_comment'></div>按状所云，仕桂日尝以守法为杨子直所知，以补常平之乏为崔正子所善，二公端人也，所取宜可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298075_comment'></div>其后在襄，赵彦仁才之，既去又以书来之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298075_comment'></div>去就迟速之节，始终可观，是宜铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298075_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1298075'>莫乐无求，莫荣无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298075_comment'></div>宁羸厥躬，永焘尔嗣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1298075_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1227&endYear=1227')">1227年</a>　是年，为友人李坤臣撰写墓志铭。作品：李中父墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298060' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298060' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298060?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李中父墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆三年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1227年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298060")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298060_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298060'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298060'>吾友李中父生而秀悟，七岁彊记过人，十三善属文，十六以《周官》书应聘有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298060_comment'></div>十九与乡举，未及仕于春官而大父母卒，哭泣以丧明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298060_comment'></div>绍熙四年，考君策进士甲科，注普州州学教授，遽以丧返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298060_comment'></div>中父号于殡庙曰：「某自今无望于斯世矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298060_comment'></div>卜宅兆以葬重亲，求菽水以养嬗母，教养弟妹以冀其成立，如是而已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298060_comment'></div>贫无担储，受徒以自给，积岁累月，仅毕所愿，益得以大肆于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298060_comment'></div>少所诵习，省记无遗，至是温寻而增益之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298060_comment'></div>尝馆于大邑刘氏，因痔痛彻心膂，为诗曰：「生道由来贯古今，纤毫不假外推寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298060_comment'></div>只因疾病呻吟切，识得平生第一心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298060_comment'></div>繇是随事习察，精切明著，群经义疏、诸史百氏，靡不究研。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298060_comment'></div>出则门人、居则弟若子从旁代读，气听色受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298060_comment'></div>读已，讽味数十过，融液浃洽乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298060_comment'></div>人有问焉，从容辨对，往往有目者所未睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298060_comment'></div>于三《礼》尤该畅，尝欲为《周礼传》而未及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298060_comment'></div>晚尤邃于《易》，以周、程子书参诸邵子之说，每谓太极、大衍相为表里，羲《易》、周《经》相为体用，《彖》、《系》多述先天心法而人罕知之，欲笔之于书，亦未及为之，而精体嘿识固已月异岁殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298060_comment'></div>尝曰：「朝闻道，夕死可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298060_comment'></div>世方驰骋乎俗学而不闻大道，虽廑劳没齿，知其无以死也」。<div class='inline'
