id='poem_title_252982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252982'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252982'>馀晦越乡别临贺，郭君出竟送荆州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252982'>放麑心事人誇说，得似如今累岁留。<div id='poem_sentence_1_252982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_252982'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_252982_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年6月8日</a>　生日，李肩吾赋诗庆贺，次韵答谢；且作谢启答谢地方官。作品：次肩吾庆生日韵。生日谢守倅以下惠诗词启。<div id='poem_253113' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253113' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253113?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次肩吾庆生日韵<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（己丑）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_253113")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253113_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253113'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253113'>男儿生世果何事，卜士诗之闾史书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253113'>内美元非私正则，天彝岂但付胥馀<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：箕子名。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253113'>滔滔大化亘千古，职职群生同一初。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253113'>此事年来才信得，从前浪走只成疏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253113'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253113_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_253111' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_253111' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/253111?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（己丑）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_253111_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_253111'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_253111'>我友忧时发满梳，殷勤勉我用诗书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_253111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_253111'>情知分义如何废，可使才能自有馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_253111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_253111'>气血渐衰多病后，创夷转甚数年初。<div id='poem_sentence_2_253111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_253111'>梦魂惯识归来趣，长傍山椒撷稻疏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_253111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_253111'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_253111_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1297538' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297538' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297538?labeling=true' target='_blank'>生日谢守倅以下惠诗词启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1229年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297538")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297538_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297538'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297538'>止《离骚》之国，三阅流年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297538_comment'></div>诵「皇览」之篇，四惊初度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297538_comment'></div>于焉信处，岂不怀归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297538_comment'></div>深虞罪罟之靡夷，复念劬劳之罔极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297538_comment'></div>有来善颂，垂贲孤踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297538_comment'></div>烂其朝采之贻，记此门弧之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297538_comment'></div>今朝五十初过二，正哦苏子之诗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297538_comment'></div>明年半百又加三，徒重白公之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297538_comment'></div>更期终诲，益厉后图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297538_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1297538_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年7月11日</a>　董甄自竟陵以《黄太史帖》见寄，为作题跋。作品：跋黄太史帖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　夏秋间，与友人真德秀书信往来论学。作品：答真侍郎德秀。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年10月</a>　侄高斯得自京城归蜀，折道至靖州来探望魏了翁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　稍后，门人程掌亦专程来访。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　约于其时，为高斯得岳父蹇君章撰写墓志铭。作品：朝奉大夫知荣州蹇君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298053' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298053' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298053?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉大夫知荣州蹇君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝庆三年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1229年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298053")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298053_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298053'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298053'>潼之通泉蹇氏系出浔阳，伏羲时曰脩，秦穆时曰叔，世久莫可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298053_comment'></div>唐禧宗时曰元盛，扈驾为排顿使，后居盐亭之白马，葬射洪之果园山，则入蜀之始祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298053_comment'></div>五世祖隽民，生二子，长曰颀，次曰颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298053_comment'></div>颀举元丰五年进士第二人，掌武信军节度书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298053_comment'></div>四传曰享父，生五子，其三人举绍熙元年进士，后以升朝恩累赠奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298053_comment'></div>颐以文学补官，是生常通，常通生利用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298053_comment'></div>利用生南运，累赠朝请郎，踰冠而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298053_comment'></div>治命以奉议之季子为后，是为君，讳君章，字晦卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298053_comment'></div>方十岁，执丧哀甚，事母王安人孝谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298053_comment'></div>未几安人卒，孤苦自持，垢衣粝食，澹如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298053_comment'></div>庆元元年，以词赋擢四川类省试高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298053_comment'></div>明年视进士乙科赐第，调青石县尉，历渠州司法参军、利州路提刑司检法官、凤州司法参军，以举主改宣教郎、知温江县，通判南平军、重庆府，知茂、荣二州，荣未上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298053_comment'></div>在渠事吴晓，晓骄恣不迪，察君非附己者，临之甚威，卒无瑕可指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298053_comment'></div>为检法官期年，曦叛，晓据兴元，衔前事停检法奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298053_comment'></div>君将去之，会本生母卒，乃行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298053_comment'></div>在凤日，宣抚司经量关外田，受命者率加赋以为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298053_comment'></div>君往真符，索夏秋岁输之数，以田均税，豪发无所益，民至今利焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298053_comment'></div>治温江，府督宿逋甚峻，君从容干理，宁其稽令，不以病民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298053_comment'></div>谕学积颓，巴县亦久不治，君以节缩浮费，府有馀财，各发泉二百万助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298053_comment'></div>茂之属县曰汶川，当威、茂之冲，土人汤彬豪于财，啸呼夷獠，武断豪夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298053_comment'></div>铁邪蕃虽隶威，而市于永康，必道汶川，彬父子数御之，为二州患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298053_comment'></div>君调军禽而戮之，繇是徼外无敢哗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298053_comment'></div>节用丰储，卒以春夏之交损粜直以赈贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298053_comment'></div>夙有胃疾，既去郡，行至汶川明窄馆而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298053_comment'></div>语不及私，唯曰：「贫者士之常，死者人之终，吾何求哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298053_comment'></div>当宝庆三年八月庚午，年五十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298053_comment'></div>取刘氏，东溪先生伯熊之孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298053_comment'></div>男森之，举嘉定十年进士，前为蓬溪县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298053_comment'></div>女适高斯得，举绍定二年进士，授文林郎、利州观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298053_comment'></div>森之既以母命卜遂宁府长江县甲山，以今年十月己酉举君之丧即窆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298053_comment'></div>前之月，以君之同年进士冯君邦佐所状事实属铭于靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298053_comment'></div>会斯得亦自都城来靖申其请，呜呼，余知晦卿已久，冯公辅余所善也，斯得吾之同产兄之子也，况又以知晦卿居家涖官之实，余曷敢曰不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298053_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1298053'>人莫己信，唯贵是师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298053_comment'></div>冥升为能，昼攫为奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298053_comment'></div>孰知古之人，为吾分所得为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298053_comment'></div>虽所居无赫赫名，而所去见思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298053_comment'></div>吾晦卿父，其尚有闻于兹。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1298053'></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1298053_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　年底，为陶熏撰写墓志铭。作品：郁林佥书判官陶君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（彭东焕《魏了翁年谱》又将此事系于次年。）</span><div id='poem_1298064' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298064' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298064?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郁林州佥书判官陶君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍定三年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1229年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298064")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298064_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298064'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298064'>始予闻诸柳文惠侯，曰「楚之南少人而多石」，而欧阳文忠公亦曰「蛮荆鲜人秀，厥美为珍怪」，心窃异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298064_comment'></div>五方之民虽气禀有清浊，而降才非殊，亦系乎风化何如耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298064_comment'></div>姑考诸近世，倡明正学以绍孔、孟之传者前后迭出，率在湖湘间，至于登朝著、仕州县、奋科第者，又不可胜数，然后知柳、欧之言固不尽然，抑亦风气有时而变移邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298064_comment'></div>予识陶宗山崇于南宫，于策府，于经筵，博览强记而娴于辞，固疑全虽楚南小郡，不为无人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298064_comment'></div>及迁靖，又多识全士，其间如滕谨仲处厚、蒋成父公顺，辱从予游，皆通经穷理，益信士之贤不止此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298064_comment'></div>谨仲陶甥也，一日以书抵予曰：「吾舅郁林君将葬，敢以铭请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298064_comment'></div>且状其事曰：君讳薰，字南仲，全州清湘县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298064_comment'></div>陶氏系自柴桑，避乱南徙，乐湘中山水而居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298064_comment'></div>有弼者为东上閤门使，有几先从山谷学文，皆寓零陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298064_comment'></div>全旧隶零陵，今之居洮村者乃其派也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298064_comment'></div>远祖硕，尝游太学，仕至将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298064_comment'></div>曾祖镕，繇舍法升胄庠，仕至浔州推官，以承奉郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298064_comment'></div>祖宰，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298064_comment'></div>父森，修职郎、监衡州耒阳县酒库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298064_comment'></div>妣唐氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298064_comment'></div>君自幼资禀轶群，淳熙间程氏之学盛行，君得诸师友，口诵心惟，期达诸德业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298064_comment'></div>既再冠乡举，会学禁事起，退而教授乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298064_comment'></div>嘉定弛禁，君之志少伸，乃举七年进士，调昭州平乐县簿尉，改注浔州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298064_comment'></div>浔乏官久，始至无居，捐奉以筑室，辟轩于圄之侧，扁曰「明听」，卧兴其间以察囚情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298064_comment'></div>摄桂平县，县彫弊，科罚烦，请于州，曰如是则可为，否则有去耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298064_comment'></div>州将从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298064_comment'></div>居八月，州无逮吏之扰，民无滥罚之怨，事亦以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298064_comment'></div>洞寇为扰，有妄获平民为贼级，欲要改秩之赏，刑狱使者命君核实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298064_comment'></div>君为伸其枉，使者荐诸朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298064_comment'></div>在浔四年，以举主三员关升，授主管邕州溪洞司机宜文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298064_comment'></div>邕当南蛮之会，控㧖诸洞，异时居是官者为洞酋所饵，贻轻纳侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298064_comment'></div>君一切谢绝，归橐萧然，远人畏慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1298064_comment'></div>寻有被帅檄主互市，擅杀人于边鄙，传闻失实，使者虽命君究诘，实以书请属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1298064_comment'></div>君持不可曰：「所杀二人耳，馀皆不实」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1298064_comment'></div>使者大怒，寮吏亦有先同后异者，君不为改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1298064_comment'></div>使者寻亦悔悟，就任辟昭州教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1298064_comment'></div>君在邕凡三摄州，摄教事一年，皆善其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1298064_comment'></div>至昭视事阅月，丁母忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1298064_comment'></div>服阕，广右台阃交辟，佥书郁林州军事判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1298064_comment'></div>过期乃往，仅四舍，若有所感而反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1298064_comment'></div>寝疾三日，召仲子建付以家事，屏艾却药，以绍定二年十二月癸亥晦卒于家箦，年七十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1298064_comment'></div>公为人神整而裕，节安而和，一介不妄取与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1298064_comment'></div>燕处无惰容，临事有大虑，为文尚理致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1298064_comment'></div>宗山位于朝，家问往来必勉以名义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1298064_comment'></div>予阅其状而叹曰：楚之南而有是人邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1298064_comment'></div>谓人少石多，既诬其邦之人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1298064_comment'></div>谓人之秀者鲜，则湖以南不为无士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1298064_comment'></div>且吾所见于全之士不为少，况如君之言德，其在浔在邕，皆以畏知谨独、达枉疏滞为职之先务，既非文俗吏所敢知，状所谓神整而裕、节安而和，又非阅理多而蓄德久者不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1298064_comment'></div>然则予虽未与君接，而其内外亲友所逮见闻者若此，予曷敢不铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1298064_comment'></div>君积官至承直郎，以引年致仕转奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1298064_comment'></div>取唐氏，再取王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1298064_comment'></div>生四子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1298064_comment'></div>子男三人：圻，继卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1298064_comment'></div>次建，次垍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1298064_comment'></div>女子子一人，嫁进士宾庾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1298064_comment'></div>孙男女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1298064_comment'></div>建等将以明年三月壬辰葬君于栗山阡，君所自卜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1298064_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1298064'>厥昌厥丰，而啬其逢以独善厥躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1298064_comment'></div>亦或庸之，则日昳而途穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1298064_comment'></div>扬清风兮浔邕，识遗恨兮幽宫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1298064_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，应邵阀之请，作《湘乡县褚公洗笔池记》<div id='poem_1297949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湘乡县褚公洗笔池记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1229年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297949")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297949'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297949'>唐永徽六年，褚公以尚书右仆射谏立武宸妃，几为所杀，赖长孙太尉一言以免，犹坐贬潭州都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297949_comment'></div>一日行县至湘乡，距县治之北数百步，有僧寺曰感应，公尝涤笔池上，若有浮云滃然，人异之，即其地祠公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297949_comment'></div>岁久弗治，藩拔碑仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297949_comment'></div>绍定二年，邵君自言为宰，即故堤遗址封略而浚治焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297949_comment'></div>断碑所勒，有「远山崷崒翠凝烟」之诗，乃为亭其上，榜曰「凝烟」，为大门，榜曰「唐都督褚公洗笔池」，更为堤以环之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297949_comment'></div>灌木脩蔓，蒙茸蔽亏，涟水衡陈，凤山对峙，实为是邦胜处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297949_comment'></div>书来，命记成事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297949_comment'></div>余惟《咸》以无心为感，《艮》以不获其身为明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297949_comment'></div>盖感于所不系，感以虚也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297949_comment'></div>止于所不见，见以理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297949_comment'></div>此人心之良感而实见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297949_comment'></div>方褚公之俟罪长沙也，枭妇之势如燎方扬，而辙迹所繇，豪端所沾，湘民之爱之殆与屈潭、贾井俪芳齐荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297949_comment'></div>况笔非有灵也，水非有云也，即思而成，致爱而存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297949_comment'></div>世之相后今六百载，尚懔乎如在也，是又奚感奚见而然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297949_comment'></div>许敬宗、李义府诸人挤善逢恶，固无足言，李绩何为者，亦迁延独对，故陈丧邦之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297949_comment'></div>自一忤一合而升沈立判，升者信乎为得矣，岁月慆迈，事与时逝，浮荣急景何翅朝菌莫蕣，而是心之昭昭可以建诸天地、质诸鬼神者，亿万人而一心，千百载而一日，著在史册，寓诸陈迹，是非邪正燎如目睫，彼所谓得者初无毫发加益，徒起秽以自臭，而忠臣良士流风所渐，则虽残堤断碣，过其下者屏营徬徨，周视太息，莫敢剪拜，甚则尸祝而社祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297949_comment'></div>呜呼，是所谓良感而实见，非可以幸而致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297949_comment'></div>敬宗既陷忠良，复专史笔，变乱白黑，类非敬播之旧，如谓刘垍之死，褚公有力，且垍子讼冤之事，义府助之，而敬宗书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297949_comment'></div>公之大节如此，人将公之信乎，抑许、李之信乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297949_comment'></div>然则士大夫以万物皆备之身而不以古人自任，不以千载自期，则亦自遏其躬耳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297949_comment'></div>邵君金华名阀也，习闻诗书之训，故为政知所先后，其必谓余言然也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1297949_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，知同产兄高茂叔下世，于咸德寺设位祭奠，作文哭之。作品：哭茂叔兄。<div id='poem_1298166' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298166' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298166?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭茂叔兄文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1229年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298166")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298166_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298166'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298166'>维年月日，具位魏某收家记，伏闻谦四宣教表兄讣音，谨率妻孥就本州威德寺为位而哭，而系之以词曰：嗟嗟吾兄，而殒厥身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298166_comment'></div>勤约以处己，畏谨以得亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298166_comment'></div>友爱著于兄弟，而恩意浃乎乡邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298166_comment'></div>博闻多识，不溺志于词采；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298166_comment'></div>正色直道，不受变于邅迍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298166_comment'></div>嘿坐兀兀，疾书翩翩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298166_comment'></div>虽疚逾美，虽诱弗挻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298166_comment'></div>同气之伦类为世用，而兄不一遇焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298166_comment'></div>藉曰得失有命，顾不可少假之年乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298166_comment'></div>去年之秋，手书谆谆，谓苦胀疾，艰于屈伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298166_comment'></div>旋闻入冬，疾已少痊，而相望数千里，终莫能以释然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298166_comment'></div>亦谓以半生之坎𡒄，岂不能贸数岁之迁延，胡为凶问，忽堕乎前！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298166_comment'></div>犹幸斯得闻诸路人，而彭门亦以书来，此宜得诸族姻，惊怛失据，其梦其信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298166_comment'></div>藐是羁穷，五溪之濒，疾不问膳药之齐，死不陪哭位之联，蛮荒一恸，涕泪彻泉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1298166_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，应友人张先之之请，为其外姑撰写墓志铭。作品：於夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1298081' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298081' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298081?labeling=true' target='_blank'>于夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1229年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298081")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298081_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298081'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298081'>始余官胄庠，天台张子益先之来为博士弟子员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298081_comment'></div>厥二十有三年，予迁靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298081_comment'></div>又三年而子益来为州教授，从容语及家事，蹙然曰：「吾妇氏将有谒焉，而未之敢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298081_comment'></div>予薄而问之：「予与子益友也，子益有骨肉之爱，而予得恝然乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298081_comment'></div>则辟席而进曰：「予外姑卒于开禧二年二月辛未，今岁再终矣，史巫纷若，实操封竁之柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298081_comment'></div>迨绍定元年十二月庚申，始克窆于翠岩山楼溪余氏先茔之卤原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298081_comment'></div>予也学先王之道，疑不以简丧绥葬为可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298081_comment'></div>妇之兄曰余由，将以铭请，而吾弗敢致也，子其许我乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298081_comment'></div>使诵其事，则由之父夔所为事状也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298081_comment'></div>其略曰：「吾妻于氏，世为台之黄岩人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298081_comment'></div>父进武校尉光时，祖父然，曾祖父龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298081_comment'></div>吾妻幼庄重孝谨，校尉死，母胡氏有心疾，侍膳药漱浣，左右无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298081_comment'></div>既归余氏，则以所事母事舅姑，敬共夙夜，承事宾祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298081_comment'></div>夔先君子乐为善，客至无留门，吾妻先意议酒食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298081_comment'></div>有友调官乏资，思赡之不能，吾妻出奁中金以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298081_comment'></div>里之黄氏有二女孤贫无依，先君字而嫁之，则又助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298081_comment'></div>凡此类弗可胜数」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298081_comment'></div>予喟然曰：「是虽妇德之常，亦人所难能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298081_comment'></div>姑止是，为子志之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298081_comment'></div>子益曰：「抑吾姑之善也，不宁维是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298081_comment'></div>吾闻诸妇曰：吾母承宁族姻，容礼娣姒，绥御妾姬，燠休贫弱，一门之内盎然以春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298081_comment'></div>而自律至严，每诵古人夜行以烛之语，未尝越足礼法」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298081_comment'></div>予曰，子益之言宜信，而予也罪放之馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298081_comment'></div>虽然，予曷敢不铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298081_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1298081'>母良其子，舅顺其妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298081_comment'></div>夫贞其配，子慈其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298081_comment'></div>婿义其姑，我铭其墓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1298081_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，聘滕处厚为家教，教小儿读书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，友人赵必愿派人送资料来，致书答谢。作品：答赵全州必愿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，读《周易》，撰《周易集义》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，致书友人苏振文，讨论学事。作品：答苏伯起振文。<div id='poem_1298109' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1298109' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1298109?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苏伯起振文墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（端平元年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1298109")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1298109_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1298109'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1298109'>予奉使潼川日，今春官贰卿度周卿移书谂予曰：「子得人矣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1298109_comment'></div>正有友二人，曰罗坚父传之、苏伯起振文，今坚父举进士而苏落落不偶，聚书数万卷，圣经贤传、山经地志、私乘野史，以至虞初稗官、旁行敷落之书，靡不搜罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1298109_comment'></div>后溪刘德修尝举贤良方正科，长沙吴德夫又以遗逸荐于朝，子其言之矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1298109_comment'></div>先是，予衔命入竟，首访人物，遂、合人士多以苏伯起、冯仲新鼎重为称，予首延致之，皆魁岸人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1298109_comment'></div>伯起尤善谈辩，诹经订史，援据蜂起，坐人为屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1298109_comment'></div>予尝谑之曰：「晏子所谓儒者滑稽而不可轨法，倨傲自顺而不可以为下，君其近诸」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1298109_comment'></div>则捧腹大笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1298109_comment'></div>处数月而别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1298109_comment'></div>予仕王朝，以言事迁靖，伯起遗予书曰：「吾于遂宁有宅一区，竹万个，大木十围者百章，溪流径其间，将为啸歌终老之计」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1298109_comment'></div>请书其颜曰「水竹庄」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1298109_comment'></div>有亭曰玩芳，以故礼部侍郎曹公叔远记示予，大抵述其放于骚人幽愤之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1298109_comment'></div>予迁靖后，温寻故书，自四经、三《礼》、《语》、《孟》以来，摘精抆萃，探深抉异，虽章句训故、名物度数，悉加雠校，往往有先贤未及发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1298109_comment'></div>间为人言，或口呿目𥈭，而伯起过我泸上，相与讲切则率多领会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1298109_comment'></div>予益知其用功之久，方将勉以歛华就实，去艰深而趋平易，反而验诸真履实蹈，庶不为空言之归，而君以衰疾求去，浩乎不可留，盖亦自知血气之不可强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1298109_comment'></div>别未数旬而卒，实绍定六年九月戊申也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1298109_comment'></div>系出梓州之铜山，淳化参知政事易简乃其九世祖，自铜山徙合之铜梁，今又徙遂宁之遂宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1298109_comment'></div>曾大父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1298109_comment'></div>大父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1298109_comment'></div>王考某，元配赵氏，朝散郎、前知广安军楙之女，继室以钱氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1298109_comment'></div>二子男：曰坚石、坚木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1298109_comment'></div>女适文林郎、知合州巴川县事姚仲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1298109_comment'></div>端平元年十二月庚寅，坚石兄弟葬君于龙门里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1298109_comment'></div>先事，使来乞铭曰：「尚死者之心也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1298109_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1298109'>自乡治废而公道壅，以科目之得失为人才之轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1298109_comment'></div>有如伯起，抱珍蕴异而老不见用，然则曾谓科目果可以选众也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1298109_comment'></div>龙门之峰，凄其长终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1298109_comment'></div>孰铭丘封，太史了翁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1298109_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，与友人袁甫商讨学事，流露欲撰《古今考》之想；并应袁甫之请，为其篆“敬寿堂”匾额。作品：答袁衢州甫。<div id='poem_1297401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297401?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答袁衢州<span class='inlineComment2'>（甫）</span>书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1229年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297401")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297401_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297401'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297401'>静寿杰作，义味渊永，又以觇深造自得之趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297401_comment'></div>所存若此，则施诸有政，盖可想见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297401_comment'></div>况絜斋、慈湖训语，朝夕左右，所以舆卫此心者至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297401_comment'></div>何当簉顾、夏诸贤之列，相与共讲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297401_comment'></div>山囚濑絷，瞻晤亡从，祗有悢悢浩气说剖析精详，皆不易得，惟以三勿为二勿，稍似欠阙耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297401_comment'></div>某山间三阅寒暑，于六经名数文义上重下钝功夫，的然见得古人所志所学，历战国暴秦以后无传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297401_comment'></div>极于五胡之乱，影灭迹绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297401_comment'></div>岂无经生学士，随其才分，有所建立？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297401_comment'></div>然骛于高远者，惟欲直指径造，以步步而行，字字而讲者为卑近；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297401_comment'></div>而安于卑近者，则又以区区记诵，小小词章为学问之极功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297401_comment'></div>所谓合外内、贯精粗者，百数十年间，始有人讲寻，以发汉唐之所未讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297401_comment'></div>又苦于实未有所见者，剿说雷同，为声利计，以为斯道之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297401_comment'></div>方欲通古今为一书，使后之有志于王道者，犹可以推原寻流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1297401_comment'></div>而学未能信，不敢容易下笔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1297401_comment'></div>近又有数篇，不得已而为之者，谩录求教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1297401_comment'></div>其视高文，犹禅律之不相伴也，望为过目，以一语可否焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1297401_comment'></div>委作「静寿」字，当更增一「堂」字，方为稳实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1297401_comment'></div>盖去「堂」字，特数十年间事耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1297401_comment'></div>三衢为舟车之冲，而广微以静镇之，曾无留难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1297401_comment'></div>又以暇日与士友周旋于义理之会，乃知清心寡欲，何事不可济，安得百子骏布在天下，使万物吐气邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1297401_comment'></div>东归故庐，外事一切不复与闻，虽足以见深识远览，无愿乎其外，抑不知何者为外？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1297401_comment'></div>国事济否，民生戚休，恐亦非于我全不相关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1297401_comment'></div>况东归之地，今为天下剧乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1297401_comment'></div>《论语》于「不在其位」之下，联书「思不出其位」一语，每疑下「位」字当是正位居体之位，盖因下语而推广及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1297401_comment'></div>然因此二语相连，后世遂有以分所当为而疑于出位者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1297401_comment'></div>此其差亦在毫釐之间，高明以为如何？</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1297401_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1229&endYear=1229')">1229年</a>　是年，与友人郭黄中论学，书信往来，略叙山中读书情况。作品：答巴州郭通判黄中。<div id='poem_1297451' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297451' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297451?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答巴州郭通判<span class='inlineComment2'>（黄中）</span>书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1229年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297451")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297451_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297451'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297451'>某囚山恰三载，温寻旧读，书味隽永，益觉从前涉猎疏卤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297451_comment'></div>今已迈始衰之年，方粗见端绪，而岁月易得，义理无穷，深惧因循玩愒，以贻无穷之悔，昼抄夜诵，迫之不置，又惧有欲速助长之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297451_comment'></div>大抵此等事姑以世间习读，善记览，为词章，亦云可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297451_comment'></div>要一字一义不放过，则面前何限合理会处！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297451_comment'></div>且如先王礼乐刑政，始变于厉、宣、幽、平，浸微于春秋，浸灭于战国，大坏于秦，不能复于汉，而尽亡于五胡之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297451_comment'></div>今仅从残编中搜讨，于孔、毛、王、郑、伏、杜诸儒对注中，参求古今之物，称谓各异，风气亦殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297451_comment'></div>汉去古未远，诸儒已是臆度悬料，其大者如郊丘、明堂、庙祧、尸主、田制、邦域，往往一人之见，一时之意，遂定为不可易之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297451_comment'></div>其不可忽者，音训、声韵、偏旁、点画，往往诸儒所未及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297451_comment'></div>今骤然理会，人亦惊怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297451_comment'></div>不知要作穷理格物功夫，无三代以前规摹在胸次，只在汉晋诸儒脚迹下盘旋，终不济事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1297451_comment'></div>程、邵、张、朱诸公，亦皆由此而充者，方叔以为如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1297451_comment'></div>山中日永，方欲专心于所当事，而四方之知旧间亦以文字相挠，有不得不应者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1297451_comment'></div>时一下笔，亦欲藉此与朋友讲磨，谨摘数篇求教。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1297451_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1230&endYear=1230')">1230年闰2月</a>　致书友人陈允迪。作品：答湖广陈总领允迪。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1230&endYear=1230')">1230年6月8日</a>　生日，靖州时官、士人来贺，作启答谢。作品：答靖州时官士人惠生日启。<div id='poem_1297539' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297539' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297539?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答靖州时官士人惠生日启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1230年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297539")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297539_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297539'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297539'>百年强半，叶黄州再闰之时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297539_comment'></div>五十加三，起白傅怀归之咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297539_comment'></div>岂但父兮母兮之感，宁忘国尔公尔之忧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297539_comment'></div>报称未能，省循莫措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297539_comment'></div>曾谓始生之旦，骤蒙善颂之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297539_comment'></div>疑甲子之纪年，问庚寅之初度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297539_comment'></div>羊牛下括，虽见思行役之无期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297539_comment'></div>鸿雁于飞，正兴念劬劳之安宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1297539_comment'></div>愿言终诲，益厉后图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1297539_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1297539_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1230&endYear=1230')">1230年</a>　与江西提刑叶宰书信往来。作品：答江西提刑叶大卿宰。<div id='poem_1297417' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1297417' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1297417?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答江西提刑叶大卿<span class='inlineComment2'>（宰）</span>书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1230年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_1297417")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1297417_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1297417'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1297417'>乃者获侍同朝，清标鲠论，立懦廉顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1297417_comment'></div>有如愚不适时，婴祸触忌，而逋诛一二年，则尚以两同年正学直道，扶持保护之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1297417_comment'></div>粤从违异，五阅荆火，大卿暂弭芳节，典司祥刑，罪戾姓名无由辄污几御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1297417_comment'></div>未几，赣守遣人来，则知大卿以忧乞身去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1297417_comment'></div>虽罔极之哀，岂易堪任，而四郊多垒，腥焰方张，匪牧匪监，何恃不恐？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1297417_comment'></div>则斯人之无所冯依以立，亦可闵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1297417_comment'></div>尝欲修书奉慰，越在蛮陬，不通于中州，无便风可寓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1297417_comment'></div>顾为来教先辱，祗以重其不敏之愧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1297417_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(35522, "南宋", "魏了翁", "poem_title_252974")'>魏了翁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252974_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252974'><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_252973' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/252973?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1230年7月6日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_252973_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_252973'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_252973'>牛女河边两夹持，前瞻箕斗后虚危。<div id='poem_sentence_0_252973_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_252973'>经星不动元如此，自是人閒空好奇。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_554025' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/554025?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1230年7月6日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_554025_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_554025'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_554025'>假拙济奸真是拙，认奸作巧巧何曾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_554025_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_554025'>须知我自灵于物，一点光明万古镫。<div
